NK045(bi)001:1: // yon tan rin chen sdud pa'i 'grel pa rgyal ba'i
NK045(bi)001:2: yum gyi dgongs don la phyin ci ma log par
NK045(bi)001:3: 'jug pa'i legs bshad ces bya ba bzhugs so //
NK045(bi)001:5: rgyal ba nyi ma'i gnyen dang rgyal ba'i sras //
NK045(bi)001:6: ma pham 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang klu sgrub sogs //
NK045(bi)001:7: rgyal ba'i brgyud 'dzin zab mo dbu ma'i lam //
NK045(bi)001:8: ston mdzad bshes gnyen tshogs la gus phyag 'tshal //
NK045(bi)001:9: mkha' dang mnyam pa rgyal ba rgyal sras dang //
NK045(bi)001:10: slob mar bcas pa dus gsum 'phags tshogs kyi //
NK045(bi)001:11: 'byung gnas yum mchog gang la gus pa'i blos //
NK045(bi)001:12: de yi tshul la 'jug pa legs par brjod //
NK045(bi)001:13: de la 'dir dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi
NK045(bi)001:14: gsung chos kyi mdzod mi zad pa thams cad kyi
NK045(bi)001:15: nang na snying po lta bu dang mthar thug par
NK045(bi)001:16: gyur pa ni 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol
NK045(bi)001:17: tu phyin pa yin par gsungs la /
NK045(bi)001:18: de la'ang yum sras bcu bdun du grags pa sogs
NK045(bi)001:19: rnam grangs du mar bzhugs pa las yon tan rin
NK045(bi)001:20: po che sdud pa 'dir ni de thams cad kyi
NK045(bi)001:21: don yongs su rdzogs par 'dus shing /
NK045(bi)001:22: tshigs su bcad pa'i sdeb sbyor gsal ba dang /
NK045(bi)001:23: sangs rgyas nyid kyi zhal nas gsungs pa'i bka' yin
NK045(bi)001:24: pa sogs yon tan gyi khyad par du mas 'phags
NK045(bi)001:25: pa 'di la 'chad nyan byas pas shes rab kyi
NK045(bi)001:26: pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' dag la 'chad nyan
NK045(bi)001:27: byas par 'gyur ba'i phyir bsam pa dag pas 'di
NK045(bi)001:28: yi dgongs don la 'jug pa'i tshul dam pa rnams
NK045(bi)001:29: kyi man ngag la brten te brjod pa la dngos
NK045(bi)001:30: bstan stong nyid kyi tshul ltar bshad pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:31: shugs bstan lam gyi mngon rtogs ltar bshad pa gnyis las /
NK045(bi)001:38: rgya gar skad du +aar+ya ste bod skada du 'aphags pa /
NK045(bi)001:39: de bzhin du pradz+ny+aa ni shes rab /
NK045(bi)001:40: p+aa ra mi ta pha rola tu phyin pa /
NK045(bi)001:42: g+aa th+aa tshigsa su bacada pa ste mtshan gyi tshig
NK045(bi)001:43: gi don rgyas pa ni gzhung gi zhar las shes
NK045(bi)001:44: par bya zhing / mdor bsdu na 'jig rten las
NK045(bi)001:45: 'das pa'i chos zab mo yin pas 'phags pa zhes
NK045(bi)001:46: par bya zhing / dang / chos thams cad kyi
NK045(bi)001:47: gnas lugs de bzhin nyid rtogs pa'i shes rab ni
NK045(bi)001:48: shes rab thams cad kyi nang na mchog dang phul
NK045(bi)001:49: du gyur ba yin pas de la shes rab kyi
NK045(bi)001:50: pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya la /
NK045(bi)001:51: de lta bu'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes
NK045(bi)001:52: de nyid brjod byar byas nas bstan pa'i phyir gzhung
NK045(bi)001:53: 'di la'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
NK045(bi)001:54: mtshan thob pa'o // gang zhig gzhung 'di la brten
NK045(bi)001:55: nas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam
NK045(bi)001:56: dang 'bras bu'i yon tan rin po che lta bu
NK045(bi)001:57: thams cad sdud cing 'dzin par byed pas na sdud
NK045(bi)001:58: mtshan thob pa'o // pa zhes bya'o // yi ge
NK045(bi)001:59: bcu gcig pa dbang po rdo rje sdeb sbyor 'phags
NK045(bi)001:60: pa'i dbyangs kyis bcings pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
NK045(bi)001:61: gnyis pa sngon gyi lo ts+aa ba chen po dag
NK045(bi)001:62: gis don dam pa ston pa'i chos zab mo 'di
NK045(bi)001:63: bod skad du bsgyur bar mdzad pa'i snga logs su
NK045(bi)001:64: lhag pa'i lha rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal la
NK045(bi)001:65: phyag 'tshal lo zhes bgegs med cing bsod nams 'phel
NK045(bi)001:68: mtshams sbyar ba gleng gzhi'i tshigs dang /
NK045(bi)001:70: dang po gnas phun sum tshogs pa bya rgod phung po'i rir /
NK045(bi)001:71: ston pa phun sum tshogs pa sh+aakya'i rgyal po sh+aakya seng ge de nyid kyis /
NK045(bi)001:72: 'khor phun sum tshogs pa nyan thos dang byang chub
NK045(bi)001:73: sems dpa' la sogs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa phal mo
NK045(bi)001:74: che'i nang du / dus phun sum tshogs pa rgyal
NK045(bi)001:75: yum 'bum pa la sogs pa gsungs tshar ba'i rjes
NK045(bi)001:76: thog de ma thag pa de nasa yanga ston pa
NK045(bi)001:77: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis dge slong la sogs pa'i
NK045(bi)001:79: tshegs chung ngus don chen po bde blag tu rtogs
NK045(bi)001:80: nas theg pa chen po'i lam dang 'bras bu'i yon
NK045(bi)001:81: tan gyis yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad
NK045(bi)001:82: pa'i phyir yang chos phun sum tshogs pa brjod bya
NK045(bi)001:83: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
NK045(bi)001:84: 'di ston cing / de'i tshe rjod byed tshigs su
NK045(bi)001:85: bcad pa 'di lta bu dag bka' stsal to zhes
NK045(bi)001:86: 'di ston cing / so // gnyis pa la chos la nyan par bskul ba dang /
NK045(bi)001:87: bstan pa chos kyi rang bzhin /
NK045(bi)001:91: zhar byung du chos bstan pa sangs rgyas kyi phrin las su bstan pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:93: dga' dang gus dang sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis bstan te /
NK045(bi)001:94: dam pa'i chos la yid dwangs shing mngon par 'dod
NK045(bi)001:95: pa'i dga' ba dang chos smra ba la zhe sar
NK045(bi)001:97: theg pa chen po thos pa'i phan yon sogs la
NK045(bi)001:98: yid ches pa'i dad pa'i mchog ni nye bar bzhag
NK045(bi)001:99: ste / chos tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'am 'dzin
NK045(bi)001:100: pa'i gegs su gyur pa 'dod pa'i 'dun pa sogs
NK045(bi)001:101: sgrib pa lnga ni nyon mongas pa zhes bya ste
NK045(bi)001:103: chos sgrub pa'am nyams su len pa'i gegs su gyur
NK045(bi)001:104: pa phar phyin drug gi mi mthun phyogs ser sna
NK045(bi)001:105: la sogs pa'i dri ma las 'das pa /
NK045(bi)001:106: snying rje chen pos 'gro ba rnams kyi gnas skabs
NK045(bi)001:107: dang mthar thug gi don sgrub pa la mngon par
NK045(bi)001:108: zhugs pa'i gang zag dam pa des ni mnyan par
NK045(bi)001:109: bya ba des pa zhes 'jam pa'am zhi ba'i rang
NK045(bi)001:110: bzhin can te stong nyid rtogs pa dang snying rje'i
NK045(bi)001:111: sems zung du 'jug pas rgyud des par gyur pa'i
NK045(bi)001:112: bdag nyid chen po rnams kyi lam shes rab kyi
NK045(bi)001:113: pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo nyan thos la
NK045(bi)001:114: sogs pa'i spyod yul las 'das pa gang la dpa'
NK045(bi)001:115: bo byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mnyam rjes kyi
NK045(bi)001:116: spyod yul du gyur pa de ni mnyan par gyis
NK045(bi)001:117: zhes pa'o // spyir nyan rang gi 'bras bu'ang gang
NK045(bi)001:118: zag gi bdag med par rtogs pa sogs stong pa
NK045(bi)001:119: nyid ci rigs par rtogs pa las byung ba'i phyir
NK045(bi)001:120: zhes pa'o // / stong nyid rtogs pa'i yon tan
NK045(bi)001:121: gya che ba spyir brjod pa'i tshe 'phags bzhi bskyed
NK045(bi)001:122: pa'i yum gcig pur gsungs pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:123: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i shes
NK045(bi)001:124: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
NK045(bi)001:125: pa ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi rgyu thun mong min
NK045(bi)001:126: pa yin pas tshul des mthar thug theg gcig tu
NK045(bi)001:127: grub pa sogs gnad mang po shes par bya dgos
NK045(bi)001:128: so // gnyis pa la dpe don rgyu mtshan gsum re re bzhin /
NK045(bi)001:129: 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sogs tshigs bcad re res bstan te /
NK045(bi)001:130: bshad ma thag pa ltar mnyan bya shes rab kyi
NK045(bi)001:131: pha rol tu phyin pa dpa' bo byang chub sems
NK045(bi)001:132: dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul thun min yin na gnas
NK045(bi)001:133: brtan rab 'byor la sogs pas ji ltar 'chad nus
NK045(bi)001:134: snyam na / dpe ji ltar na 'adzama bu'i gling
NK045(bi)001:135: 'dir gang+g+aala sogs pa'i chu klung ji snyed cig 'bab
NK045(bi)001:136: par byed cing me tog dang 'bras bur ldan pa'i
NK045(bi)001:137: sman dang nags tshal gang yod pa thams cad skyed
NK045(bi)001:139: mtsho chen po ma dros pa la gnas pa'i klu
NK045(bi)001:140: yi gtso bo'am dbang po nyid du gyur pa bye
NK045(bi)001:141: tshan gyi 'jigs pa sogs med pa'i klu yi bdag
NK045(bi)001:142: po rten gnas te chen po de ni klu yi
NK045(bi)001:143: bdag po de yi sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthu
NK045(bi)001:144: dpal las byung ba yin no //
NK045(bi)001:145: dpe de bzhin du rgyal ba'i nyan thos rab 'byor
NK045(bi)001:146: la sogs pa dag gis ji tsam snyed kyi chos
NK045(bi)001:147: mdor bsdus te ston pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:149: de dag kyang gtan la 'beb byed bya ba byed
NK045(bi)001:150: pa sogs rigs pa'i rnam grangs bzhi'i tshul dag dang
NK045(bi)001:152: chos bstan pa de yi 'bras bu mthar thug mchog
NK045(bi)001:153: tu 'phags pa'i bde ba mi gnas pa'i mya ngan
NK045(bi)001:154: las 'das pa thob par byed pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:155: gzhan yang chos bstan pa de yi 'bras bu gnas
NK045(bi)001:156: skabs su rgyun zhugs la sogs pa 'bras bu bzhi
NK045(bi)001:157: thob pa de dag kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
NK045(bi)001:158: skyes bu'i mthu las byung ba'o //
NK045(bi)001:159: de ci yi phyir zhe na rgyal bas bdag med
NK045(bi)001:160: pa'i chos tshul gang bstan pa de la mi mchog
NK045(bi)001:161: sangs rgyas kyi slob mar gyur pa nyan thos pas
NK045(bi)001:163: mngon sum du rtogs par byas nas rang gis bslabsa
NK045(bi)001:164: pa de ji lta ba bzhin du gzhan la'ang ston
NK045(bi)001:165: par byed de / de thams cad sangs rgyas kyi
NK045(bi)001:166: mthus byed kyi nyan thos ranga gi stobs kyi mthus
NK045(bi)001:167: par byed de / ma yin no // gzhan yang
NK045(bi)001:168: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs las sems med pa'i
NK045(bi)001:169: nam mkha' las kyang chos zab mo'i sgra 'byung ba
NK045(bi)001:170: las gdul bya rnams rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba
NK045(bi)001:171: sogs sangs rgyas kyi phrin las ni bsam gyis mi
NK045(bi)001:173: gnyis pa bstan pa chos kyi rang bzhin la /
NK045(bi)001:176: dang po la lam gyi gtso bo shes rab phar phyin bshad pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:178: dang po la bsdus te bstan pa'i sgo dang /
NK045(bi)001:180: rgyas par bstan pa'i sgo dang gsum /
NK045(bi)001:181: dang po la rten chos 'bras bu rgyas par bshad pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:182: de dag gi skabs bsdu ba gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:185: nyams su blang bya chos de'i 'bras bu bstan pa gsum /
NK045(bi)001:186: dang po la rtogs pa'i khyad par /
NK045(bi)001:188: byang sems kyi sgra don gsum /
NK045(bi)001:189: dang po la gzhi dmigs pa med pa /
NK045(bi)001:191: 'bras bu mtha' gnyis su mi gnas pa'i tshul gsum /
NK045(bi)001:192: dang po la bstan bshad bsdu gsum las /
NK045(bi)001:194: gang la shes rab sogs tshigs bcad gcig gi don ni /
NK045(bi)001:195: byang chub sems dpa' gang la 'di skad du /
NK045(bi)001:196: bstan par bya ba'am nyams su blang bya shes rab
NK045(bi)001:197: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchoga de'ang yul gang
NK045(bi)001:198: las yin dang gang zag su yi yin pa sogs
NK045(bi)001:199: yul dus kyi cha phye zhing dpyad na rang gi
NK045(bi)001:200: ngo bo nyid kyis grub par mi dmigs shing brda
NK045(bi)001:201: dang tha snyad kyis bzhag pa tsam du grub pa
NK045(bi)001:202: dang / de bzhiin du bstan pa'i yul lam nyams
NK045(bi)001:203: su len pa po byang chub sems dpa' yang phung
NK045(bi)001:204: po lnga'i tshogs pa tsam du zad la /
NK045(bi)001:205: de la gang zag dang chos su grub pa'i ngo
NK045(bi)001:206: bo nyid cung zad kyang mi rnyed mi dmigsa par
NK045(bi)001:207: tha snyad sgyu ma tsam du gnas pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:208: gang zag des lam de nyams su blang ba'i ngo
NK045(bi)001:209: bo don dam pa'i byang chub sems rang bzhin 'od
NK045(bi)001:210: gsal ba zhes pa'ang brtag cing dpyad na mtha' thams
NK045(bi)001:211: cad la mi gnas pa'i phyir rang gi ngo bo
NK045(bi)001:212: nyid du bden par grub pa cung zad kyang mi
NK045(bi)001:213: dmigs so // de ltar chos gang la yang mi
NK045(bi)001:214: gnas shing dmigs pa'i spyod yul thams cad las 'das
NK045(bi)001:215: pa'i zab mo chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ston
NK045(bi)001:216: pa'i gtam de skad thos nas /
NK045(bi)001:217: de ma yin no snyam du bden par 'dzin pa'i rmongs pa med cing /
NK045(bi)001:218: stong pa nyid du bstan pa la mngon par skrag pa med par /
NK045(bi)001:219: rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang snang ba dbyer med
NK045(bi)001:220: par bden gnyis zung du chud pa yi byang chub
NK045(bi)001:221: sems dpa' de ni bde par gshegs pas thugs su
NK045(bi)001:222: chud cing bstan pa'i shes rab zab mo la spyod
NK045(bi)001:223: pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa yin no //
NK045(bi)001:225: shes bya'i yul mi dmigs pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:226: yul can shes rab mi dmigs pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:229: dang po gzugs med sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:230: 'di ltar don dam dpyod pa'i shes rab kyis dpyod
NK045(bi)001:231: na gzugs kyi phung por bsdus pa dbang po lnga
NK045(bi)001:232: dang don lngar snang ba ji snyed pa 'di thams
NK045(bi)001:233: cad ni rdul du ma 'dus shing bsags pa yin
NK045(bi)001:234: la / du ma 'dus pa la rags pa'am ril
NK045(bi)001:235: po'i ngo bo bden par grub pa cung zad kyang
NK045(bi)001:236: la / med cing / rdul phra rab de la'ang
NK045(bi)001:237: phyogs cha yod med du dpyad pas rdul nyid kyang
NK045(bi)001:238: bden par grub pa med pa'i phyir /
NK045(bi)001:239: gzugs 'di ni snang yang bden pa med pa'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o //
NK045(bi)001:240: de bzhin du rang ngam gzhan gyi rgyud du gtogs
NK045(bi)001:241: pa'i bde sdug btang snyoms kyi tshor ba gang ji
NK045(bi)001:242: snyed pa kun kyang du ma dang mi rtag pa'i
NK045(bi)001:243: rang bzhin la dpyad na shin tu phra ba'i cha
NK045(bi)001:244: gcig kyang bden par grub pa med cing /
NK045(bi)001:245: de dang 'dra bar 'du shes kyi phung po dang
NK045(bi)001:246: sems pa ste 'du byed rnams kyang rang gi ngo
NK045(bi)001:247: bo nyid kyis grub pa cung zad kyang med do
NK045(bi)001:248: // tshul de lta bu la rnam par shes pa'i
NK045(bi)001:249: gnas sam gzhir gyur pa ni rdul tsam yod pa
NK045(bi)001:250: // ma yin te / gang 'di ltar sems dang
NK045(bi)001:251: sems las byung ba'i chos rnams ni sna tshogs pa
NK045(bi)001:252: nyid du gnas pas de la gcig bden mi srid
NK045(bi)001:253: // ma yin te / la / skad cig gis
NK045(bi)001:254: skye 'gag byed pa'i dngos po rnams la dus mtha'i
NK045(bi)001:255: cha med ni snga phyi'i cha la dpyad pa'i tshe
NK045(bi)001:256: // ma yin te / la / mi grub bo
NK045(bi)001:257: // de ltar phung po lnga po 'di dag ma
NK045(bi)001:258: brtag nyams dga' ba'i snang ba tsam las brtag cing
NK045(bi)001:259: dpyad na phra rags gang gi ngo bor yang ma
NK045(bi)001:260: grub pas med bzhin snang ba rmi lam sgyu ma
NK045(bi)001:261: chu zla la sogs pa'i tshul du mthong zhing /
NK045(bi)001:262: de ltar 'dus byas 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams
NK045(bi)001:263: cad kyang rang ngos nas cung zad kyang ma grub
NK045(bi)001:264: pa rgyu rkyen rten 'brel gyi dbang gis snang ba
NK045(bi)001:265: tsam bslu ba med pa ji ltar snang ba 'di
NK045(bi)001:266: la'ang de kho na nyid tshol ba'i rigs pas dpyad
NK045(bi)001:267: na rtog pa'i dbang gis bdag dang chos sna tshogs
NK045(bi)001:268: su blos bzhag pa tsam las de dang der grub
NK045(bi)001:269: pa rdul phra rab tsam mi rnyed par nges pa
NK045(bi)001:270: skyes pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de shes bya'i
NK045(bi)001:271: chos kun la'ang dmigs gtad kyi tshul gyis mi gnas
NK045(bi)001:272: pa yin no // mtha' gang du'ang mi gnas par
NK045(bi)001:273: gyur pa'i nges shes kyis lta ba bzang po dang
NK045(bi)001:274: ldan pa de ni ci la'ang mi gnas par spyod
NK045(bi)001:275: pa'am gnas pa med par spyod pa ste /
NK045(bi)001:276: ci yang ma mthong ba ni yang dag pa'i mthong bar gsungs pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:277: de bzhin du mi gnas pa'i gnas pa /
NK045(bi)001:278: mi spyod pa'i spyod pa sogs gsungs pa kun gyi tshul shes par bya'o //
NK045(bi)001:279: de ltar 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad rang bzhin
NK045(bi)001:280: ma grub pa sgyu ma lta bu'i tshul du shes
NK045(bi)001:281: pa 'di ni rjes thob sgyu ma lta bu'i nges
NK045(bi)001:282: shes bya'o // 'di ni rnam grangs pa'i don dam
NK045(bi)001:283: sems kyi spyod yul 'dzin stangs can gyi lta ba
NK045(bi)001:285: las dang po pa 'di la 'dris goms bya ba gal che'o //
NK045(bi)001:286: yang dag pa gnas lugs mthar thug gi don du
NK045(bi)001:287: ni rang bzhin ma grub pa dang sgyu ma lta
NK045(bi)001:288: bu zhes pa la sogs pa sgra dang rtog pa'i
NK045(bi)001:289: rjes su rgyu ba'i blo'i spyod yul thams cad ni
NK045(bi)001:290: rtog pas phar btags nas bzhag pa'i chos yin la
NK045(bi)001:291: de yang kun rdzob pa dang bcos mar gyur pa
NK045(bi)001:292: yin gyi / don dam pa mthar thug pa'i ngo
NK045(bi)001:293: bo bcos min chos nyid kyi gshis rnal ma ni
NK045(bi)001:294: ma yin pas 'di ltar snang ba dang stong pa
NK045(bi)001:295: kun rdzob dang don dam zhes pa'i gnyis chos thams
NK045(bi)001:296: cad gnyis su med par gyur pa'i chos dbyings rnam
NK045(bi)001:297: grangs min pa'i don dam so so rang gis rig
NK045(bi)001:298: pa'i ye shes kyis rtogs par bya ba /
NK045(bi)001:299: sgra dang rtog pa'i spyod yul thams cad las 'das pa /
NK045(bi)001:300: mnyam par bzhag pa'i spyod yul du chos thams cad
NK045(bi)001:301: gdod nas skye 'gag dang blang dor med par mnyam
NK045(bi)001:302: pa nyid kyi ngo bos nam mkha'i dkyil ltar snang
NK045(bi)001:303: ba de ni dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras dang
NK045(bi)001:304: bcas pa'i yum chen mo chos dbyings skye ba med
NK045(bi)001:305: pa'i gnas lugs / rang bzhin 'od gsal ba don dam byang chub sems kyi ngo bo /
NK045(bi)001:306: chos thams cad kyi snying po mthar thug pa yin
NK045(bi)001:307: pas tshul 'di la nges pa'i shes pa the tshom
NK045(bi)001:308: dang bral ba'i sgo nas 'jug pa ni cis kyang
NK045(bi)001:309: gal che'o // de skad du yang sgra gcan 'dzin gyis yum la bstod pa las /
NK045(bi)001:310: smra bsam brjod med shes rab pha rol phyin //
NK045(bi)001:311: ma skyes ma 'gag nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid //
NK045(bi)001:312: so so rang rig ye shes spyod yul ba //
NK045(bi)001:313: dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK045(bi)001:316: gzhan las shes min zhi ba dang //
NK045(bi)001:317: spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa //
NK045(bi)001:318: rnam rtog med don tha dad med //
NK045(bi)001:319: de ni de nyid mtshan nyid do //
NK045(bi)001:321: de lta bur chos nyid zab mo la mnyam par
NK045(bi)001:322: bzhag pa'i rnal 'byor pa des chos gang yang yongs
NK045(bi)001:323: su gzung ba med pas na /
NK045(bi)001:324: rnam shes kyi spyod yul can gyi dmigs gtad dang
NK045(bi)001:325: spros pa'i d+r+wa ba thams cad rab tu log pas
NK045(bi)001:326: 'dzin stangs kyi rnam pa gang yang med pa'i shes
NK045(bi)001:327: rab rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'am rang byung gi
NK045(bi)001:328: ye shes rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan
NK045(bi)001:329: pa la brten nas bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub
NK045(bi)001:330: chen po thob pa yin no //
NK045(bi)001:331: 'dir cung zad rgyas par bkrol ba bzhin 'og gi
NK045(bi)001:332: gnas skabs rnams su gzugs sogs dgag pa'i tshig la
NK045(bi)001:333: sogs pa gang byung ba'ang de ltar shes par bya'o
NK045(bi)001:335: ji ltar kun tu rgyu sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:336: dpe ji ltar na mu stegs kun tu rgyu ba
NK045(bi)001:337: bzo sbyangs zhes pa'am kha cig tu phreng can zhes
NK045(bi)001:338: grags pa des kho rang gi gzhung na bdag yod
NK045(bi)001:339: par 'dod pa sogs dmigs pa can gyi lta ba
NK045(bi)001:340: de la nan tan ji ltar byas kyang 'ching ba
NK045(bi)001:341: mtha' dag las grol ba'i rgyu mi byed par rang
NK045(bi)001:342: nyid kyi rnam par dpyod pa'i shes pa yis mthong
NK045(bi)001:343: nas / ston pa bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du 'ong nas thar pa'i lam dris pa na /
NK045(bi)001:344: ston pas bdag med pa'i chos bstan pa la lhag
NK045(bi)001:345: par yid ches nas shes rab dmigs pa meda pa'i
NK045(bi)001:346: lam de la brten nas sdug bsngal nye bar len
NK045(bi)001:347: pa'i phung po rnam par 'jig pa'am 'khor ba'i rgyun
NK045(bi)001:348: ldog pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa 'byung ba ltar
NK045(bi)001:349: / byang chub sems dapa'a gang zhig de ltar chos
NK045(bi)001:350: rnams dmigs su med par shes pa de ni zhi
NK045(bi)001:351: ba phyogs pa'i mya ngan 'das pa la mi reg
NK045(bi)001:352: cing byang sems de ni srid zhi mnyam pa nyid
NK045(bi)001:353: kyi shes rab zab mo la gnas par 'gyur ro
NK045(bi)001:355: sgrub phyogs nas bstan pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:357: de'i don bsdu ba dang gsum /
NK045(bi)001:359: yang 'di shes rab sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:360: yang 'di snyam du chos thams cad rang bzhin med
NK045(bi)001:361: par rtogs pa'i shes rab ces bya ba mya ngan
NK045(bi)001:362: las 'das pa'i yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas
NK045(bi)001:363: gcig pu pa 'di ni don du gnyer bar bya
NK045(bi)001:365: 'on kyang 'di'i ngo bo gang lta bu zhig yin /
NK045(bi)001:367: yul gang las yin zhes brtags shing dpyad pa na
NK045(bi)001:368: de la'ang de'i ngo bo gcig tu bden par grub
NK045(bi)001:370: des mtshon nas gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar gyi
NK045(bi)001:371: chos 'di thams cad rang gi ngo bos stong par
NK045(bi)001:372: rtoga cing dpyod par byed do //
NK045(bi)001:373: de ltar yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang ldan pas
NK045(bi)001:374: nye bar brtags nas stong pa nyid kyi don la
NK045(bi)001:375: mgo rmongs pa'i zhum pa med cing chos nyid zab
NK045(bi)001:376: mo la skrag pa med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
NK045(bi)001:377: de ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba nyid
NK045(bi)001:380: gal te mi shes sogs rkang pa bzhi'i don ni /
NK045(bi)001:381: gal te chos thams cad gdod ma nas stong pa'i
NK045(bi)001:382: don mi shes bzhin du gzugs la gzugs kyi ngo
NK045(bi)001:383: bo nyid yongs su grub pa'i 'du shes la gnas
NK045(bi)001:384: shing / de bzhin du tshor ba dang sems pa
NK045(bi)001:385: ste 'du byed dang rnam shes kyi phung pora bden
NK045(bi)001:386: zhen gyi 'du shes kyis spyod par byed cing /
NK045(bi)001:387: des rigs pas dpyad pa la brten nas phung po
NK045(bi)001:388: 'di kun gyi rang bzhin ni dgag bya bden grub
NK045(bi)001:389: bkag pa'i med dgag stong pa de tsam gnas lugs
NK045(bi)001:390: so zhes rtog par byed na'ang de 'dra'i byang chub
NK045(bi)001:392: gnas lugs sgro skur dang bral ba rtog pa'i spyod
NK045(bi)001:393: yul las 'das pa'i don la mi gnas pa'i phyir
NK045(bi)001:394: / dmigs pa can gyi mtshan ma la spyod pa
NK045(bi)001:395: yin gyi mtshan ma'i spros pa kun gyis dben pa'i
NK045(bi)001:396: skye med chos dbyings zab mo'i gnas la yid ches
NK045(bi)001:397: pa'i dad pa thob pa ma yin te dmigs gtad
NK045(bi)001:398: mtshan 'dzin gyis bcings pa can du shes par bya'o
NK045(bi)001:400: gang zhig gzugs min sogs rkang pa bzhi'i don /
NK045(bi)001:401: de ltar bstan pa'i don rnal ma ni /
NK045(bi)001:402: gang zhig gzugs la gzugs su 'dzin pa min pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:403: de bzhin du tshor bar 'dzin pa min la 'du
NK045(bi)001:404: shes dang sems pa nyid du'ang 'dzin pa min zhing
NK045(bi)001:405: / rnam par shes pa la yang ngo bo nyid
NK045(bi)001:406: kyis grub par 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis mi spyod la
NK045(bi)001:407: / / mdor na phung sogs chos gang la'ang yod
NK045(bi)001:408: med la sogs pa dmigs gtad kyi mtshan ma la
NK045(bi)001:409: mi spyod pas gang la'ang gnas pa med par spyod
NK045(bi)001:410: pa de ni gang du spyod kyang bdag spyod do
NK045(bi)001:411: zhes bya bar mi dmigs te rloms pa thams cad
NK045(bi)001:412: dang bral ba'i mtshan med kyi shes rab brtan par
NK045(bi)001:414: de lta bur skye med rtogs pa'i blo dang ldana
NK045(bi)001:415: pa de ni dpa' bar 'gro ba la sogs pa'i
NK045(bi)001:416: ming can gyi ting nge 'dzin rab tu zhi ba
NK045(bi)001:418: gnyis pa lam spyod med ni /
NK045(bi)001:419: byang chub sems gang sogs tshigs bcad gnyis kyi don ni /
NK045(bi)001:420: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig ji skad bshad pa
NK045(bi)001:421: de ltar lam sgom pa'i skabs 'dir bdag gi rgyud
NK045(bi)001:422: nye bar zhi bar gnas pa de ni sngon gyi
NK045(bi)001:423: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bla med rdzogs pa'i
NK045(bi)001:424: byang chub tu lung bstan par mdzad pa yin te
NK045(bi)001:425: / de lta bu'i byang sems de la /
NK045(bi)001:426: bdag ni stong pa nyid la mnyam par bzhag ce'am
NK045(bi)001:427: de las langs so zhes pa'i rlom sems 'byung ba
NK045(bi)001:428: med de de ci yi phyir zhe na des chos
NK045(bi)001:429: thams cad kyi rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'i chos
NK045(bi)001:430: nyid mnyam pa nyid yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro
NK045(bi)001:431: // tshul de ltar spyod na bde gshegs rnams kyi shes rab la spyod pa yin te /
NK045(bi)001:432: byang sems des ni chos gang la'ang spyod du med
NK045(bi)001:433: pa nyid spyod pa'i dam pa yin par rab tu
NK045(bi)001:434: shes pa'i phyir / lam la sogs pa'i chos gang
NK045(bi)001:435: dang gang spyod pa de dang spyod pa po yang
NK045(bi)001:437: tshul 'di lta bu ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog la spyod pa yin no //
NK045(bi)001:438: gsum pa la don dang dpe gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:439: dang po gang zhig yod pa sogs tshigs bcad gcig gi don /
NK045(bi)001:440: gang zhig chos 'di dag thams cad ni rang gi
NK045(bi)001:441: ngo bos yod pa ma yin te chos su gdags
NK045(bi)001:442: pa ji snyed pa de ni rang bzhin med do
NK045(bi)001:443: ces bya ba nyid du bstan pa'i tshe /
NK045(bi)001:444: byis pa ming dang mtshan ma la chags pa rnams kyis don de brtags shing dpyad nas /
NK045(bi)001:445: yang na yod pa sgro 'dogs kyi mtha' dang /
NK045(bi)001:446: yang na med pa skur 'debs kyi mtha' gang rung
NK045(bi)001:447: zhig tu 'dzin par byed kyi mtha' dang bral ba'i
NK045(bi)001:448: gnas lugs khong du chud par mi nus so //
NK045(bi)001:449: yang dag pa'i don la yod pa dang med pa
NK045(bi)001:450: zhes bya ba 'di gnyis char yang mgo mnyam par
NK045(bi)001:451: dmigs su med pa'i chos yin te /
NK045(bi)001:452: yod med yin min sogs byis pa'i sgro btags pa'i
NK045(bi)001:453: spros pa thams cad dang bral ba zung 'jug rab
NK045(bi)001:454: tu mi gnas pa'i don ni mtha' dang khas len
NK045(bi)001:455: gyi rnam pa ma lus pa zhi ba so so
NK045(bi)001:456: rang gis rig par bya ba'o //
NK045(bi)001:457: byang chub sems dapa'a ganga gis yod med gnyis su
NK045(bi)001:458: mi rtog pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi don 'di shes
NK045(bi)001:459: na mtha' thams cad las nges par 'byung bar 'gyur
NK045(bi)001:460: ro // gnyis pa gang 'dir phung po sogs tshigs bcad gcig gi don /
NK045(bi)001:461: gang zhig lam la slob pa'i skabs 'dir phung po
NK045(bi)001:462: lnga yis mtshon pa'i chos thams cad dag dpe ji
NK045(bi)001:463: ltar na snang yang mi bden pa sgyu ma 'dra
NK045(bi)001:464: bar shes shing / der yang sgyu ma gzhan dang
NK045(bi)001:465: phung po gzhan du byas te de gnyis la bden
NK045(bi)001:466: che chung gi khyad par 'dzin par mi byed la
NK045(bi)001:467: phung po lnga nyid sgyu ma dang rmi lam la
NK045(bi)001:468: sogs pa dang mgo mnyam par shes nas /
NK045(bi)001:469: bdag dang chos su 'dzin pa sna tshogs pa'i 'du
NK045(bi)001:470: shes dang bral zhing spros pa nye bar zhi ba
NK045(bi)001:471: la spyod pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol
NK045(bi)001:472: tu phyin pa mchog la spyod pa yin no //
NK045(bi)001:473: gnyis pa bshes gnyen gyi khyad par la /
NK045(bi)001:474: sgrub pa dang dgag pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:475: dang po dge ba'i bshes dang sogs rkang pa gnyis kyi don /
NK045(bi)001:476: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni phyi nang
NK045(bi)001:477: gi yongs 'dzin dang ldan pa'i phyir theg pa mchog
NK045(bi)001:478: gi lam las nyams par mi 'gyur te /
NK045(bi)001:479: gang zhe na phyi'i yongs 'dzin shes rab kyi sgo
NK045(bi)001:480: nas chos kun rang bzhin med par ston pa dang
NK045(bi)001:481: / thabs kyi sgo nas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
NK045(bi)001:482: cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su bsngo ba'i
NK045(bi)001:483: tshul ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ldan zhing
NK045(bi)001:484: nang gi yongs 'dzin rang nyid rnam mkhyen thob 'dod
NK045(bi)001:485: kyi sems dang ldan zhing 'khor gsum dag pa'i lhag
NK045(bi)001:486: mthong dang ldan par gyur pa de lta bu ni
NK045(bi)001:487: rgyal ba rnams kyi bskyed yum shes rab kyi phar
NK045(bi)001:488: phyin zab mo thos nas skrag par yongs ye mi
NK045(bi)001:489: 'gyur par yum don la bzod par 'gyur ro //
NK045(bi)001:491: gang zhig sogs rkang gnyis don /
NK045(bi)001:492: bshad ma thag pa las bzlog nas las dang po
NK045(bi)001:493: pa gang zhig theg pa mchog gi don la smod
NK045(bi)001:494: pa'i sdig pa'i grogs dang ldan la /
NK045(bi)001:495: rang nyid blo gros ma smin pas gzhan gyi dring
NK045(bi)001:496: la 'jog pa ste gzhan la ltos pa can de
NK045(bi)001:497: ni / dper na snod so ma btang ba chus
NK045(bi)001:498: reg pa'i mod la zhig pa bzhin du theg pa
NK045(bi)001:499: mchog gi lam las nyams par 'gyur ro //
NK045(bi)001:500: gsum pa byang chub sems dpa'i sgra don la /
NK045(bi)001:501: byang chub sems dpa' zhes pa'i sgra don dang /
NK045(bi)001:502: sems dpa' chen po'i sgra don gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:504: ci phyir 'di ni sogs rkang pa bzhi'i don /
NK045(bi)001:505: ci yi phyir gang zag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes gdags par bya zhe na /
NK045(bi)001:506: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la rjes su zhugs
NK045(bi)001:507: pa'i thos pa la sogs pa'i shes rab kyi sgo
NK045(bi)001:508: nas gzugs la sogs pa'i chos thams cad la mngon
NK045(bi)001:509: par zhen pa'am chags pa ma lus pa gcod par
NK045(bi)001:510: byed cing / shes bya'i chos kun la bden zhen
NK045(bi)001:511: gyis chags pa'i rnam par rtog pa sa bon dang
NK045(bi)001:512: bcas pa yongs su spangs te zad par 'dod pa
NK045(bi)001:513: byed cing / dang / mthar gyis rgyal ba rnams
NK045(bi)001:514: kyi byang chub chen po chags pa med par gyur
NK045(bi)001:515: pa la rega pa des na gang zag 'di la
NK045(bi)001:516: ni byang chub semsa dpa'i ming thob bo //
NK045(bi)001:518: sems can rnams kyi mchog tu gyur pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:520: dang po ci phyir 'di ni sogs tshigs bcad gcig gi don /
NK045(bi)001:521: yang ci yi phyir 'di ni sems dpa' che zhes ming du gdags par bya zhe na /
NK045(bi)001:522: 'dis 'gro ba ma lus pa yongs su bskyab pa'i
NK045(bi)001:523: sems bskyed dang chos zab mo rtogs pa'i che bas
NK045(bi)001:524: 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i sems
NK045(bi)001:525: can gyi sde dang ris su gtogs pa'i tshogsa rnams
NK045(bi)001:526: mang po'i ste tshad med dpag tu med pa dag
NK045(bi)001:527: gi mchog dang phul du gyur pa nyid kyi phyir
NK045(bi)001:528: dang / sems can gyi khams rnams kyi bdag dang
NK045(bi)001:529: phung po sogs su lta ba mtha' yas pa rnams
NK045(bi)001:530: ni thogs med nas goms pas gzhig dka' ba dang
NK045(bi)001:531: mu med pas mang ba'i phyir chen po ste /
NK045(bi)001:532: de lta bu'i lta ba thams cad kyang 'dis dmigs
NK045(bi)001:533: pa med pa'i chos zab mo bstan pas gcod cing
NK045(bi)001:535: de yi phyir na sems dpa' chen po zhes par ni rab tu brjod do //
NK045(bi)001:537: go cha'i tshul bshad pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:539: gtonga ba che dang sogsa tshigas bcad gcig gi don /
NK045(bi)001:540: bshad ma thag pa der ma zad gzhan yang go
NK045(bi)001:541: cha chen po bgos pa'i phyir na yang sems dpa'
NK045(bi)001:543: go cha de gang zhe na /
NK045(bi)001:544: bdog pa thams cad la mi chags par gtong ba
NK045(bi)001:545: che ba dang ldan pa sbyin pa'i go cha dang
NK045(bi)001:546: / 'chal tshul spong ba'i sems pa'am blo che ba tshul khrims kyi go cha dang /
NK045(bi)001:547: bzod pa sogs gzhan bzhi'i go cha dang ldan pas
NK045(bi)001:548: 'khrugs pa'i sems sogs rang rang gi mi mthun phyogs
NK045(bi)001:550: rgyal ba rnams kyi theg pa chen po mchog la
NK045(bi)001:551: sems bskyed pa nas rnam mkhyen bar gyi lam 'bras
NK045(bi)001:552: bu dang bcas pa la zhugsa pa dang ldan pa
NK045(bi)001:553: ste / mdor na lam phar phyin drug nyams su
NK045(bi)001:554: len pa'i sgo nas nam mkha' ltar mu med pa'i
NK045(bi)001:555: theg pa chen po'i lam gyi chos ma lus pa
NK045(bi)001:556: la snying stobs ldog tu med pa'i go cha chen
NK045(bi)001:557: po bgos shing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams
NK045(bi)001:558: cad du lta ba'i thib po sel zhing ngan song
NK045(bi)001:559: sgrol ba sogs bdud kyi sgyu rtsal mtha' dag 'dul
NK045(bi)001:560: ba la brtson pa de yi phyir na semsa dpa'
NK045(bi)001:561: chen po zhes rab tu brjod do //
NK045(bi)001:562: gnyis pa la dpe don gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:564: dper na sgyu ma sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:565: de la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha ji ltar bgo ba'i tshul ni mi 'jigs pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:566: zhum pa med pa'i rang bzhin can yin la /
NK045(bi)001:567: de gang gis na 'di ltar dper na sgyu ma
NK045(bi)001:568: mkhan gyis lam gyi bzhi mdor gzugs sna tshogs su
NK045(bi)001:570: skye bo phal cher te phal mo che dag gi
NK045(bi)001:571: mgo mang po bye ba gcod par byed pa'i 'phrul
NK045(bi)001:572: ba bstan pa'i tshe na gsad bya de dag sgyu
NK045(bi)001:573: ma'i sprul pa tsam yin pa'i phyir ji tsam du
NK045(bi)001:574: sdug bsngal ba dang ji tsam du mang por gyur
NK045(bi)001:575: pa de tsam rdzun du mthong ba ci 'dra ba
NK045(bi)001:576: de ltar du byang chub sems dpas kyang /
NK045(bi)001:577: sdug bsngal rgya che zhing mu med pa'i 'gro ba
NK045(bi)001:578: 'di kun kyang bden grub med par sprul pa'i tshul
NK045(bi)001:579: de 'dra bar rab tu shes nas /
NK045(bi)001:580: byang sems de la phyi ma'i mu mthar thug gi
NK045(bi)001:581: bar du mu med pa'i sems can gyi don khur
NK045(bi)001:582: du len pa la 'jigs pa cung zad kyang med
NK045(bi)001:584: gzugs dang 'du shes sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:585: sems can rnams sgyu ma'i sprul pa dang 'dra ba'i rgyu mtshan yang /
NK045(bi)001:586: 'di ltar sems can zhes bya ba ni phung po
NK045(bi)001:587: lnga po 'di tsam la brten nas btags mod kyi
NK045(bi)001:588: / yang dag par na gzugs dang 'du shes dang
NK045(bi)001:589: tshor ba dang ni sems pa dang rnam par shes
NK045(bi)001:590: pa ni sus kyang ma bcings la gang gis kyang
NK045(bi)001:591: ma grol te de'i rgyu mtshan phung po lnga po
NK045(bi)001:592: 'di dag don dam par yod pa mina pa'i phyir
NK045(bi)001:593: / ro // gang rang gi ngo bo med pa la bcing grol med de nam mkha' bzhin no //
NK045(bi)001:594: de ltar shes nas kun rdzob tha snyad tsam du
NK045(bi)001:595: byang chub bsgrub pa la 'jug pa'i tshul la zhum
NK045(bi)001:596: pa'i sems med pa 'di ni gang zag dam pa
NK045(bi)001:597: rnams kyi go cha mchog tu gyur pa'o //
NK045(bi)001:598: gnyis pa nyams su blang bya chos la /
NK045(bi)001:599: theg chen gyi ngo bo mdor bstan pa /
NK045(bi)001:600: de'i rang bzhin rgyas par bshad pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:601: dang po la tha snyad du sgra don ngo bo byed las kyi sgo nas bshad pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:602: don dam par de dag mi dmigs par bstan pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:604: ci phyir 'di ni sogs tshigs bcad gcig gi don /
NK045(bi)001:605: ci yi phyir 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg
NK045(bi)001:606: pa chen po zhes ming 'dogs par bya zhe na
NK045(bi)001:607: / theg pa chen po de gang zag gang gis
NK045(bi)001:608: zhon nas gdul bya'i sems can thams cad mya ngan
NK045(bi)001:609: las zlo ba ste 'da' bar byed pas na bzhon
NK045(bi)001:610: pa'i don gyis theg pa zhes bya ste lam 'dis
NK045(bi)001:611: mthar thug gi 'bras bu la rang gzhan thams cad
NK045(bi)001:613: theg pa chen po 'di yi ngo bo ni sems
NK045(bi)001:614: can tshad med pa la go skabs 'byed cing stong
NK045(bi)001:615: nyid nyi shu'i rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'
NK045(bi)001:616: dang 'dra ba zab pa'i bdag nyid dang /
NK045(bi)001:617: gzhal med khang chen dang 'dra bar ting nge 'dzin
NK045(bi)001:618: dang gzungs dang phar phyin sogs rgya che ba'i bkod
NK045(bi)001:619: pa tshad med pa dang ldan te /
NK045(bi)001:620: tshul de lta bu la zhugs pa'i byed las sems
NK045(bi)001:621: can tshad med pa rnams zag med kyi bde bas
NK045(bi)001:622: gnas skabs su sems dga' ba dang lus skyid pa
NK045(bi)001:623: dang / mthar thug gi 'bras bu mi gnas pa'i
NK045(bi)001:624: myang 'das kyi bde ba mngona par 'thor bar byeda
NK045(bi)001:625: pas na theg pa'i mchog gam theg pa chen po
NK045(bi)001:626: dang / zhes bya'o // gnyis pa gang zhig zhon nas sogs tshigs bcad gcig gi don /
NK045(bi)001:627: don dam par ni gang zag gang zhig theg pa
NK045(bi)001:628: chen po gang la zhon nas 'bras bu'i phyogsa su
NK045(bi)001:630: 'o na theg pa 'di la brten nas 'bras bu
NK045(bi)001:631: mya ngan las 'das par 'gro bar 'gyur ro gsungs
NK045(bi)001:632: pa de ci lta bu zhe na /
NK045(bi)001:633: de ni tha snyad tsam du bstan pa ste /
NK045(bi)001:634: yang dag pa'i don du mya ngan las 'das par
NK045(bi)001:635: 'gro ba zhes mi dmigs pa'am dmigs su med de
NK045(bi)001:636: / dper na bud shing zad pas me shi ba
NK045(bi)001:637: na me de yis phyogs gzhan du 'gro rgyu ci
NK045(bi)001:638: yang med pa de bzhin du /
NK045(bi)001:639: phyin ci log 'khrul pa'i rnam rtog zad pa'i rgyu
NK045(bi)001:640: des gang zag de ni mya ngan las 'das zhes
NK045(bi)001:641: rab tu brjod pa yin na /
NK045(bi)001:643: gang zag dang lam rang bzhin med par bstan pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:644: de yi don bsdu ba gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:645: dang po la lam sgrub pa po gang zag mi dmigs par bstan pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:646: lam sher phyin mi dmigs par bstan pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:648: byang chub sems dpa' sogs tshigs bcad gcig gi don /
NK045(bi)001:649: lam sgrub pa po byang chub sems dpa' de ni
NK045(bi)001:650: sngon gyi mtha' ste 'das pa'i dus sam 'khor ba'i
NK045(bi)001:651: gnas skabs dang / phyi mtha' ste ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang mi slob pa lta bu dang /
NK045(bi)001:652: da ltar byung bar gyur pa lam la slob pa'i
NK045(bi)001:653: dus te de gang gi gnas skabs su yang mi
NK045(bi)001:654: dmigs te / gang zag rang gi ngo bos gdod nas ma skyes la phyis mi skye ba'i phyir /
NK045(bi)001:655: dus gsum gyi mtshan mas dag pa ste gang gis kyang khyad par du byar med pa'o //
NK045(bi)001:656: gang dag byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de
NK045(bi)001:657: ni yang dag par na 'dusa ma byas yin pas
NK045(bi)001:658: de la lam sgrub pa po dang 'bras bu thob
NK045(bi)001:659: pa po sogs su bzhag pa'i tha snyad kyi spros
NK045(bi)001:660: pa med de / de ltar shes pa 'di ni
NK045(bi)001:661: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog la
NK045(bi)001:666: byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rig sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:667: byang chub sems dpa' kun rdzob la mkhas shing don
NK045(bi)001:668: dam pa'i de nyid rig pa gang gi spyad pa
NK045(bi)001:670: chos rnams kyi rgyu 'bras ngo bo nyid la dpyad
NK045(bi)001:671: nas gdod nas skye ba med pa'i don rnam para
NK045(bi)001:672: bsams te 'di ltar spyod par byeda cing gnas so
NK045(bi)001:673: // de gang zhe na dmigs med kyi snying rje
NK045(bi)001:674: chen po bskyed kyang sems can du 'du shes pa
NK045(bi)001:675: med pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
NK045(bi)001:676: phyin pa mchog la spyod pa yin no //
NK045(bi)001:677: gnyis pa gal te sems can 'du shes sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:678: gal te sems can du bden par 'du shes pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:679: de bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes bskyed pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:680: bdag gis 'gro ba rnams kyi don bya zhing de dag gi sdug bsngal spang bar bya'o snyam ste /
NK045(bi)001:681: bdag dang sems can du mngon par zhen pa'i tshul
NK045(bi)001:682: gyis yongs su rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni
NK045(bi)001:683: kun tu rtog pa las ma brgal ba ste /
NK045(bi)001:684: 'di 'dra ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
NK045(bi)001:685: phyin pa mchog la yongs su spyod pa ma yin
NK045(bi)001:686: te dmigs pa can gyi sa la gnas pa'o //
NK045(bi)001:688: bdag ci 'dra ba sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:689: byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis ma
NK045(bi)001:690: grub pa ci 'dra ba de 'drar sems can thams
NK045(bi)001:692: sems can thams cad rang bzhin med pa ci 'dra
NK045(bi)001:693: ba de 'dra ba sems bskyed sogs chos kun kyang
NK045(bi)001:694: shes nas / skye ba med pa dang skye ba
NK045(bi)001:695: gnyis kar yang mi rtog pa bden gnyis dbyer med
NK045(bi)001:696: pa'i gnas lugs spros pa med pa'i don la gnas
NK045(bi)001:697: pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
NK045(bi)001:698: pa mchog gi gnas la spyod pa yin no //
NK045(bi)001:700: 'jig rten dag na chos sogs tshigs bcad gcig gi don /
NK045(bi)001:701: gnyis su mi rtog pa'i ye shes des thob bya ci lta bu zhe na /
NK045(bi)001:702: 'jig rten dag na chos kyi minga ji snyed pa
NK045(bi)001:703: yongs su brjod para rung ba gzugs nas rnam mkhyen
NK045(bi)001:704: gyi bar kun la don dam par skye ba dang
NK045(bi)001:705: ni yang dag par 'das pa'am 'gags pa'i mtha' spangs
NK045(bi)001:706: nas skye 'gags med par mnyam pa nyid du gnas
NK045(bi)001:707: pa sangs rgyas kyi thugs rnam par mi rtog pa'i
NK045(bi)001:708: ye shes gang zhig nam yang nyams pa med pas
NK045(bi)001:709: 'chi ba med pa dang dam pa de las gzhan
NK045(bi)001:710: med pa ste / thams cad kyi dam pa mthar
NK045(bi)001:711: thug pa bla na med pa'i bdag nyid 'thob par
NK045(bi)001:712: byed pa de yi phyir na chos thams cad dmigs
NK045(bi)001:713: su med par rtogs pa'i lam 'di ni shes rab
NK045(bi)001:714: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste lam
NK045(bi)001:715: thams cad kyi bla ma bla na med pa'o //
NK045(bi)001:717: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:718: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig rang gi sa la
NK045(bi)001:719: yid ches pas the tshom dang dogs pa med par
NK045(bi)001:720: ji skad bstan pa de ltar spyod pa de ni
NK045(bi)001:721: mchog gi shes rab dang ldan pa zhes brjod par
NK045(bi)001:722: bya ba ste de ni chos thams cad mnyam pa
NK045(bi)001:723: nyid la gnas par shes par bya'o //
NK045(bi)001:724: de ltar gzhi lam 'bras bu'i chos rnams thams cad
NK045(bi)001:725: rang bzhin med pa mnyam pa nyid du ro gcig
NK045(bi)001:726: par yongsa su shes par gyur pa 'di lta bu
NK045(bi)001:727: ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog
NK045(bi)001:729: gnyis pa 'bring du dbye ba'i sgo la ji ltar bslab pa'i gnas bstan pa /
NK045(bi)001:730: de ltar bslab pa'i yul can sher phyin nyid ngos bzung ba /
NK045(bi)001:731: de la brten pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba /
NK045(bi)001:732: de'i rang bzhin rgyud la bskyed pa'i tshul dang bzhi las /
NK045(bi)001:733: dang po la mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
NK045(bi)001:734: de la slob pa'i tshul bshad pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:735: dang po la mi gnas pa'i gnas pa bshad pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:737: dang po la don dang dpe gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:738: dang po la khyad gzhi gzugs la sogs pa la mi gnas pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:739: khyad chos mi rtag sogs su mi gnas pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:741: gang zhig gzugs la mi gnas sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:742: gang zhig gzugs la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi gnas
NK045(bi)001:743: la de bzhin du tshora ba la yang mi gansa
NK045(bi)001:744: shing / gang zhig 'du shes la mi gansa pa
NK045(bi)001:745: dang sems par mi gansa la rnam shesa gang la
NK045(bi)001:746: shing / mi gnas pa / de ni de dag
NK045(bi)001:747: gi chos nyid dmigs su med pa la gnas pa
NK045(bi)001:748: ste 'di lta bu ni shes rab kyi pha rol
NK045(bi)001:749: tu phyin pa mchog la spyod pa yin no //
NK045(bi)001:751: rtag dang mi rtag sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:752: gzhan yang gzugs la sogs pa'i chos rnams la rtag
NK045(bi)001:753: pa dang mi rtag pa dang bde ba dang sdug
NK045(bi)001:754: bsngal ba dang yid du 'thad pa'i sdug pa dang
NK045(bi)001:755: mi sdug pa dang bdag yod pa dang bdag med
NK045(bi)001:756: pa dang / de bzhin nyid du 'dzin pa dang
NK045(bi)001:757: de bzhin du stong pa nyid du 'dzin pa sogs
NK045(bi)001:758: mtha' gnyis dang rnam par rtog pa'i bzung ba gang
NK045(bi)001:760: rgyun zhugs sogs 'bras bu gsum thob pa dang dgra
NK045(bi)001:761: bcom pa'i sa la'ang der 'dzin gyi 'du shes kyis
NK045(bi)001:762: mi gnas shing / rang rgyal gyi sa dang de
NK045(bi)001:763: bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi gnas te
NK045(bi)001:764: mdor na gzhi lam 'bras bu'i chos gang la'ang mngon
NK045(bi)001:765: par zhen pas gnas par mi byed pa'o //
NK045(bi)001:767: ji ltar 'dren pa sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:768: chos gang la'ang mi gnas pa'i dpe ni ji ltar
NK045(bi)001:769: 'dren pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ni
NK045(bi)001:770: 'dus ma byas kyi khamsa te zhi ba mya ngan
NK045(bi)001:771: las 'das pa'i dbyings 'ba' zhig la mi gansa shing
NK045(bi)001:772: / de bzhin 'dus byas khams gsum 'khor ba'i phyogs la yang mi gansa te /
NK045(bi)001:773: de ni srid zhi'i mtha' ci la'ang gnas pa med
NK045(bi)001:774: par spyod pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' shes
NK045(bi)001:775: bya'i gnas gang la'ang der zhen gyis gnas pa med
NK045(bi)001:777: gnas su gdags pa gang yang med pa la gansa
NK045(bi)001:778: pa yin te tshul 'di lta bu ni chos kyi
NK045(bi)001:779: rgyal po rgyal bas gnas pa thams cad kyi mchog
NK045(bi)001:782: gang dag bde gshegs sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:783: de ltar gzhi lam rnam pa'i chos thams cad la
NK045(bi)001:784: mngon par zhen pas gnas shing dmigs pa can gyis
NK045(bi)001:786: dmigs pa med pa la brten nas byang chub gsum thob pa ni /
NK045(bi)001:787: gang dag bde bar gshegs pa'i nyan thos su 'gyur bar bya'o snyam pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:788: rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin chos kyi rgyal po
NK045(bi)001:789: sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar 'doda pa ste mdor na
NK045(bi)001:791: mi gnas pa'am dmigs pa med pa'i don la bzod
NK045(bi)001:792: pa yi lam 'di la ma brten par ni 'bras
NK045(bi)001:793: bu de gang yang thob para mi nus te /
NK045(bi)001:794: dper na gru la ma brten par rgya mtsho'i tshu
NK045(bi)001:795: rol dang pha rol tu 'gro ba'i ngogs mi mthong
NK045(bi)001:797: gang zag gi bdag dang chos kyi bdag gi rang
NK045(bi)001:798: bzhin ma dmigs par rtogs pa'i bzod pa ci tsam
NK045(bi)001:799: skyes pa de tsam gyi tshod dang mtshungs pa'i byang
NK045(bi)001:801: stong pa nyid kyi bye brag gang zag gi bdag
NK045(bi)001:802: med par rtogs pas nyan thos kyi byang chub dang
NK045(bi)001:803: / bdag med phyed gnyis rtogs pas rang rgyal gyi byang chub dang /
NK045(bi)001:804: bdag med gnyis ka rdzogs pa'i mnyam pa nyid mthar
NK045(bi)001:805: thug pa rtogs pas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob
NK045(bi)001:806: ste / de ltar de dag thams cad sher phyin gyi mthu las byung ba'o //
NK045(bi)001:807: des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
NK045(bi)001:808: 'di las theg pa gsum gyi lam rgya cher 'byung
NK045(bi)001:810: mdo gzhan las kyang rgyun du zhugs pa rgyun du
NK045(bi)001:811: zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bdag gis thob po zhes rloms
NK045(bi)001:812: na de nyid de yi bdag tu 'dzin par 'gyur
NK045(bi)001:813: ba sogs dang / yang rnam thar sgo gsum gyi
NK045(bi)001:814: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la nyan thos thabs mkhas
NK045(bi)001:815: pa dang bral zhing blo dman pas nyi tshe ba'i
NK045(bi)001:816: 'du shes kyis re zhig ji bzhin ma rtogs par
NK045(bi)001:817: dman pa'i myang 'das mngon du byas kyang mthar mnyam
NK045(bi)001:818: pa nyid ji bzhin rtogs nas sangs rgya bas mthar
NK045(bi)001:819: thug theg pa gcig tu bstan pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:820: sher phyin gyi mdor rang nyid las gzhi shes dang
NK045(bi)001:821: lam shes dang rnam mkhyen gsum gyi khyad par bstan
NK045(bi)001:822: pa de bzhin rgyal tshab sa bcu'i sems dpa'i bstan
NK045(bi)001:823: bcos las kyang gsal bar bshad pa bzhin /
NK045(bi)001:824: spyir dmigs pa can 'khor ba las thar mi nus la /
NK045(bi)001:825: dmigs pa med pa'i sher phyin nyams su len pa
NK045(bi)001:826: la'ang rtogs pa rdzogs ma rdzogs kyi 'bras yum la
NK045(bi)001:827: nye ring gi khyad yod par shes pa gal che'o
NK045(bi)001:828: zhes pa 'phros don du smos pa'o //
NK045(bi)001:829: gnyis pa de la slob tshul la /
NK045(bi)001:832: ji ltar bslab tshul gsum las /
NK045(bi)001:834: chos 'chad pa dang sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:835: kun rdzob kyi dbang du byas te slob dpon gyis chos 'chad pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:837: bshad par bya ba'i chos gang yin pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:838: chos thos shing nan tan byas pas nyan thos kyi 'bras bu bzhi thob pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:839: de bzhin du rkyen rgyal te rang rgyal gyi 'bras bu thob pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:840: de bzhin du 'jig rten mgon po sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon du mdzad pa gang zhig /
NK045(bi)001:841: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyi tshul la mkhas
NK045(bi)001:842: pa blo gsal bas thob pa'i mthar thug gi mya
NK045(bi)001:843: ngan las 'das pa ganga yin pa de kun kyang
NK045(bi)001:844: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i snang ba rigs pas
NK045(bi)001:845: dpyad bzod du ma grub pa'i sgyu ma lta bur
NK045(bi)001:846: de bzhin gshegs pas bstan to //
NK045(bi)001:849: lha'i bu dag kho bo las chos nyan pa ni
NK045(bi)001:850: sgyu ma dang sprul pa lta bur btsal bar bya'o
NK045(bi)001:851: zhes pa nas bdag ni mya ngan las 'das pa
NK045(bi)001:852: las lhag pa'i chos gzhan zhig yod na de yang
NK045(bi)001:853: sgyu ma lta bur blta'o zhes gsungs so //
NK045(bi)001:854: gnyis pa gang zag bzhi po sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:855: ji skad bshad pa'i don de su zhig gus na /
NK045(bi)001:856: gang zag bzhi po 'di dag ni bshad ma thag
NK045(bi)001:857: pa'i don zab mo de la mi skrag ste bzhi
NK045(bi)001:858: gang zhe na / rgyal ba'i sras po bden don
NK045(bi)001:859: zab mo la mkhas pa ste bden pa mthong ba'am
NK045(bi)001:861: byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa chen po rnams dang /
NK045(bi)001:862: 'phags pa dgra bcom pa ste de rnams ni blo
NK045(bi)001:863: yi dri ma bsal zhing zad par byas nas zab
NK045(bi)001:864: mo'i don la som nyi spang bas bsam pa yongs
NK045(bi)001:865: su rdzogs pa dang de gsum yin la /
NK045(bi)001:866: bzhi pa ni las dang po pa yin du zin
NK045(bi)001:867: kyang sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pas
NK045(bi)001:868: da lta sher phyin yang dag pa ston par nus
NK045(bi)001:869: pa'i dge ba'i bshes kyis yongs su zin pa'o //
NK045(bi)001:871: 'bras bu dman pa la mi slob pa'i tshul la slob pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:872: chos thams cad la mi slob pa'i tshul la slob pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:874: byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rig sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis bstan te /
NK045(bi)001:875: byang chub sems dpa' theg pa gsum gyi lam gyi
NK045(bi)001:876: gnas skabs la mkhas shing mthar thug bden pa dbyer
NK045(bi)001:877: med mnyam pa nyid theg pa gcig pu'i tshul rig
NK045(bi)001:878: pa gang zhig chos thams cad mtha' bral ro mnyam
NK045(bi)001:879: du de ltar spyod cing btags pa'i chos nyid mi
NK045(bi)001:881: rang nyid nyan thos dgra bcom pa thob byed kyi sa la mi slob /
NK045(bi)001:882: rkyen rtogs rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la'ang slob pa min la /
NK045(bi)001:883: tha snyad du gang la slob na rnam pa thams
NK045(bi)001:884: cad mkhyen pa nyid kho na'i ched du sangs rgyas
NK045(bi)001:885: rnams gshegs shing 'byung ba'i chos kyi rjesa su slob
NK045(bi)001:886: pa yin no // de lta na'ang don dam par
NK045(bi)001:887: gang zhig slob pa zhes bya ba dang de'i zlog
NK045(bi)001:888: phyogs mi slob pa zhes bya ba gnyis ka yang
NK045(bi)001:889: ma dmigs pas chos gang la'ang mi slob pa de
NK045(bi)001:890: ni yang dag pa'i lam la slob pa yin no
NK045(bi)001:892: gzugs 'phel yongs su sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:893: gzugs la sogs pa kun nyon dang rnam byang gis
NK045(bi)001:894: bsdus pa'i chos thams cad 'phel ba dang yongs su
NK045(bi)001:895: nyams pa ste 'grib pa dang yongs su gzung bar
NK045(bi)001:896: bya ba'i phyir slob pa min te /
NK045(bi)001:897: chos 'di dag thams cad gdod nas dmigs su med
NK045(bi)001:898: pas rang bzhin dag pa yin pas don dam par
NK045(bi)001:899: de la 'phel 'grib dang skye 'gags gzung bya sogs
NK045(bi)001:900: nam yang med pa'i rang bzhin gnyug ma'i don mthong
NK045(bi)001:901: nas byar med mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa des
NK045(bi)001:902: / chos rnams sna tshogs pa gang yang mngon zhen
NK045(bi)001:903: gyis yongs su gzung ba'am dang du len pa'i phyir
NK045(bi)001:904: sbyor bas mi slob pa'am mi dmigs par slob cing
NK045(bi)001:905: / / bsam pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi phyed pa'i tshul gyis yongs su 'dzin la /
NK045(bi)001:906: thabs shes zab mo'i lam gyi nus pas rang gis
NK045(bi)001:907: 'dod pa mthar thug gi go 'phang der ngesa par
NK045(bi)001:908: 'byung ba ste chos gsum dang ldan pa gang yina
NK045(bi)001:909: pa 'di ni theg pa mchog gi yona tan la
NK045(bi)001:910: dag'a ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi slob tshul
NK045(bi)001:911: yin no // gnyis pa de ltar bslab pa'i yul can shes rab phar phyin ngos bzung ba la /
NK045(bi)001:912: gcig dang tha dad bral bar bstan pa /
NK045(bi)001:914: bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pa /
NK045(bi)001:915: gzod nas dag par bstan pa bzhi /
NK045(bi)001:916: dang po gzugs ni shes rab sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:917: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya
NK045(bi)001:918: ba de ci lta bu zhe na gzugsa ni shes
NK045(bi)001:919: rab kyi phar phyin ma yin te de gnyis gcig
NK045(bi)001:921: gzugs la shes rab tha dad du gnas pa'ang mada de gud na ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)001:922: de bzhin du rnam shes dang 'du shes dang tshor ba dang semas pa 'du byed 'di dag ni /
NK045(bi)001:923: shes rab ma yin la 'di dag la yang shes raba tha dad du med de /
NK045(bi)001:924: chos rnams kyi chos nyid gzhi shes rab kyi pha
NK045(bi)001:925: rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs sogs dang gcig tha
NK045(bi)001:926: dad gang du'ang brjod par byar med do //
NK045(bi)001:927: des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
NK045(bi)001:928: chos kyi dbyings 'di ni chos can gzugs la sogs
NK045(bi)001:929: pa gang dang yang gcig ma yin la tha dad
NK045(bi)001:930: kyang min mod kyi chos thams cad de gcig pu'i
NK045(bi)001:931: ngang tshul du 'ub chub pas dper na nam mkha'i
NK045(bi)001:932: khamas dang mtshungsa te chos kyi dbyings 'ba' zhig tsam
NK045(bi)001:933: gyis rab tu phye ba las tha dad pa'i gnyis
NK045(bi)001:934: chos rdul tsam yang med do //
NK045(bi)001:935: de yang chos can rnams las chos nyid dam chos
NK045(bi)001:936: kyi dbyings tha dad du yod na de'i chos nyid
NK045(bi)001:937: ma yin dang chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bor ma
NK045(bi)001:938: gyur pa'i chos yod par 'gyur na de mi srid
NK045(bi)001:939: pa'i phyir ro // chos can gzugs la sogs pa
NK045(bi)001:940: 'di chos dbyings dang gcig yin na 'di mthong ba
NK045(bi)001:941: kho nas bden pa mthong ba dang kun rdzob don
NK045(bi)001:942: dam tha dad du bzhag tu med pa sogs skyon
NK045(bi)001:944: de skad du yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
NK045(bi)001:945: phyin pa ni rab 'byor gyi le'u las btsal bar
NK045(bi)001:947: der ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs las btsal bar mi bya /
NK045(bi)001:948: gzugs las gzhan du btsal bar mi bya ste /
NK045(bi)001:949: chos de dag mtshan nyid gcig pa ste mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)001:950: zhes pa las shes pa gsungs pa bzhin no //
NK045(bi)001:951: gnyis pa dmigs pa rnams kyi sogs tshig bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:952: dmigs pa'am gzung bar bya ba gzugs la sogs pa
NK045(bi)001:953: rnams kyi rang bzhin de ni 'di dang 'di zhes
NK045(bi)001:954: ris su chad de mi gnas pa'i phyir pha mtha'a
NK045(bi)001:955: med la / der rtog pa'am 'dzin pa po sems
NK045(bi)001:956: can gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de yang chos
NK045(bi)001:957: kyi dbyings kyi ngo bos pha mtha' med cing /
NK045(bi)001:958: chos nyid mtshon pa'i dper gyur pa nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin de yang pha mtha' med do //
NK045(bi)001:959: yul de dag thams cad rtogs pa'i 'jig rten mkhyen
NK045(bi)001:960: pa'i shes rab de yang de tsam du pha mtha'
NK045(bi)001:961: med do // de ni mdo las shes rab kyi
NK045(bi)001:962: pha rol tu phyin pa che ba dang tshad med
NK045(bi)001:963: pa dang mtha' yas pa ste /
NK045(bi)001:964: zhes sogs gsungs pa bzhin du /
NK045(bi)001:965: chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bor gyur
NK045(bi)001:966: pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings ni thams cad shongs shing
NK045(bi)001:968: de'i ngang du chud pa'i chos can rnams kyang yul
NK045(bi)001:969: gyi mu dang dus kyi mtha' med pas na ro
NK045(bi)001:970: mnyam pa'i chos nyid yangs pa chen po'i rang bzhin
NK045(bi)001:971: de lta bur shes par bya'o //
NK045(bi)001:973: 'du shes tshu rol sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:974: ci tsam du dngos dngos med la sogs pa'i mtshan
NK045(bi)001:975: mar 'dzin pa'i 'du shes yod pa de srid du
NK045(bi)001:976: 'jig rten las mi 'da' bas tshu rol yin zhes
NK045(bi)001:977: 'dren pa bde bar gshegs pas yongas su bsgragsa par
NK045(bi)001:978: mdzad de ji tsam du 'du shes skye ba de
NK045(bi)001:981: des na so sor rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis gang
NK045(bi)001:982: du 'du shes pa dang gang zhig dmigs par gyur
NK045(bi)001:983: pa de thams cad rnam par bshig nas mtshan 'dzin
NK045(bi)001:984: gyi 'du shes thams cad spong ba ni 'jig rten
NK045(bi)001:985: pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu 'gro'o //
NK045(bi)001:986: tshul des na gang dag dmigs pa'i 'du shesa thams
NK045(bi)001:987: cad dang bral ba blo las 'das pa'i chos nyid
NK045(bi)001:988: 'di lta bu ni gang gis rjes su thob pa
NK045(bi)001:989: de dag lam gyi pha rol tu phyin nas ston
NK045(bi)001:990: pa'i nges don gyi bka' yi dgongs pa la gnas
NK045(bi)001:991: pa yin te / chos thams cad rang gi ngo
NK045(bi)001:992: bos gdod nas ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin sgrib bral
NK045(bi)001:993: du gnas su zin kyang log pa'i 'du shes kyis
NK045(bi)001:994: bdag dang chos sna tshogs su phar btags nas kun
NK045(bi)001:995: tu rtog pas bslad par zad la /
NK045(bi)001:996: chos nyid dang rjes su mthun par rnam rtog med
NK045(bi)001:997: pa'i ye shes kyis 'du shes thams cad 'gog pa
NK045(bi)001:998: yang dag pa'i mtha' chos kyi dbyings la mnyam par
NK045(bi)001:999: bzhag pa ni bsal bzhag med pa'i gshis rnal ma
NK045(bi)001:1000: bab kyis skyong ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
NK045(bi)001:1001: phyin pa mthar thug pa yin par shes par bya'o
NK045(bi)001:1003: sems can gyis mtshon pa'i chos kun gzod nas dag pa dngos dang /
NK045(bi)001:1004: de ltar rtogs pa'i phan yon gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:1006: gal te ston pas sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:1007: gal te tshad mar gyur pa ston pa bde bar
NK045(bi)001:1008: gshegs pas kyang ni chu bo gang+g+aa'i klung gi bye
NK045(bi)001:1009: ma snyed kyi bskal par bzhugs te sems can yod
NK045(bi)001:1010: do zhes pa'i sgra mngon par yongs su bsgrags kyang
NK045(bi)001:1011: / rang gi ngo bo gzod ma nas ma skyes
NK045(bi)001:1012: shing dag pa'i rang bzhin du gnas pas sems can
NK045(bi)001:1013: yod pa'am skye bar ga la 'gyur te /
NK045(bi)001:1014: dngos po'i chos nyid 'gyur ba med pa yin pas
NK045(bi)001:1015: sus kyang skye ba la sogs par bya mi nus
NK045(bi)001:1016: te des na ston pas yod par bstan kyang yod
NK045(bi)001:1017: par mi spyod na gzhan gyis lta ci smos /
NK045(bi)001:1018: de ltar gdod nas ma skyes pa'i don mthong ba
NK045(bi)001:1019: 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
NK045(bi)001:1020: mchog la spyod pa yin no //
NK045(bi)001:1021: de ltar sher phyin nyid ngos bzung ba'i tshigs bcad
NK045(bi)001:1022: bzhi po 'dis rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul las
NK045(bi)001:1023: 'das pa'i / ye shes gnyis su med pa'i tshul
NK045(bi)001:1024: 'chang ba yang dag pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol
NK045(bi)001:1025: tu phyin pa zab mo'i rnal 'byor gtan la dbab
NK045(bi)001:1027: gang tshe nga ni sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:1028: gang gi tshe sh+aakya'i rgyal po nga ni shes rab
NK045(bi)001:1029: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchoga 'di dang rnam
NK045(bi)001:1030: pa thams cad du rjes su mthun par smra bar
NK045(bi)001:1031: gyur pa sa brgyad par mi skye ba'i chos la
NK045(bi)001:1032: bzod pa dam par thob par gyur pa de yi
NK045(bi)001:1033: tshe / sngon gyi skye mchog gis khyod ma 'ongsa
NK045(bi)001:1034: pa yi dus na sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes
NK045(bi)001:1035: nga lung bstan par gyur to zhes rgyal ba sh+aakya
NK045(bi)001:1036: thub pa nyid kyis de skad du gsungs te /
NK045(bi)001:1037: sngon sangs rgyas mar me mdzad la bdag cag gi
NK045(bi)001:1038: ston pa 'di bram ze khye'u gzhon nu sprin zhes
NK045(bi)001:1039: par gyur pas uta pa la lngas gtor te ral
NK045(bi)001:1040: pa gser gyi mdog can gdan du bting ba na
NK045(bi)001:1041: / sangs rgyas de'i zhal nas bram ze khye'u khyod
NK045(bi)001:1042: ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa na
NK045(bi)001:1043: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du de bzhin gshegs
NK045(bi)001:1044: pa sh+aakya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes
NK045(bi)001:1045: / lung bstan to // de yang de'i tshe bram
NK045(bi)001:1046: ze khye'u des mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob nas
NK045(bi)001:1047: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad
NK045(bi)001:1048: med pa dang ma bral bas na lung bstan pa
NK045(bi)001:1049: thob ste mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob pa la
NK045(bi)001:1050: sangs rgyas rnams lung ston pa chos nyid do //
NK045(bi)001:1051: de'i sngon du bskal pa tshad med par sangs rgyas
NK045(bi)001:1052: grangs med la bsnyen bkur byas nas thams cad mkhyen
NK045(bi)001:1053: pa'i sems bskyed kyang lung bstan pa ma thob ste
NK045(bi)001:1054: rnam pa thams cad du shes rab kyi pha rol
NK045(bi)001:1055: tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i bzod pa de lta
NK045(bi)001:1056: bu sngon chad ma thob pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs
NK045(bi)001:1057: so // gsum pa de la brten pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba la /
NK045(bi)001:1058: rang gis 'chang ba sogs kyi phan yon dang /
NK045(bi)001:1059: gzhan la 'chad pa sogs kyi phan yon gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:1060: dang po la gnod pas mi tshugs pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:1062: dang po shes rab pha rol sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:1063: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la
NK045(bi)001:1064: mgon po rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pas
NK045(bi)001:1065: mnyam rjes kyis spyod pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu'am
NK045(bi)001:1066: bu mo gang zhig gis gus par byas te gzhung
NK045(bi)001:1068: don yid la chud par byed pa de la lus
NK045(bi)001:1069: kyi sdug bsngal dug dang mtshon dang me dang chus
NK045(bi)001:1070: mi tshugs la / gzhan yang mngon par zhen pa dug lta bu dang /
NK045(bi)001:1071: zhe sdang mtshon lta bu dang /
NK045(bi)001:1073: chu dang 'dra ba'i gti mug gis kyang mi tshugs so //
NK045(bi)001:1074: lam gyi bar chad bdud sdig can dang bdud kyi
NK045(bi)001:1075: phyogs nag po'i rtsa lag rnams kyis glags kyang rnyed
NK045(bi)001:1076: par mi 'gyur te chos nyid kyi stobs dang sangs
NK045(bi)001:1077: rgyas byang sems dang dkar phyogs kyi lha rnams kyis
NK045(bi)001:1079: gnyis pa la mchod pa'i phan yon dang /
NK045(bi)001:1081: dang po la las bde gshegs sogs tshigs bcad gsum ste /
NK045(bi)001:1082: gang la las bde bar gshegs pa yongs su mya
NK045(bi)001:1083: ngan las 'das pa yi ring srel gyi snying po
NK045(bi)001:1084: can gyi mchod rten byas pa de ni 'brel ba'i
NK045(bi)001:1085: yul khyad par 'phags pa'i dbang gis phan yon che
NK045(bi)001:1086: la / der yang mchod rten de'i rgyu'i khyad par
NK045(bi)001:1087: ni beed+aur+ya dang mu tig dmar po dang mu sa
NK045(bi)001:1088: la gar+b+ha dang asma gar+b+ha dang shel dang gser dang
NK045(bi)001:1089: la / / dngul lta bu'i rin chen bdun las byas shing de la mchod par byed la /
NK045(bi)001:1090: de yang ji ltar na grangs mang pa'i khyad par
NK045(bi)001:1091: ni bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten de lta bu
NK045(bi)001:1092: dag chu bo gang+g+aa yi klung gi bye ma snyed
NK045(bi)001:1093: kyi grangs dang mnyam par byas pa nyid kyis /
NK045(bi)001:1094: bye ba phrag stong gi grangs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams bkang ste /
NK045(bi)001:1095: yongs su brtag pa bzung ba'i dper bya na byed
NK045(bi)001:1096: po'i khyad par zhing rnams bye ba mang po mtha'
NK045(bi)001:1097: yas pa na sems can gyi rigs ji snyed 'khod
NK045(bi)001:1098: pa de dag thams cad kyis las gzhan ci yang
NK045(bi)001:1099: mi byed par / mchod pa'i dngos po'i khyad par lha'i me tog dang spos rab dang byug pas /
NK045(bi)001:1100: dus kyi khyad par nyin mtshan re re zhing dus
NK045(bi)001:1101: gsum du ma chag par tshul de ltar bskal pa'am
NK045(bi)001:1102: bskal pa de bas kyang lhag par mchod na de
NK045(bi)001:1103: la bsod nams tshad med pa yod mod kyi /
NK045(bi)001:1104: de las gzhan gang zhig gis rgyu gang las rnam
NK045(bi)001:1105: 'dren rgyal ba'i stobs bcu sogs yon tan mnyam pa
NK045(bi)001:1106: med pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba bde bar gshegs pa
NK045(bi)001:1107: rnams kyi yum gnyis su med pa'i shes rab thabs
NK045(bi)001:1108: mkhas dang bcas pa ston pa'i gzhung 'di glegs bam
NK045(bi)001:1109: la bris te lag tu 'chang zhing me tog dang
NK045(bi)001:1110: byug pas bsti stang tsam dus re zhig tu byed
NK045(bi)001:1111: par gyur na / snga ma mchod rten de lta
NK045(bi)001:1112: bu byas nas mchod pa'i bsod nams des ni phyi
NK045(bi)001:1113: ma 'di la bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la
NK045(bi)001:1114: sogs pa'i grangs dang cha dang dpe dang rgyur yang
NK045(bi)001:1115: par gyur na / mi phod pa'o // gnyis pa
NK045(bi)001:1116: yum la bslab pas srid zhi'i bde ba kun 'byung
NK045(bi)001:1117: par gyur na / mi phod pa'o // tshul dang
NK045(bi)001:1118: / yum la bslab pas sku gdung sogs mchod pa
NK045(bi)001:1119: par gyur na / mi phod pa'o // tshul dang
NK045(bi)001:1120: / brnyes tshul / yum la bslab pas dge rtsa
NK045(bi)001:1121: gzhan 'das pa'i phar phyin du 'gyur tshul gsum /
NK045(bi)001:1122: dang po don bstan pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:1125: zhi ba'i bde ba 'byung ba dang /
NK045(bi)001:1126: srid zhi gnyis ka'i bde ba 'byung tshul gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:1127: dang po la zhi ba tsam gyi bde ba 'byung tshul /
NK045(bi)001:1128: zhi ba chen po'i go 'phang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas 'byung tshul gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:1130: rgyal ba'i shes rab sogs rkang pa gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:1131: rgyal ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
NK045(bi)001:1132: 'di ni rig sngags chen po'am rig sngags bla na
NK045(bi)001:1133: med pa ste / de la rig sngags zhes pa
NK045(bi)001:1134: man+t+ra'i sgra las rig pa dang shes pas bde blag
NK045(bi)001:1135: tu skyob pa'i don yin la de 'dra'i rig sngags
NK045(bi)001:1136: kyi thabs kun las kyang 'di ni chen po ste
NK045(bi)001:1137: med pa ste / / 'dis sems can gyi khams
NK045(bi)001:1138: mang po tshad med pa'i yid kyi mya ngan dang
NK045(bi)001:1139: lus kyi sdug bsngal gyi chosa su gtogs pa thams
NK045(bi)001:1140: cad gtan du zhi bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)001:1141: gnyis pa la 'das dang da ltar gyi rgyal ba'i yum du gyur tshul dang /
NK045(bi)001:1142: ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yum du 'gyur tshul gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:1144: gang dag 'das dang sogs rkang pa gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:1145: gang dag sngar 'das pa dang gang dag phyogs bcu'i
NK045(bi)001:1146: 'jig rtena gyi mgon po da ltar 'tsho zhing gzhes
NK045(bi)001:1147: pa de dag mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rig
NK045(bi)001:1148: sngags chen po 'di bslab nas sems can thams cad
NK045(bi)001:1149: kyi lus dang sems kyi zug rngu ma lus pa
NK045(bi)001:1150: sel ba'i sman pa'i rgyal po bla na med par
NK045(bi)001:1152: gnyis pa gang dag phan dang sogs rkang pa gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:1153: gang dag sems can thams cad la sbyor bas phana
NK045(bi)001:1154: pa dang bsam pa snying rjera bcas pa kun tu
NK045(bi)001:1155: bzang po'i spyad pa spyod pa byang chub sems dpa'
NK045(bi)001:1156: rnams kyang rig sngags chen po shes rab kyi pha
NK045(bi)001:1157: rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab nas makhasa pa
NK045(bi)001:1158: de dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus su bla na med
NK045(bi)001:1159: pa'i byang chub mchog la reg ste 'tshang rgya ba
NK045(bi)001:1160: yin no // gnyis pa 'dus byas bde dang sogs rkang pa gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:1161: 'dus byas 'khor ba'i bde ba dang 'dus ma byas rnam grol gyi bde ba gang yin pa ste /
NK045(bi)001:1162: 'khor 'das kyi bde ba de kun chos kun gyi
NK045(bi)001:1163: gazhi'am snying po lta bu shes rab kyi pha rol
NK045(bi)001:1164: tu phyin pa 'di las 'byung bar rig par bya'o
NK045(bi)001:1166: sa yi dpes yon tan kun skyed tshul dang /
NK045(bi)001:1167: 'khor sgyur gyi dpes yon tan kun 'di yi rjes su 'gro tshul gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:1169: sa bon btab nas sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:1170: lam dang 'bras bu'i yon tan thams cad kyi gzhir grub pa'i dpe ji ltar na /
NK045(bi)001:1171: sa bon btab nas sa la gnas te myu gu sogs 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag /
NK045(bi)001:1172: rang rang gi rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshogs pa rnyed
NK045(bi)001:1173: nas rnam pa mang po'i gzugs dag rnam par skye
NK045(bi)001:1175: lam pha rol tu phyin pa lnga dang 'bras bu
NK045(bi)001:1176: byang chub kyi yon tan ji snyed pa de dag
NK045(bi)001:1177: kun kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
NK045(bi)001:1178: las skye ste / 'khor gsum mi rtog pa'i shes
NK045(bi)001:1179: rab kyis sbyin sogs zin na yang dag pa'i lam
NK045(bi)001:1180: du 'gyur zhing de dang mthar thug gi 'bras bu
NK045(bi)001:1181: gnyis med na mi 'byung gi 'brel pa can du
NK045(bi)001:1182: las skye ste / grub bo // gzhan yang de
NK045(bi)001:1183: kho na nyid rtogs pa'i shes rab las rnam pa
NK045(bi)001:1185: mkhyen pa des rgyu dang 'bras bu'i chos mtha' dag
NK045(bi)001:1186: phyin ci ma log par bstan pa las dngos dang
NK045(bi)001:1187: brgyud nas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'byung bar
NK045(bi)001:1189: 'khor los sgyur rgyal sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:1190: 'khor losa sgyur ba'i rgyal po lam gang zhig nas
NK045(bi)001:1191: ni rtag tu 'gro ba yi lam de nyid nas
NK045(bi)001:1192: rgyal srid rin po che bdun dang dpung gi tshogs
NK045(bi)001:1193: bzhi po kun kyang 'gro ba bzhin du /
NK045(bi)001:1194: gang zag gi rgyud dang lam gyi gnas skabs gang
NK045(bi)001:1195: nas rgyal ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
NK045(bi)001:1196: pa 'di yod pa'am 'gro ba de nyid nas ni
NK045(bi)001:1197: rgyu 'khor gsum dag pa'i dge rtsa ji snyed pa
NK045(bi)001:1198: dang 'bras bu'i chos te lam dang 'bras bu'i yon
NK045(bi)001:1199: tan gyi chos kun 'gro bar 'gyur te 'di rtogs
NK045(bi)001:1200: pa las dkar po'i chos thams cad sdud cing 'phel
NK045(bi)001:1202: gnyis pa yum la bslab pas sku gdung mchod pa brnyes tshul la /
NK045(bi)001:1204: de'i rgyu mtshan dpe dang bcas te bshad pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:1206: rgyal bas brgya byin sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:1207: rgyal bas brgya byin la dri ba yongs su dris nas lan gsol ba ni /
NK045(bi)001:1208: gal te gang+g+aa'i bye ma snyed kyi grangs dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyasa kyi zhing du gyur pa la /
NK045(bi)001:1209: zhing de kun rgyal ba'i ring srel gyis khong seng
NK045(bi)001:1210: med par rtse mo phyur bura gyur pa'i tshul gyis
NK045(bi)001:1212: de dang sher phyin glegs bam la bris pa cha
NK045(bi)001:1213: gnyis su byas te de las gang 'dam zhing len
NK045(bi)001:1214: zhe na / brgya byin bdag ni shes rab kyi
NK045(bi)001:1215: pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam la bris pa
NK045(bi)001:1218: ci slad ce na sogs tshigs bcad gsum ste /
NK045(bi)001:1219: de ltar mchod pa sogs bgyis pas bsod nams mi
NK045(bi)001:1220: zad par 'byung ba'i ring srel mang po de tsam
NK045(bi)001:1221: pa bzhag nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
NK045(bi)001:1222: pa 'di len pa ci yi slad du ce na
NK045(bi)001:1223: sku gdung la mi gus pa ni badga ma lags
NK045(bi)001:1224: te bdag gus mod kyi 'ona kyang sher phyin len
NK045(bi)001:1226: shes rab 'di lta bus yongs su bsgos pas sku
NK045(bi)001:1227: gdung de dag kyang mchod par bgyid pa'i 'os su
NK045(bi)001:1229: dper na rgyal po la brten pa'i mi rnams kyang gzhan gyis rim gro thob pa ltar /
NK045(bi)001:1230: sangs rgyas kyi ring srel yon tan chen po dang
NK045(bi)001:1231: ldan pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
NK045(bi)001:1232: pa la brten nas de ltar gyur pa'o //
NK045(bi)001:1233: 'o na sher phyin de'i mthus sangs rgyas mya ngan
NK045(bi)001:1234: las 'das nas da lta byed pa dang bral ba'i
NK045(bi)001:1235: phyir ring srel ji ltar mchod par 'os zhe na
NK045(bi)001:1236: ji ltar nor bu rin po che 'dod pa ster
NK045(bi)001:1237: ba'i yon tan kun dang ldan la rin thang gzhal
NK045(bi)001:1238: du med pa de ni gab tse ste sba ba'i
NK045(bi)001:1239: sgrom la sogs pa snod gang du stsal ba'am bzhag
NK045(bi)001:1240: pa'i snod de ni 'jig rten na phyag bgyi bar
NK045(bi)001:1241: 'os la / nor bu de snod de nas byung
NK045(bi)001:1242: bar gyur kyang sngar bzhag snod du byas pa'i gab
NK045(bi)001:1243: tse la ni 'di ni nor bu rin po che
NK045(bi)001:1244: 'jog pa'i snod yin pas gzhan dang mi 'dra'o snyam
NK045(bi)001:1245: du dga' bar bgyid de snod de yi yon tan
NK045(bi)001:1246: de lta bu dag thob pa ni nor bu rin
NK045(bi)001:1247: po che de yi lags te yin no //
NK045(bi)001:1248: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
NK045(bi)001:1249: pa mchog gi rin po che de'i yon tan gyis
NK045(bi)001:1250: rgyal ba mya ngan las 'das kyang de'i snod lta
NK045(bi)001:1251: bu ring srel gyis kyang mchod pa brnyes pa yin
NK045(bi)001:1252: pa'i rgyu mtshan de ltas te de lta bus na
NK045(bi)001:1253: / skyes bu gang zhig rgyal ba'i yon tan tshad
NK045(bi)001:1254: med pa la dga' zhing 'dzin par 'tshal ba des
NK045(bi)001:1255: / / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di blang bar bya ste /
NK045(bi)001:1256: 'di ni mtshan ma'i 'ching ba dang sgrib pa thams
NK045(bi)001:1257: cad las thar bar byed pa dang thar pa yi
NK045(bi)001:1258: ngo bo bla na med pa lags so //
NK045(bi)001:1259: gsum pa dge ba gzhan 'das lam du bsgyur ba la /
NK045(bi)001:1260: sbyin sogs tshula gcig tu byed pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:1263: sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:1264: sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba ni shes
NK045(bi)001:1265: rab ste 'khor gsum mi dmigs pa'i shes rab kyis
NK045(bi)001:1267: tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus bsam gtan kyang de bzhin no //
NK045(bi)001:1268: de ci'i phyir na sbyin sogs dge ba'i chos de
NK045(bi)001:1269: thams cad dmigs bcas kyis sbag pas 'khor ba dang
NK045(bi)001:1270: zhi ba phyogs gcig pa'i rgyur chud mi gzan pa'i
NK045(bi)001:1271: phyir phar phyin yongs su dag pa'i gnas nyid du
NK045(bi)001:1273: shes rab 'di ni sbyin sogs chos rnams thams cad
NK045(bi)001:1274: dmigs pa med pa'i bdag nyid du ro mnyam pa'i
NK045(bi)001:1275: tshul nyid ston para byed do //
NK045(bi)001:1277: dper na 'dzam bu'i sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:1278: sbyin sogs dge ba gzhan thams cad shes rab kyi
NK045(bi)001:1279: pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin du ro gcig
NK045(bi)001:1280: pa de'i tshul dper bya na 'dzam bu'i gling na
NK045(bi)001:1281: tsan dan dang a ga ru sogs shing rnams tha
NK045(bi)001:1282: dad pa bye ba stong phrag du ma de dag
NK045(bi)001:1283: kyang kha dog dang dri la sogs pa rnam pa
NK045(bi)001:1284: sna tshogsa yal sdong me 'bras sogs kyi dbyi ba
NK045(bi)001:1285: rnam pa du ma gzugs mang ba yod kyang /
NK045(bi)001:1286: de dag gi grib ma la ni shing gi grib
NK045(bi)001:1287: mar gyur pa'i rnam grangs su brjod pa tsam ma
NK045(bi)001:1288: gtogs par / grib ma yin pa la shing bzhin du mdog dang dri sogs sna tshogs med cing /
NK045(bi)001:1289: grib ma kho rang gi ngos nas shing so so'i bye brag bzhin du yod pa ma yina no //
NK045(bi)001:1290: dpe de bzhin du rgyal ba'i lam pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag kyang /
NK045(bi)001:1291: de nyid rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis zin na 'di
NK045(bi)001:1292: kun kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
NK045(bi)001:1294: 'jig rten 'das pa'i phar phyin du bgrang ba de
NK045(bi)001:1295: ni shes rab kyi dbang gis yin la lam de
NK045(bi)001:1296: dag thams cad rnam kun mchog ldan gyi stong nyid
NK045(bi)001:1298: lam gyi gnas skabs su ma zad dge ba rnams
NK045(bi)001:1299: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir yongs su bsngo
NK045(bi)001:1300: bar byas na rgya mtshor phyin pa'i chu bzhin du
NK045(bi)001:1301: dge ba de thams cad kyi 'bras bu rdzogs pa'i
NK045(bi)001:1302: byang chub ces bya bar phar phyin drug po 'di
NK045(bi)001:1303: kun ro gcig tu 'gyur te rnam kun mchog ldan
NK045(bi)001:1304: gyi stong nyid 'bras bu'i ye shes chos kyi skur
NK045(bi)001:1306: gnyis pa gzhan la 'chad pa'i phan yon la /
NK045(bi)001:1308: de ltar bshad pa'i phan yon gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:1309: dang po la spang bya sher phyin bcos ma 'chad tshul dang /
NK045(bi)001:1310: blang bya sher phyin yang dag 'chad tshul gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:1312: byang chub sems dpa' gal te sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:1313: byang chub sems dapa'a gang zhig rang gis gal te
NK045(bi)001:1314: ji skad bshad pa'i yum don zab mo spros pa
NK045(bi)001:1315: dang bral ba'i tshul rab tu mi shes bzhina du
NK045(bi)001:1316: / gzugs dang 'du shes tshor dang sems pa rnam
NK045(bi)001:1317: par shes pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag mi
NK045(bi)001:1318: rtag pa dang des mtshon pas sdug bsngal ba dang
NK045(bi)001:1319: / / gang zag gi bdag med tsam dang /
NK045(bi)001:1320: nyi tshe ba'i stong pa tsam du yongs su ston
NK045(bi)001:1321: pa byas te 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol
NK045(bi)001:1322: tu phyin pa mchog go zhes smra ba de ni
NK045(bi)001:1323: / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs
NK045(bi)001:1324: brnyan nam sher phyin bcos ma'am ltar snang la spyod
NK045(bi)001:1325: / pa ste / chos nyid dang mi mthun par
NK045(bi)001:1326: bstan pa des ni theg pa mchog gi dgongs pa
NK045(bi)001:1328: yum don ji lta bar rtogs pa'i mkhas pa rnams
NK045(bi)001:1329: kyis nam yang rgyal ba'i ye shes zab mos bzhag
NK045(bi)001:1330: pa'i chos rnams don dang yi ger ldan pas phyin
NK045(bi)001:1331: ci ma log par ston par byed de de bzhin
NK045(bi)001:1332: gshegs pa'i bstan pa zab mo nyams pa'am 'jig par
NK045(bi)001:1335: chos ston pa gang la gzugs su mngon par zhen
NK045(bi)001:1336: pa min pa dang de bzhin du tshor bar min
NK045(bi)001:1337: la 'du shes su mi dmigs shing rnam par shes
NK045(bi)001:1338: pa dmigs pa ma yin zhing sems pa mi dmigs
NK045(bi)001:1339: la / gzugs sogs chos kyi ngo bo dang de'i
NK045(bi)001:1340: khyad par mi rtag sogs kyis mtshon pa'i 'khor 'das
NK045(bi)001:1341: kyi chos kun ye nas skye med stong pa rnam
NK045(bi)001:1342: par rtog pa'i spyod yul kun las 'das pa'i tshul
NK045(bi)001:1343: du rab tu shesa shing gzhan la de ltar ston
NK045(bi)001:1344: pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
NK045(bi)001:1345: pa mchog la spyod pa yin no //
NK045(bi)001:1346: gnyis pa sher phyin yang dag pa bshad pa'i phan yon la dngos dang /
NK045(bi)001:1349: la las gang+g+aa'i sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:1350: gang zag la lasa gang+g+aa'i klung gi bye ma snyed
NK045(bi)001:1351: kyi zhing rnams na sems can du gtogs pa ji
NK045(bi)001:1352: snyed cig 'khod pa de kun nyan rang gi 'bras
NK045(bi)001:1353: bu mthar thug pa dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod
NK045(bi)001:1355: gang zag gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
NK045(bi)001:1356: phyin pa 'di yi ger bris te sems can mchog
NK045(bi)001:1357: ces 'di'i don rtogs shing gzhan la 'chad nus pa'i
NK045(bi)001:1358: byang chub sems dpa' la glegs bam de byin na
NK045(bi)001:1359: snga ma bas 'di ni bsod namsa ches khyad par
NK045(bi)001:1360: du 'phags so // gnyis pa la rgyu mtshan dngos dang /
NK045(bi)001:1363: ci phyir zhe na sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:1364: de ltar bsod nams 'phags pa de ci yi phyir
NK045(bi)001:1365: zhe na smra ba'i mchog byang chub sems dpa' de
NK045(bi)001:1366: dag lam 'dir bslab nas chos rnams mtha' dag stong
NK045(bi)001:1367: pa nyid du theg pa chen po 'dir ston par
NK045(bi)001:1368: byed la / stong pa nyid kyi tshul de thos
NK045(bi)001:1369: nas blo dman pa dag gis kyang gzugs dbu ba
NK045(bi)001:1370: rdos pa lta bu sogs su go nas nyan thos
NK045(bi)001:1371: kyi rigs can rnams kyang myur du 'khor ba las
NK045(bi)001:1372: rnam par grol ba la reg pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:1373: dbang po 'bring gis rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i
NK045(bi)001:1374: don mthong nas rang rgyal byang chub thob pa dang
NK045(bi)001:1375: ni / dbang po rnon pos chos kun mnyam pa
NK045(bi)001:1376: nyid du rtogs nas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la
NK045(bi)001:1378: gnyis pa la myu gu'i dpes mdor bstan pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:1379: nyi ma dang klu yi dpes rgyas par bshad pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:1380: dang po myu gu med par sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:1381: ji ltar myu gu meda par ni 'jig rten na
NK045(bi)001:1382: sdong po 'byung ba yong ye med pa yin na
NK045(bi)001:1383: / sdong po med pa de la yal ga dang
NK045(bi)001:1384: 'dab ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu ga la
NK045(bi)001:1386: de bzhin du rgyal ba'i yum nas bstan pa'i don
NK045(bi)001:1387: dam pa dang kun rdzob pa'i byang chub kyi sems
NK045(bi)001:1388: myu gu lta bu med na sdong po lta bu'i
NK045(bi)001:1389: rgyal ba 'jig rten du 'byung ba'ang yong ye med
NK045(bi)001:1390: la / de med na sangs rgyas des chos bstan
NK045(bi)001:1391: pa'i 'bras bu yal 'dab sogs dang mtshungs par brgya
NK045(bi)001:1392: byina dang tshangs pa dang nyan thos rnams kyang ga
NK045(bi)001:1393: la 'byung ste rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)001:1395: rjes 'gro'i dpe nyi mas mtshon pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:1396: ldog pa'i dpe klu bdag gis mtshon pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:1398: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:1399: 'di ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las gang gi tshe
NK045(bi)001:1400: 'od kyi d+r+wa ba phyogs bcur snang ba'am 'gyed pa
NK045(bi)001:1401: de yi tshe sems can rnams las kyi mtha' sna
NK045(bi)001:1402: tshogs byed pa la brtson pa de bzhin du /
NK045(bi)001:1403: mkhas pa dag gis rgyal ba'i shes rab kyi pha
NK045(bi)001:1404: rol tu phyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i
