NK045(bi)001:1405: ye shes thob pa'i phyir 'jig rten du smon 'jug
NK045(bi)001:1406: gi sems bskyed pa byung na /
NK045(bi)001:1407: de las 'bras bu rgyal ba'i ye shes bla na med pa 'byung la /
NK045(bi)001:1408: ye shes de nyid kyis ni shes bya thams cad
NK045(bi)001:1409: phyin ci ma log par gzigs pa'i sgo nas gdul
NK045(bi)001:1410: bya rnams la dmigs byed pa'i chos kyi 'od zer
NK045(bi)001:1411: gtong bas sems can rnams gnas skabs dang mthar thug
NK045(bi)001:1412: gi yon tan gyi chos rnams dang ldan par 'gyur
NK045(bi)001:1414: dper na ma dros sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:1415: dper bya na ma dros pa'i mtsho la klu yi
NK045(bi)001:1416: bdag po nyid med par gyur na 'dzam bu'i gling
NK045(bi)001:1417: 'dir klu de'i mthu las byung ba'i chu klung rnams
NK045(bi)001:1418: 'bab par ga la 'gyur te mi 'bab la /
NK045(bi)001:1419: chu klung med na rlan gsher med pa'i phyir me
NK045(bi)001:1420: tog dang 'bras bu rnams kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur
NK045(bi)001:1421: ro // gzhan yang chu ma bu 'phrad pa las
NK045(bi)001:1422: byung ba'i rgya mtsho chen po dag la yang rin
NK045(bi)001:1423: chen sna tshogs kyi gzugs mi 'dra ba mang po
NK045(bi)001:1425: dpe de bzhin du 'jig rten 'dir yang klu'i bdag
NK045(bi)001:1426: po dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems gnyis zang du
NK045(bi)001:1427: 'jug pa stong nyid snying rje'i snying po can med
NK045(bi)001:1428: na / bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes
NK045(bi)001:1429: gang zhig byang chub kyi sa bon rgyas par byed
NK045(bi)001:1430: pa sogs kyi sgo nas chu klung gi rgyun dang
NK045(bi)001:1431: 'dra ba de 'jig rten 'di dag kun tu ga
NK045(bi)001:1433: ye shes chu rgyun lta bu de med na des
NK045(bi)001:1434: chos bstan pa gdul bya rnams kyis thos sogs kyi
NK045(bi)001:1435: sgo nas mngon mtho dang nges legs kyi rgyur gyur
NK045(bi)001:1436: pa'i dge ba'i yon tan me tog lta bu sgrub
NK045(bi)001:1438: de med na de'i 'bras bu byang chub gsum yang med do //
NK045(bi)001:1439: rin po ches gang ba'i rgya mtsho dang 'dra ba'i
NK045(bi)001:1440: sangs rgyas kyi chos stobs la sogs pa dpag tu
NK045(bi)001:1441: med pa rnams kyang med par 'gyur bas na stong
NK045(bi)001:1442: nyid snying rje'i snying po can bden pa gnyis su
NK045(bi)001:1443: dbyer med pa'i byang chub sems rin po che yod
NK045(bi)001:1444: na lam dang 'bras bu'i yon tan thams cad kyang
NK045(bi)001:1445: de'i rjes su yod pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:1446: de med na gzhan kun kyang ldog pa'i phyir 'di
NK045(bi)001:1447: nyid gcig pu dkar po'i chos thams cad kyi rtsa
NK045(bi)001:1448: bar gyur pa'o // bzhi pa sher phyin de'i rang bzhin rgyud la bskyed par bya ba la /
NK045(bi)001:1449: rjes thob tu bya ba dang /
NK045(bi)001:1450: mnyam bzhag tu bsgom pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:1451: dang po la bsod nams spel ba'i rgyu yi rang /
NK045(bi)001:1452: chud mi za ba'i rgyu bsngo ba /
NK045(bi)001:1453: gong nas gong du 'phel ba'i rgyu mos pa gsum /
NK045(bi)001:1454: dang po la byang sems kyi yi rang gi phan yon bstan pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:1455: yi rang dang bsngo ba'i gzhi thung mong du bstan pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:1456: dang po la dpe dang don gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:1458: 'jig rten 'di na sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste //
NK045(bi)001:1459: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na snang bar byed pa'i
NK045(bi)001:1460: 'od can rgyu skar dang me sgron la sogs pa
NK045(bi)001:1461: dang / me khyer dang sgron me thogs pa la
NK045(bi)001:1462: sogs pa'i srog chagsa ji snyed pa kun gyis phyogs
NK045(bi)001:1463: rnams snang bar bya ba'i phyir rang rang gi lus
NK045(bi)001:1464: dang rdzas kyi 'od rnams phyogs gcig tu byung ba
NK045(bi)001:1465: dang / bas / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer gcig pa byung ba ni ches mchog ste /
NK045(bi)001:1466: snang byed tshogsa kyi 'od gzhan rnams kun gyis de'i
NK045(bi)001:1467: gsal ba dang khyab pa'i tshul la 'gran pa'i char
NK045(bi)001:1469: nyan thos tshogs rnams sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:1470: bshad ma thag pa'i dpe de bzhin du nyan thos
NK045(bi)001:1471: kyi tshogs rnams kyis ji snyed pa'i sbyin pa dang
NK045(bi)001:1472: tshul khrims dang bsgom pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i
NK045(bi)001:1473: bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum gyi tshogs bskyed
NK045(bi)001:1474: pa'ang / byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su yi rang gi sems skad cig gcig bskyed pa la /
NK045(bi)001:1475: nyan thos tshogs kyi bsod nams phung posa char yang
NK045(bi)001:1476: mi phod de nyan thos kyi dge rtsa dngos po
NK045(bi)001:1477: ji tsam che yang dmigs rnam rgya chung zhing rtog
NK045(bi)001:1478: pa'i dri ma ma dag la thabs mkhas pa'i bsngo
NK045(bi)001:1479: bas ma zin pas 'bras bu rgya chung ba'i phyir
NK045(bi)001:1480: ro // gnyis pa yi rang dang bsngo ba'i gzhi ni /
NK045(bi)001:1481: 'das dus sngon gyi sogs tshigs bcad gsum ste /
NK045(bi)001:1482: 'das pa'i dus na sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig gang zhig /
NK045(bi)001:1483: zhing mang po mtha' yas bye ba phrag stong dag
NK045(bi)001:1484: na gang bzhugs pa zhes pa'i mtshon te 'das pa'i
NK045(bi)001:1485: sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:1486: gang yang 'khor ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa 'jig
NK045(bi)001:1487: rten gyi mgon po rnams da ltar 'tsho zhing gzhes
NK045(bi)001:1488: te sdug bsngal zad par bya ba'i phyir rin chen
NK045(bi)001:1489: chos ston pa de thams cad kyis dang po byang
NK045(bi)001:1490: chub mchog tu thugs bskyed pa rang rgyud la bskyed
NK045(bi)001:1491: pa nas bzung ste rnam par 'dren pa de rnams
NK045(bi)001:1492: kyi dam pa'i chos nub pa'am zad par gyur pa
NK045(bi)001:1493: nyid kyi dus de yi bar gyi rgyal ba de
NK045(bi)001:1494: dag gi bsam pa thugs bskyed pa'i bsod nams gang
NK045(bi)001:1495: yin pa dang / sbyor ba pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:1496: 'bras bu stobs la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos gang thob pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:1497: gang gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi sras byang chub sems
NK045(bi)001:1498: dpa' rnams dang ni nyan thos dang rang rgyal bcas
NK045(bi)001:1499: pa de dag gi slob pa dang mi slob pa'i
NK045(bi)001:1500: dge ba dang zag bcas dang zag pa med pa
NK045(bi)001:1501: de thams cad rang gi blos gcig tu bsdus nas
NK045(bi)001:1502: byang chub sems dpa' des de yi rjes su bsam
NK045(bi)001:1503: pa thag pa nas dga' bas yi rang bar bya
NK045(bi)001:1504: zhing bla med byang chub tu sems bskyed par byas
NK045(bi)001:1505: te de yang mu med pa'i 'gro ba'i don bsgrub
NK045(bi)001:1506: pa'i rgyu ru bla na med pa'i byang chub chen
NK045(bi)001:1507: po thob pa'i phyir ni rang gzhan gyi dge rtsa
NK045(bi)001:1508: de thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas bsngo bar bya
NK045(bi)001:1509: ste / kun rdzob tu bsngo ba'i gnas yang dag
NK045(bi)001:1510: la dmigs pa'i sems pa 'dun pa dang bcas pas
NK045(bi)001:1511: mda' 'phang pa ltar dge rtsa der sgyur bar byed
NK045(bi)001:1512: pa ni bsngo ba'i ngo bo'o //
NK045(bi)001:1513: gnyis pa bsngo ba la dngos dang /
NK045(bi)001:1514: de ltar bsngosa pa'i phan yon gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:1516: don dam mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsngo ba dang /
NK045(bi)001:1517: kun rdzob tu sangs rgyas kyi rjes su slob pa'i bsngo ba gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:1518: dang po la dgag sgrub so sor bshad pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:1519: de'i don bsdu dpe dang bcas par bstan pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:1520: dang po la dgag bya dmigs bcas kyi bsngo ba /
NK045(bi)001:1521: bsgrub bya dmigs med kyi bsngo ba gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:1523: yongs bsngo gal te sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:1524: yongs su bsngo ba de la'ang gal te sngo byed
NK045(bi)001:1525: kyi sems su bden par zhen pa'i 'du shes 'byung
NK045(bi)001:1526: bar 'gyur zhing / gang du bsngo ba'i gnas byang chub la yang der zhen gyi 'du shes dang /
NK045(bi)001:1527: yongs su bsngo yul gyi sems can du 'du shes pa byung na /
NK045(bi)001:1528: mngon par zhen pa'i 'du shes kyis bcing ba'i phyir
NK045(bi)001:1529: na dmigs pa can gyi lta ba la gnas shing
NK045(bi)001:1530: sems de ni bsngo ba'i 'khor gsum la bden zhen
NK045(bi)001:1531: gyis chags pa'i dmigs pa yod pas phyin ci ma
NK045(bi)001:1532: log pa'i rang bzhin can gyi yongs su bsngo bar
NK045(bi)001:1534: bsngo ba rnam dag gi grangs su mi gtogs so //
NK045(bi)001:1535: gnyis pa gal te 'di ltar sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:1536: gal te dmigs pa can gyi bsngo tshul de las
NK045(bi)001:1537: bzlog nas 'di ltar bsngo bya'i dge ba dang sngo
NK045(bi)001:1538: byed kyi sems te gang gis gang bsngo ba'i chos
NK045(bi)001:1539: 'di kun rdzob tu skad cig ma yin pas 'gags
NK045(bi)001:1540: shing rang bzhin gyis zad pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:1541: gang du yongs su bsngo ba yi gnas byang chub
NK045(bi)001:1542: de yang snga ma dang dus mnyam du mi skye
NK045(bi)001:1543: bas zad pa'am med pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:1544: don dam par bsngo bya sngo byed bsngo ba'i chos
NK045(bi)001:1545: gsum po de skad cig dang rdul phran tsam du
NK045(bi)001:1546: yang grub pa med pas rang gi ngo bos ma
NK045(bi)001:1547: skyes pa'am ye nas 'gags shing zad pa ste yod
NK045(bi)001:1549: don dam par chos kyis chos la nam yang mi
NK045(bi)001:1550: bsngo ba'am bsngo rgyu med pa'i tshul shes par gyur
NK045(bi)001:1551: na bsngo ba'i 'khor gsum la mi chags pa de
NK045(bi)001:1552: ltar rab tu shes pas zin pa de ni legs
NK045(bi)001:1553: par yongs su bsngosa pa zhes bya ba yin no
NK045(bi)001:1554: // gsum pa de gnyis kyi don bsdu /
NK045(bi)001:1555: gal te mtshan mar sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:1556: mdor na gang zhig gang du bsngo ba sogs chos
NK045(bi)001:1557: gsum yul du byas nas 'dun pas bsngo mod kyi
NK045(bi)001:1558: de ni kun rdzob sgyu ma lta bu'i tshul du
NK045(bi)001:1559: shes dgos kyi / gal te chos gsum po de
NK045(bi)001:1560: la mtshan mar rlom zhing bsngo bar byed na de
NK045(bi)001:1561: ni yang dag par bsngo ba ma yin no //
NK045(bi)001:1562: ji ste chos gsum po de la mtshan ma med
NK045(bi)001:1563: pa'i rang bzhin du shes shing bsngosa na de ni
NK045(bi)001:1564: byang chub tu yang dag par bsngo ba yin te
NK045(bi)001:1565: / ji ltar dug dang 'dres pa'i kha zas bzang
NK045(bi)001:1566: po za ba na zas bzang yang dug gis gnod
NK045(bi)001:1567: / pa yin la / dkar po'i chos yin kyang
NK045(bi)001:1568: de la bden par zhen pa'i 'du shes kyis dmigs
NK045(bi)001:1569: pa'ang zas dug dang 'dres pa de 'drar rgyal bas
NK045(bi)001:1570: / pa yin la / gsungs so // gnyis pa kun rdzob kyi bsngo ba ni /
NK045(bi)001:1571: de ltas 'di ltar sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:1572: bsngo ba rnam dag yin min de lta bus na
NK045(bi)001:1573: 'di ltar skyon yon shes nas yongs su bsngo ba
NK045(bi)001:1575: ji ltar rgyal ba de dag gis rjes su yi
NK045(bi)001:1576: rang dang bsngo ba'i dge ba phyin ci ma log
NK045(bi)001:1577: pa de 'di lta bu'o zhes thugs su chud pa'am
NK045(bi)001:1578: mkhyen pa'i rnam pa gang lta bu yin pa ste
NK045(bi)001:1579: kun rdzob tu bsngo ba'i ngo bo'am rnam pa ji
NK045(bi)001:1581: de las tha snyad du 'bras bu mi bslu bar
NK045(bi)001:1582: 'byung ba gang dang ci 'dra ba yin pa dang
NK045(bi)001:1583: / de dag don dam par mi dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid gang lta bu yin pa ste /
NK045(bi)001:1584: mdor na bden gnyis dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin thugs
NK045(bi)001:1585: su chud nas rgyal bas yi rang dang bsngo ba
NK045(bi)001:1586: ji ltar mdzad pa de la /
NK045(bi)001:1587: de dang mthun par bdag gis kyang rjes su yi
NK045(bi)001:1588: rang ba de lta bur bya zhing de ltar yongs
NK045(bi)001:1589: su bsngo'o snyam pa ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ji
NK045(bi)001:1590: ltar bsngo ba bzhin bsngo'o snyam pas rang nyid ji
NK045(bi)001:1591: ltar bsngo ba'i tshul la ma mkhas kyang mkhas pa
NK045(bi)001:1592: gzhan gyi rjes su bsngo bas bsngo ba yang dag
NK045(bi)001:1593: pa'i rjes su mthun par 'gyur te /
NK045(bi)001:1594: bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam las /
NK045(bi)001:1595: 'jam dpal dpa' bos sogs tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsungs pa bzhin no //
NK045(bi)001:1596: gnyis pa de ltar bsngosa pa'i phan yon la /
NK045(bi)001:1597: dngos dang de dpe yi sgo nas rgyas par bstan pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:1599: de ltar bsod nams sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:1600: ji skad bshad pa de ltar bsod nams thams cad
NK045(bi)001:1601: byang chub chen por yongs su bsngo ba byed na
NK045(bi)001:1602: / rgyu bsngo ba dug med pa yin pa dang
NK045(bi)001:1603: de'i 'bras bu sangs rgyas mi spong ba'am thob pa
NK045(bi)001:1604: yin pa dang rgyal bas gsungs pa'i chos theg pa
NK045(bi)001:1605: chen po bzhin phyin ci ma log par smra ba
NK045(bi)001:1606: / yin no // de ltar mi dmigs pa'i tshul
NK045(bi)001:1607: gyis yongs su bsngo bar byed pa'i dpa' bo byang
NK045(bi)001:1609: 'jig rten na dmigs pa can gyi byang chub sems
NK045(bi)001:1610: dpa' ji snyed yod pa thams cad zil gyis gnona
NK045(bi)001:1611: par byed do // gnyis pa la /
NK045(bi)001:1612: 'bras bu rnam mkhyen thob pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:1613: lam phar phyin dag pa thob tshul gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:1614: dang po la dmigs bu'i dpes phar phyin gzhan rnam mkhyen du 'khrid pa /
NK045(bi)001:1615: mig ma bris pas phar phyin gzhan tshang yang rnam mkhyen mi thob pa'i tshul gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:1617: dmus long dmigs bu sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:1618: ji ltar mig med pa'i dmusa long gang zhig lam
NK045(bi)001:1619: du 'khrid mkhan gyi dmigs bu med pa bye ba
NK045(bi)001:1620: khrag khrig rnams lhan cig tshogs par gyur kyang /
NK045(bi)001:1621: rang gi mdun na gnas pa'i lam yang mi mthong zhing mi shes na /
NK045(bi)001:1622: lam der zhugs nas grong khyer gzhan du 'jug par ga la 'gyur te de ni gnas med do //
NK045(bi)001:1623: de bzhin du shes raba kyi pha rol tu phyin
NK045(bi)001:1624: pa mig lta bu 'di med na rang ngos nas
NK045(bi)001:1625: mig med pa lta bu'i sbyin sogs pha rol tu
NK045(bi)001:1626: phyin pa lnga po 'di phyogs su 'khrid pa'i dmigs
NK045(bi)001:1627: bu lta bu shes rab kyis ma bzung bar grogs
NK045(bi)001:1628: de med pas ni 'phags lam mi shes pa'i phyir
NK045(bi)001:1629: rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi grong khyer la reg par
NK045(bi)001:1632: gang tshe shes rab sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:1633: gang gi tshe sbyin sogs dge chos gzhan de dag
NK045(bi)001:1634: 'khor gsum mi rtog pa'i shes rab kyi sa ni
NK045(bi)001:1635: rab tu zina par gyur na de yi tshe de
NK045(bi)001:1636: dag mig rnyed par gyur cing pha rol tu phyin
NK045(bi)001:1637: pa 'di yi ming thob nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i
NK045(bi)001:1638: grong khyer du 'di blag tu phyin par byed pa
NK045(bi)001:1639: 'thob bo // de dag dper bya na mi la
NK045(bi)001:1640: sogs pa'i gzugs kyi ri mo'i las ni gzhan dang
NK045(bi)001:1641: gzhan yongs su rdzogs par bris zin na yang de
NK045(bi)001:1642: la mig kho na med pa ste ma tshangs na
NK045(bi)001:1643: 'thob bo // / ji srid mig ma bris pasa
NK045(bi)001:1644: ri mor ma rdzogs pa'i phyir de'i rngan pa mi
NK045(bi)001:1646: dge ba gzhan tshang yang shes rab med na 'bras bu mi thob pa'i tshul lo //
NK045(bi)001:1647: de ltar chos kun gyi de kho na nyid shes
NK045(bi)001:1648: pa'i shes rab la brten nas lam thams cad rnam
NK045(bi)001:1649: kun mchog ldan gyi stong nyid du bsgyur ba'i 'bras
NK045(bi)001:1650: bu rnam kun mchog ldan gyi stong pa nyid kyi
NK045(bi)001:1651: ye shes kho nar smin par nges pa'i blo gros
NK045(bi)001:1652: kyis lam gzhan gyis mi 'phrog par 'bras bu'i yum
NK045(bi)001:1653: nyid la gzhol ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i
NK045(bi)001:1654: sems kyis bsngo ba mi dmigs pa dang ldan pa
NK045(bi)001:1655: ni theg pa chen po'i lam gyi snying po yin
NK045(bi)001:1657: gnyis pa la mi dmigs pas sher phyin gral du tshud pa nam mkha'i dpes bstan pa /
NK045(bi)001:1658: de dang bral na lam yongs su mi dag pa'i tshul gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:1660: gang tshe 'dus byas sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:1661: gang gi tshe 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas dang /
NK045(bi)001:1662: dkar po dang nag po'i chos su gtogs pa thams cad la /
NK045(bi)001:1663: gnas lugs mthar thug la dpyod pa'i shes rab kyis rnam par dpyad cing mtshan 'dzin bshig nas /
NK045(bi)001:1664: de dag la yang dag par grub pa'am mtshan ma'i
NK045(bi)001:1665: spyod yul rdul phra rab tsam yang mi dmigs shing
NK045(bi)001:1666: gang du'ang gnas pa med pa'i don mthong ba'i tshe
NK045(bi)001:1667: na / 'jig rten dag na shes rab kyi pha
NK045(bi)001:1668: rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro
NK045(bi)001:1669: na / ste / dper na nam mkha' ni rang
NK045(bi)001:1670: gi ngo bo med pa'i phyir gzhan gang la'ang cung
NK045(bi)001:1671: zad rten de mi gnas pa de dang 'dra'o //
NK045(bi)001:1673: gal te bdag ni sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:1674: gal te snying rjes zin kyang dmigs gtad ma zhig
NK045(bi)001:1675: pa'i sgo nas bdag ni rgyal ba'i shes rab kyi
NK045(bi)001:1676: phar phyin 'di la spyad par bya'o zhes 'dzin stang
NK045(bi)001:1678: sems can sdug bsngal la reg pa khrag khrig mang
NK045(bi)001:1679: po dgrol lo zhes mngon par zhen pa'i sems yod
NK045(bi)001:1680: na / de ltar bdag dang gzhan gyi rgyud kyis
NK045(bi)001:1681: bsdus pa'i sems can du 'du shes pas yongs su
NK045(bi)001:1682: rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa can zhes
NK045(bi)001:1683: na / bya ste / 'di lta bu ni shes
NK045(bi)001:1684: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog la spyod
NK045(bi)001:1689: des na yum la dad pas brtson par gdams pa gsum /
NK045(bi)001:1691: byang chub sems dpa' sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:1692: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig sngon chad kyi skye ba rnams su spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe /
NK045(bi)001:1693: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo'i
NK045(bi)001:1694: don 'di la nyan cing 'dzin la sems pa sogs
NK045(bi)001:1695: kyi sgo nas spyod pa de dag 'jig rten 'dir
NK045(bi)001:1696: skyes nas sngon gyi rgyu'i dbang gis shes rab kyi
NK045(bi)001:1697: pha rol tu phyin pa'i don la mkhas pa dang
NK045(bi)001:1698: de la soms nyi med par gyur nas gzhung 'di
NK045(bi)001:1699: thos ma thag tu skyes bu des ni bdag gis
NK045(bi)001:1700: ston pa mthong ngo snyam du ston pa'i 'du shes
NK045(bi)001:1701: skyed pa yi rgyu des ni byang chub zhi ba
NK045(bi)001:1702: chen po myur du rtogs par 'gyur ro //
NK045(bi)001:1704: sngon spyad tshe na sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:1705: gang zhig sngon spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe na sangs
NK045(bi)001:1706: rgyas khrag khrig du ma bskur zhing mchod de bsod
NK045(bi)001:1708: theg pa chen po'i dgongs don rgyal ba'i shes rab
NK045(bi)001:1709: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma dad cing
NK045(bi)001:1710: de thob par smon lam ma btab na /
NK045(bi)001:1711: da lta sher phyin zab mo thos par gyur pa'i
NK045(bi)001:1712: mod nas blo chung de yis chos kyi mchog zab
NK045(bi)001:1713: mo 'di ni sgo gsum gyi log spyod kyi sgo
NK045(bi)001:1714: nas spong bar byed de gus par mi byed do
NK045(bi)001:1715: // de spang bas dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams
NK045(bi)001:1716: kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos thams cad kyang spang
NK045(bi)001:1717: // bar gyur nas / 'phags pa'i chos kyi skyabs
NK045(bi)001:1718: med par gyur pa de ni dmyal ba mnar med
NK045(bi)001:1719: par 'gro zhing 'jig rten chags 'jig gi bskal pa
NK045(bi)001:1720: du mar brgyud par sdug bsngal myong ba sogs nyes
NK045(bi)001:1721: dmigs tshad med par gsungs so //
NK045(bi)001:1723: de lta bas na sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:1724: gang la dad na phan yon che zhing ma dad
NK045(bi)001:1725: na nyes dmigs che ba de lta bas na gal
NK045(bi)001:1726: te sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mchog la reg par
NK045(bi)001:1727: 'doda na rgyal ba'i yum 'dir dad par gyis shig
NK045(bi)001:1728: dang / 'di ni de'i med na mi 'byung gi rgyu thun mong min pa yin no //
NK045(bi)001:1729: da lta rin po che'i gling lta bu'i de bzhin
NK045(bi)001:1730: gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang mjal ba'i dus 'dir 'bras
NK045(bi)001:1731: bu yod par bya dgos kyi /
NK045(bi)001:1732: dper na tshong pa dag rina chen gyi gling du
NK045(bi)001:1733: song nas ni sngar gyi tshong zong zad la gsar
NK045(bi)001:1734: du rin po che'i khe ci yang ma thob par
NK045(bi)001:1735: slar lag stong du log pa lta bur gyur na
NK045(bi)001:1736: mi rung ngo // de yang sher phyin zab mo'i
NK045(bi)001:1737: nor bu lag tu mchis kyang de la ma mos
NK045(bi)001:1738: mi rung ngo // par dor nas / chos spangs
NK045(bi)001:1739: pa'i rgyus sngar gyi bsod nams zad par 'gyur ba
NK045(bi)001:1740: de ltar mi bya'o zhes so //
NK045(bi)001:1741: gnyis pa mnyam bzhag tu bsgom tshul la /
NK045(bi)001:1742: rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo /
NK045(bi)001:1746: dang po ngo bo ni gzugs kyi dag pa sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:1747: chos thams cad gdod nas rnam par dag pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:1748: rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:1749: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:1750: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba dang /
NK045(bi)001:1751: ye nas ma skyes ma 'gags pa'i mnyam pa nyid
NK045(bi)001:1752: kyi ngo bos thams cad thig le nyag gcig chos
NK045(bi)001:1753: dbyings 'od gsal sgrib bral chen por ro mnyam du
NK045(bi)001:1754: sgom pa ni mnyam bzhag ye shes kyi ngo bo'o
NK045(bi)001:1755: // de'i tshul ji lta bu zhe na /
NK045(bi)001:1756: 'di ltar gzugs kyi dag pa zhes pas mtshon te
NK045(bi)001:1757: shes bya'i yul gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi dbar gyi
NK045(bi)001:1758: chos thams cad ni ye nas gzung ba dang 'dzin
NK045(bi)001:1759: pa kun nyon dang rnam byang bdag dang gzhan dngos
NK045(bi)001:1760: dang dngos med la sogs pa'i gnyis chos kyi rang
NK045(bi)001:1761: bzhin gang du'ang ma grub pa chos dbyings thig le
NK045(bi)001:1762: nyag gcig gdod nas skye 'gag dang bral ba'i mnyam
NK045(bi)001:1763: pa nyid rang bzhin rnam dag sgrib bral chen por
NK045(bi)001:1765: de ltar ma rtogs pa'i 'khrul pa glo bur ba
NK045(bi)001:1766: skyes pa'i tshe na bdag dang chos su sgro 'dogs
NK045(bi)001:1767: pa'i blo dri ma can gyi ngor yul yang ma
NK045(bi)001:1768: dag pa ltar snang la blos kyang de ltar bzung
NK045(bi)001:1769: bas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyogs kyi dri ma
NK045(bi)001:1770: dang sgrib pa yod pa la ma dag pa'i sems
NK045(bi)001:1771: can zhes bya'o // glo bur gyi dri ma de
NK045(bi)001:1772: bsal ba'i phyir theg pa gsum gyi lam bstan pa
NK045(bi)001:1773: de la zhugs pas chos nyid kyi gnas lugs rang
NK045(bi)001:1774: bzhin rnam dag de je gsal du mthong ba'i tshul
NK045(bi)001:1775: las 'di ltar nyan thos kyi 'bras bu bzhi dang
NK045(bi)001:1776: rang rgyal gyi 'bras bu dang byang chub sems dpa'i
NK045(bi)001:1777: mthong lam dang sgom lam sa dgu'i rtogs pa skyes
NK045(bi)001:1778: te spang bya'i dri ma rnams spang ba'i cha nas
NK045(bi)001:1779: dag pa chung 'bring chen po zhes su brjod de
NK045(bi)001:1780: dag ni dri ma ci rigs par dag pa'i sems
NK045(bi)001:1781: can zhes bya'o // can zhes bya'o // de yang
NK045(bi)001:1782: yul gzugs sogs kyi rang bzhin la ye nas ma
NK045(bi)001:1784: phyin ci log tu bzung ba'i dri ma glo bur
NK045(bi)001:1785: ba rnams dag pa'i rim pa dang mtshungs pas mig
NK045(bi)001:1786: skyon dag pas yul je gsal du mthong ba ltar
NK045(bi)001:1787: yul can des yul gyi dag pa mthong la de
NK045(bi)001:1788: mthong ba'i dbang gis yul can de'ang dag pa zhes
NK045(bi)001:1789: brjod pa las tha dad du dag tshul gzhan med
NK045(bi)001:1790: de 'di ltar snang tshul la ni yul can je
NK045(bi)001:1791: dag tu song ba dang yul yang gsar du dag
NK045(bi)001:1792: par snang ba ltar yod kyang /
NK045(bi)001:1793: gnas tshul la ni yul gzugs sogs kyi rang bzhin
NK045(bi)001:1794: ye nas dag pa mthong ba de nyid yul can
NK045(bi)001:1795: glo bur gyi dri ma las grol ba 'bras bu
NK045(bi)001:1796: ye dag pa nyid yin par shes par bya ste
NK045(bi)001:1797: / de gnyis ye nas yul yul can gnyis su
NK045(bi)001:1798: med par dag pa chen por gnas pa'i gnad la
NK045(bi)001:1799: don gcig pas dag pa de gnyis ngo bo tha
NK045(bi)001:1800: mi dad du shes par bya'o //
NK045(bi)001:1801: de bzhin du 'bras bu dag pa dang gzugs sogs
NK045(bi)001:1802: kyi dag pa de nyid glo bur bral dag gi
NK045(bi)001:1803: mthar thug pa sgrib gnyis yongs su spang pa'i shin
NK045(bi)001:1804: tu rnam par dag pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
NK045(bi)001:1805: shes nyid kyi dag par 'gyur te dag pa de
NK045(bi)001:1806: thams cad rtsa ba rang bzhin rnam dag gi don
NK045(bi)001:1807: la gnad gcig pa bshad ma thag pa bzhin no
NK045(bi)001:1808: // de ltar dag pa mthar thug pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dag pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:1809: gnas skabs kyi lam so so'i 'bras bu thob pa'i dag pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:1810: gzhi gzugs sogs phung khams skye mched kyi chos rnams
NK045(bi)001:1811: kyi dag pa gsum po 'di ni snang tshul la
NK045(bi)001:1813: gnas tshul la nam mkha'i khams la tha dad med
NK045(bi)001:1814: pa dang mtshungs te chos dbyings rang bzhin gyis rnam
NK045(bi)001:1815: par dag pa gcig gi ngo bor dbyera med la
NK045(bi)001:1816: blos kyang tha dad du gcad du med de /
NK045(bi)001:1817: chos nyid rnam dag de'i rang bzhin ji lta ba
NK045(bi)001:1818: bzhin du mngon sum gzigs pa sangs rgyas kyi ye
NK045(bi)001:1819: shes kyi ngor / chos thams cad mngon par sangs
NK045(bi)001:1820: rgyas pa'am gdod nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang
NK045(bi)001:1821: bzhin du gzigs kyi ma dag pa med la /
NK045(bi)001:1822: de ltar rtogs pa'i ye shes de'ang glo bur gyi
NK045(bi)001:1823: dri ma bag chags dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa mtha'
NK045(bi)001:1824: dag gtan nas spangs pa'i dag pa mthar thug pa
NK045(bi)001:1825: yin pas / des ji ltar gzigs pa ltar chos
NK045(bi)001:1826: thams cad yul dang yul can la sogs pa'i gnyis
NK045(bi)001:1827: chos kyi rang bzhin du med par gnyis med mnyam
NK045(bi)001:1828: pa chen por ye nas dag cing sangs rgyas pa
NK045(bi)001:1829: nyid du dbye ba med par ro gcig tu shes
NK045(bi)001:1830: pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
NK045(bi)001:1831: dgongs pa mthar thug pa yin la /
NK045(bi)001:1832: gshis rnal ma de'i don bab kyis cog bzhag tu skyong ba'i tshul yang /
NK045(bi)001:1833: 'di la bsal bya ci yang med //
NK045(bi)001:1834: bzhag par bya ba gang yang med //
NK045(bi)001:1835: yang dag nyid la yang dag blta //
NK045(bi)001:1836: yang dag mthong nas rnam par grol //
NK045(bi)001:1837: zhes pa bzhin du shes par bya'o //
NK045(bi)001:1839: zhi mthar mi gnas pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:1840: srid mthar mi gnas pa'i byed las gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:1842: dpa' bo gar spyod sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:1843: dpa' bo byang chub sems dpa' rnams gnas skabs ci
NK045(bi)001:1844: dang gar spyod kyang srid dang zhi ba gnyis su
NK045(bi)001:1845: med pa ye nas rnam dag chen po shes rab
NK045(bi)001:1846: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yis
NK045(bi)001:1847: / khams gsum gyi nyon mongs pa kun las yang
NK045(bi)001:1848: dag par 'das la de lta na'ang nyan thos ltar
NK045(bi)001:1849: srid pa las rnam par grol ba'i myang 'das phyogs
NK045(bi)001:1850: gcig pa la gnas pa'ang min te /
NK045(bi)001:1851: srid par dbang med du skye ba'i nyon mongs pa
NK045(bi)001:1852: bsal bar gyur kyang thabs la mkhas pas srid par
NK045(bi)001:1853: skye ba yongs su ston par byed la /
NK045(bi)001:1854: rga dang na dang 'chi ba meda kyang snying rje'i
NK045(bi)001:1855: dbang gis gzhan don du 'chi 'pho ba sogs su
NK045(bi)001:1857: rang gis srid zhir mi gnas pa'i chos dbyings rtogs
NK045(bi)001:1858: pa na srid zhi'i mtha' la zhen pa rnams la
NK045(bi)001:1859: chos zab mo rtogs pa'i rang 'bras kyi snying rje
NK045(bi)001:1860: chen po 'byung ba dang thabs mkhas pa tshad med
NK045(bi)001:1861: pa rtsol med du thob par 'gyur ba chos nyid
NK045(bi)001:1863: 'gro ba 'di dag sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:1864: rang bzhin med par rtogs pa'i shes rab dang mi
NK045(bi)001:1865: ldan pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag ni minga dang gzugs
NK045(bi)001:1866: kyi phung po lnga'i 'dam brgal dka' ba la chags
NK045(bi)001:1867: nas / nyi zla 'phul byed go la'i rlung gi
NK045(bi)001:1868: 'khor lo yang nas yang du 'khor ba lta bu'i
NK045(bi)001:1870: 'di ltar las dang nyon mongs pa dang skye ba
NK045(bi)001:1871: gsum gyi tshul can rten 'brel bcu gnyis po lu
NK045(bi)001:1872: gu rgyud du bar med par 'brel te mgal me
NK045(bi)001:1874: dag ni rang gi sems rmongs pa'i rgyar tshud pa
NK045(bi)001:1875: ji ltar na ri dwags rnams 'bros su med pa'i
NK045(bi)001:1876: rgyar chud pa dang 'dra bar sdug bsngal zhing thar
NK045(bi)001:1878: de nyid rtogs pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa rnams
NK045(bi)001:1879: ni 'khrul pa'i rgyas mi 'ching bar 'gro ba'i khams
NK045(bi)001:1880: 'di na dper na mkha' la bya bzhin du rnam
NK045(bi)001:1882: mnyam bzhag ye shes de'i spyod yul la /
NK045(bi)001:1883: mi spyod pa'i spyod yul bstan pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:1884: de ltar spyod pa'i phan yon dpes bshad pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:1886: spyod pa yongs dag sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:1887: byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa yongs su dag pa
NK045(bi)001:1888: gang zhig gzugs la gzugs kyi ngo bo dang de'i
NK045(bi)001:1889: khyad par mi rtag pa sogs su dmigs pas mi
NK045(bi)001:1890: spyod cing / de bzhin du rnam shes dang 'du
NK045(bi)001:1891: shes dang tshor ba dang sems par yang mi spyod
NK045(bi)001:1892: spyod cing / na / de ltar gang du yang
NK045(bi)001:1893: mi spyod par spyod pa de ni dngos zhen gyi
NK045(bi)001:1894: chags pa phra rags thams cad yongs su spong bar
NK045(bi)001:1896: chags pa mtha' dag las rnam par grol ba bde
NK045(bi)001:1897: gshegs rnams kyi shes rab la spyod pa yin no
NK045(bi)001:1899: de ltar spyod pa'i tshogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:1900: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mkhas shing
NK045(bi)001:1901: gsal ba de ni mngon par rlom pa'i chags pa
NK045(bi)001:1902: thams cad bcad nas 'gro la zhes dang rgya dpe
NK045(bi)001:1903: la lar grol la zhes kyang 'byung /
NK045(bi)001:1904: mnyam pa nyid chags pa med par gong nas gong du 'gro ste /
NK045(bi)001:1905: dper na nyi ma ni sgra gcan zhes pa'i gza' dang bral nas lhang nger 'dug pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:1906: me btang bas rtsa dang shing dang nags tshal thams
NK045(bi)001:1907: cad bsreg pa bzhin du shes rab chen po 'od
NK045(bi)001:1908: dang me lta bus nyon mongs pa'i mun pa dang
NK045(bi)001:1910: bzhi pa mnyam bzhag ye shes de'i rnam par dmigs med bstan pa /
NK045(bi)001:1911: chos rnams thams cad sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:1912: 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam byang
NK045(bi)001:1913: gis bsdus pa'i chos rnams thams cad ni rang gi
NK045(bi)001:1914: ngo bos nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin dag cing shes
NK045(bi)001:1915: bya'i dmigs pa yongs su dag par gyur pa la
NK045(bi)001:1916: / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dngos po'i rang
NK045(bi)001:1917: bzhin de lta bu nyid rtogs pa'i shes rab kyi
NK045(bi)001:1918: pha rol tu phyin pa mchog gi don la lta
NK045(bi)001:1919: / zhing gnas na / lta mkhan sher phyin sgom
NK045(bi)001:1920: par byed pa po yang mi dmigs la blta bar
NK045(bi)001:1921: bya ba'i chos kun kyang mi dmigs te spros pa
NK045(bi)001:1922: nye bar zhi ba'i dbyings la gnas pa 'di ni
NK045(bi)001:1923: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog la
NK045(bi)001:1925: gsum pa rgyas par bstan pa'i sgo la /
NK045(bi)001:1926: sbyor ba la bslab pa'i rim pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:1927: sbyor ba de'i 'bras bu yang dag par 'grub pa'i tshul dang /
NK045(bi)001:1928: de la sbyor ba po gang zag bstan pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:1929: de ltar 'jug pa'i gang zag gi che ba dang /
NK045(bi)001:1930: des bslab bya chos kyi che ba dang lnga las dang po la /
NK045(bi)001:1931: bsgom bya sbyor ba'i ngo bo /
NK045(bi)001:1932: sbyor ba bsgom pa las byung ba'i yon tan /
NK045(bi)001:1935: rkyen bshes gnyen bshad pa dang lnga /
NK045(bi)001:1937: rgyal ba la ni sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:1938: rgyal ba mi yi seng ge la ni lha yi rgyal po brgya byin gyis zhus pa /
NK045(bi)001:1939: gang zhig sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas
NK045(bi)001:1940: shing de las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dge
NK045(bi)001:1941: ba'i bshes gnyen gyis zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
NK045(bi)001:1942: rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
NK045(bi)001:1943: spyod pa la ji ltar brtson par bya zhes zhus
NK045(bi)001:1944: pa'i lan du bka' stsal pa /
NK045(bi)001:1945: phung po dang khams kyis bsdus pa'i chos la rdul
NK045(bi)001:1946: tsam du'ang dmigs pa dang gnas pa'i tshul gyis brtson
NK045(bi)001:1948: phung po la sogs par mi dmigs mi gnas mi
NK045(bi)001:1949: brtson la de ni byang chub sems dpa' dag gi
NK045(bi)001:1950: yang dag pa'i brtson pa yin no //
NK045(bi)001:1952: sbyor ba'i rgyu gus pa'i yon tan /
NK045(bi)001:1953: sbyor ba las byung ba 'bras bu'i yon tan /
NK045(bi)001:1954: gnas skabs sbyor ba'i ngo bo'i yon tan gsum /
NK045(bi)001:1956: gang zhig chos 'di sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:1957: gang zag gang zhig sher phyin gyi gzhung 'di nas
NK045(bi)001:1958: chos 'di dag thams cad ngo bo med kyang rnam
NK045(bi)001:1959: pa mi 'gag pa sbrul pa dang sgyu ma 'dra
NK045(bi)001:1961: de'i don la soms nyi med cing yid ches nas
NK045(bi)001:1962: de slob pa la phyir zhing nan tan gyis sbyor
NK045(bi)001:1963: bar byed pa yi sems can de ni sngon yun
NK045(bi)001:1964: ring po nas theg chen la zhugs pa nyid du
NK045(bi)001:1965: rig par bya zhing des sngon sangs rgyas bye ba
NK045(bi)001:1966: khrag khriga mang po la mchod cing rjed pa sogs
NK045(bi)001:1967: kyi sgo nas lhag par bya ba byas pa yin
NK045(bi)001:1969: de 'dra'i rgyu sngon song la ma brten par shes
NK045(bi)001:1970: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo'i don
NK045(bi)001:1971: thos nas mos par 'gyur ba mi 'byung ngo //
NK045(bi)001:1972: gnyis pa la bar chad kyis mi tshugs pa'i yon tan /
NK045(bi)001:1973: sku gsum thob pa'i yon tan gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:1975: dgon pa'i lam ni sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:1976: skye bos dben pa dgon pa'i lam ni dpag tshad mang po yod par zhugs pa'i mis /
NK045(bi)001:1977: lam de bgrod bgrod pa las nam zhig grong khyer
NK045(bi)001:1978: gyi gnag rdzi rnams gnas pa dgon pa dang grong
NK045(bi)001:1979: gis mtshams su gyur pa nyid kyi nags tshal yid
NK045(bi)001:1980: du 'thad pa phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas /
NK045(bi)001:1981: lam ring por bgrod pa de dag 'di snyam du /
NK045(bi)001:1982: 'di dag ni grong dang grong khyer dang nye ba'i rtags yin no snyam ste /
NK045(bi)001:1983: stag sogs dgon pa'i gnas na yod pa'i 'jigs pa
NK045(bi)001:1984: las dbugs phyin pa rnyed par 'gyur zhing de phan
NK045(bi)001:1985: chod chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa yid la byed pa
NK045(bi)001:1986: med par 'gyur ba de bzhin du byang chub dam
NK045(bi)001:1987: pa thob par 'dod cing de'i thabs yongs su tshol
NK045(bi)001:1988: ba'i tshe / rgyal ba rnams kyi yum shes rab
NK045(bi)001:1989: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lam mchog tu gyur
NK045(bi)001:1990: pa 'di mnyan pa yi skal ba gang gis thob
NK045(bi)001:1991: pa de ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las dbugs phyina
NK045(bi)001:1992: pa thopa para gyur cing srid zhi'i mthar lhung ba'i
NK045(bi)001:1994: nyan thos dgra bcom pa'i sa la lhung ba ma
NK045(bi)001:1995: yin rkyen rtogs kyi sa la'ang lhung ba min no
NK045(bi)001:1996: // gnyis pa la chos sku thob pa'i yon tan /
NK045(bi)001:1997: longs sku thob pa'i yon tan /
NK045(bi)001:1998: sprul sku thob pa'i yon tan gsum /
NK045(bi)001:2000: mi zhig rgya mtsho'i sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:2001: mi zhig rgya mtsho'i chu ni blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba na de yis /
NK045(bi)001:2002: gal te shing dang nags tshal dang ri bo dag
NK045(bi)001:2003: mdun gyi phyogs su mthong na ni da dung rgya
NK045(bi)001:2004: mtsho dang ring bar shes te /
NK045(bi)001:2005: ci ste ri la sogs pa ring ba'i rtags de
NK045(bi)001:2006: dag ma mthong bar sa thams cad khad kyis mnyam
NK045(bi)001:2007: zhing gzhol la mtha'i pha rol mi mthong bar gyur
NK045(bi)001:2008: na da ni rgya mtsho chen po ni bdag dang
NK045(bi)001:2009: nye bar gyur to snyam ste de la somsa nyi
NK045(bi)001:2010: meda de rgya mtsho chen po ni pha mtha' mi
NK045(bi)001:2011: mngon pa srid du yangs shing mnyam pa'i phyir de'i
NK045(bi)001:2012: khyon kyi char ri la sogs pa yod pa mi
NK045(bi)001:2013: srid pa'i phyir na de ltar rgyang nas kyang shes
NK045(bi)001:2014: so // dpe de ji lta bar byang chub dam
NK045(bi)001:2015: par raba tu zhugs pa rnams kyis rgyal ba yi
NK045(bi)001:2016: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan
NK045(bi)001:2017: pa'i skal ba thob pa de yang mtha' kun dang
NK045(bi)001:2018: bral ba'i chos sku ye shes kyi rgya mtsho chen
NK045(bi)001:2019: po dang nye bar rig par bya ste /
NK045(bi)001:2020: 'di las kun tu rtog pa'i mtshan ma nags tshal
NK045(bi)001:2021: dang ri la sogs pa lta bu rnams rim gyis
NK045(bi)001:2022: spangs te rtog pa mngon du rgyu ba rnams khad
NK045(bi)001:2023: kyis zhi nas mtha' bral dmigs pa med pa'i ye
NK045(bi)001:2024: shes thob par bslu ba med pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)001:2025: des na sher phyin 'di dang ma bral ba'i gang
NK045(bi)001:2026: zag de rnam par 'dren pas mngon sum du khyod
NK045(bi)001:2027: 'tshang rgya'i zhes lung bstan par ma gyur kyang /
NK045(bi)001:2028: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni ring por mi thogs
NK045(bi)001:2029: par bdag gis reg pa'am thob par 'gyur te rgyu
NK045(bi)001:2030: 'bras bslu med kyi tshul las so //
NK045(bi)001:2031: gnyis pa longs sku thob tshul /
NK045(bi)001:2032: dpyid dus bzang la sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2033: dpyid kyi dus bzang po la shing gi sdong po
NK045(bi)001:2034: gang las lo ma rnying pa barje nas sa la
NK045(bi)001:2036: shing gi yala gas ni ring por mi thogs par
NK045(bi)001:2037: lo ma dang 'bras bu me tog rnams gsar du
NK045(bi)001:2038: bskrun par 'gyur ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi
NK045(bi)001:2039: pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang zag su yi
NK045(bi)001:2040: lag tu thob pa de ni dus ring por mi
NK045(bi)001:2041: thogs par 'drena pa rnams kyi byang chub thob ste
NK045(bi)001:2042: yang dag pa'i gdams ngag thob pa'i dus de nas
NK045(bi)001:2043: theg pa mchog la sems bskyed pa'i 'bras bu dpag
NK045(bi)001:2044: bsam gyi shing lta bu'i gzugs kyi sku snying rje'i
NK045(bi)001:2045: lo ma stug po'i grib bsil can mtshan dpe'i me
NK045(bi)001:2046: tog rgyas shing gzhan phan gyi 'bras bu dang ldan
NK045(bi)001:2047: pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku thob par 'gyur ro
NK045(bi)001:2048: // gsum pa sprul sku thob tshul /
NK045(bi)001:2049: dper na bud med sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2050: dper na bud med mngal chags pa'i sbrum ma gang
NK045(bi)001:2051: zhig mngal gyi zla dus rdzogs nas btsa' ba'i nad
NK045(bi)001:2052: kyi sdug bsngal myong bas nyen par gyur pa na
NK045(bi)001:2053: / tshul de ni de yi btsa' ba'i dus la
NK045(bi)001:2054: bab pa'i tshod ces bya ba yin pa de bzhin
NK045(bi)001:2055: du byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig rgyal ba'i shes
NK045(bi)001:2056: raba 'di nyan pa thob cing de la yid dang
NK045(bi)001:2057: ba'i dga' ba dang 'dod pa'i 'dun pa bskyed pa
NK045(bi)001:2058: ni myur du byang chub chen po la reg par
NK045(bi)001:2059: / 'gyur te / lam 'di las rigs kyi sa
NK045(bi)001:2060: bon gsos btab nas tshogs rdzogs par byas te sbrum
NK045(bi)001:2061: ma las bu btsas pa bzhin du sprul pa'i sku
NK045(bi)001:2062: 'jig rten na dngos su snang bar 'gyur ro //
NK045(bi)001:2063: gsum pa ngo bo'i yon tan la 'phel 'grib sogs
NK045(bi)001:2064: su mi rtog kyang myang 'das phyogs gcig la mi
NK045(bi)001:2065: reg pa dang / rnam par mi rtog kyang 'gro don 'byung ba gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:2067: shes rab pha rol sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2068: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog gi
NK045(bi)001:2069: don la tshul bzhin spyod pa'i tshe theg pa mchog
NK045(bi)001:2070: gi rnal 'byor pa des gzugs la sogs pa kun
NK045(bi)001:2071: byang gi chos rnams kyi 'phel ba ste skye ba
NK045(bi)001:2072: dang rgyun bsags pa'i khyad par du gyur pa dang
NK045(bi)001:2073: ni / yongs su 'grib pa ste 'gag pa dang
NK045(bi)001:2074: sngar las dma' bar gyur pa'i tshul mi mthong ste
NK045(bi)001:2075: chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i don du 'phel
NK045(bi)001:2076: 'grib bri gang dang bral te mnyam pa nyid du
NK045(bi)001:2077: ni / gnas pa'o // de bzhin du gang zhig
NK045(bi)001:2078: chos dge ba dang chos min mi dge ba dang
NK045(bi)001:2079: ni / gnas pa'o // / chos rnams kyi chos
NK045(bi)001:2080: nyid dam chos kyi dbyings zhes su'ang mngon par zhen
NK045(bi)001:2081: pa'i tshul gyis mi mthong bas dmigs pa thams cad
NK045(bi)001:2082: nye bar zhi zhing spros pa med pa la gnas
NK045(bi)001:2083: ni / gnas pa'o // / na yang / zhi
NK045(bi)001:2084: ba'i dbyings 'ba' zhig pa'i tshul gyis phyogs gcig pa'i
NK045(bi)001:2085: mya ngan 'das pa la ma reg par byang chub
NK045(bi)001:2086: sems dpa' de ni srid zhi'i mthar mi gnas pa'i
NK045(bi)001:2087: shes rab mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa'o //
NK045(bi)001:2088: gnyis pa gang zhig 'dir spyod sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2089: gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
NK045(bi)001:2090: 'dir tshul bzhin spyod pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi
NK045(bi)001:2091: chos stobs sogs rnams kyang de dang der yongs su
NK045(bi)001:2092: 'dzin pas rnam par mi rtog ste /
NK045(bi)001:2093: de bzhin du lam stobsa lnga dang rdzu 'phrul gyi
NK045(bi)001:2094: rkang pa bzhi sogs dang 'bras bu'am de kho na
NK045(bi)001:2095: nyid byang chub zhi ba la yang rnam par mi
NK045(bi)001:2096: rtog / gzugs sogs phung khams rnams la'ang rnam par mi rtog go zhes /
NK045(bi)001:2097: don la 'dis rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma bzhi dang bral ba'i tshul bstan te /
NK045(bi)001:2098: ji ltar na rnam par mi rtog pa la 'jug
NK045(bi)001:2099: pa'i gzungs bstan pa las gsungs pa ltar go rim
NK045(bi)001:2100: bsdeb na / phung po sogs 'khor ba'i chos rnams la rang bzhin yod par rtog pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:2101: lam phar phyin la gnyen por rtog pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:2102: de kho na nyid la chos nyid du rtog pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:2103: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la thob par rtog pa rnams dang bral bar bstan pa ste /
NK045(bi)001:2104: de ltar rtog pa thams cad bral yang rtog med
NK045(bi)001:2105: lhun gyis grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin de'i mthu dang
NK045(bi)001:2106: smon lam gyi shugs sam byin gyi rlabsa kyis bdud
NK045(bi)001:2107: 'dul ba dang gzhan gyi don bya ba thams cad
NK045(bi)001:2109: mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa
NK045(bi)001:2110: ni chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gnyis
NK045(bi)001:2111: su med pa'i tshul gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mthu
NK045(bi)001:2112: thob pas de'i phrin las cung zad kyang chud mi
NK045(bi)001:2113: za'o // tshul 'di lta bu ni shesa rab kyi
NK045(bi)001:2114: pha rol tu phyin pa mchog rnam par mi rtog
NK045(bi)001:2115: pa'i ye shes la spyod pa yin no //
NK045(bi)001:2116: gsum pa sbyor ba'i bar chod du gyur pa bstan pa la /
NK045(bi)001:2120: smra ba'i zla ba sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2121: mtshan dpe'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'i zhal gyi bzhin las
NK045(bi)001:2122: gsung gi 'od zer 'gyed pas gdul bya rnams kyi
NK045(bi)001:2123: ma rig pa'i mun pa dang nyon mongs pa'i gdung
NK045(bi)001:2124: ba sel bas na smra ba'i zla ba zhes su
NK045(bi)001:2125: grags pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la ni
NK045(bi)001:2126: gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis zhus pa /
NK045(bi)001:2127: theg pa chen po'i yon tan la dga' ba byang
NK045(bi)001:2128: chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba'i bar du gcod
NK045(bi)001:2129: pa gang lags zhes zhus pa la /
NK045(bi)001:2131: bar du gcod par 'gyur ba ni mang ste /
NK045(bi)001:2132: de las 'dir re zhig cung zad tsam zhig yongs su brjod na /
NK045(bi)001:2137: bar chad kyis tshugs mi tshugs kyi rgyu bstan pa gsum /
NK045(bi)001:2139: rgyu sbyor ba nyid nyams pa /
NK045(bi)001:2140: lam theg chen las nyams pa rkyen 'chad nyan gyi tshogs pa dang mi ldan pa /
NK045(bi)001:2141: des mtshon pa'i skyon gzhan bstan pa dang bzhi /
NK045(bi)001:2142: dang po la blo gros las su mi rung bas nyams pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:2143: yum la the tshom za bas nyams pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:2145: rgyal ba'i shes rab sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2146: rgyal ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
NK045(bi)001:2147: 'di nyid yi ge 'bri ba'i tshe na zhes 'bri
NK045(bi)001:2148: bas mtshon nas 'dzin pa dang klog pa dang kha
NK045(bi)001:2149: ton byed pa dang 'chad pa dang nyan pa sogs
NK045(bi)001:2150: kyi tshe na dus gsum gyi yul gzugs sogs la
NK045(bi)001:2151: rtog pa'i spobsa pa tha dad pa dang rgod rmug
NK045(bi)001:2152: gnyid 'gyod chags sdang the tshom sogs rnam pa du
NK045(bi)001:2154: sbyor ba des bdag dang gzhan 'gro ba'i don ma
NK045(bi)001:2155: byasa par glog 'gyur ba bzhin du myur du yang
NK045(bi)001:2156: brtson pa 'phro bcad de sbyor ba las yongs su
NK045(bi)001:2157: nyams par 'gyur ba 'di ni bdud kyi las su
NK045(bi)001:2159: 'di bshad tshe na sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2160: chos 'di bshad pa'i tshe na kha cig 'di la som nyi za bar 'gyur te /
NK045(bi)001:2161: 'dren pasa 'dir ni bdag gi ming yang yongs su ma brjod la /
NK045(bi)001:2162: rigs dang gang du gnas pa'i sa phyogs dang rus
NK045(bi)001:2163: kyang yongs su ma brjod ces bsam nas de ltar
NK045(bi)001:2164: bdag gsal bar lung ma bstan pas na 'dis bdag
NK045(bi)001:2165: byang chub nges par 'grub pa'i rgyu mtshan ma mthong
NK045(bi)001:2166: ngo snyam pa sogs yum las phyir phyogs pa'i rgyu
NK045(bi)001:2167: mtshan bzung nas the tshom des chos zab mo 'di
NK045(bi)001:2168: ni nyan par mi 'gyur la spong bar 'gyur ba
NK045(bi)001:2170: gnyis pa la rnam mkhyen gyi rgyu theg chen spang ba dpes bstan pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:2171: dman lam tshol ba dpes bstan pa /
NK045(bi)001:2172: theg dman las byang chub chen po tshol ba dpes bstan pa gsum /
NK045(bi)001:2174: de ltar mi shes sogs rkang pa gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:2175: shes rab kyi phar phyin ni chos kun gyi gzhi
NK045(bi)001:2176: gcig pu yin pa de ltar mi shes pa'i rmongs
NK045(bi)001:2177: pa de dag gis yang dag pa sangs rgyas kyi
NK045(bi)001:2178: chos kun gyi rtsa ba lta bu sher phyin 'di
NK045(bi)001:2179: bor nas ni / rmongs pasa yal ga dag dang
NK045(bi)001:2180: 'dab ma lta bu'i chos gzhan dang gzhan tshol bar
NK045(bi)001:2181: 'gyur ba yang bdud kyi las so //
NK045(bi)001:2183: glang po rnyed nas sogs rkang pa gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:2184: ji ltar glang po don du gnyer bas glang po
NK045(bi)001:2185: dngos rnyed nas de bzhag ste slar glang po'i rjesa
NK045(bi)001:2186: ni tshol ba ltar mchog gi chos zab mo dngos
NK045(bi)001:2187: su bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
NK045(bi)001:2188: pa thos nas de nan tan gyis don du mi
NK045(bi)001:2189: gnyer bar / de las gzhan pa'i mdo sher phyin
NK045(bi)001:2190: la brgyud nas 'jug pa'i don tshol ba ni dpes
NK045(bi)001:2191: bstan pa de bzhin du shes par bya ste 'di
NK045(bi)001:2192: yang bdud kyi las yin no //
NK045(bi)001:2194: dper na la las sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2195: dper na la las ro brgya dang ldan pa'i zas
NK045(bi)001:2196: rnyed pa la de'i ro mi myang bar zas mchog
NK045(bi)001:2197: rnyed nas kyang slar zas ngan pa tshola bar byed
NK045(bi)001:2198: pa ltar / byang chub sems dpa' las dang po
NK045(bi)001:2199: pa gang gis pha rol tu phyin pa mchog gi
NK045(bi)001:2200: chos 'di rnyed nas de yi don la tshul bzhin
NK045(bi)001:2201: pa ltar / mi spyod par / dgra bcoma pa'i
NK045(bi)001:2202: sa'am go 'phang gi lam ston pa'i gzhung de yis
NK045(bi)001:2203: mthar thug gi byang chub tshol bar byed pa ni
NK045(bi)001:2204: gong gi dpe de bzhin te 'di yang bdud kyi
NK045(bi)001:2205: pa ltar / mi spyod par / las yin no
NK045(bi)001:2206: // gsum pa 'chad nyan gyi tshogs pa dang mi
NK045(bi)001:2207: pa ltar / mi spyod par / las yin no
NK045(bi)001:2208: // ldan pa la / rang la brten pa dang
NK045(bi)001:2209: pa ltar / mi spyod par / las yin no
NK045(bi)001:2210: // ldan pa la / / gzhan la brten pa
NK045(bi)001:2211: pa ltar / mi spyod par / las yin no
NK045(bi)001:2212: // ldan pa la / / gnyis / dang po
NK045(bi)001:2213: pa ltar / mi spyod par / las yin no
NK045(bi)001:2215: stang 'dod par sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2216: rang nyid snyan grags dang gzhan gyis bsti stang bya ba 'dod par 'gyur zhing /
NK045(bi)001:2217: yang zas nor sogs rnyed pa dag gi ro myang ba 'dod par 'gyur ba dang /
NK045(bi)001:2218: phyi rol yul la lta bar 'dod pa dang bcas
NK045(bi)001:2219: pa'i sems kyis grong gi khyim la 'dris pa'i byed
NK045(bi)001:2220: pa dang ldan zhing de dang de lta bu la
NK045(bi)001:2221: sogs pa g.yengs pa'i bya ba sna tshogs kyi sgo
NK045(bi)001:2222: nas chos zab mo 'di 'bri ba dang mnyan pa
NK045(bi)001:2223: dang sems pa sogs btang bar gyur nas ni /
NK045(bi)001:2224: chos min pa'i bya ba gnas ngan len gyi gzhi
NK045(bi)001:2225: gang yang rung ba la spyod par 'gyur ba gang
NK045(bi)001:2226: zhig / yang dag pa'i lam bor nas lam min
NK045(bi)001:2227: du gol te 'gro ba 'di ni bdud kyi las
NK045(bi)001:2229: gang dag de yi sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2230: nyan pa po gang dag 'chad pa po rnyed bkur
NK045(bi)001:2231: la g.yengs pa sogs de yi tshe na yum la
NK045(bi)001:2232: 'dun cing dad par gyur nas chos kyi dam pa
NK045(bi)001:2233: 'di ni nyan du song ba las /
NK045(bi)001:2234: nyan pa po de dag gis ni chos smra ba
NK045(bi)001:2235: de rnyed bkur la dga' ba sogs bya ba ngan
NK045(bi)001:2236: pa la zhen pa'i tshul dang ldan par rig nas
NK045(bi)001:2237: / chos smra ba de las chos nyan pa la
NK045(bi)001:2238: dga' ba med cing da ni chos zhu bar mi
NK045(bi)001:2239: bya'o snyam du yid mi bde bar gyur nas phyir
NK045(bi)001:2240: 'gro ba 'di yang sher phyin mnyan pa sogs la
NK045(bi)001:2241: bar chad du gyur pa'i bdud kyi las so //
NK045(bi)001:2242: bzhi pa de yi tshe na sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2243: gang dag chos zab mo 'di nyan pa la sogs
NK045(bi)001:2244: pa de yi tshe na 'chad nyan gyi tshogs pa
NK045(bi)001:2245: dang mi ldan pa sogs sbyor ba yang dag pa
NK045(bi)001:2246: la bar du gcod pa'i bdud kyi las 'di 'byung
NK045(bi)001:2248: chos zab mo mnyan pa sogs de yi tshe na
NK045(bi)001:2249: chos la yid sdang ba bdud sdig to can gang
NK045(bi)001:2250: dag zug rngus zug pa bzhin du gyur pa de
NK045(bi)001:2251: dag gis ni mdo 'dzin pa'i dge slong manga po'i
NK045(bi)001:2252: rgyud dkrugs nas / bar du gcod pa'i thabs rnam
NK045(bi)001:2253: pa sna tshogs kyi sgo nas shes rab kyi pha
NK045(bi)001:2254: rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di tshul bzhin 'dzin
NK045(bi)001:2255: pa dang sems pa la sogs par mi 'gyur ba'i
NK045(bi)001:2256: bar du gcod pa yi chos rnam pa mang po
NK045(bi)001:2257: gzhan 'dir ma bshad pa du ma yang 'byung bar
NK045(bi)001:2258: rgyud dkrugs nas / 'gyur te / mdor na chos
NK045(bi)001:2259: zab mo 'di 'dzin pa sogs kyi skabs na de
NK045(bi)001:2260: la gnod pa'i phyogs su gyur na gang ci yang
NK045(bi)001:2261: rung ste de thams cad bdud kyi las su rigs
NK045(bi)001:2262: rgyud dkrugs nas / 'gyur te / par bya ste
NK045(bi)001:2263: / bar du gcod pa de nyid la bdud kyi
NK045(bi)001:2264: las zhes ming du btags pa yin pa'i phyir ro
NK045(bi)001:2265: rgyud dkrugs nas / 'gyur te / par bya ste
NK045(bi)001:2266: / // de skad du yang nam mkha' mdzod kyis
NK045(bi)001:2268: rigs kyi bu ci tsam du mi dge ba'i chos la 'jug pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:2269: dge ba'i chos 'dor ba de thams cad ni bdud kyi las so zhes gsungs so //
NK045(bi)001:2270: gnyis pa bdud las 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan /
NK045(bi)001:2271: rin chen rin thang sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2272: ji ltar rin po che rin thang gzhal du med
NK045(bi)001:2273: par rnyed par 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de
NK045(bi)001:2274: dag ni dus nam yin du mi rnyed pas dkon
NK045(bi)001:2275: la / rnyed cing 'chang ba'i dus rnams rtag tu
NK045(bi)001:2276: de la pha rol brnab sems can dgra la sogs
NK045(bi)001:2277: pas 'tshe ba'ang mang ba de bzhin rgyal ba'i shes
NK045(bi)001:2278: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog rin po
NK045(bi)001:2279: che'i chos 'di dag kyang shin tu 'byung bar dkon
NK045(bi)001:2280: la / la / bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa
NK045(bi)001:2281: rnams kyis de skal bas chun par dka' ba'i phyir
NK045(bi)001:2282: rtag tu 'tshe ba'ang mang ba yin no //
NK045(bi)001:2284: bar chad de gang la 'byung ba'i yul bstan pa /
NK045(bi)001:2285: bar chad de las sangs rgyas kyis bsrung ba'i tshul gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:2287: theg par gsar du sogs rkang pa gsum ste /
NK045(bi)001:2288: theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i sems can blo chung ba gang zhig /
NK045(bi)001:2289: shin tu dkon zhing zab pa'i chos rin po che
NK045(bi)001:2290: bdud kyi yul las 'da' bar byed pa 'di lta
NK045(bi)001:2291: bu ni de snga ma rnyed pa ste nyams 'og
NK045(bi)001:2292: tu tshud par ma byas pa de la bar chad
NK045(bi)001:2293: bya ba'i phyir bdud ni spro bar 'gyur te glags
NK045(bi)001:2298: dang po phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas sogs rkang pa gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2299: 'o na yum la thog mar spyod pa thams cad
NK045(bi)001:2300: las dang po pa yin la de la bdud kyi
NK045(bi)001:2301: bar chad de tsam 'byung na byang chub sems dpas
NK045(bi)001:2302: sher phyin sgom pa rdzogs par daka'o snyam na /
NK045(bi)001:2303: rin chen rnyed pa'i gang zag nyams chung ba kha cig yul gyi rgyal pos bsrung ba ltar /
NK045(bi)001:2304: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs
NK045(bi)001:2305: rgyas bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi gzigs pa sgrib
NK045(bi)001:2306: pa med pa can de thams cad kyis chos 'di
NK045(bi)001:2307: la thog mar spyod cing bdud kyi yul las 'das
NK045(bi)001:2308: pa'i dgongs nyams ma rnyed pa de dag bar chad
NK045(bi)001:2309: kyi g.yang sa las yongs su 'dzin pa la brtson
NK045(bi)001:2310: pa'am sbyor ba mdzad pa yin no //
NK045(bi)001:2311: 'on kyang gang zag de'i sngon gyi bsod nams kyi
NK045(bi)001:2312: rgyu dang da lta'i dad pa sogs kyi rkyen la
NK045(bi)001:2313: ltos na sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs 'jug pa'i yul
NK045(bi)001:2314: du ma gyur pa dang gyur pa las bar chad
NK045(bi)001:2315: kyis tshugs mi tshugs sna tshogs su 'byung bar shes
NK045(bi)001:2317: ma zhig na bar sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2318: sangs rgyas kyis srung bar mdzad pa'i rgyu mtshan kyang
NK045(bi)001:2319: dper na ma zhig na bar gyur pa la bu
NK045(bi)001:2320: ni mang du yod pa de kun yid mi bde
NK045(bi)001:2321: zhing ma de la rim gro byed pa de bzhin
NK045(bi)001:2322: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi sangs rgyas rnams kyang
NK045(bi)001:2323: / rang rang bskyed pa'i yum du gyur pa shes
NK045(bi)001:2324: rab dam pa 'di la thugs kyis dgongs pa nyid
NK045(bi)001:2326: bzhi pa sbyor ba'i byed las bshad pa la /
NK045(bi)001:2327: rang sras bskyed pa'i bya ba byed pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:2328: rang sras yon tan la sbyor ba'i bya ba byed pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:2329: dang po gang dag 'das dang sogs rkang pa gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:2330: bshad ma thag pa ltar 'di la rgyal ba'i yum
NK045(bi)001:2331: zhes brjod na yum du 'gyur tshul ji lta bu
NK045(bi)001:2332: yin zhe na 'jig rten na mas bu bskyed pa
NK045(bi)001:2333: dang / bskyed nas bya ba la 'god pa gnyis
NK045(bi)001:2334: kyi sgo nas ma zhes 'jog pa ltar 'dir yang
NK045(bi)001:2335: gang dag 'adsa pa dang da ltar gyi phyogs bcu'i
NK045(bi)001:2336: zhing thams cad na bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi mgon
NK045(bi)001:2337: po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa
NK045(bi)001:2338: dang / dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs
NK045(bi)001:2339: rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur ba de
NK045(bi)001:2340: dag thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
NK045(bi)001:2341: pa 'di nyid las 'byung bas na dus gsum gyi
NK045(bi)001:2342: rgyal ba thams cad kyi yum du gyur pa yin
NK045(bi)001:2343: dang / dang / no // gnyis pa la gzhi
NK045(bi)001:2344: 'khor 'das kyi tshul mkhyen pa la sbyor ba dang
NK045(bi)001:2345: dang / dang / no // / 'bras bu rnam mkhyen gyi mdzad pa la sbyor ba /
NK045(bi)001:2346: lam mtha' gnyis 'gog pa'i tshul la sbyor ba gsum /
NK045(bi)001:2347: dang po la sher phyin la brten nas 'jig rten gyi bden gnyis la mkhas pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:2348: de bzhin nyid rtogs pas mtshan thob pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:2350: 'jig rten ston pa sogs tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:2351: 'jig rten ni phung khams skye mched kyi chos su
NK045(bi)001:2352: grags pa ji snyed pa rnams te de dag gi
NK045(bi)001:2353: tha snyad kyi rgyu 'bras ngo bo'i rang bzhin ji
NK045(bi)001:2354: lta bu yin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol
NK045(bi)001:2355: tu phyin pas rang gi sras sangs rgyas rnams la
NK045(bi)001:2356: ston pa ste / rgyal ba rnams kyi skyeda byed
NK045(bi)001:2357: kyi yum sher phyin 'di la brten nas sangs rgyas
NK045(bi)001:2358: de dag gis chos de dag skyu ru ra rlon
NK045(bi)001:2359: pa lag mthil tu bzhag pa bzhin du gzigs pa'i
NK045(bi)001:2360: ston pa ste / phyir ro // gzhan yang gdul
NK045(bi)001:2361: bya'i don mdzad pa la dgos pa ched du bkar
NK045(bi)001:2362: te sems can gyi khams tshad med pa ji snyed
NK045(bi)001:2363: pa gzhan gyi sems kyi spyod pa nang du bsdus
NK045(bi)001:2364: pa dang phyir g.yeng ba dang chags bcas dang chags
NK045(bi)001:2365: bral la sogs pa mtha' med pa dag kyang sher
NK045(bi)001:2366: phyin la goms pa'i mthus rang gi sras la ston
NK045(bi)001:2367: par byed pa ni kun rdzob ston pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:2368: 'jig rten phung po lnga'i de bzhin nyid dang /
NK045(bi)001:2369: dgra bcom pa'i de bzhin nyid dang rang rgyal gyi de bzhin nyid dang /
NK045(bi)001:2370: rgyal sras byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid dag
NK045(bi)001:2371: ni tha dad du ma grub pa'i phyir gcig pa
NK045(bi)001:2372: nyid de / de thams cad kyang dngos po dang
NK045(bi)001:2373: bral ba'i phyir na gzhan dang gzhan du yod pa
NK045(bi)001:2374: mina pas de bzhin nyid ces bya la /
NK045(bi)001:2375: de lta bu'i kun byang gi chos thams cad kyi
NK045(bi)001:2376: gnas lugs de bzhin nyid shes rab kyi pha rol
NK045(bi)001:2377: tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen cing
NK045(bi)001:2378: ji lta ba bzhin thugs su chud pa'o //
NK045(bi)001:2379: de ltar sho lo ka phyed dang gnyis po 'dis
NK045(bi)001:2380: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten
NK045(bi)001:2381: nas mdor na bden pa gnyis kyi chos tshul thams
NK045(bi)001:2382: cad sangs rgyas kyis gzigs par gyur to zhes so
NK045(bi)001:2384: mkhas pa 'jig rten sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2385: ji ltar 'jig rten na yang mas bu la ming
NK045(bi)001:2386: 'dogs pa ltar rgyal ba'i yum la brten nas de
NK045(bi)001:2387: bzhin gshegs pa zhes pa'i mtshan thob pa ni /
NK045(bi)001:2388: de kho na nyid la mkhas pa sangs rgyas rnams
NK045(bi)001:2389: 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'tsho gzhes shing gnas sam
NK045(bi)001:2390: mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste /
NK045(bi)001:2391: chos nyid skyon med pa gang zhig chos rnams kyi
NK045(bi)001:2392: stong pa nyid du brjod pa 'di ni nam yang
NK045(bi)001:2393: 'gyur ba med pa dang sus kyang dkrugs par mi
NK045(bi)001:2394: nus par nam mkha' bzhin du gnas ste /
NK045(bi)001:2395: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis de bzhin nyid ye
NK045(bi)001:2396: nas bab kyis gnas pa 'di yi yin lugs ma
NK045(bi)001:2397: nor bar blos rjes su rtogs shing nam zhig rtogs
NK045(bi)001:2398: pa mthar phyin pa'i tshe na /
NK045(bi)001:2399: de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin du gshegs pa'am
NK045(bi)001:2400: rtogs pa de yi phyir na de bzhin gshegs pa
NK045(bi)001:2401: zhes sangs rgyas rnams la mtshan du gsol bar gyur
NK045(bi)001:2402: to // gnyis pa 'bras bu rnam mkhyen la sbyor tshul la /
NK045(bi)001:2403: sher phyin la brten nas don gnyis 'grub pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:2404: khyad par du gzhan don du chos ston pa'i tshul gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:2406: shes rab pha rol sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2407: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la
NK045(bi)001:2408: gnas na zag med kyi dga' ba mtha' yas pa
NK045(bi)001:2409: 'byung ba'i phyir lha'i dga' ba'i tshal lta bu la
NK045(bi)001:2410: brten nas gnas pa stobs bcu dang ldan pa rnam
NK045(bi)001:2411: 'dren sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ni 'di lta
NK045(bi)001:2412: bu yin te / gang zhe na sems can tshad
NK045(bi)001:2413: med pa sdug bsngal sna tshogs dang ngan song gsum
NK045(bi)001:2415: sangs rgyas de dag la nam yang sems cana gyi
NK045(bi)001:2416: 'du shes su 'gyur ba ni med de dmigs med
NK045(bi)001:2417: kyi thugs rje chen pos rtag khyab lhun gyis grub
NK045(bi)001:2418: pa'i phrin las kyis chos bstan pa sogs mdzad pa'i
NK045(bi)001:2420: lam min tshar gcod pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:2421: lam yang dag ston pa'i tshul gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:2423: dper na seng ge sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2424: dper na ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng ge ni
NK045(bi)001:2425: gangs kyi ri sul la brten nas gzhan su la'ang
NK045(bi)001:2426: 'jigsa pa med par gnas te ri dwags phra mo
NK045(bi)001:2427: mang po skrag par byeda cing nga ro'i sgra sgrogs
NK045(bi)001:2428: pa ltar / mi yi seng ge sangs rgyas kyang
NK045(bi)001:2429: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
NK045(bi)001:2430: stong pa nyid kyi don la brten nas /
NK045(bi)001:2431: bdag tu lta ba'i mu stegsa can mang po dag
NK045(bi)001:2432: skrag par byed cing 'jig rten na dam pa'i chos
NK045(bi)001:2433: kyi sgra yang sgrogs par mdzad do //
NK045(bi)001:2434: gnyis pa dper na nam mkha' sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2435: dper na nam mkhar gnas pa nyi ma'i 'od zer
NK045(bi)001:2436: gyis ni sa 'di la rlan bag yod pa rnams
NK045(bi)001:2437: skem par byed cing gzugs rnams kyang rab tu ston
NK045(bi)001:2438: pa yin pa de bzhin du chos kyi rgyal po
NK045(bi)001:2439: chos kyi nyi ma sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shes
NK045(bi)001:2440: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nam mkha'i dbyings
NK045(bi)001:2441: lta bu la brten pa rnams kyis srid par sred
NK045(bi)001:2442: pa'i chu klung skemsa shing shes bya'i chos rnams kyang
NK045(bi)001:2443: yang dag par raba tu ston par mdzad do //
NK045(bi)001:2447: dang po la don dang dpe gnyis kyi dang po /
NK045(bi)001:2448: gzugs rnams mi mthong sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2449: gzugs rnams rang gi ngo bo med pa'i phyir dmigs su med pa'am mi mthong la /
NK045(bi)001:2450: de bzhin du tshor ba dag kyang mi mthong zhing
NK045(bi)001:2451: 'du shes mthong ba med la sems pa mi mthong
NK045(bi)001:2452: zhing / de kho na nyid la mnyam par bzhag
NK045(bi)001:2453: pa'i spyod yul gang la rnam par shes pa dang
NK045(bi)001:2454: sems zhes bya ba dang yid ces bya ba'i gzhi
NK045(bi)001:2455: ci yang mthong ba med pa ste /
NK045(bi)001:2456: 'di la 'das pa la sems 'jug pa ma 'ongs
NK045(bi)001:2457: pa la rnams par shes pa da lta yid la
NK045(bi)001:2458: byed pa'i cha nas de ltar brjod pa'am ming gi
NK045(bi)001:2459: rnam grangs kyis brjod pa yin par 'brel ba gzhan
NK045(bi)001:2460: nas bshad la / ye shes zhabs kyis ni yongs
NK045(bi)001:2461: su grags pa ltar sems ni kun gzhi'i rnam shes
NK045(bi)001:2462: nas bshad la / dang / yid ni nyon mongs
NK045(bi)001:2463: pa can gyi yid dang rnam shes ni 'jug shes
NK045(bi)001:2465: de ltar phung po lngas mtshon pas chos thams cad
NK045(bi)001:2466: dmigs su med pas ci dang ci'i ngo bor yang
NK045(bi)001:2467: ma mthong ba 'di ni chos rnams kyi rang bzhin
NK045(bi)001:2468: rnal ma mthong ba yin no zhes de bzhin gshegs
NK045(bi)001:2469: pasa bstan te mig skyon med pas rab rib ma
NK045(bi)001:2470: mthong ba ni rab rib kyi rang bzhin mthong ba
NK045(bi)001:2472: gnyis pa nam mkha' mthong zhes sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2473: ma mthong ba'i mthong ba de'i dpe ji lta bu zhe na /
NK045(bi)001:2474: 'jig rten na bdag gis nam mkha' mthong ngo zhes
NK045(bi)001:2475: sems can rnams kyis de skad bsam zhing tshig tu
NK045(bi)001:2476: rab tu brjod pa ni yod mod kyi /
NK045(bi)001:2477: 'on kyang nam mkha' ji ltar mthong nus te nam
NK045(bi)001:2478: mkha' la mthong bar bya ba'i dbyibs dang kha dog
NK045(bi)001:2479: gi gzugs mig gi yul du gyur pa gang yang
NK045(bi)001:2480: med na de skad bsam zhing brjod pa'i don 'di
NK045(bi)001:2481: ci zhig yin zhes ranga gis brtag par gyis dang
NK045(bi)001:2482: gzugs can gyi chos gang yang ma mthong ba de
NK045(bi)001:2483: tsam la nam mkha' mthong ba'i tha snyad byas pa
NK045(bi)001:2484: yin par khong du chud par 'gyur ro //
NK045(bi)001:2485: dpe de ltar chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid
NK045(bi)001:2486: mthong ba zhes pa yang shes rab kyi spyan gyis
NK045(bi)001:2487: chos gang yang ma grub par shes nas ci'i ngo
NK045(bi)001:2488: bor yang mi dmigs pa'am ma mthong ba la chos
NK045(bi)001:2489: mthong ba'o zhes de bzhina gshegs pasa bstan par mdzad
NK045(bi)001:2490: pa yin no // 'jig rten na gang mthong ba
NK045(bi)001:2491: zhes pa thams cad yul can gang gis yul gang
NK045(bi)001:2492: mthong ba la tha snyad byed na mtha' gang du'ang
NK045(bi)001:2493: ma dmigs la spros pa'i rnam pa gang yang ma
NK045(bi)001:2494: mthong ba'i mthong ba 'di ni phyogs tsam du nam
NK045(bi)001:2495: mkha' mthong ba'i dpes bstan gyi yang dag par na
NK045(bi)001:2496: yod med yin min sogs mtha' kun las 'das pa'i
NK045(bi)001:2497: chos kyi dbyings so so rang rig pa'i ye shes
NK045(bi)001:2498: kyis mthonga ba la dpe gzhan gyis ni rnam pa
NK045(bi)001:2499: kun tu bsnyad par nusa pa ma yin te bsam
NK045(bi)001:2500: gyis mi khyab pas dpe dang gtan tshigs la sogs
NK045(bi)001:2501: pas gzhal ba dang bgrang ba las yang dag par
NK045(bi)001:2503: gnyis pa lam de'i byed las la /
NK045(bi)001:2504: lam 'bras kyi yon tan kun sdud pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:2505: lam gol ba las thag bsring tshul gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:2506: dang po la blon po'i dpes mdzad pa kun byed pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:2507: rgyal po'i dpes yon tan kun sdud pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:2509: gang gis de ltar sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2510: byang chub sems dpa' gang gis dmigs pa'i rnam pa
NK045(bi)001:2511: cir yang ma mthong ba de ltar shes rab kyi
NK045(bi)001:2512: spyan gyis mthong ba de yis chos thams cad kun
NK045(bi)001:2513: mthong ba yin te de las bya ba chen po
NK045(bi)001:2514: thob pa ni ji ltar na rgyal po ni 'bad
NK045(bi)001:2515: rtsol med par btang snyoms su 'dug cing blon po
NK045(bi)001:2516: mchog gis rgyal po'i las su bya ba kun byed
NK045(bi)001:2517: pa ltara / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dang nyan
NK045(bi)001:2518: thos rnams kyi yon tan gyi chos rnams ji snyed
NK045(bi)001:2519: pa de dag thams cad shes rab kyi pha rola
NK045(bi)001:2520: tu phyin pa rnam par rtog pa med pa la
NK045(bi)001:2521: brten nas byed de bdag med rtogs pa'i shes rab
NK045(bi)001:2522: dang ldan na rnam par grol ba'i lam thams cad
NK045(bi)001:2523: bde blag tu 'grub kyi gzhan du 'grub pa'i thabs
NK045(bi)001:2524: pa ltara / med pas na'o // gnyis pa /
NK045(bi)001:2525: rgyal po grong du sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2526: ji ltar rgyal po chen po ni grong khyer dag
NK045(bi)001:2527: tu mi 'gro zhing yul 'khor chen po gzhan rnams
NK045(bi)001:2528: su'ang mi 'gro la rang gi yul pho brang de
NK045(bi)001:2529: na gnas bzhin du 'dug nas dpya khral la sogs
NK045(bi)001:2530: pa'i 'du ba thams cad tshur sdud pa ltar du
NK045(bi)001:2531: / byang chub sems dpa'i rgyud kyi chos nyid zab
NK045(bi)001:2532: mo rtogs pa ni mi g.yo zhing gnas gzhan gang
NK045(bi)001:2534: gang gis rtogs pa'i rgyud der chos nyid kyi mthus
NK045(bi)001:2535: sangs rgyas pa'i sa yi yon tan gang yin pa
NK045(bi)001:2536: thams cad sdud pa ni bya ba rmad du byung
NK045(bi)001:2537: ba yin no // gnyis pa la bstan bshad gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:2539: gang la bde gshegs sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2540: gang zag gang la bde bar gshegs pa dang de'i
NK045(bi)001:2541: sras byang chub semsa dpa' rnams la dad pa dang
NK045(bi)001:2542: 'dod pa'i dad pa mi ldog pa'i brtan pa yod
NK045(bi)001:2543: cing / byang chub sems dpa' dang sangs rgyas su
NK045(bi)001:2544: 'gyur ba'i lam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
NK045(bi)001:2545: pa mchog la bsam pas don du gnyer zhing sbyor
NK045(bi)001:2546: bas nan tan byed pa de la thabs shes gnyis
NK045(bi)001:2547: ka tshang bas na de dag lam gol ba nyan
NK045(bi)001:2548: thos dang rang rgyal gyi sa gnyis las shin tu
NK045(bi)001:2549: 'das par byas nas srid zhi'i sgrib pas zil gyis
NK045(bi)001:2550: mi non pa rgyal ba'i byang chub dam pa myur
NK045(bi)001:2551: du thob par 'gyur ro zhes theg pa mchog la
NK045(bi)001:2552: dad pa ni thog ma'i 'jug sgo yin la /
NK045(bi)001:2553: shes rab kyis dad pa bzhin du 'bras bu thob
NK045(bi)001:2554: pa las mi nyams par byed pas thabs shes 'di
NK045(bi)001:2556: las dang po pa dad pa yod kyang shes rab
NK045(bi)001:2557: kyi phar phyin dang ma ldan na lam las nyams
NK045(bi)001:2558: pa srid kyi / shes rab kyi phar phyin zab
NK045(bi)001:2559: mo'i dgongs pa nyams 'og tu tshud phyin chad dad
NK045(bi)001:2560: pa mi 'phrog pa thob nas lam las nyams pa
NK045(bi)001:2561: pa srid kyi / mi srid do // gnyis pa tshul de rgyas bshad la /
NK045(bi)001:2565: rgas pa'i dpes bstan pa bzhi po re re la'ang dpe don gnyis res bstan te /
NK045(bi)001:2567: dper na rgya mtshor sogs tshigs bcad gsum ste /
NK045(bi)001:2568: dper na rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i mi dag gi gru ni chag ste zhig par gyur la /
NK045(bi)001:2569: der mi gang zhig ro'am r+ts+wa'am shing ni mi 'dzin
NK045(bi)001:2570: pa rang gar lus pa de dag chu yi dbus
NK045(bi)001:2571: su 'jig pa ste 'chi bar 'gyur bas rgya mtsho'i
NK045(bi)001:2572: ngogs su phyin par mi 'gyur la /
NK045(bi)001:2573: gang zhig shing la sogs pa 'dzin pa de ni
NK045(bi)001:2574: de la brten nas rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu phyin
NK045(bi)001:2575: par 'gyur ro // dpe de ltar rdzogs pa'i byang
NK045(bi)001:2576: chub don du gnyer ba'i dad pa dang ldan la
NK045(bi)001:2577: spro ba'i dang ba thob pa gang zhig ni /
NK045(bi)001:2578: rdzogs byang de'i lam du gyur pa shes rab kyi
NK045(bi)001:2579: pha rol tu phyin pa rgyal ba'i yum la dad
NK045(bi)001:2580: pas rjes su mi 'jug pa ni 'bras bu bde
NK045(bi)001:2581: gshegs kyi byang chub la reg pa min no //
NK045(bi)001:2582: 'di ltar skye ba dang rga ba dang 'chi ba
NK045(bi)001:2583: dang mya ngan sna tshogs kyi rba rlabs 'khrugs pa
NK045(bi)001:2584: yi 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po der ni rtag
NK045(bi)001:2585: tu 'khor bar gyur pa gang de rang bzhin med
NK045(bi)001:2586: par rtogs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
NK045(bi)001:2587: pa mchog gis yongs su zin par gyur na /
NK045(bi)001:2588: dngos po'i rang bzhin phyin ci ma log pa la
NK045(bi)001:2589: mkhas shing don dam pa ston par byed par 'gyur
NK045(bi)001:2590: ro // de ltar de dag gi rdzogs byang don
NK045(bi)001:2591: gnyer gyi dad pa sogs thabs kyi yon tan de
NK045(bi)001:2592: dag dmigs pa med pa'i shes rab kyis yongs su
NK045(bi)001:2593: zin par gyur na mchog tu rmad du byung ba'i
NK045(bi)001:2594: bde bar gshegs pa'i byang chub la myur du reg
NK045(bi)001:2595: ste dper na mi gang dag shing sogs 'dzin pa
NK045(bi)001:2596: rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa bzhin
NK045(bi)001:2597: ro // no // gnyis pa dper na la las sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:2598: dper na mi la las rdza so ma btang bar chu skyed par byas na /
NK045(bi)001:2599: bum pa de sra ba'i cha nyams chung ba'i phyir na myur du 'jig par rigsa par bya'o //
NK045(bi)001:2600: so btang ba'i bum par chu skyed par byas na
NK045(bi)001:2601: gang du 'gro ba'i lam du bum pa de 'jig
NK045(bi)001:2602: par dogs pa yi 'jigs pa med cing bde bar
NK045(bi)001:2603: slar rang gi khyim du phyin par 'gyur ba de
NK045(bi)001:2604: bzhin du / byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig rdzogs
NK045(bi)001:2605: pa'i byang chub la dang 'dod kyi dad pa med
NK045(bi)001:2607: de sgrub par byed pa'i lam shes raba kyi pha
NK045(bi)001:2608: rol tu phyin pa las rnam par nyams na myur
NK045(bi)001:2609: du ma rungsa pa ste lam dman pa sogs su
NK045(bi)001:2610: ltung nas theg pa chen po'i lam las nyams par
NK045(bi)001:2611: 'gyur ro // dad pasa shes rab ste dad pa
NK045(bi)001:2612: dang bcas pa'i shes rab phar phyin nyid kyis ni
NK045(bi)001:2613: gang zag de'i rgyud yongs su zin par gyur na
NK045(bi)001:2614: nyan rang gi sa gnyis las shin tu 'das te
NK045(bi)001:2615: byang chub mchog thob par 'gyur ro //
NK045(bi)001:2617: dper na bcos legs sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:2618: dper na rgyu dang chags tshad zag lhan sogs bzo
NK045(bi)001:2619: bcos legs par ma byas pa'i gru de ni rgya
NK045(bi)001:2620: mtsho'i nang du nor dang bcas shing tshong pa ru
NK045(bi)001:2621: bcas te 'jig pa'am chud za bar 'gyur la /
NK045(bi)001:2622: gru de legs par brtag nas bcos legs po byas pa dang ldan par gyur na /
NK045(bi)001:2623: gru de ni mi 'jig mi nyams par tshong pa
NK045(bi)001:2624: nor dang bcas par rgya mtsho'i 'grams kyi ngogs su
NK045(bi)001:2625: phyin par 'gyur ba de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
NK045(bi)001:2626: gang zhig dad pasa rgyud yongs su bsgos kyang /
NK045(bi)001:2627: shes raba kyi phar phyin la brten pa med na
NK045(bi)001:2628: byang chub mchog gi chos las ni myur du nyams
NK045(bi)001:2629: par 'gyur zhing / dad ldan de nyid shes rab
NK045(bi)001:2630: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog dang ldan na
NK045(bi)001:2631: lam dman pa'i skyon gyis ma smas la theg pa
NK045(bi)001:2632: mchog gi lam las ma nyams par rgyal ba'i byang
NK045(bi)001:2635: lo brgya nyi shu sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:2636: dper na lo brgya nyi shu lon te tshe tshad
NK045(bi)001:2637: mthar thug pas rgas shing sdug bsngal bar gyur pa'i
NK045(bi)001:2638: mi de stan las langs par byas kyang badga nyid
NK045(bi)001:2639: kyi nus pas gnas gzhan du 'gro bar nus pa
NK045(bi)001:2640: ma yin te de ni rgas shing 'khogs pa'i phyir
NK045(bi)001:2641: ro // gal te mi de ni g.yas g.yon gnyis
NK045(bi)001:2642: nas mi stobs dang ldan pa yis rten par byas
NK045(bi)001:2643: na lam du 'gyel ba'i 'jigs pa med cing gang
NK045(bi)001:2644: 'dod pa'i gnas su bde blag tu 'gro bar 'gyur
NK045(bi)001:2645: ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig
NK045(bi)001:2646: de nyid rtogs pa'i shesa rab stobs chung ba de
NK045(bi)001:2647: ni byang chub mchog gi lam la rab tu zhugs
NK045(bi)001:2648: par gyur kyang 'bras bu ma thob pa'i bar du
NK045(bi)001:2650: gang zag de nyid kyi rgyud dad pa sogs thabs
NK045(bi)001:2651: dang bdag med rtogs pa'i shes rab mchog gis yongs
NK045(bi)001:2653: lam las mi nyams par de bzhin gshegs kyi byang chub la reg par 'gyur ro //
NK045(bi)001:2654: lnga pa rkyen dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa la /
NK045(bi)001:2655: brten bya bshes gnyen bsten pa /
NK045(bi)001:2656: rten pa po slob ma bshad pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:2657: dang po la mtshan nyid ldan pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten dgos tshul dang /
NK045(bi)001:2658: bshes gnyen des gdams ngag ston tshul gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:2660: de ltar brten dgos pa'i rgyu mtshan gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:2661: dang po byang chub sems dpa' sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2662: 'di ltar byang chub semsa dpa' dang po'i las kyi sar gnas pa ste /
NK045(bi)001:2663: las dang po pa gang zhig /
NK045(bi)001:2664: gzhan don dang rdzogs byang la lhag par dmigs pa'i
NK045(bi)001:2665: lhag pa'i bsam pas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mchog
NK045(bi)001:2666: gi lam dang 'bras bu la don du gnyer ba'i
NK045(bi)001:2667: sgo nas zhugs pa yi slob ma bzang po bla
NK045(bi)001:2668: ma la gus pa dang ldan pa de dag gis
NK045(bi)001:2669: / lta spyod bzang zhing theg chen gyi dgongs don
NK045(bi)001:2670: ston par nus pa'i bla ma mkhas pa rnams la
NK045(bi)001:2672: gnyis pa ci phyir zhe na sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2673: las dang po pa theg chen la zhugs pa dag
NK045(bi)001:2674: la dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa nan tan gyis
NK045(bi)001:2675: bsten par gdams pa de ci yi phyir zhe na
NK045(bi)001:2676: theg pa chen po'i lam dang 'bras bu la mkhas
NK045(bi)001:2677: pa'i yon tan thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen de
NK045(bi)001:2678: lasa 'byung ste bshes gnyen de dag gis theg pa
NK045(bi)001:2679: chen po'i lam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
NK045(bi)001:2680: pa 'di rjes su ston pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)001:2681: des na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob pa ni
NK045(bi)001:2682: dge ba'i bshesa gnyen la rten par gyur to zhes
NK045(bi)001:2683: yon tan kun gyi mchog mnga' ba rgyal ba rdzogs
NK045(bi)001:2684: pa'i sangs rgyas kyis de skad gsungs te /
NK045(bi)001:2685: 'di ltar thabs la mkhas pa'i lam sgom pa dang
NK045(bi)001:2686: bsam pa dang thos pa rnams snga ma snga ma
NK045(bi)001:2687: phyi ma phyi ma la rag las shing /
NK045(bi)001:2688: thos pa de yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)001:2689: gnyis pa gdams ngag ston tshul la /
NK045(bi)001:2690: gdams pa ji ltar ston pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:2691: de ltar bstan pa'i basngagasa pa brjod pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:2692: dang po sbyin dang tshul khrims sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2693: 'di ltar theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa de
NK045(bi)001:2694: la gdams ngag 'doms pa na thabs dang shes rab
NK045(bi)001:2695: ya ma bral ba'i lam rgyud tshod dang 'tshams par
NK045(bi)001:2696: ston dgos te / gang khyod kyis rgyal ba'i lam
NK045(bi)001:2697: du gyur pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug ste
NK045(bi)001:2698: sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang de
NK045(bi)001:2699: bzhin du brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan shes rab rnams
NK045(bi)001:2700: la sbyor dngos mjug gsum tshang ba'i sgo nas zhugs
NK045(bi)001:2701: la dge ba'i rtsa ba de thams cad rnam pa
NK045(bi)001:2702: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'dod pa'i yid la
NK045(bi)001:2703: byed pas mthar thug gi byang chub chen por yongs
NK045(bi)001:2704: su bsngo bar gyis shig ces gdams pa ni thabs
NK045(bi)001:2705: kyi phyogs la gdams pa yin la /
NK045(bi)001:2706: thob bya mthar thug tu 'dod pa'i byang chub ces
NK045(bi)001:2707: bya ba de yang gzugs la sogs pa phung po'i
NK045(bi)001:2708: dngos por zhen nas de la mchog gam lhag par
NK045(bi)001:2709: mngon zhen gyis 'dzin par ma byed cig /
NK045(bi)001:2710: de ci'i phyir na byang chub kyis mtshon pa'i chos
NK045(bi)001:2711: thams cad kyang rang bzhin med pa yin pas de
NK045(bi)001:2712: khong du chud par bya ba la 'doms pa ni
NK045(bi)001:2713: shes rab kyi phyogs la gdams pa'o //
NK045(bi)001:2714: tshul de skad ces byang chub la 'dun pa dang
NK045(bi)001:2715: po'i las can de la de ltar bstan par bya'o
NK045(bi)001:2717: de ltar spyod pa sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2718: de ltar spyod pa ste gdams ngag legs par ston
NK045(bi)001:2719: pa'i theg pa chen po'i bshes gnyen gang zhig legs
NK045(bi)001:2720: pa'i yon tan rtogs dka' ba'i rgya mtsho chen por
NK045(bi)001:2721: gyur pa / yang dag pa'i chos kyi 'od zer dang ldan pa'i smra ba'i zla ba rnams ni /
NK045(bi)001:2722: phan bde'i rgyu chos ston pas 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel ba'i skyabs su gyur pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:2723: myang 'das kyi bde ba la 'god pa'i dpung gnyen du gyur pa dang ni /
NK045(bi)001:2724: sdug bsngal gyi rgyu sel ba'i gnas su gyur pa yin te /
NK045(bi)001:2725: de bzhin du 'di ltar byang chub tu 'gro ba'i rten du gyur pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:2726: phan dang mi phan shes pa'i blo gros su gyur pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:2727: srid par sred pa'i chu bor byings pa la gling
NK045(bi)001:2728: du gyur pa dang zhes gling ni chu'i dbus kyis
NK045(bi)001:2729: gzhi gnas su rung ba la brjod de dwi pa
NK045(bi)001:2730: zhes chu gnyis kyi bar na gnas pa'i ming ngo
NK045(bi)001:2731: // skye med kyi chos nyid bstan pas 'khor ba'i
NK045(bi)001:2732: 'dam nas yongs su 'dren pa'i don 'dod pa'am don
NK045(bi)001:2733: byed pa'i ded dpon la sogs pa lta bu yin
NK045(bi)001:2734: // pa dang / gang zag gi bdag med ston pas gsal byed du gyur pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:2735: chos kyi bdag med ston pas chos kyi sgron ma chen por gyur pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:2736: so so yang dag par rig pa'i sgo nas chos
NK045(bi)001:2737: kyi mchog stong pa nyid smra ba la mi 'khrugs
NK045(bi)001:2739: rang nyid zab mo'i chos la yid ches gting tshugs
NK045(bi)001:2740: nas de'i lam dang 'bras bu 'chad pa la phyogs
NK045(bi)001:2741: las rnam par rgyal ba'i spobs pa yongs su rdzogs
NK045(bi)001:2742: pa yin no // yang na yongs su 'dren pa
NK045(bi)001:2743: ni ded dpon la sogs pa bzhin du des sna
NK045(bi)001:2744: drangs nas lam la 'jug pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:2745: don 'dod pa'i snying rjes gzhan don lhun grub tu byed pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:2746: de kho na nyid kyi chos mchog smra ba dang /
NK045(bi)001:2747: de bdud dang mu stegs sogs phas kyi sgol bas
NK045(bi)001:2748: mi bardzi ba'am mi 'khrugs pa yin zhes so sor
NK045(bi)001:2750: gnyis pa shes rab zab mo nyan pa'i slob ma bshad pa la /
NK045(bi)001:2751: zab mo la yid ches pa dang ldan pa'i slob ma bstan pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:2752: de lta bu'i yid ches pa dka' bar bstan pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:2753: dang po la blo zab pa'i tshul dang /
NK045(bi)001:2754: zab pa de'i yon tan bstan pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:2756: grags chen ldan rnams sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2757: mchog tu zab pa dang rgya che ba'i lam theg
NK045(bi)001:2758: pa chen po la zhugs pa gang zhig rgyal ba'i
NK045(bi)001:2759: zhing mtha' yas pa rnams su byang chub sems dpa'
NK045(bi)001:2760: zhes bya ba'i mtshan gyi grags pa chen po dang
