NK045(bi)001:2761: ldan pa rnams ni bya dka' ba'i go cha gyon
NK045(bi)001:2762: par byed de / 'di ltar tha snyad du nam
NK045(bi)001:2763: mkha' dang mnyam pa mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams
NK045(bi)001:2764: cad mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings
NK045(bi)001:2765: su bdag gis mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes
NK045(bi)001:2766: par byed de / sems bskyed cing / de yang
NK045(bi)001:2767: kun nyon dang rnam byang gi dmigs pa dang bral
NK045(bi)001:2768: te 'di ltar phung po dang khamsa dang skye mcheda
NK045(bi)001:2769: rnams kyi dngos por dmigs pa'i go cha bgo ba
NK045(bi)001:2770: par byed de / sems bskyed cing / min la
NK045(bi)001:2771: / theg pa gsum la mngon par zhen pa'i 'du
NK045(bi)001:2772: par byed de / sems bskyed cing / min la
NK045(bi)001:2773: / shesa bral zhing / chos gang yang yongs su
NK045(bi)001:2774: dmigs pa'am bzung ba med pa'i sher phyin la gnas
NK045(bi)001:2775: pa de nyid kyi phyir na /
NK045(bi)001:2776: zab mo'i don la yid ches pas ched du bya
NK045(bi)001:2777: ba chen po gsum ldan rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi
NK045(bi)001:2778: 'bras bu thob pa las mi ldog la lam theg
NK045(bi)001:2779: pa chen po'i tshul las gzhan du g.yo ba med
NK045(bi)001:2780: cing / rkyen ngan pa bdud dang phas kyi rgol
NK045(bi)001:2781: ba gang gis kyang de'i rgyud nyon mongs par bya
NK045(bi)001:2782: mi nus pas mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can yin te
NK045(bi)001:2784: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams
NK045(bi)001:2785: cad mya ngan las bzla bar go cha 'tshal kyang
NK045(bi)001:2786: sems can ma dmigs pa de dag ni dka' ba
NK045(bi)001:2787: bgyid pa lags so zhes dang /
NK045(bi)001:2788: rab 'byor go cha de ni gzugs dang 'brel ba ma yin te zhes sogs gsungs pa bzhin no //
NK045(bi)001:2789: gnyis pa de dag 'di 'dra'i sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2790: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni zab
NK045(bi)001:2791: mo dpag par dka' ba 'di 'dra ba'i chos dang
NK045(bi)001:2792: ldan zhing / de'i dbang gis dmigs pa mtha' dag gi spros pa med la /
NK045(bi)001:2793: zab mo'i don la the tshom dang som nyi yid
NK045(bi)001:2794: gnyis bral zhing yid ches pa'i don dang ldan no
NK045(bi)001:2795: // 'di la soms nyi sogs the tshom gyi rnam
NK045(bi)001:2796: grangs tsam ste mngon du rgyu ba sogs the tshom
NK045(bi)001:2797: phra rags gang yang med par ston pa'am /
NK045(bi)001:2801: ma 'ongs pa la yid gnyis kyi tshul gyis lam
NK045(bi)001:2802: 'bras la yid rtse gnyis su gyur pa med ces
NK045(bi)001:2803: sogs ldog pa'i khyad par du blta bar bya'o //
NK045(bi)001:2804: the tshom med pa'i yid ches de'i sgo nas zab
NK045(bi)001:2805: mo shesa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thosa
NK045(bi)001:2806: nas de'i don las blo phyir mi nur ba de
NK045(bi)001:2807: ni rang gi blo gros kyis chos zab mo nyams
NK045(bi)001:2808: 'og tu tshud pas na gazhana gyi dring la mi
NK045(bi)001:2809: 'jog pa ste gzhan la ltos nas des gang du
NK045(bi)001:2810: khrid kyang der 'jug pa lta bu nges pa med
NK045(bi)001:2811: pa min zhing / de ltar gyur pa de yi
NK045(bi)001:2812: phyir theg pa mchog gi lam dang 'bras bu las
NK045(bi)001:2813: phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
NK045(bi)001:2814: gnyis pa zab mo de rtogs dka' ba'i tshul la /
NK045(bi)001:2815: spyad bya'i chos zab par bstan pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:2816: de ltar zab pa'i rgyu mtshan gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:2817: dang po 'dren pa rnams kyi sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2818: 'dren pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos yum chen mo 'di ni mchog tu zab pa ste /
NK045(bi)001:2819: gzhi yi chos thams cad skye ba med la de
NK045(bi)001:2820: bzhin nyid tsam du dmigs su med pas gzung ba
NK045(bi)001:2821: dang 'dzin pa'i sems kyi spyod yul las ye nas
NK045(bi)001:2822: 'das pas na mthong bar dka' ba yin pa de'i
NK045(bi)001:2823: phyir lam gyi gnas skabs na sus kyang rtogsa pa
NK045(bi)001:2824: meda cing 'bras bu'i dus na thob par 'gyur ba'ang
NK045(bi)001:2826: gang rtogs pa dang thob pa'i ngo bor yod pa
NK045(bi)001:2827: zhig na de nyid yang dag pa'i rtogs pa dang
NK045(bi)001:2829: mdo gzhan las kyang byang chub ni sangs rgyas nyid
NK045(bi)001:2830: kyis kyang ma brnyes na gzhan pas lta ci smos
NK045(bi)001:2831: te byang chub kyi ngo bo ye nas dben pa'i
NK045(bi)001:2832: phyir ro // zhes pa'i tshul du yang yang gsungs pa bzhin no //
NK045(bi)001:2833: de ltar mthong ba dang rtogs pa dang thob pa
NK045(bi)001:2834: med pa'i chos nyid zab mo 'di ni zab cing
NK045(bi)001:2835: dpag par dka' ba de yi phyir /
NK045(bi)001:2836: sems can thams cad la phan pa mdzad pa'i brtser
NK045(bi)001:2837: ldan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa'i
NK045(bi)001:2838: byang chuba chen po brnyes par gyur nas ni /
NK045(bi)001:2839: bdag gi thugs su chud pa'i chos zab mo 'adi
NK045(bi)001:2840: lta bu sems can gyi tshogsa na sus shes par
NK045(bi)001:2841: nus snam du chos ston pa la thugs khral chung
NK045(bi)001:2842: bar mdzad de / de skad du yang /
NK045(bi)001:2844: zab zhi spros bral 'od gsal 'dus ma byas //
NK045(bi)001:2845: bdud rtsi lta bu'i chos zhig bdag gi rnyed //
NK045(bi)001:2846: su la bstan kyang go bar mi 'dug pas //
NK045(bi)001:2847: mi smra nags kyi gnas su gnas par bya //
NK045(bi)001:2849: rtsa ba shes rab las kyang /
NK045(bi)001:2850: de phyir zhan pa'i chos 'di yi //
NK045(bi)001:2851: gting rtogs dka' bar mkhyen gyur nas //
NK045(bi)001:2852: thub pa'i thugs ni chos bstan las //
NK045(bi)001:2853: rab tu log par gyur pa yin //
NK045(bi)001:2855: gnyis pa sems can rnams ni sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2856: chos zab mo 'di phal gyis rtogs dka' ba de rgyu mtshan ci yi phyir zhe na /
NK045(bi)001:2857: 'di ltar sems can rnams ni thog ma med pa
NK045(bi)001:2858: nas sems dngos por zhen pa la goms pa'i dbang
NK045(bi)001:2859: gis sred pa'i gnas bdag tu 'dzin pa sogs kyi
NK045(bi)001:2860: tshul la dga' zhing bzung ba'i yul rnams 'dod la
NK045(bi)001:2861: / de 'dzin pa'i sems la gnas shing de ltar
NK045(bi)001:2862: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i spros pa'i spyod yul du
NK045(bi)001:2864: gzung 'dzin med pas rab tu phye ba'i de kho
NK045(bi)001:2865: na nyid kyi don la mi mkhas shing de'i tshul
NK045(bi)001:2866: la blo gzhug mi shes pa'i blun rmongs su gyur
NK045(bi)001:2867: pa dper na mun pa dag gi khrod na gnas
NK045(bi)001:2868: pa bzhin no // ston pa dang thob par bya
NK045(bi)001:2869: ba'i chos yum gyi don ni dmigs pas gnas par
NK045(bi)001:2870: bya ba'i yul med la gang dang gang du'ang 'dzin
NK045(bi)001:2871: pa bzhin no // pa med de / de ltar
NK045(bi)001:2872: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos de dag 'jig rten
NK045(bi)001:2873: thams cad dang mi mthun la khyad par 'phags pa
NK045(bi)001:2874: des na 'jig rten dag dang rtsod pa 'byung ba
NK045(bi)001:2875: pa bzhin no // pa med de / yin te
NK045(bi)001:2876: / 'jig rten pas dngos po yod par 'dzin cing
NK045(bi)001:2877: cig shos kyis de med par ston pa'i slad du'o
NK045(bi)001:2878: pa bzhin no // pa med de / yin te
NK045(bi)001:2879: / // des na 'jig rten pa dag gis dngos
NK045(bi)001:2880: po med par ston pa'i chos kyi tshul ma mthong
NK045(bi)001:2881: nas rtsod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dngos po'i ngo
NK045(bi)001:2882: bo ji lta ba bzhin du gzigs pas ni ngo
NK045(bi)001:2883: bo med kyang 'jig rten pa'i ngor snang ba sgyu
NK045(bi)001:2884: ma lta bu'i chos de dag 'jig rten na ji
NK045(bi)001:2885: ltar snang ba ltar 'jig rten dang mthun par tha
NK045(bi)001:2886: snyad mdzad pa'i phyir mdo gzhan las /
NK045(bi)001:2887: 'jig rten pa dag nga dang lhan cig rtsod kyi
NK045(bi)001:2888: nga ni 'jig rten dang lhan cig tu mi rtsod
NK045(bi)001:2889: de / gang 'jig rten na yod par 'dod pa
NK045(bi)001:2890: de ngas kyang yod par 'dod do zhes sogs gsungs
NK045(bi)001:2891: de / so // gnyis pa sbyor ba des 'bras bu yang dag par 'grub pa'i tshul la /
NK045(bi)001:2892: thob bya'i 'bras bu ngos bzung ba dang /
NK045(bi)001:2893: lam 'di med na de mi thob pa'i tshul gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:2894: dang po la dpe dang don gnyis las /
NK045(bi)001:2895: dang po nam mkha'i khams ni sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2896: 'di ltar nam mkha'i khams ni shar gyi phyogs dang
NK045(bi)001:2897: lho yi phyogsa dang de bzhin nub kyi phyogs dang
NK045(bi)001:2898: byang gi phyogs pha mtha' yasa pa ste phyogs bzhi
NK045(bi)001:2899: mu med pa'i mtha' ji snyed pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:2900: de bzhin du steng dang 'og dang mtshams bzhi ste
NK045(bi)001:2901: mdor na phyogs bcu'i rgya khyon mtha' med pa ji
NK045(bi)001:2902: snyed pa rnams na'ang yod de nam mkhas ma khyab
NK045(bi)001:2904: rang la dngos por gyur pa'i rang bzhin med pas
NK045(bi)001:2905: na phyogs tha dad kyi nam mkha' de yang tha
NK045(bi)001:2906: dad du gyur pa med cing rang gi ngo bo
NK045(bi)001:2907: la dbyibs la sogs pa mi 'dra ba'i bye brag
NK045(bi)001:2908: tu gyur pa gang yang med do //
NK045(bi)001:2910: 'das pa'i de bzhin sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2911: ji ltar dpe nam mkha' la bye brag med pa
NK045(bi)001:2912: de bzhin du 'das pa'i dus kyi chos rnams kyi
NK045(bi)001:2913: de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang ma byon pa'i
NK045(bi)001:2914: de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang da ltar gyi
NK045(bi)001:2915: de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang dgra bcom pa
NK045(bi)001:2916: sogs gang zag gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
NK045(bi)001:2917: dang / gzhi shes bya'i chos kun gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:2918: 'bras bu rgyal ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:2919: stong pa nyid rtogs pa sogs lam gyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa ste /
NK045(bi)001:2920: de ltar de bzhin nyid 'di thams cad la bye
NK045(bi)001:2921: brag so sor grub pa gang yang med par chos
NK045(bi)001:2922: kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid du ro gcig pa yin
NK045(bi)001:2923: te / 'di ltar srid pa dang zhi ba 'das
NK045(bi)001:2924: dang ma 'ongs sogs gnyis chos kyis phye ba thams
NK045(bi)001:2925: cad ni snang tshul tha snyad tsam du tha dad
NK045(bi)001:2926: du snang ba dang de ltar btags pa yin mod
NK045(bi)001:2927: te / kyi / gnas tshul yang dag pa'i don
NK045(bi)001:2928: tu chos thams cad ma skyes ma 'gags la ngo
NK045(bi)001:2929: bo nyid kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin mnyam
NK045(bi)001:2930: pa nyid du gyur pas de la dus gsum dang
NK045(bi)001:2931: bdag gzhan bzang ngan la sogs pas khyad par byar
NK045(bi)001:2932: med de thams cad chos dbyings thig le nyag gcig
NK045(bi)001:2933: gi rang bzhin du gnas pa de skad cig gcig
NK045(bi)001:2934: dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis thugs su chud nas
NK045(bi)001:2935: rang byung gi ye shes rnam pa thams cad kyi
NK045(bi)001:2936: mchog dang ldan pa'i chos kyi sku'i ngo bor chos
NK045(bi)001:2937: thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub ba brnyes
NK045(bi)001:2938: pa bri gang dang bral ba mi 'gyur mi 'pho
NK045(bi)001:2939: ba'i byang chub chen po ni mthar thug gi 'bras
NK045(bi)001:2940: te / kyi / bu'o // gnyis pa la mdor bstan rgyas bshad gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:2942: bde gshegs byang chub sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2943: de lta bur thob bya'i 'bras bu mthar thug pa
NK045(bi)001:2944: bde bar gshegsa pa'i byang chub nam mkha'i tshul can
NK045(bi)001:2945: rtogs bya rtogs byed la sogs pa tha dad kyi
NK045(bi)001:2946: chos dang bral bar gyur pa gnyis su med pa'i
NK045(bi)001:2947: rang byung ye shes kyi sku'am chos nyid kyi sku'i
NK045(bi)001:2948: rang bzhin can 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gang
NK045(bi)001:2949: zhig gis thob par 'dod pa des /
NK045(bi)001:2950: rdzogs byang don gnyer gyi dad pa sogs thabs dang
NK045(bi)001:2951: ldan pa'i sgo nas chos kun gyi de kho na
NK045(bi)001:2952: nyid rtogs pa'i shesa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
NK045(bi)001:2953: pa mchog la sbyor ba'am brtson dgos kyi 'dren pa
NK045(bi)001:2954: rgyal ba'i yum shes rab kyi phar phyin 'di med
NK045(bi)001:2955: na thob bya byang chub chen po de nam yang
NK045(bi)001:2956: thob par 'gyur ba ma yin te 'bras bu mthar
NK045(bi)001:2957: thug pa de'i rgyu ni lam kun gyi dam pa
NK045(bi)001:2958: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes gang zhig shes
NK045(bi)001:2959: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming can 'di
NK045(bi)001:2960: nyid du nges pa yin no //
NK045(bi)001:2962: lam 'di dang bral na mthar 'bras mi 'grub pa'i tshul dang /
NK045(bi)001:2963: de ltar shes nas lam 'dir 'jug pa'i tshul gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:2964: dang po la dpe don gnyis las dang po /
NK045(bi)001:2965: bya zhig lus che sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2966: yongs su brtags pa bzung ba'i dper bya na bya zhig /
NK045(bi)001:2967: lus che ba'i tshad dpag tshad brgya rtsa gcig dang
NK045(bi)001:2968: lnga bcu par gyur pa yod la de'i 'dab gshog
NK045(bi)001:2969: zad de med nas 'phur nus pa'i nyams rtsal yod
NK045(bi)001:2971: bya de yis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha yi
NK045(bi)001:2972: gnas nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir bdag nyid mchongs par
NK045(bi)001:2973: gyur na gnas skabs der ni bya de nyams nyes
NK045(bi)001:2974: par gyur te lus rmas pa sogs su gyur pa
NK045(bi)001:2977: rgyal ba rnams kyi sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:2978: bshad ma thag pa'i dpe de yi tshul dang 'dra ba'i don gang zhe na /
NK045(bi)001:2979: rgyal ba rnams kyi lam du gyur pa sbyin sogs pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di yang /
NK045(bi)001:2980: dus bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por nan tan gyis bsgrub par byas shing /
NK045(bi)001:2981: lam dang 'bras bu rgya chen po la yang nas
NK045(bi)001:2982: yang du 'jug pa'i smon lam mtha' yas pa rgya
NK045(bi)001:2983: chen po 'jig rten 'di na rtag tu brten par
NK045(bi)001:2984: gyur kyang de tsam kho nas byang chub chen po
NK045(bi)001:2985: thob pa'i rgyu tshang ba ma yin te /
NK045(bi)001:2986: byang chub chen po'i rgyu ma nor ba ni dge
NK045(bi)001:2987: ba'i rtsa ba rnams rnam mkhyen du bsngo ba sogs
NK045(bi)001:2988: theg pa chen po'i thabs mkhas tshad med pa dang
NK045(bi)001:2989: / chos kun mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i shes
NK045(bi)001:2990: rab ste bya mkha' la 'gro ba'i sgro gshog zung
NK045(bi)001:2991: lta bu thabs shes 'di gnyis ya ma bral ba
NK045(bi)001:2992: / yin na / gang zhig thabs de lta bu
NK045(bi)001:2993: med pa dang de kho na nyid rtogs pa'i shes
NK045(bi)001:2994: rab dang bral ba ni nyan thos kyi 'bras bu
NK045(bi)001:2995: nyid du lhung ste dper na bya lus che yang
NK045(bi)001:2996: sgro gshog med par de mchongs na 'og tu lhung
NK045(bi)001:2997: / yin na / ba bzhin no // gnas lugs
NK045(bi)001:2998: mthar thug pa'i sher phyin dang ldan na ye shes
NK045(bi)001:2999: de'i ngo bor thabs shes 'du 'bral med de bden
NK045(bi)001:3000: gnyis dbyer med pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro
NK045(bi)001:3001: / yin na / ba bzhin no // // gnyis pa /
NK045(bi)001:3002: sangs rgyas theg pa sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:3003: de ltar mthar thug gi byang chub chen po'i rgyu
NK045(bi)001:3004: bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
NK045(bi)001:3005: bla na med pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
NK045(bi)001:3006: phyin pa 'di la brten nas byang chub chen po'i
NK045(bi)001:3007: go 'phang la nges par 'byung ba ste phyin par
NK045(bi)001:3008: 'dod pa gang yin pa des ni /
NK045(bi)001:3009: tshul ji lta bu dang ldan pas 'jug par bya
NK045(bi)001:3010: zhe na theg pa chen po ni gzhan don la
NK045(bi)001:3011: dmigs pa'i snying rje'i rtsa ba can /
NK045(bi)001:3012: thabs kyi lhan cig byed pa can /
NK045(bi)001:3013: 'bras bu sems can gyi don nam mkha' ji srid
NK045(bi)001:3014: du mdzad pa can yin pas de la 'jug pa'i
NK045(bi)001:3015: tshul dang zhugs pa'i gang zag gi tshul ni /
NK045(bi)001:3016: mtha' yas pa'i 'gro ba kun la ris su ma
NK045(bi)001:3017: chad par sems snyoms par byas te pha dang ma'i
NK045(bi)001:3018: 'du shes dang spun dang srin mo'i 'du shes la
NK045(bi)001:3019: sogs pa la gnas pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:3020: gtan du phan pa'i sems dang 'phral du bde bar
NK045(bi)001:3021: 'dod pa byams pa'i yid kyis sems can de dag
NK045(bi)001:3022: gi don la brtul ba ste brtson par bya zhing
NK045(bi)001:3023: / khro ba dang rnam par 'tshe ba'i tha ba
NK045(bi)001:3024: med cing g.yo dang rgyu med par rgyud drang la
NK045(bi)001:3025: ngag gis chos bstan pa dang mthun par brjod pa
NK045(bi)001:3026: sogs tshig 'jam por smra bar bya zhing byams pa'i
NK045(bi)001:3027: lus kyi las su'ang bya ste /
NK045(bi)001:3028: sems can rnams la zol med par phan pa'i sems
NK045(bi)001:3029: skyed pa can des de dang tshul mi mthun pa
NK045(bi)001:3030: g.yo sgyu dang gnod sems sogs byed pa gnas ma
NK045(bi)001:3032: rtsa ba'i gsum pa sbyor ba po gang zag bshad pa la /
NK045(bi)001:3033: zhus pa'i sgo nas mdor bstan dang /
NK045(bi)001:3034: lan gyis rgyas par bshad pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:3036: 'jig rten mgon la sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:3037: 'jig rten gsum gyi mgona po sangs rgyas bcom ldan
NK045(bi)001:3038: 'das la gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis yongs su zhusa
NK045(bi)001:3039: pa / yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa dang
NK045(bi)001:3040: ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag gi nyon mongs
NK045(bi)001:3041: pa ma mchis pa'i rtagsa dang mtshan ma ji lta
NK045(bi)001:3042: bu yin pa de bdag la bstan du gsol /
NK045(bi)001:3043: don gnyis sgrub pa'i mthu che ba byang chub sems
NK045(bi)001:3044: dpa' dag ji ltar na rtags gang gis mtshon nas
NK045(bi)001:3045: byang chub chen po'i lam las slar ldog par mi
NK045(bi)001:3046: 'gyur ba ste phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems
NK045(bi)001:3047: dpar shes par 'gyur ba de ltar byang sems bdag
NK045(bi)001:3048: nyid chen po de dag gi yon tan tshad med
NK045(bi)001:3049: pa las phyogs sam cha shas tsam zhig rgyal bas
NK045(bi)001:3050: bdag la lung bstan du gsol zhes zhus pa'o //
NK045(bi)001:3052: rtags kyis mtshon pa'i phyir mi ldog pa ngos bzung ba /
NK045(bi)001:3053: phyir mi ldog pa de'i spyod pa'i khyad par phyir
NK045(bi)001:3054: ldog pa dang mi ldog pa'i khyad par bstan pa
NK045(bi)001:3055: gsum / dang po tha dad dang 'du shes sogs tshigs su bcad pa drug gis bstan te /
NK045(bi)001:3056: de ltar rab 'byor gyis zhus pa la phyir mi
NK045(bi)001:3057: ldog pa'i rtags ci rigs pa bde bar gshegs pas
NK045(bi)001:3059: byang chub sems dpa' zab mo'i chos nyid rtogs pa
NK045(bi)001:3060: gang gis chos thams cad de bzhin nyid du dbyer
NK045(bi)001:3061: med par mthong bas kun byang gi chos kun la
NK045(bi)001:3062: tha dad kyi 'du shes bral zhing /
NK045(bi)001:3063: chos zab mo ston pa la gnas lugs dang mthun
NK045(bi)001:3064: par gzhal ba'i rigs pa dang ldan pa'i tshig mkhas
NK045(bi)001:3065: pas basngagasa shing gzhan du bsgyur mi nus pa smra
NK045(bi)001:3066: ba dang / rang nyid lam 'di'i ston pa la
NK045(bi)001:3067: yid ches mi ldog pa thob pas phyi rol pa'i
NK045(bi)001:3068: dge sbyor dag dang bram ze gzhan la lam ston
NK045(bi)001:3069: pa po'i 'du shes kyis rten par mi byed cing
NK045(bi)001:3070: des bstan pa'i lam sna tshogs la yid rton pa
NK045(bi)001:3071: gting nas mi byed pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:3072: rgyu 'bras bslu ba med pa sogs chos kyi tshul
NK045(bi)001:3073: la mkhas shing yid ches pas mi dge ba mngon
NK045(bi)001:3074: gyur spangs pas dus rnams rtag tu ngan song gsum
NK045(bi)001:3075: po dang des mtshon pa'i mi khoms pa kun spang
NK045(bi)001:3077: mkhas pa de dag rang nyid dge ba bcu'i las
NK045(bi)001:3078: kyi lam la ngang gis gnas shing gzhan dag kyang
NK045(bi)001:3079: der 'god pa la mngon par brtson pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:3080: rnyed bkur sogs zang zing la blta ba'i sems med
NK045(bi)001:3081: par 'gro ba la pha rol tu phyin pa sogs
NK045(bi)001:3082: kyi chos ni sangs rgyas dang byang sems rnams kyis
NK045(bi)001:3083: ji ltar bstan pa dang mthun par de yi rjes
NK045(bi)001:3085: chos zab mo'i don la yid ches pas dam pa'i
NK045(bi)001:3086: chos la rtse gcig tu dga' zhing bya ba gzhan
NK045(bi)001:3087: ched cher mi byed par chos 'ba' zhig gtso bor
NK045(bi)001:3088: byed pa dang / gzhan la phan pa'i sems 'byongs
NK045(bi)001:3089: pas rtag tu tshig 'jam por smra ba sogs byams
NK045(bi)001:3090: pa'i lus ngag yid kyi las gsum dang ldan pa
NK045(bi)001:3091: byed pa dang / dang / dge ba'i chos la
NK045(bi)001:3092: bag yod pa goms pas rgyud du 'gro ba dang
NK045(bi)001:3093: nye ba na 'chag pa dang nyal ba dang 'dug
NK045(bi)001:3094: par gyur pa ste spyod lam bzhi po gang byed
NK045(bi)001:3095: kyang bag med pa spangs te dran pa dang shes
NK045(bi)001:3096: bzhin rab tu ldan pa ste de yang ji lta
NK045(bi)001:3097: bu zhe na 'di ltar lam du 'gro ba'i tshe
NK045(bi)001:3098: na'ang mig gnya' shing gang tsam du lta zhing 'gro
NK045(bi)001:3099: la rtag tu bag med pa las byung ba'i lam
NK045(bi)001:3100: nor ba dang lus snad pa lta bu sogs sems
NK045(bi)001:3102: mkhas shing bag yod pa'i sems kyis dbang gis smad
NK045(bi)001:3103: du med pa'i chos la gnas shing gzhan skye bo
NK045(bi)001:3104: ma dad pa spang ba'i phyir phyi dang nang gi
NK045(bi)001:3106: gtsang mar byas shing gtsang ma'i gos 'chang ba sogs
NK045(bi)001:3107: gdul bya'i yid dang 'thad pa'i spyod lam gtsang ba
NK045(bi)001:3108: dang / lus ngag yid kyi sgo gsum po kha
NK045(bi)001:3109: na ma tho bas dben zhing dri ma med pa'i
NK045(bi)001:3111: 'dus byas kyi rang mtshangs mthong bas de la lhag
NK045(bi)001:3112: par mi chags par sbyang ba'i yon tan len pa
NK045(bi)001:3113: sogs kyi sgo nas rnyed pa 'doda pa ma yin
NK045(bi)001:3114: pa dang / ser sna sogs phar phyin gyi mi
NK045(bi)001:3115: mthun phyogs zil gyis mnan nas rang rgyud yon tan
NK045(bi)001:3116: mchog gis mdzes shing gzhan gyi don ched cher byed
NK045(bi)001:3117: pas skyes bu rnams kyi khyu mchog tu ngang gis
NK045(bi)001:3118: pa dang / gyur pa dang / dus rtag tu
NK045(bi)001:3119: zab mo'i chos 'dod pa ste chos dang rang rgyud
NK045(bi)001:3120: 'dres pas dus thams cad du yang chos nyid dang
NK045(bi)001:3121: ldan par 'gro ba zhes zab mo'i chos nyid nyams
NK045(bi)001:3122: 'og tu tshud pas de dang blo ngang gis mi
NK045(bi)001:3123: phyed par gyur nas ci smra ci spyod pa thams
NK045(bi)001:3124: cad de dang mthun pa dang de las ma 'das
NK045(bi)001:3126: dper na chags ldan pa dag gis spyod lam thams
NK045(bi)001:3127: cad chags pa dang ldan par 'gro ba bzhin no
NK045(bi)001:3128: // chos zab mo la bzod pa'i ngang can du
NK045(bi)001:3129: gyur pas na bdud sdig can gyi sprul pas lam
NK045(bi)001:3130: gzhan ston pa dang dmyal ba sogs mngon du sprul
NK045(bi)001:3131: nas 'khor ba la yid skrag par byed pa sogs
NK045(bi)001:3132: thabs sna tshogs kyis theg pa chen po'i lam las
NK045(bi)001:3133: bzlog ste lam gzugs brnyan bstan kyang de la bdud
NK045(bi)001:3134: du shes nas bdud kyi las sna tshogs kyis mi
NK045(bi)001:3136: bdud kyi yula las 'das shing gzhan gyi dring la
NK045(bi)001:3137: mi 'jog pa ste gzhan la rag ma las pa'i
NK045(bi)001:3138: rang gi blo stobs dang ldan par gyur pa dang
NK045(bi)001:3139: / bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par 'jug pa'am bsam
NK045(bi)001:3140: gtan du byed kyang bsam gtan der ro myong ba
NK045(bi)001:3141: sogs kyis mi gnas pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:3142: dngos po sgyu ma ltar shes pa'i phyir na rang
NK045(bi)001:3143: nyid snyan pa dang grags pa 'dod pa ma yin
NK045(bi)001:3144: pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyis rang gi rgyud
NK045(bi)001:3145: dul bas khro bas sems 'khrugs pa'am kun nas dkris
NK045(bi)001:3147: rang nyid 'dod pa la ma chags shing thabs la
NK045(bi)001:3148: mkhas pas gzhan don du khyim par gyur kyang rtaga
NK045(bi)001:3149: tu dngos po kun la ma chags par gtong ba
NK045(bi)001:3150: dang / bdag med rtogs pa dang gzhan la snying
NK045(bi)001:3151: rje'i sems kyi dbang du song bas rang gi don
NK045(bi)001:3152: ched cher 'dzin pa las byung ba'i log pa'i 'tsho
NK045(bi)001:3153: ba dang las kyi mtha' thams cad spang ba ste
NK045(bi)001:3154: dang / / de yang ji ltar na rang 'tsho
NK045(bi)001:3155: ba'i phyir ni srog gcod pa dang kha gsag la
NK045(bi)001:3156: sogs pa rnam smin yangas te yang ba can gyi
NK045(bi)001:3157: sgo nas longs spyod tshol bar mi byed pa dang
NK045(bi)001:3158: dang / / / rang gi ched du gzhan la
NK045(bi)001:3159: gnod pa drag shul spyod pa'i sngags mngon spyod kyi
NK045(bi)001:3161: chags pa'i dbang gis bud med dbang du byed pa'am
NK045(bi)001:3162: rang dbang du sbyor ba'i sngags byed pa min pa
NK045(bi)001:3163: dang / rang nyid bsgrags pa'i don du 'dod pa'i
NK045(bi)001:3164: khams kyi las can mngal na gnas pa'am gdod skye
NK045(bi)001:3165: bar 'gyur ba la 'di ni pho'am mor 'gyur ro
NK045(bi)001:3166: zhes ngag gis lung ston par mi byed pa de
NK045(bi)001:3167: rnams kyis mtshon nas log pa'i 'tsho ba dang /
NK045(bi)001:3168: log pa'i las kyi mtha' rnam par dag pa'i rtags dang ldan pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:3169: sgo gsum gyi bya ba ste las dang smra ba
NK045(bi)001:3170: dang spros pa la dga' ba'i g.yengs pa sna tshogs
NK045(bi)001:3171: kyis rab tu dben pa'i sgo nas shes rab kyi
NK045(bi)001:3172: pha rol tu phyin pa mchog la brtson pa dang
NK045(bi)001:3173: / rgyud des par gyur pas na gang du gnas
NK045(bi)001:3174: kyang deng phan tshun 'thab pa dang rtsod pa sogs
NK045(bi)001:3175: dang bral zhing byamsa pa'i semsa kyang rkyen gyis mi
NK045(bi)001:3176: 'phrog par rab tu brtan pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:3177: kun mkhyen sangs rgyas nyid la gcig tu dga' ba'i
NK045(bi)001:3178: yid kyis de lta ba dang mchod pa byed pa
NK045(bi)001:3179: dang de'i go 'phang rang gis thob par 'dod cing
NK045(bi)001:3180: 'dun pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dam
NK045(bi)001:3181: pa'i chos la rtag tu 'dun cing de la gzhol
NK045(bi)001:3182: ba'i sems kyis chos spyod bcu'i tshul gyis 'jug pa
NK045(bi)001:3184: smon lam mam ye shes kyi sgo nas skye ba
NK045(bi)001:3185: la dbang thob pas mtha'a khob kla klo skye bo'i
NK045(bi)001:3186: yul dang yul gyi mtha' chos mi dar ba rnam
NK045(bi)001:3187: par spangs nas chos kyi 'byor pa'i yul du gnas
NK045(bi)001:3188: pa chos nyid kyis thob pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:3189: rang gi sa yi yon tan sogs la dogs pa'am
NK045(bi)001:3190: the tshom med par nges par gyur nas lam gzhan
NK045(bi)001:3191: gyis mi 'phrog par rtag tu ri rab dang 'dra
NK045(bi)001:3193: dam pa'i chos kyi phyir rang gi srog kyang 'dor ba la dka' ba med par gyur cing /
NK045(bi)001:3194: chos 'dzin pa dang don yid la byed pa'i rnal 'byor la rab tu brtson pa ste /
NK045(bi)001:3195: 'di dag ni chos zab mo la myong ba'i nges
NK045(bi)001:3196: pa gnad du tshud pa sbyor ba'i lam la gnas
NK045(bi)001:3197: pa dang bden pa mthong ba'i gang zag dag gi
NK045(bi)001:3198: phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags ni 'di dag yin par
NK045(bi)001:3200: lam thabs shes kyi rnal 'byor dang ldan la de
NK045(bi)001:3201: la nges shing goms pa'i rang rtags 'di lta bu
NK045(bi)001:3202: dang ldan na rtags des phyir mi ldog par nges
NK045(bi)001:3203: nus te du ba'i me bzhin no //
NK045(bi)001:3204: gnyis pa la don dam pa'i yul can zab mo'i spyod pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:3205: kun rdzob pa'i yul can rgya che ba'i spyod pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:3206: zung du 'jug pa thabs mkhas kyi spyod pa gsum las /
NK045(bi)001:3207: dang po la spyad bya zab mo'i don ngos bzung ba dang /
NK045(bi)001:3208: de la ji ltar spyod tshul gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:3209: dang po la zab mo nyid bshad pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:3210: de la spyad pas bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:3212: gzugs dang tshor dang sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:3213: gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang sems pa
NK045(bi)001:3214: dang rnam shes rnams te chos rnams ni zab pa
NK045(bi)001:3215: ste / ji ltar zab na rang bzhin dben pa'i phyir stong pa nyid dang /
NK045(bi)001:3216: gzugs su rung ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma med cing /
NK045(bi)001:3217: de la mngon par zhen pa'i smon pa rab tu
NK045(bi)001:3218: zhi ba yin pa'i phyir blos dmigs par byar med
NK045(bi)001:3219: pas dper na mda' yis rgya mtsho'i gting thug tshol
NK045(bi)001:3220: ba na 'di lta bu'o zhes mi rnyed pa ltar
NK045(bi)001:3221: / de nyid dpyod pa'i shes rab kyis ni brtags shing dpyad na phung po'i gting mi rnyed do //
NK045(bi)001:3222: gnyis pa la dngos dang de la klan ka spang ba gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:3223: dang po la mdor bstan rgyas bshad gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:3224: dang po byang chub sems dpa' sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:3225: byang chub semsa dpa' gang zhig rtogs bya chos kyi
NK045(bi)001:3226: rang bzhin nam gnas lugs de ltar ngo bos zab
NK045(bi)001:3227: par gyur cing / theg pa mchog don dam pa'i
NK045(bi)001:3228: yul can gang du rnam par mi rtogs pas chags
NK045(bi)001:3229: pa med pa gang la gnas par byas nas /
NK045(bi)001:3230: 'di ltar phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi
NK045(bi)001:3231: bdag nyid du grub pa yod pa min pa'i zab
NK045(bi)001:3232: mo'i chosa 'di rtogs pa de'i bsod nams yang dag
NK045(bi)001:3233: par grub pa de las mchog tu gyur pa gzhan
NK045(bi)001:3235: de ni bsod nams mchog yang dag par grub pa yin no //
NK045(bi)001:3237: zab mo de yid la byas pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:3239: mnyam rjes su bsgoms pa'i phan yon dang /
NK045(bi)001:3240: de lta bu'i bsod nams kyang sgyu ma ltar bltas pa'i phan yon bzhi /
NK045(bi)001:3242: dper na 'dod chags sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:3243: de yang mdo rgyas pa rnams las /
NK045(bi)001:3244: shes rab ni pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan
NK045(bi)001:3245: pa'i gnas zab mo 'di gang zhig sems pa dang
NK045(bi)001:3246: 'jal ba dang nges par rtogs pa dag gis shes
NK045(bi)001:3247: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ji lta
NK045(bi)001:3248: ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du gnas par bya'o zhes
NK045(bi)001:3249: nyin gcig tsam du yang rnal 'byor du byed na
NK045(bi)001:3250: / des nyi ma gcig po de la las ci tsam zhig byed ce na /
NK045(bi)001:3251: dper na 'dod chags la spyod pa zhes sogs nas
NK045(bi)001:3252: de snyed kyi bskal par 'khor ba la rgyab kyis
NK045(bi)001:3253: phyogs pa dang rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog par
NK045(bi)001:3254: 'gyur ba'i nyes pa rnams spangs te las de snyed
NK045(bi)001:3255: byed do zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan pa ltar 'dir
NK045(bi)001:3256: yang / dper na sems 'dod chags kyi chos la
NK045(bi)001:3257: spyod pa'i skyes bu zhig gis bud med dang dus
NK045(bi)001:3259: gal te de dang ma 'phrad par gyur pa na
NK045(bi)001:3260: skyes bu de yi ni nyin gcig po de la
NK045(bi)001:3261: sems kyi rnam rtog sna tshogs pa brgyud mar 'byung
NK045(bi)001:3262: ste chags pa'i dbang gis yul de kho na yang
NK045(bi)001:3263: yang sems par byed pa yin la /
NK045(bi)001:3264: de 'dra'i sems kyi rnam rtog skad cig ma spyod
NK045(bi)001:3265: pa ji snyed pa de snyed kyi bskala par bsags
NK045(bi)001:3266: pa'i dge ba yang chos 'di la nyin gcig tu
NK045(bi)001:3267: rnal 'byor byed pa'i byang chub sems dpas thob par
NK045(bi)001:3268: 'gyur te / sems kyi skad cig re res kyang
NK045(bi)001:3269: dge ba'i tshogs tshad med pa 'dum par 'gyur ro
NK045(bi)001:3270: 'gyur te / // gnyis pa byang chub sems dpa' tshogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:3271: byang chub sems dpa' ganga zhig bskal pa mang po bye ba stong du /
NK045(bi)001:3272: dgra bcom pa dang rang rgyal sogs la sbyin pa
NK045(bi)001:3273: byed pa'am nyan rang gi 'bras bu'i don du sbyin
NK045(bi)001:3274: pa byed la tshul khrims dag pa srung bar byed
NK045(bi)001:3275: kyang / gzhan gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog dang ldan pa'i chos /
NK045(bi)001:3276: nyin gcig tsam brjod pa'i legs pa yi cha de
NK045(bi)001:3277: la sbyin dang tshul khrims des char yang mi phod
NK045(bi)001:3279: byang chub sems dpa' sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:3280: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig gis mnyam bzhag tu
NK045(bi)001:3281: shes raba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog bsgoms
NK045(bi)001:3282: par byas te / de las langs nas rjes thob
NK045(bi)001:3283: tu rang gi bsgoms pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i
NK045(bi)001:3284: gos pa med pa'i chos de mtshan ma'i rtog pa
NK045(bi)001:3285: sogs kyis skyon med pa yi chos brjod par byas
NK045(bi)001:3286: pa'am yang na rnyed bkur sogs don du gnyer ba'i
NK045(bi)001:3287: rtog pas ma gos pa'i chos brjod cinga zhes kyang
NK045(bi)001:3288: par byas te / gsungs so // chos bshad pa
NK045(bi)001:3289: de yang 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir byang chub mchog
NK045(bi)001:3291: dge ba de dang mnyam pa sa 'og sa steng sa bla'i 'jig rten gsum na med do //
NK045(bi)001:3292: bzhi pa bsod nams de yang sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:3293: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
NK045(bi)001:3294: sems pa dang 'chad pa sogs la tha snyad du
NK045(bi)001:3295: bsod nams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa
NK045(bi)001:3296: yod kyang don dam par bsod nams kyang rang bzhin
NK045(bi)001:3297: med de / 'di ltar 'chad pa sogs las byung
NK045(bi)001:3298: ba'i bsod nams de yang rang gi mtshan nyid du
NK045(bi)001:3299: ma grub pa'i phyir gsog dang de bzhin du sdug
NK045(bi)001:3300: bsngal ba la sogs pa'i rnam pas stong pas stong
NK045(bi)001:3301: med de / pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pas gsob dang /
NK045(bi)001:3302: rang gi ngo bos ma grub par rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bas na ya ma barla dang /
NK045(bi)001:3303: dmigs pas gzung bar bya ba dang bral bas snying
NK045(bi)001:3304: po med par rab tu shes nas de ltar bde
NK045(bi)001:3305: gshegs rnams kyi shes rab phar phyin la spyad pa
NK045(bi)001:3306: spyod na / de lta'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe
NK045(bi)001:3307: bsod namsa dpag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin no
NK045(bi)001:3308: spyod na / // 'dir rang mtshan med pas gsog dang /
NK045(bi)001:3309: stong pa nyid la sogs pa gsum ni stong pa nyid do //
NK045(bi)001:3310: stong nyid stong nyid nas gsum gyi phyir gsog go //
NK045(bi)001:3311: 'dus byas stong nyid nas lnga ni gsob bo //
NK045(bi)001:3312: rang bzhin stong nyid la sogs pas na snying po med pa'o zhes su'ang bshad do //
NK045(bi)001:3313: don du dngos po rang bzhin med pa'i tshul la
NK045(bi)001:3314: ldog cha nas du ma bsags shing sob sob po
NK045(bi)001:3315: ltar brtan cha med pas gsog dang /
NK045(bi)001:3316: seng ge la sogs pa ltar bcos pa'i gzugs brnyan lta bur gso ba dang /
NK045(bi)001:3317: rang skya mi pher bar gzhan la ltos pa gya
NK045(bi)001:3318: gyu yid gtad mi pher bas na ya ma barla
NK045(bi)001:3319: zhes sogs rdzun pa'i tshig gi rnam grangs kyis bstan
NK045(bi)001:3320: pa'o // gnyis pa klan ka spang ba la /
NK045(bi)001:3321: don dam par bsod nams kyi 'bras bu 'phel ba
NK045(bi)001:3322: dang spang thob med pas sangs rgya ba mi 'thad
NK045(bi)001:3324: kun rdzob tu yang sangs rgyas thob pa mi 'thad pa'i klan ka spang ba gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:3325: dang po la don dam par zad 'phel med pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:3326: med kyang kun rdzob tu sangs rgyas 'thad pa'i tshul gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:3328: sangs rgyas kyis bshad sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:3329: gang zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mdor bstan te bshad pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:3330: de'i don rab tu rgyas par sbyor zhing bstan pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:3331: sgrub byed 'thad pa'i rigs pa dang bcas te rab
NK045(bi)001:3332: tu bstan pa'i chos gang ji snyed gsungs pa 'di
NK045(bi)001:3333: thams cad kyang / yang dag par na rjod byed
NK045(bi)001:3334: dang brjod bya thams cad mi dmigs te brjod du
NK045(bi)001:3336: tha snyad du brjod pa yi ming tsam du zad par shes nas /
NK045(bi)001:3337: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por chos kyi
NK045(bi)001:3338: sgo tshad med pa bstan te dgag pa'am sgrub pa'i
NK045(bi)001:3339: tshul du brjod par byas kyang rjod byed kyi tshig
NK045(bi)001:3340: la zad pa med mod kyi /
NK045(bi)001:3341: des chos kyi dbyings rang gi ngo bo la ni
NK045(bi)001:3342: skyon zad pa med cing yon tan 'phel ba cung
NK045(bi)001:3343: zad kyang med de mnyam pa nyid brjod du med
NK045(bi)001:3344: la bri gang bral bar rtag tu gnas pa'o //
NK045(bi)001:3345: des na yang dag pa'i don du chos thams cad
NK045(bi)001:3346: zad 'phel med par mnyam pa nyid du ye nas
NK045(bi)001:3347: mya ngan las 'das pa yin gyi slar yang byang
NK045(bi)001:3348: chub par bya ba cung zad kyang med do //
NK045(bi)001:3350: rgyal ba rnams kyi sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:3351: rgyal ba rnams kyi lam pha rol tu phyin pa
NK045(bi)001:3352: nyid ces bya ba gang yin pa'i chos de rnams
NK045(bi)001:3353: kyang rang gi ngo bo ma grub par ming gis
NK045(bi)001:3354: brjod pa tsam du ni yongs su bsgrags mod kyi
NK045(bi)001:3355: / 'on kyang kun rdzob tsam du dge ba'i rtsa
NK045(bi)001:3356: ba thams cad bla med rdzogs byang du yongs su
NK045(bi)001:3357: / bsngo ba dang / lam dang 'bras bu la
NK045(bi)001:3358: rang bzhin med par shes nas de dang der rlom
NK045(bi)001:3359: pa'i sems med pa'i thabs shes zung du 'brel ba'i
NK045(bi)001:3360: byang chub sems dpa' ni rten 'brel bslu med kyi
NK045(bi)001:3361: tshul las yang dag pa'i lam las nyams pa med
NK045(bi)001:3362: cing sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mchog la reg par
NK045(bi)001:3363: 'gyur ba tha snyad du yod de /
NK045(bi)001:3364: chos kun gdod nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang
NK045(bi)001:3365: bzhin rnam dag gi gnas tshul de de bzhin mngon
NK045(bi)001:3367: glo bur bral dag gis khyad par du byas pa'i
NK045(bi)001:3368: byang chub thob pa ni snang tshul gyi ngos na
NK045(bi)001:3369: bslu med du yod pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)001:3370: gnyis pa kun rdzob tu klan ka spang ba la /
NK045(bi)001:3371: spang bya spong ba 'thad pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:3372: yon tan thob pa 'thad tshul gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:3376: 'bru mar snying po sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:3377: 'di ltar kun rdzob tha snyad kyi dbang du byas
NK045(bi)001:3378: na yang byang chub thob par byed pa'i sems ni
NK045(bi)001:3379: skad cig ma yin la de bsag tu med pa'i
NK045(bi)001:3380: phyir sems des sgrib pa dang bral ba'i byang chub
NK045(bi)001:3381: ji ltar thob ste sems snga ma kho nas kyang
NK045(bi)001:3383: snga ma la ma brten pa'i phyi ma kho nas
NK045(bi)001:3384: kyang mi spong zhing de gnyis lhan cig tu bsags
NK045(bi)001:3385: pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
NK045(bi)001:3386: thog mar 'jig rten na grags pa'i dper bya na /
NK045(bi)001:3387: ji ltar 'bru la sogs pa'i mar gyi snying po
NK045(bi)001:3388: ste zhun mar gang yin pa de nyid dang mar
NK045(bi)001:3389: me'i me lce 'bar ba gnyis phrad pa na /
NK045(bi)001:3390: me lce skad cig dang po de kho na yis
NK045(bi)001:3391: snying po de yongs su rdzogs par tshig pa min
NK045(bi)001:3392: la skad cig dang po de med par yang de
NK045(bi)001:3394: mar khu dang me lce phrad pa tha ma kho
NK045(bi)001:3395: nas kyang mar gyi snying po de tshig pa min
NK045(bi)001:3396: la me lce tha ma med par yang snying po
NK045(bi)001:3397: de tshig pa min mod kyi /
NK045(bi)001:3398: me lce skad cig dang po nas tha ma'i bar
NK045(bi)001:3399: gyi skad cig gi rgyun rdzogs pa na 'bru mar
NK045(bi)001:3400: gyi snying po thams cad mes tshig par byas nas
NK045(bi)001:3401: yongs su zad pa ni yod pa de ltar dper
NK045(bi)001:3403: gnyis pa dang po'i sems kyang sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:3404: bshad ma thag pa'i dpe de ltar /
NK045(bi)001:3405: sems bskyed ma thag pa dang po'i sems de kho
NK045(bi)001:3406: na tsam nyid kyis spang bya mtha' dag dang bral
NK045(bi)001:3407: ba'i byang chub mchog la reg pa ma yin la
NK045(bi)001:3408: / de meda par yang byang chub de la reg par nus pa ma yin zhing /
NK045(bi)001:3409: byang chub thob kha ma rgyun gyi tha ma'i sems
NK045(bi)001:3410: gang yin pa de gcig pu nyid kyis kyang byang
NK045(bi)001:3411: chub chen po dri ma mtha' dag zhi ba thob
NK045(bi)001:3412: pa min la / de med par yang byang chub
NK045(bi)001:3413: de thob par nus pa ma yin mod kyi snga
NK045(bi)001:3414: ma snga ma las phyi ma phyi ma khyad par
NK045(bi)001:3415: can du gyur pa'i sems kyi rgyun gyis mthar spang
NK045(bi)001:3416: bya mtha' dag spangs pa'i byang chub chen po thob
NK045(bi)001:3417: pa ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos nyid
NK045(bi)001:3418: de bsnyon du med pa yin no //
NK045(bi)001:3419: gnyis pa yon tan thob tshul la /
NK045(bi)001:3420: yon tan thob pa 'thad pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:3421: yon tan rdzogs pa 'thad pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:3424: rten brel gyi sgo nas nges par 'thad pa bshad pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:3426: sa bon las ni sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:3427: gang byang chub thob byed kyi sems dang po 'bras
NK045(bi)001:3428: bu thob pa'i bar du sdod na rtag par 'gyur
NK045(bi)001:3429: la / mi sdod par 'gag na skad cig ma'i
NK045(bi)001:3430: sems de snyed pa re re nas byang chub 'byung
NK045(bi)001:3431: ba med pas bskal pa du mar bsgrubs pa'i byang
NK045(bi)001:3432: chub kyi yon tan 'byung ba 'di tha snyad du
NK045(bi)001:3433: mi 'thad do zhes rgol ba la lan bstan pa
NK045(bi)001:3434: la / ni / 'dus byas thams cad skad cig
NK045(bi)001:3435: ma yin kyang rgyu yi skad cig ma rnams sngon
NK045(bi)001:3436: du song ba na de'i 'bras bu bshol du med
NK045(bi)001:3437: pa ni rten 'brel gyi chos nyid de /
NK045(bi)001:3438: 'di ltar 'jig rten na sa bon las ni myu
NK045(bi)001:3439: gu dang de las sdong bu me tog dang 'bras
NK045(bi)001:3440: bu rnams rim par 'byung ba yod la 'bras bu'i
NK045(bi)001:3441: dus su rang rang gi rgyu 'gag mod kyi /
NK045(bi)001:3442: sa bon de yang 'gags la de'i 'bras bu shing
NK045(bi)001:3443: yang med pa der gyur pa min te sa bon
NK045(bi)001:3444: 'gags su zin kyang 'bras bu myu gu la sogs
NK045(bi)001:3445: pa rim par snang ba yod pa ltar /
NK045(bi)001:3446: lam gyi 'bras bu la dpyad pa'i skabs 'dir yang
NK045(bi)001:3447: dpe de bzhin du sems thog mar bskyed pa'am dang
NK045(bi)001:3448: po'i sems kyang byang chub kyi rgyu yin te /
NK045(bi)001:3449: sems de yang 'gagsa la de'i brgyud pa'i 'bras bu
NK045(bi)001:3450: byang chub med pa de lta bu ma yin te
NK045(bi)001:3451: rgyu 'bras bslu med kyi tshul du lam gyi gnas
NK045(bi)001:3452: skabs kyi sems snga phyi'i rgyu las 'bras bu byang
NK045(bi)001:3453: chub thob pa mi bslu bar yod do //
NK045(bi)001:3455: sa bon rnyed nas sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:3456: 'di ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i tshul ni /
NK045(bi)001:3457: gang zhig rang 'bras skyed rung ba'i tshogs pa dang
NK045(bi)001:3458: ldan par gyur pa'i sa bon nyid rnyed pa ste
NK045(bi)001:3459: yod par gyur nas de'i 'bras bu 'bru sna tshogs
NK045(bi)001:3460: dang 'bras s+aa lu la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur
NK045(bi)001:3461: la / sa bon de yi 'bras bu ni sa
NK045(bi)001:3462: bon de la gdod nas yod pa min zhing 'byung
NK045(bi)001:3463: rung gi tshul du med pa yang min te gang
NK045(bi)001:3464: snga nas yod pa la rgyu mi dgos shing 'byung
NK045(bi)001:3465: rung gi tshul du med na'ang rgyu zhes pa'i don
NK045(bi)001:3467: de lta na de yi rang bzhin la dpyad na
NK045(bi)001:3468: yod pa dang med pa sogs kyi dngos po'i rang
NK045(bi)001:3469: bzhin dang bral ba yin na yang sgyu ma la
NK045(bi)001:3470: sogs pa'i tshul du snang ba bslu med kyi rnam
NK045(bi)001:3471: par 'byung ba ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i
NK045(bi)001:3473: de yi tshul du rgyal ba rnams kyi byang chub
NK045(bi)001:3474: 'di yang ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i dbang
NK045(bi)001:3476: de la dpyad na bden par grub pa'i dngos po'i
NK045(bi)001:3477: rang bzhin dang bral ba yin pas sgyu ma lta
NK045(bi)001:3478: bur 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid du rig par bya'o
NK045(bi)001:3479: // gnyis pa yon tan rdzogs pa 'thad pa /
NK045(bi)001:3480: chu yi thigs pas sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:3481: gang dngos po rnams skad cig ma yin la de
NK045(bi)001:3482: bsag tu med pas na bskal pa grangs med par
NK045(bi)001:3483: goms kyang lhan cig tu tshogs nas 'phel ba mi
NK045(bi)001:3484: srid pas yon tan mtha' dag tshang ba rdzogs pa'i
NK045(bi)001:3485: byang chub kyi 'bras bu ji ltar thob ce na
NK045(bi)001:3486: / dngos po thams cad skad cig ma yin du
NK045(bi)001:3487: zin kyang sems snga ma snga ma la brten nas
NK045(bi)001:3488: phyi ma phyi ma yon tan khyad par can du
NK045(bi)001:3489: gyur pas mthar yon tan yongs su rdzogs pa yod
NK045(bi)001:3490: / de / 'di ltar chu yi thig pa gcig
NK045(bi)001:3491: nas du mar bsags pas bum pa bkang ba na
NK045(bi)001:3492: / de / / thigs pa dang po nas tha
NK045(bi)001:3493: ma'i bar gyis rim gyis nyung ngu nyung ngu bsags
NK045(bi)001:3494: pas mthar bum pa de yongs su 'gengs pa ltar
NK045(bi)001:3496: lam lngar rim bzhin sems bskyed pa'i grangs tshang ba
NK045(bi)001:3497: la ltos na sangs rgyas thob pa yang dpe de
NK045(bi)001:3498: bzhin du mos spyod kyi skabs na dang po'i sems
NK045(bi)001:3499: bskyed pa nyid kyang byang chub mchog gi rgyu yin
NK045(bi)001:3501: pus yon tan yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin kyang
NK045(bi)001:3503: gyis gong nas gong du dkar po'i yon tan rdzogs
NK045(bi)001:3504: pa'i sgo nas sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur te chu
NK045(bi)001:3505: yi thigs pa gcig gis bum pa yongs su mi
NK045(bi)001:3506: gang yang du mas gang ba bzhin no //
NK045(bi)001:3507: gcig gis mi gang bar du mas gang ba'i sgo
NK045(bi)001:3508: nas sems skyed pa'i skad cig du ma tshang bas
NK045(bi)001:3509: sangs rgyas thob pa'i dper song la /
NK045(bi)001:3510: chu'i dngos po'ang skad cig ma yin mod kyi thigs
NK045(bi)001:3511: pa rnams kyi rgyun gyis phan tshun tshogs pas bum
NK045(bi)001:3512: pa gang ba ltar sems skad cig ma'i rgyun gyis
NK045(bi)001:3513: phyi ma phyi ma snga ma las khyad par du
NK045(bi)001:3514: gyur pa'ang de'i tshul du shes par bya'o //
NK045(bi)001:3515: gnyis pa zab mo de la ji ltar spyod tshul la /
NK045(bi)001:3517: de yi yon tan bshad pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:3518: dang po stong pa mtshan med sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:3519: 'di ltar chos thams cad rang gi ngo bo stong
NK045(bi)001:3520: pa nyid yin pas de la dmigs par lta ba
NK045(bi)001:3521: thams cad rab tu zhi ba'i don dang /
NK045(bi)001:3522: de ltar dmigs par bya ba'i gazhi'am rgyu yi mtshan
NK045(bi)001:3523: ma med pa yin pas rtog pa dang rnam par
NK045(bi)001:3524: rtog pa thams cad rab tu spang ba'i don dang
NK045(bi)001:3525: / de yi phyir na de la zhen pa'am 'bras
NK045(bi)001:3526: bu la smon pa med pa yin pas khams gsum
NK045(bi)001:3527: thams cad kyi smon lam dang bral ba'i don te
NK045(bi)001:3528: de ltar rnam thar sgo gsum rtogs pa'i chos zab
NK045(bi)001:3529: mo srid zhi mnyam pa nyid kyi don la spyod
NK045(bi)001:3530: / cing / de'i mthus zhi ba phyogs gcig pa'i
NK045(bi)001:3531: mya ngan las 'das pa la mi reg cing srid
NK045(bi)001:3532: par dngos zhen gyi mtshan mar mi spyod pa ni
NK045(bi)001:3533: dper na mnyan pa mkhas pa rgya mtsho'i phar 'gram
NK045(bi)001:3534: dang tshur 'gram du 'gro bar byed pa na yang
NK045(bi)001:3535: / cing / / phar tshur gyi mtha' gnyis la
NK045(bi)001:3536: mi gnas shing rgya mtshor yang gnas pa med pa
NK045(bi)001:3537: / cing / / bzhin no // de yang sher
NK045(bi)001:3538: phyin gyi skabs 'dir rnam thar gsum dang skye ba
NK045(bi)001:3539: med pa dang de bzhin nyid dang de kho na
NK045(bi)001:3540: nyid la sogs pa'i rnam grangs ji snyed pas bstan
NK045(bi)001:3541: pa'ang don gcig tu mthun te /
NK045(bi)001:3542: gang stong pa nyid yin pa de ni mtshan ma
NK045(bi)001:3543: med cing smon par byar med pa sogs kyang yin
NK045(bi)001:3544: pas rnam grangs sna tshogs pa de dag ldog pa
NK045(bi)001:3545: tha dad kyang sbrang rtsi ro gcig pa bzhin du
NK045(bi)001:3546: rtogs bya chos kyi dbyings kyi don du gcig par
NK045(bi)001:3548: de ltar spyod pa sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:3549: de ltar srid zhi mnyam pa nyid kyi don la
NK045(bi)001:3550: spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'di snyam
NK045(bi)001:3551: du bdag rgyal ba stobs bcu dang ldan pas lung
NK045(bi)001:3552: bstan par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:3553: thob bya byang chub la reg par 'gyur ro snyam pa'i rlom sems med de /
NK045(bi)001:3554: gnas lugs bab kyi don 'di la bsal bya dang
NK045(bi)001:3555: bzhag bya thob bya dang spang bya ci yang med
NK045(bi)001:3556: do zhes khong du chud pas byang chub nam mkha'i
NK045(bi)001:3557: mtshan nyid la blos mi bzod pa'i skrag pa med
NK045(bi)001:3558: par gding du gyur pa de ltar spyod pa ni
NK045(bi)001:3559: bde bar gshegs pa'i shes rab zab mo la spyod
NK045(bi)001:3560: pa yin no // gnyis pa kun rdzob kyi yul
NK045(bi)001:3561: can rgya che ba zhing sbyang ba'i spyod pa ni
NK045(bi)001:3562: pa yin no // / 'jig rten dgon pa'i sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:3563: gang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na ma dag pa'i rnam par snang ba /
NK045(bi)001:3564: chu dang grong dang 'byor pas dben pa dgon pa'i
NK045(bi)001:3565: lam nyams nga ba gnas rtsub pa gcan gzan gdug
NK045(bi)001:3566: pa sogs kyis gang ba lta bu snod kyi skyon
NK045(bi)001:3567: dang / bcud kyi sems can rnams chos dang zang zing gi 'byor bas dbul ba'i mu ge dang /
NK045(bi)001:3568: lus dang sems kyi sdug bsngal gyi nad dang nang
NK045(bi)001:3569: gi nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyis nad dang bcas
NK045(bi)001:3570: par mthong nasa / de thams cad la sgyu mar shes pa'i blos skrag pa med cing /
NK045(bi)001:3571: de nas 'di ltar zhing sbyong ba'i go cha chen po gyon par byas te 'jug pa ni /
NK045(bi)001:3572: kye ma sems can 'di dag ni bsod nams chung ba ste /
NK045(bi)001:3573: 'di ltar nyon mongs dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis
NK045(bi)001:3574: gtses pas na bdag gis 'di thams cad kyi don
NK045(bi)001:3575: du zhing rnam par sbyangs te bdag nam zhig sangs
NK045(bi)001:3576: rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyes pa
NK045(bi)001:3577: 'di lta bu yong ye med par 'byor pa phun
NK045(bi)001:3578: sum tshogs pa bsgrub par bya'o zhes de'i don du
NK045(bi)001:3579: pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs la bskal pa phyi
NK045(bi)001:3580: ma'i mu mthar thug gi bar du rtag tu brtson
NK045(bi)001:3581: par byed cing / de yang rang bzhin med par
NK045(bi)001:3582: rab tu shes pa'i sgo nas tshul de la yongs
NK045(bi)001:3583: su skyo ba'i yid ni rdul tsam skyed par mi
NK045(bi)001:3584: par byed cing / byed do // gsum pa zung 'jug thabs mkhas kyi spyod pa bstan pa la /
NK045(bi)001:3585: mdor bstan rgyas bshad don bsdu gsum /
NK045(bi)001:3586: dang po byang chub sems dpa' sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:3587: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rgyal ba'i yum shes
NK045(bi)001:3588: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa
NK045(bi)001:3589: kun tu spyod par byed cing de la gnas so
NK045(bi)001:3590: // de ji ltar zhe na yul can shes rab kyi stobs kyis /
NK045(bi)001:3591: phung po la sogs pa'i chos 'di dag thams cad
NK045(bi)001:3592: gdod nas stong zhing skye ba med par shes nas
NK045(bi)001:3593: chos nyid kyi don la gnyis su med pa'i tshul
NK045(bi)001:3595: ji ltar mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i skabs bzhin du
NK045(bi)001:3596: sems can gyi khams sna tshogs tshad med pa la
NK045(bi)001:3597: snying rje chen po 'jug par 'gyur gyi /
NK045(bi)001:3598: mnyam par bzhag pas zhi ba'i dbyings kho nar gnas
NK045(bi)001:3599: nas sems can gyi don 'dor ba ni ma yin
NK045(bi)001:3600: te shes rab dang snying rje zung du 'jug pa'i
NK045(bi)001:3601: rnal 'byor zab mo phul du byung ba thob pa'i
NK045(bi)001:3602: phyir ro // sems can gyi don sna tshogs la
NK045(bi)001:3603: 'jug pa'i bar skabs der yang sangs rgyas kyi chos
NK045(bi)001:3604: mi gnas pa'i gnas pa shes rab kyi pha rol
NK045(bi)001:3605: tu phyin pa las yongs su mi nyams te /
NK045(bi)001:3606: shes rab dang snying rje gnyis su med pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)001:3607: 'dir mnyam par ma bzhag ces pa chos nyid zab
NK045(bi)001:3608: mo'i don la mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems can
NK045(bi)001:3609: 'khrul pa'i khams la snying rje 'jug ces dang /
NK045(bi)001:3610: byang chub sems dpa' rang nyid mnyam par ma bzhag
NK045(bi)001:3611: pa'i skabs su sems can gyi khams la snying rje
NK045(bi)001:3612: 'jug ces dang / shes rab dang snying rje zung
NK045(bi)001:3613: du 'jug pa'i bar ram dbus na gnas pa lta
NK045(bi)001:3614: bu'i skabs de dag tu sangs rgyas kyi chos stobs
NK045(bi)001:3615: la sogs pa las yongs su mi nyams te thabs
NK045(bi)001:3616: mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i phyir zhi
NK045(bi)001:3617: ba 'ba' zhig pa mngon du mi byed pa'i tshul
NK045(bi)001:3619: gang ltar yang shes rab dang snying rje zung du
NK045(bi)001:3620: 'jug pa'i thabs mkhas kyi ngo bo bstan pa yin
NK045(bi)001:3621: no // gnyis pa la dpe brgyad kyi tshul gyis bstan te /
NK045(bi)001:3622: sgyu ma'i dpes sems can mi 'dor ba /
NK045(bi)001:3623: snod kyi dpes smon lam gyi shugs rdzogs pa /
NK045(bi)001:3624: bya 'phur ba'i dpes rten med kyang mi ltung ba /
NK045(bi)001:3625: mda' 'phang pa'i dpes ma rdzogs par sdod pa /
NK045(bi)001:3626: rdzu 'phrul gyi dpes sdod kyang gzhan don du mi skyo ba /
NK045(bi)001:3627: gdugs 'dzin pa'i dpes mthar mi ltung ba /
NK045(bi)001:3628: ded dpon gyi dpes rang gzhan gyi phan bde bsgrub pa /
NK045(bi)001:3629: tshong pa'i dpes lam la mkhas pa dang brgyad las /
NK045(bi)001:3631: dper na skyes bu sogs tshigs bcad gsum ste /
NK045(bi)001:3632: shes rab dang snying rje zung du 'jug pa'i thabs
NK045(bi)001:3633: mkhas pa ci lta bu zhe na dpes rim par
NK045(bi)001:3635: dper na skyes bu dgra 'dul ba'i thabs la mkhas
NK045(bi)001:3636: pa yi yon tan kun dang ldan zhing zhes mdor
NK045(bi)001:3637: bstan nas yon tan ci dang ldan zhe na de'i
NK045(bi)001:3638: tshul rgyas par bshad pa ni /
NK045(bi)001:3639: rang nyid lus sems stobs dang ldan par gyur la
NK045(bi)001:3640: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i bya ba la brtson par
NK045(bi)001:3641: byas pa ste de yang gang zhe na 'di ltar
NK045(bi)001:3642: lus mchongs pa sogs sgyu rtsal gyi bya ba'am cho
NK045(bi)001:3644: mda' 'phen pa sogs 'phong dang gzhan yang bzo yi
NK045(bi)001:3645: gnas mang po'i pha rol tu phyin par gyur cing
NK045(bi)001:3646: / der ma zad sgyu ma sna tshogs ston pa'i
NK045(bi)001:3647: tshul sgrub shes pa lam du 'gro ba'i don rab
NK045(bi)001:3648: tu 'dod pa zhig zhes sam 'grel par 'gro ba
NK045(bi)001:3649: gzhan gyi don la brtson pa'i snying rje can zhes
NK045(bi)001:3650: / gsungs so // de lta bu'i skyes bu des
NK045(bi)001:3651: rang gi pha dang ma dang chung mar bcas pa
NK045(bi)001:3652: yongs su bsdus nas dgra byed pa mang ba can
NK045(bi)001:3653: gyi dgon pa'i lam du phyin pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:3654: dgra yi tshogs der 'ong ba na skyes bu de
NK045(bi)001:3655: yis rang nyid zhum pa med pas dpa' zhing pha
NK045(bi)001:3656: rol la rgol nus pa'i rtul phoda pa can gyi
NK045(bi)001:3657: skyes bu mang po mngon par sprul te dgra sogs
NK045(bi)001:3658: kyis gnod pa gang yang mi 'byung bar byas nas
NK045(bi)001:3659: phar gang 'dod pa'i gnas su bde bar song zhing
NK045(bi)001:3660: phyir yang rang gi khyim du bde bar 'ong ba
NK045(bi)001:3661: ltar byang chub sems dpas lam sgrub pa'i gnas skabs
NK045(bi)001:3662: 'dir yang dpe de bzhin du 'gro ba'i don la
NK045(bi)001:3663: spyod pa de yi tshe na byang chub sems dpa'
NK045(bi)001:3664: thabs la mkhas pa yanga sems can gyi khamsa rnams
NK045(bi)001:3665: kun tu snying rje cher bskyed cing /
NK045(bi)001:3666: theg pa chen po'i lam gyi bar chad du gyur
NK045(bi)001:3667: pa lha'i bu'i bdud la sogs pa bdud bzhi dag
NK045(bi)001:3668: dang nyan rang gi sa gnyis las kyang raba tu
NK045(bi)001:3669: 'das nas rnam thar gsum ldan gyi ting nge 'dzin
NK045(bi)001:3670: mchog la gnas shing yang dag pa'i mtha' zhi ba'i
NK045(bi)001:3671: dbyings 'ba' zhig pa mngon du byed pa'i tshul gyis
NK045(bi)001:3672: byang chub la reg par mi byed do zhes /
NK045(bi)001:3673: spyi tsam du yang dag pa'i mtha' ni spros pa
NK045(bi)001:3674: kun gyis dben pa kho na yin na de la
NK045(bi)001:3675: ro gcig pa'i tshul gyis 'dres par gyur pa'i mnyam
NK045(bi)001:3676: bzhag mi rtog ye shes yongs su smin pa dag
NK045(bi)001:3677: sa pa'i sems dpa' chen po lta bu rnams zhi
NK045(bi)001:3678: ba'i dbyings de kho nar bar ma dor mya ngan
NK045(bi)001:3679: las 'da' bar 'gyur ba srid dam snyam pa la
NK045(bi)001:3680: de mi srid de thabs la mkhas pas yongs su
NK045(bi)001:3681: zin pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rdzogs par 'gyur gyi
NK045(bi)001:3682: bar du yang dag mtha' mngon du mi byed pa
NK045(bi)001:3683: dang / mdo gzhan na sangs rgyas kyis bskul ma
NK045(bi)001:3684: mdzad pa sogs kyis zhi ba las slong ba'i tshul
NK045(bi)001:3685: sogs zhi mtha' 'gog pa'i tshul gsungs pa ni yang
NK045(bi)001:3686: dag pa'i mtha' chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo la
NK045(bi)001:3687: zhi ba'i mthar ltung ba'i gzhi zhig yod pas ma
NK045(bi)001:3688: dang / yin te / yod na de srid zhir
NK045(bi)001:3689: ngo bo nyid kyis mi gnas pa'i gzhi sher phyin
NK045(bi)001:3691: des na de rtogs pa 'bras yum la nye ba'i
NK045(bi)001:3692: gzhi shes su'ang mi rung ba sogs theg pa chen
NK045(bi)001:3693: po'i gnad nyams nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
NK045(bi)001:3694: phyin pa ni theg pa gsum gyi lam thun mong
NK045(bi)001:3695: bar 'gyur gyi / theg chen thun mong ma yin pa'i lam du mi rung bar 'gyur ro //
NK045(bi)001:3696: 'o na ci zhe na chos kyi dbyings yang dag
NK045(bi)001:3697: pa'i mtha' ni rang gi ngo bos bden pa gnyis
NK045(bi)001:3698: su dbyer med pa'i mnyam pa nyid gnas lugs mthar
NK045(bi)001:3699: thug pa'i don yin pas srid zhir mi gnas la
NK045(bi)001:3700: / de ji lta ba bzhin du mngon du gyur
NK045(bi)001:3701: pa na sangs rgyas pa nyid yin pas de slob
NK045(bi)001:3702: lam du mngon du byed pa mi srid de mngon
NK045(bi)001:3703: du byed pa'i rgyu ma tshang ba'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)001:3704: 'o na der dogs pa mi dgos pas de bar
NK045(bi)001:3705: ma dor mngon du mi byed pa'i thabs mkhas sogs
NK045(bi)001:3706: ci la gsung snyam na slob lam gyi skabs su
NK045(bi)001:3707: thabs shes kyi cha shas che chung du yod pa
NK045(bi)001:3708: las yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs pa med pa'i ldog
NK045(bi)001:3709: cha nas bzung ste brgya la de kho nar zhen
NK045(bi)001:3710: na zhi ba phyogs gcig par 'gyur ro zhes mtha'
NK045(bi)001:3711: yi 'dzin pa bsal ba'i thabs mkhas bstan pa'i cha
NK045(bi)001:3712: nas yang dag pa chos kyi dbyings rnam kun mchog
NK045(bi)001:3713: ldan gyi stong nyid mthar thug pa de dag sa
NK045(bi)001:3714: pas kyang slar yang 'jug par bya ba'i chos zab
NK045(bi)001:3715: mo yin par shes pa'i ched dus brgyad pa la
NK045(bi)001:3716: rang gi nang gi thabs mkhas pa'i stobs dang /
NK045(bi)001:3717: de la gnas pa la phyi'i rkyen sangs rgyas rnams
NK045(bi)001:3718: kyis kyang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nga'i chos stobs
NK045(bi)001:3719: la sogs pa ma thob pas brtson par gyis shig
NK045(bi)001:3720: sems can gyi khams tshad med pa la snying rjer
NK045(bi)001:3721: gyis shig ces bskul ba'ang chos nyid yin la /
NK045(bi)001:3722: sa brgyad pa pa des rnam kun mchog ldan gyi
NK045(bi)001:3723: stong nyid la gnas pa rtsol ba med pa'i rnal
NK045(bi)001:3724: 'byor thob kyang shes rab kyi phyogs zhi ba'i dbyings
NK045(bi)001:3725: la gnas pa'i ting 'dzin shas che bas da dung
NK045(bi)001:3726: chos kyi dbyings rnam kun mchog ldan yongs su dag
NK045(bi)001:3727: pa'i bdag nyid thabs shes cha mi mnyam pa med
NK045(bi)001:3728: par zung gcig tu tshud pa'i mthar thug pa la
NK045(bi)001:3729: mnyam par 'jog pa'i spyod yul sangs rgyas rnams dang
NK045(bi)001:3731: slar yang lam gong nas gong du 'jug dgos pa'i don yin gyi /
NK045(bi)001:3732: brgya la res 'ga' zhig na yang bar ma dor
NK045(bi)001:3733: mya ngan las 'da' mkhan gyi dag sa pa zhig
NK045(bi)001:3734: srid pa'i don ni rnam pa kun tu min te
NK045(bi)001:3735: / sa dang po nas kyang bden gnyis dbyer med
NK045(bi)001:3736: pa'i chos nyid mngon du mthong bas sangs rgyas kyi
NK045(bi)001:3738: ma dag sa bdun du dag sa dang 'dra bar
NK045(bi)001:3739: mi rtog pa'i ye shes ma thob pas thabs kyi
NK045(bi)001:3740: phyogs la gnas pa shas che ba bzhin no //
NK045(bi)001:3741: de la mdo rnams nas brgya la sangs rgyas rnams
NK045(bi)001:3742: kyis ma bskul du zin na de gdon mi za
NK045(bi)001:3743: bar mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes gsung
NK045(bi)001:3744: ba ma yin nam zhe na de yin mod de
NK045(bi)001:3745: / de ni sa brgyad pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin
NK045(bi)001:3746: tu zhi ba'i phul du byung ba yin par shes
NK045(bi)001:3747: pa'i don du brtag pa mthar bzung gi dper gsungs
NK045(bi)001:3748: / pa ste / sangs rgyas rnams kyis de la
NK045(bi)001:3749: mi bskul ba ni rnam pa kun tu mi srid
NK045(bi)001:3750: / pa ste / de / de'i nang gi thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyi dbang gis /
NK045(bi)001:3751: phyi'i rkyen bskul ma de ltar mdzad nas yang dag pa'i sgo bsgrub pa'ang chos nyid de /
NK045(bi)001:3752: der ma zad theg pa chen po'i rigs su skyes
NK045(bi)001:3753: shing phyir mi ldog pas dang po thob pa nas
NK045(bi)001:3754: kyang yin na 'di la lta ci smos pa'i phyir
NK045(bi)001:3755: ro // des na mthar thug gi 'bras bu mi
NK045(bi)001:3756: gnas pa'i myang 'das chen po sangs rgyas nyid ma
NK045(bi)001:3757: thob par bar ma dor mya ngan las 'das na
NK045(bi)001:3758: de ni zhi ba phyogs gcig pa'i myang 'das las
NK045(bi)001:3759: ro // 'os med la / der mi 'da' ba'i
NK045(bi)001:3760: thabs mkhas kyang bden pa gnyis dbyer med pa'i yul
NK045(bi)001:3761: can stong nyid snying rje gnyis su med pa'i sher
NK045(bi)001:3762: phyin nyid yin gyi gzhan min kyang /
NK045(bi)001:3763: thabs mkhas de 'dra ba la 'jug tshul thun mong
NK045(bi)001:3764: min pa dag sa pa'i nyams len gyi skabs shig
NK045(bi)001:3765: bstan pa yin par go ba ni shin tu gnad
NK045(bi)001:3767: dogs pa'i gnas gal che ba cung zad phye ste bshad pa'o //
NK045(bi)001:3769: mkha' la rlung brten sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:3770: 'jig rten chags shing gnas pa na thog mar nam
NK045(bi)001:3771: mkha' la rlung gi dkyil 'khor brten te chags la
NK045(bi)001:3772: rlung de la chu yi phung po brten pa dang
NK045(bi)001:3773: chu de la sa chen po 'di brten cing sa
NK045(bi)001:3774: de la sa la gnas pa'i 'gro ba gling bzhi
NK045(bi)001:3775: la sogs pa brten pa yin te /
NK045(bi)001:3776: sems can rnams thun mong gi las bsags pa la
NK045(bi)001:3777: spyod pa'i rgyu'am gzhi ni de 'dra ba yin pa
NK045(bi)001:3778: ste / de ltar 'byung ba rnams gcig la gcig
NK045(bi)001:3779: brten par gyur kyang mthar nam mkha' ni gzhan gang
NK045(bi)001:3780: la brten nas gnas pa yin pa'i don 'di la
NK045(bi)001:3781: bsam par gyis dang de ni gang la'ang mi rten
NK045(bi)001:3783: tshul de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'
NK045(bi)001:3784: lta bu'i stong pa nyid la gnas pa de yang
NK045(bi)001:3785: / 'gro ba rnams la sems can gyi tha snyad
NK045(bi)001:3786: dang don dam pa'i rang bzhin shes pa'i dmigs pa
NK045(bi)001:3787: med pa'i snying rje chen pos de dag gi don
NK045(bi)001:3788: du smon lam tshad med pa btab pa'i rten can
NK045(bi)001:3789: gyis te smon lam la brten nas byung ba'i sems
NK045(bi)001:3790: can gyi khams kun tu phan bde'i bya ba rnam
NK045(bi)001:3791: pa sna tshogs du ma ston par byeda cing /
NK045(bi)001:3792: 'bras bu phyogs gcig pa'i mya ngan 'das pa la
NK045(bi)001:3793: mi reg la lam stong pa 'ba' zhig par gnas
NK045(bi)001:3794: pa'ang med do // gsum pa gang gi tshe na sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:3795: theg pa chen po'i lam la slob pa gang gi
NK045(bi)001:3796: tshe na 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rang nyid
NK045(bi)001:3797: dam pa'i don la mkhas shing /
NK045(bi)001:3798: gzhan gyi rmongs pa'i mun pa bsal nas gsal bar byed pa nyid du gyur pa gang zhig /
NK045(bi)001:3799: stong pa nyid kyi yul can spros pa zhi ba'i
NK045(bi)001:3800: ting nge 'dzin dam pa 'di la spyod pa de
NK045(bi)001:3801: ni lam la slob pa'i bar skabs der ni dmigs
NK045(bi)001:3802: par bya ba'i mtshan ma cung zad kyang rab tu
NK045(bi)001:3803: sgom par mi byeda de mtshan ma med par gyur
NK045(bi)001:3804: pa'i don la gnas shing 'khor ba'i rnam par rtog
NK045(bi)001:3805: pa zhi la myang 'das kyi rnam par rtog pa
NK045(bi)001:3806: rab tu zhi ba la spyod pa yin mod bar
NK045(bi)001:3807: snang du 'phur ba'i bya la brten par bya ba'i
NK045(bi)001:3808: gnas gzhan yod pa ma yin te nam mkha' de
NK045(bi)001:3809: na de gang la'ang gnas pa ma yin kyang sa
NK045(bi)001:3810: la ltung bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar byang chub
NK045(bi)001:3811: sems dpa' rnam thar gsum gyi sgor spyod pa de
NK045(bi)001:3812: ni thabs kyis mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' la
NK045(bi)001:3813: mi reg la shes rab kyis srid pa'i mtshan mar
NK045(bi)001:3814: spyod pa ma yin pas chos gang la'ang mi gnas
NK045(bi)001:3815: la mtha' gang du'ang mi ltung ngo //
NK045(bi)001:3817: dper na 'phong bslab sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:3818: dper na 'phong bslab pa legs par lob pa'i skyes
NK045(bi)001:3819: bus gnam du shing leb dang bcas pa'i mda' 'phangs
NK045(bi)001:3820: te / yang de'i rjes su 'phrang ba'i mda' gzhan
NK045(bi)001:3821: dag gis mda' snga ma snga ma'i phyi bzhin brgyud
NK045(bi)001:3822: mar yong btags pa ste gcig gcig gis 'brel chags
NK045(bi)001:3823: su bzung bar gyur pas snga ma'i mda' de sa
NK045(bi)001:3824: la ltung ba'i skabs mi rnyed par gyen du 'phul
NK045(bi)001:3825: bar byed la mi de dag gis rtsol ba de
NK045(bi)001:3826: bzhag par 'dod nas ma 'phang na mda' de dag
NK045(bi)001:3828: dpe de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
NK045(bi)001:3829: pa mchog la spyod pa de ni lam gyi gnas
NK045(bi)001:3830: skabs su dmigs pa med pa'i shesa raba dang snying
NK045(bi)001:3831: rje dang yongs bsngo sogs thabs dang /
NK045(bi)001:3832: dad pa sogs kyi stobs dang lus gang 'dod du
NK045(bi)001:3833: ston pa sogs rdzu 'phrul gyis ni rnam par spyod
NK045(bi)001:3834: pa de dag rdzogs smin sbyang pa mthar phyin pa'i
NK045(bi)001:3835: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ji srid ma rdzogs pa
NK045(bi)001:3836: de srid du stong nyid dam pa zag pa med
NK045(bi)001:3837: pa'i dbyings de ni bar ma dor mngon du thob
NK045(bi)001:3838: par mi byed de smon lam 'grub pa'i bya ba
NK045(bi)001:3839: yongs su ma rdzogs bar du tshogs sog par byed
NK045(bi)001:3841: dper na dge slong sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:3842: dper na dge slong rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs mchog dang
NK045(bi)001:3843: ldan pa zhig nam mkhar gnas te dus cig char
NK045(bi)001:3844: cho 'phrul sna tshogs rnam par 'phrul pa 'gro ba
NK045(bi)001:3845: dang 'chag pa dang ni nyal ba dang 'dug pa
NK045(bi)001:3846: sna tshogs su ston kyang de la ni bya ba
NK045(bi)001:3847: sna tshogs pa des sems skyo ba med cing de
NK045(bi)001:3848: yi lus la dub pa med do //
NK045(bi)001:3849: dpe de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa
NK045(bi)001:3850: gang zhig nam mkha' lta bu'i stong nyid kyi don
NK045(bi)001:3851: la gnas shing thabs la mkhas pa'i ye shesa dang
NK045(bi)001:3852: rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rola tu son pa la chos
NK045(bi)001:3853: gang la'ang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gansa pa med kyang
NK045(bi)001:3854: / 'gro ba dag la rang rang dang 'tshams pa'i
NK045(bi)001:3855: phan bde'i bya ba sna tshogs rnam pa mtha' yas
NK045(bi)001:3856: pa ston par byed cing de la bskal pa bye
NK045(bi)001:3857: ba tshad med pa'i bar du yang yid skyo ba
NK045(bi)001:3858: med cing lus dub pa gang yang med do //
NK045(bi)001:3859: drug pa dper na mi 'ga' sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:3860: dper na mi 'ag'a zhig g.yang sa chen po'i khar
NK045(bi)001:3861: 'dug par byed cing lag pa gnyis kas gdugs gnyisa
NK045(bi)001:3862: 'dzin cing nam mkha' la mchongsa par byed cing g.yang
NK045(bi)001:3863: sa chen por lus bor na gdugs thogs pa de
NK045(bi)001:3864: rlung gis btegs pa'i mthus de ma thag tu g.yang
NK045(bi)001:3865: sa de'i mthil du ltung bar mi 'gyur te de'i
NK045(bi)001:3866: bar thag ji srid pa der ni dal gyis 'gro
NK045(bi)001:3867: bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
NK045(bi)001:3868: de kho na nyid la mkhas pa dang yid snying
NK045(bi)001:3869: rjer gnas pa gang gis thabs dang shes rab gnyis
NK045(bi)001:3870: kyi gdugsa ni yongs su bzung ste gnas na /
NK045(bi)001:3871: 'di ltar shes rab kyi gdugs bzung bas chos rnams
NK045(bi)001:3872: stong pa dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa
NK045(bi)001:3874: thabs kyi gdugs bzung bas zhi ba phyogs gcig pa'i
NK045(bi)001:3875: mya ngan 'das la reg pa med la ji snyed
NK045(bi)001:3876: pa'i chos kun kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
NK045(bi)001:3877: bdun pa dper na rin chen sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:3878: dper bya na mi ya rabs kyi rigs can gnyen
NK045(bi)001:3879: la sogs pa bde bar bya ba'i phyir rina chen
NK045(bi)001:3880: 'dod pa zhig rin chen gyi gling du song ste
NK045(bi)001:3881: / rin chen mang po rnyed nas phyir yang rang
NK045(bi)001:3882: gi khyim du 'ong bar gyur pa na der ni
NK045(bi)001:3883: ded dpon rang nyid 'ba' zhig rnyed pa des bde
NK045(bi)001:3884: bar 'tsho bar byed cing gzhan gnyen bshes kyi tshogs
NK045(bi)001:3885: la cung zad kyang mi ster bar yid mi bde
NK045(bi)001:3886: bar 'jog par byed pa min pa ltar du shes
NK045(bi)001:3887: / par bya ste / gang zhe na dpe de
NK045(bi)001:3888: bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi
NK045(bi)001:3889: ting nge 'dzin rin po che'i gling du song ste
NK045(bi)001:3890: bsam gtan kyi dga' ba dang dbang po lnga dang
NK045(bi)001:3891: stobs lnga la sogs pa yon tan gyi chos tshad
NK045(bi)001:3893: mya ngan 'das la reg pa po rang nyid 'ba' zhig tshul des mngon par dga' bar byed cing /
NK045(bi)001:3894: sems can gzhan rnams la yon tan des phan mi
NK045(bi)001:3895: gdags par sdug bsngal yid du 'jog par 'gyur ba
NK045(bi)001:3896: ma yin te sems can gyi don du chos de
NK045(bi)001:3898: brgyad pa dper na don gnyer sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:3899: dper na rin po che don du gnyer ba'i tshong
NK045(bi)001:3900: pa dag ni lam gyi rgyus shes par bya ba'i
NK045(bi)001:3901: phyir / rang gi khyim nas rin po che'i gling gi bar gyi grong khyer chen po rnams dang /
NK045(bi)001:3902: grong rdal te grong 'bring po dang grong chung ngu
NK045(bi)001:3903: ba gang yin par 'gro yang rang nyid der 'dug
NK045(bi)001:3904: pa don med par rig nas bar gyi grong khyer
NK045(bi)001:3905: la sogs pa der yang mi gnas la /
NK045(bi)001:3906: rin po che'i gling du 'dug na'ang rang khyim la
NK045(bi)001:3907: mi phan par shes nas rin chen gling du'ang mi
NK045(bi)001:3908: gansa la / lam du 'gro bzhin pa lam gyi
NK045(bi)001:3909: rgyus shes shing rig pa de dag kho rang gi
NK045(bi)001:3910: khyim du'ang mi gnas par lam bgrod pa la mkhas
NK045(bi)001:3911: shing rtsol bas lam du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
NK045(bi)001:3912: de bzhin du sems can la phan bde don gnyer
NK045(bi)001:3913: gyi byang chub sems dpa' thabs shes kyi lam la
NK045(bi)001:3914: slob bzhin pa na tshul de la blo gsal bar
NK045(bi)001:3915: gyur te / 'di ltar bar gyi grong la sogs pa lta bu'i nyan thos dang /
NK045(bi)001:3916: rang rgyal rnams kyi lam gyi shes pa ste shes
NK045(bi)001:3917: rab dang 'bras bu rnam grol gyi tshul kun la
NK045(bi)001:3919: dman pa'i lam dang 'bras bu de la rang nyid
NK045(bi)001:3920: mi gnas shing rin po che'i gling lta bu'i sangs
NK045(bi)001:3921: rgyas kyi ye shes la'nga mngon par zhen pa'i tshul
NK045(bi)001:3923: rang gi khyim lta bu mya ngan las 'das pa
NK045(bi)001:3924: 'dus ma byas pa'i dbyings la'ang ro myong gi tshul
NK045(bi)001:3926: gnas skabs lam la bgrod pa lta bu nyan rang
NK045(bi)001:3927: byang sems kyi lam gsum gyi tshul shes par byas
NK045(bi)001:3928: nas ni de'i rigs can gyi sems can tshad med
NK045(bi)001:3929: pa'i don byed pa nyid yin par shes par bya'o
NK045(bi)001:3934: gang tshe 'gro la sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:3935: gang gi tshe 'gro ba kun la byams pa chen
NK045(bi)001:3936: pos bzung ba'i sgo nas rjes su 'brel bar byas
NK045(bi)001:3937: nas / ting nge 'dzin dam pa stong pa nyid
NK045(bi)001:3938: dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i
NK045(bi)001:3939: rang bzhin can la spyod pa yi byang chub sems
NK045(bi)001:3940: dpa' de ni 'dus ma byas pa 'ba' zhig pa'i
NK045(bi)001:3941: dbyings mya ngan las 'das pa kho na thob par
NK045(bi)001:3943: pa yin par gdags nus pa de ni gnas med
NK045(bi)001:3944: nas / 'gyur ro zhe'am / do // gnyis pa dper na sprul pa'i sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:3945: de ltar 'khor 'das gang rung du gdags par mi
NK045(bi)001:3946: nus kyang byang sems de rnam pa kun tu sus
NK045(bi)001:3947: kyang mi shes mi mthong bar mi 'gyur te /
NK045(bi)001:3948: dper na sprul pa'i mi yi lus ni su la'ang mi snang ba ma yin zhing /
NK045(bi)001:3949: de ni ming gisa kyang ni gdags par nus la
NK045(bi)001:3950: 'jig rten na de'i tshul brjod pa dag kyang yod
NK045(bi)001:3951: pa ltar du shes par bya la /
NK045(bi)001:3952: ming gis btags kyang sprul pa de mi'am mi ma
NK045(bi)001:3953: yin pa'i gang zag gzhan yin par ma gyur pa
NK045(bi)001:3954: de bzhin byang chub sems dapa'a rnam thar gsum gyi
NK045(bi)001:3955: sgor spyod pa de ni srid zhir mi gnas kyang
NK045(bi)001:3956: 'jig rten na snang zhing ming gis kyang ni gdags
NK045(bi)001:3958: gsum pa phyir ldog pa dang mi ldog pa'i khyad par la /
NK045(bi)001:3962: gal te spyod pa sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:3963: gal te gang zag gang gis byang chub sems dpa'
NK045(bi)001:3964: gang la rgyal ba'i sras kyi gnas par bya ba'i
NK045(bi)001:3965: spyod pa ji lta bu yin pa dang ni gang
NK045(bi)001:3966: zag de zab mo'i tshul la ji ltar mos pa
NK045(bi)001:3967: dang ji ltar sems par byed pa'i dad pa dang
NK045(bi)001:3968: shes rab la sogs pa'i dbang po ji lta bu
NK045(bi)001:3969: yiiin pa'i tshul yongs su dris pa la /
NK045(bi)001:3970: byang chuba sems dpa' des rtogs bya stong pa nyid
NK045(bi)001:3971: dang mtshan ma med pa'i chos zab mo yongs su
NK045(bi)001:3972: mi ston la / gang zag de dbang po smin
NK045(bi)001:3973: par gyur pa'i bdag nyid du yid ches par nus
NK045(bi)001:3974: pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yi chos rtags dang
NK045(bi)001:3975: rnam pa la sogs pa mi 'chad pa ste 'chad
NK045(bi)001:3976: mi nus pa de ni phyir mi ldog par lung
NK045(bi)001:3977: ma bstan pa yin par rig par bya ste /
NK045(bi)001:3979: byang chub sems dpa' 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas ji
NK045(bi)001:3980: ltar stong pa nyid la 'dris par bya zhing mngon
NK045(bi)001:3981: du mi byed pa yin zhes dris pas mtshon te
NK045(bi)001:3982: phyir mi ldog pa'i spyod pa dang dbang po dang
NK045(bi)001:3983: rtags ji lta bu yin zhes dris pa la rang
NK045(bi)001:3984: gis nyams 'og tu ma tshud pa dag gis de
NK045(bi)001:3986: de ltar yang mdo las byang chub la spyod pa mang ste lan ldon pa ni nyung ngo //
NK045(bi)001:3988: gang phyir mi ldog pa'i lam gyi chos rang gis
NK045(bi)001:3989: mngon du byas pa des ni ji ltar dris pa
NK045(bi)001:3990: la shin tu nges pa'i tshul gyis lan ldon pa
NK045(bi)001:3991: na 'di ni chos zab mo 'di lta bu nyams
NK045(bi)001:3992: 'og tu tshud pa las phyir mi ldog pa'o snyam
NK045(bi)001:3993: du yid ches par nus kyi gzhan du phyir mi
NK045(bi)001:3994: ldog pa yin par nges mi nus so //
NK045(bi)001:3995: gnyis pa la phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags dang /
NK045(bi)001:3996: bdud kyis bslus pa'i khyad par gnyis so //
NK045(bi)001:3998: dgra bcom sa dang sogs tshig bcad gsum ste /
NK045(bi)001:3999: thabs shes zung 'brel theg pa chen po'i lam la nges par gyur pas /
NK045(bi)001:4000: nyan thos dgra bcom pa'i sa dang rkyen gyi sangs
NK045(bi)001:4001: rgyas zhes rang rgyal gyi ye shes te de ltar
NK045(bi)001:4002: zhi mtha' dang / srid pa khams gsum po dag
NK045(bi)001:4003: la dngos su lta ci rmi lam na yang mi
NK045(bi)001:4004: zhi mtha' dang / 'dod cing / sangs rgyas rnams
NK045(bi)001:4005: 'khor rgya mtshos bskor ba mthong zhing des 'gro la
NK045(bi)001:4006: chos kyang ston par byed pa rmi lam sogs su
NK045(bi)001:4007: mthong ba de ni bla na med pa'i byang chub
NK045(bi)001:4008: las dman pa'i lam du mi ldog par lung bstan
NK045(bi)001:4009: pa yin par rig par bya'o //
NK045(bi)001:4010: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i yid dang
NK045(bi)001:4011: ldan pa des rmi lam na ni sems can ngan
NK045(bi)001:4012: song gsum gyi gansa mthong nas skad cig de la
NK045(bi)001:4013: ngan song rnams rgyun gcod pa'i smon lam 'debs par
NK045(bi)001:4014: byed cing des sdug bsngal rnams zhi bar mthong ba
NK045(bi)001:4015: dang / yang gnyid du gyur pa'am sad pa na
NK045(bi)001:4016: grong mer 'bar ba mthong nas byang sems des bdag
NK045(bi)001:4017: phyir mi ldog par lung bstan pa yin na bden
NK045(bi)001:4018: pa dang bden pa'i tshig 'dis me 'di zhi bar
NK045(bi)001:4019: gyur cig ces pa lta bu bden pa'i byin gyis
NK045(bi)001:4020: brlabs kyis me yi phung po de zhi ba'i mthu
NK045(bi)001:4021: grub pa de ni phyir mi ldog par lung bstan
NK045(bi)001:4022: pa yin par rig par bya'o //
NK045(bi)001:4023: mi yi 'jig rten na 'byung po'i gdon sna tshogs dang nada mang ba dag la /
NK045(bi)001:4024: phan par 'dod pa dang sdug bsngal las bskyab par
NK045(bi)001:4025: 'dod pa'i snying brtser ldan pa'i bden pa'i tshig brjod
NK045(bi)001:4026: pa sogs kyi sgo nas bden pa'i byin gyis de
NK045(bi)001:4028: 'on kyang bdag gis de ltar nus pa'i phyir bdag
NK045(bi)001:4029: ni mthu dang ldan pa'o snyam du nus pa des
NK045(bi)001:4030: rlom sems su gyur pa med cing rang nyid khyad
NK045(bi)001:4031: par du 'phags so snyam pa'i nga rgyal skye ba
NK045(bi)001:4032: med pa de ni phyir mi ldog par lung bstan
NK045(bi)001:4033: pa thob pa yin par rig par bya'o //
NK045(bi)001:4034: de ltar lam la nges pa bstan pa nang gi drod dang /
NK045(bi)001:4035: de las phyii'i rkyen sangs rgyas rmi lam sogs su mthong ba dang /
NK045(bi)001:4036: nang gi yon tan gyi mthu mngon gyur du ston
NK045(bi)001:4037: nus pa gang zhig rlom pa med pa de ni
NK045(bi)001:4041: de spang ba'i thabs la brtson par bstan pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:4042: dang po la yon tan gyis rlom pa'i bdud /
NK045(bi)001:4043: ming gi gzhi las 'ong ba'i bdud /
NK045(bi)001:4044: dben pas rlom pa'i bdud dang gsum /
NK045(bi)001:4045: dang po ci ste de ni sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:4046: ci ste gang zag de ni bdag gam gzhan bdud
NK045(bi)001:4047: la sogs pa'i mthus gdon zhi ba la sogs pa'i
NK045(bi)001:4048: bden pa'i byin rlabs sna tshogs dag grub pa'am 'byor
NK045(bi)001:4049: bar gyur pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis bdag ni yon tan
NK045(bi)001:4050: 'di lta bu dang ldan pa'i phyir lung bstan pa
NK045(bi)001:4051: nyid du gyur pa'o snyam du rlom sems 'byung ba'am
NK045(bi)001:4052: / gal te byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis bdag
NK045(bi)001:4053: lung bstan cing grags pa brjod par 'gyur du 'ong
NK045(bi)001:4054: ngo snyam du rlom pa skyes na /
NK045(bi)001:4055: bdag snyan pa dang grags pa'i yon tan gyis rlom
NK045(bi)001:4056: sems la gnas pa de ni rlom pa de dang
NK045(bi)001:4057: ldan pa'i phyir blo chung zhing ma smin la bdud
NK045(bi)001:4058: kyis bslu rung ba'i 'os su shes par bya ste
NK045(bi)001:4059: / de la byin rlabs kyi gzhi las 'ong ba'i bdud 'jug pa yin no //
NK045(bi)001:4060: gnyis pa ming gi gzhi las sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:4061: ming gi gzhi las kyang rlom pa'i bdud 'byung ste
NK045(bi)001:4062: gang zhe na 'di ltar bdud sdig can ni sangs
NK045(bi)001:4063: rgyas la sogs pa cha byad gang yang rung bas
NK045(bi)001:4064: gang zag de'i gan du nye bar 'ong par gyur
NK045(bi)001:4065: nas / 'di skad smras te 'di lta bu ni khyod dang khyod kyi pha ma dang /
NK045(bi)001:4066: khyod kyi mi rabs bdun gyi mes po tshun chad
NK045(bi)001:4067: kyi rgyud kyi bar gyi ming yin no zhes de
NK045(bi)001:4068: dag gi ming thams cad smra zhing rang gi yid
NK045(bi)001:4069: la sngon nas bsam pa sogs dang tshul mthun par
NK045(bi)001:4070: gang tshe khyod ni sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i ming
NK045(bi)001:4071: ni 'di zhes bya ba yin no //
NK045(bi)001:4072: da lta gang zag de bsod snyoms pa dang stan
NK045(bi)001:4073: gcig pa sogs sbyangs pa'i yon tan la gnas pa
NK045(bi)001:4074: dang / tshul khrims dag pa'i sdom pa dang ldan pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:4075: bsam pa dang sgom pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor
NK045(bi)001:4076: dang ldan pa ci 'dra ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba
NK045(bi)001:4077: de de bzhin du gsal por brjod la /
NK045(bi)001:4078: khyod ci sngon gyi dus su yang sbyang yon la
NK045(bi)001:4079: sogs pa'i yon tan gyi tshul yang da lta'i 'di
NK045(bi)001:4080: dang 'dra bar gyur pa'o zhes brjod par byed do
NK045(bi)001:4081: // de skad smras pa'i bdud kyi tshig de gang gis thos nas /
NK045(bi)001:4082: rang gi yon tan sogs brjod pa'i ming tsam gyi
NK045(bi)001:4083: gazhi'am rgyu de la brten nas des rlom sems su
NK045(bi)001:4084: gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni /
NK045(bi)001:4085: bdud kyis rlom sems yongs su bslang zhing blo chung ba yin par rig par bya'o //
NK045(bi)001:4086: gsum pa la mdor bstan rgyas bshad gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:4088: rab tu dben pa'i sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:4089: rang nyid gzhan dang mi phrad par rab tu dben
NK045(bi)001:4090: pa'i grong dang grong khyer chen po dang ri yi
NK045(bi)001:4091: sul dang grong las thag ring ba dgon pa dang
NK045(bi)001:4092: mi med pa'i dben pa dang nags kyi khrod lta
NK045(bi)001:4093: bu gang yang rung ba rab tu bsten par byed
NK045(bi)001:4095: de 'di snyam du dben par gnas pa ni de
NK045(bi)001:4096: bzhin gshegs pas mchog tu basngagasa shing bdag ni dben
NK045(bi)001:4097: par gnas pa'o snyam du dben pa'i gzhi des rlom
