NK045(bi)001:4099: bdag la bstod cing gzhan dben par mi gnas pa la smod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni /
NK045(bi)001:4100: bdud kyis rgyud yongs su bslad pa'am bskyod par byas shing /
NK045(bi)001:4101: de dag blo rgya chung ba nyid du rig par bya'o //
NK045(bi)001:4102: gnyis pa la nang gi dben pa bstan pa /
NK045(bi)001:4103: dben pa de ma shes pa'i skyon bshad pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:4105: rtag tu grong dang sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:4106: dus rtag tu lus 'phags la sogs pa lta bu'i
NK045(bi)001:4107: grong dang tsam pa ka la sogs pa'i yul 'khor
NK045(bi)001:4108: dang / pa tra li pu tra la sogs pa lta bu'i grong rdal na gnas par byed cing /
NK045(bi)001:4109: der sems can rnams smin pa byed pa dang byang chub kyi lam la brtson pa ma gtogs para /
NK045(bi)001:4110: byang sems de ni dgra bcom dang rang rgyal gyi
NK045(bi)001:4111: 'bras bu la 'dod pa gzhar yang ste nam yang
NK045(bi)001:4112: mi skye ba 'di ni bde bar gshegs pa'i sras
NK045(bi)001:4113: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dben pa yang dag
NK045(bi)001:4114: par gsungs pa yin te lus dben pa tsam gyis
NK045(bi)001:4115: sems dri mas dben par mi 'gyur la /
NK045(bi)001:4116: nang gi sems rang don yid byed dang dman lam
NK045(bi)001:4117: yid byed kyis dben pa na gang du gnas kyang
NK045(bi)001:4118: dben pa'i mchog la gnas pa yin pa'i phyir ro
NK045(bi)001:4119: // de dag dper na sngon 'phags pa 'jam dpal
NK045(bi)001:4120: gyis rgyal byed kyi tshal du dbyar gnas par dam
NK045(bi)001:4121: bcas nas der dge 'dun gyi tshogs su ma bzhugs
NK045(bi)001:4122: par gsal rgyal gyi btsun mo'i 'khor du sems can
NK045(bi)001:4123: rnams smin par byas pa'i lo rgyus 'phags pa dkon
NK045(bi)001:4124: mchog gi za ma tog las 'byung ba lta bu'o
NK045(bi)001:4125: // // gnyis pa la nang gi dben pa dang bral ba'i skyon dang /
NK045(bi)001:4126: nang gi dben pa can la brnyas pa'i skyon bstan pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:4128: gang zhig dpag tshad sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:4129: gang zhig dpag tshad lnga brgya tsam tshun chad na
NK045(bi)001:4130: skye bo'i rgyu 'grul gyis dben par yod pa'i ri
NK045(bi)001:4131: yi sul mi med la gdug pa'i sbrul gyis gang
NK045(bi)001:4132: zhing sdod mi tshugs pa'i gnas ga la bar lo
NK045(bi)001:4133: manga po bye bar gnas par byed kyang /
NK045(bi)001:4134: nang gi dben pa yang dag pa 'di mi shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni /
NK045(bi)001:4135: rang nyid lhag pa'i nga rgyal rnyed nas dman pa'i yid byed dang 'dre bar gnas pa yin te /
NK045(bi)001:4136: de'i rgyu mtshan dben pa ni ma 'dres pa'i don yin la /
NK045(bi)001:4137: ci dang 'dre mi rung zhe na byang chub sems
NK045(bi)001:4138: dpa'i rgyud ni bdag la lhag par chags pa dang
NK045(bi)001:4139: dman lam yid byed dang 'dre mi rung ba yin
NK045(bi)001:4140: na de 'dra'i dben pa mi shes par lus dben
NK045(bi)001:4141: pa tsam gyis nga rgyal du byed cing sems can
NK045(bi)001:4142: gyi don bya ba las g.yel ba de ni sems
NK045(bi)001:4143: mi mthun phyogs nyon mongs pa dang 'dre bar gyur
NK045(bi)001:4144: pas na dben pa la gnas pa min no zhes
NK045(bi)001:4145: pa'i don to // gnyis pa la dngos dang /
NK045(bi)001:4146: des na gzhan gyi tshod dpog dka' bar bstan pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:4148: byang chub sems dpa' sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:4149: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig 'gro ba'i don la brtson pa dang ldan zhing /
NK045(bi)001:4150: bsam gtan bzhi dang stobs lnga dang dbang po lnga
NK045(bi)001:4151: dang rnam thar sgo gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin thob
NK045(bi)001:4152: nas grong dang grong khyer rnams su rgyu zhing sems
NK045(bi)001:4153: can rnams smin pa'i don du mdzad pa'i tshul sna
NK045(bi)001:4155: de'i dgongs spyod zab mo mi shes pa dag gis
NK045(bi)001:4156: 'di ni dgon pa dang dben pa la spyod pa
NK045(bi)001:4157: min no snyam du brnyas par byed pa po de
NK045(bi)001:4158: ni bdud kyi spyod yul te bdud kyis glags rnyed
NK045(bi)001:4159: pa'i yul la gnas par gyur pa yin no zhes
NK045(bi)001:4161: dge slong chos smra ba spyod pa rnam dag dang
NK045(bi)001:4162: spyod pa'i blo gros kyi lo rgyus chos thams cad
NK045(bi)001:4163: 'byung ba med par bstan pa'i mdo sogs las gsungs
NK045(bi)001:4164: pa bzhin no // gnyis pa gang zhig grong ngam sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:4165: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig lus grong ngam 'ona te dgon par gnas kyang rung ste /
NK045(bi)001:4166: nang gi yid nyan rang gi theg pa gnyis kyi
NK045(bi)001:4167: sems dang bral nas byang chub mchog gi lam la
NK045(bi)001:4169: tshul 'di ni 'gro ba'i don la zhugs pa byang
NK045(bi)001:4170: chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dben pa yang dag pa
NK045(bi)001:4171: ste / de ltar ma shes nas de 'dra'i dben
NK045(bi)001:4172: pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di la
NK045(bi)001:4173: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis drod snyom pa'am drod
NK045(bi)001:4174: tshad bzung nas 'di ni dben par mi gnas pa'o
NK045(bi)001:4175: snyam pa sogs tshad 'dzin pa de ni bdag nyid
NK045(bi)001:4176: thob pa dang ma thob pa'i yon tan las nyams
NK045(bi)001:4177: ste / par 'gyur ro // des nang dang nga
NK045(bi)001:4178: 'dra ba ma gtogs par gang zag gis gang zag
NK045(bi)001:4179: gi tshod gzung bar mi bya zhes dang /
NK045(bi)001:4180: byang chub sems dpas ni rang gi rgyud la rtogs
NK045(bi)001:4181: kyi gzhan gyi 'khrul pa btsal bar mi bya zhes
NK045(bi)001:4183: gnyis pa bdud kyi las spong ba'i thabs bstan pa la /
NK045(bi)001:4187: de lta bas na sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:4188: lam tshol ba la bdud kyi las mang du 'byung
NK045(bi)001:4189: ba de lta bas na de bzlog pa'i phyir phyi
NK045(bi)001:4190: dang nang gi yongs su 'dzin pa brten par bya'o
NK045(bi)001:4191: // de ci lta bu zhe na gang gis brten
NK045(bi)001:4192: pa po ni byang chub dam pa tshol ba yi
NK045(bi)001:4193: bsam pa drag po dang ldan la de bsgrub pa'i
NK045(bi)001:4194: thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pas so //
NK045(bi)001:4195: ji lta brten na rang gi rgyud kyi nga rgyala
NK045(bi)001:4196: nges par bcom ste dge ba'i bshes gnyen gzhan la
NK045(bi)001:4197: gus pa chen pos ji ltar nad pa'i tshogs kyis
NK045(bi)001:4198: rang gi nad gso ba'i phyir gzhan sman pa bzang
NK045(bi)001:4199: po la bsten pa ltar chos nyan pa'i skabs su'ang
NK045(bi)001:4200: / rang la nad pa chos smra ba la sman
NK045(bi)001:4201: pa chos la sman nan tan nyams su len pa
NK045(bi)001:4202: la nad gso ba'i 'du shes bzhi dang ldan pas
NK045(bi)001:4203: g.yel ba med par bsten par bya'o //
NK045(bi)001:4204: gang bsten na dge ba'i bshes gnyen te dge ba
NK045(bi)001:4205: ni skabs 'dir theg pa chen po'i chos yin la
NK045(bi)001:4206: / de legs par ston pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te /
NK045(bi)001:4207: lam yang dag par ston pa dang lam gyi bar
NK045(bi)001:4208: chad bdud kyi las ngos zin par byed cing de
NK045(bi)001:4209: las 'da' ba'i thabs ston pa'i sgo nas lam las
NK045(bi)001:4210: mi nyams pa 'dis yongs su 'dzin nus pa'i phyir
NK045(bi)001:4211: ro // des na de lta bu yongs su bsten para bya'o //
NK045(bi)001:4212: gnyis pa la phyi nang gi yongs 'dzin gnyis bshad pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:4213: nang gi yongs 'dzin bye brag tu bshad pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:4215: sangs rgyas byang chub sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:4216: bsten par bya ba'i bshes gnyen de gang zhe na 'di lta ste /
NK045(bi)001:4217: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub mchog la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag dang /
NK045(bi)001:4218: lam pha rol tu phyin pa dang bcas te dge ba'i bshes su bsten par bya'o //
NK045(bi)001:4219: de yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de
NK045(bi)001:4220: dag ni theg pa chen po 'di gzhan la rjes
NK045(bi)001:4221: su ston par byed pa yin pas phyi'i yongs 'dzin
NK045(bi)001:4222: zhes bya la / de dag gis bstan pa lam
NK045(bi)001:4223: pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyams su len
NK045(bi)001:4224: pa'am bsgrub par bya ba'i sa'am gnas yin pas nang
NK045(bi)001:4226: de ltar phyi nang gi yongs 'dzin des theg pa
NK045(bi)001:4227: mchog gi lam las lam gzhan du mi ltung bar
NK045(bi)001:4228: 'dzin pas na yongs 'dzin gnyis po de bsten pa'i
NK045(bi)001:4229: rgyu rnam pa de gnyis kyis sangs rgyas kyi byang
NK045(bi)001:4230: chub myur du rtogs par 'gyur te ma tshang ba
NK045(bi)001:4231: med pa'i rgyu phun sum tshogs par gyur pa'i phyir
NK045(bi)001:4232: ro // gnyis pa nang gi yongs 'dzin bye brag tu bshad pa la /
NK045(bi)001:4233: sher phyin bshes gnyen yin tshul dang /
NK045(bi)001:4234: bshes gnyen de ji ltar bsten tshul gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:4236: rgyal ba 'das dang sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:4237: gang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni
NK045(bi)001:4238: dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yongs su grags mod
NK045(bi)001:4239: kyi / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
NK045(bi)001:4240: dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa'i tshul ji ltar
NK045(bi)001:4241: kyi / yin snyam na / rgyal ba rdzogs pa'i
NK045(bi)001:4242: sangs rgyas gang zhig sngar 'das pa'i dus su byon
NK045(bi)001:4243: kyi / yin snyam na / zin pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:4244: da lta ma byon pa ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas
NK045(bi)001:4245: kyi / yin snyam na / zin pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:4246: dang / da lta sangs rgyas nas phyogs bcur gang
NK045(bi)001:4247: bzhugs pa ste dus gsum gyi rgyal ba de dag
NK045(bi)001:4248: kun gyi lam ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
NK045(bi)001:4249: phyin pa 'di nyid yin gyi 'di las gzhan ni
NK045(bi)001:4250: kyi / yin snyam na / zin pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:4251: dang / ma yin te / shes rab kyi pha
NK045(bi)001:4252: rol tu phyin pa la ma brten par 'tshang rgya
NK045(bi)001:4253: ba'i lam gzhan ni rnam pa kun tu mi srid
NK045(bi)001:4254: de srid zhi mnyam nyid du rtogs pa'i shes rab
NK045(bi)001:4255: med pa'i lam gzhan gyis 'tshang rgya mi nus par
NK045(bi)001:4257: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
NK045(bi)001:4258: byang chub mchog gi tshul la zhugs pa rnams kyi
NK045(bi)001:4259: gsal byed du gyur pa dang sgron mar gyur pa
NK045(bi)001:4260: dang snang bar gyur pa dang ston pa mchoga tu
NK045(bi)001:4261: gyur pa yin no zhes su rgyal ba rnams kyis
NK045(bi)001:4262: bshad de / rim pa ltar gang zag gi bdag med pa ston pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:4263: chos kyi bdag med pa ston pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:4264: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad ston pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:4265: mthar thug gi 'bras bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub kyi lam ston pa'i phyir na'o //
NK045(bi)001:4266: gnyis pa la bsten bya sher phyin gyi ngo bo /
NK045(bi)001:4267: de bsten dgos par gdams pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:4269: de lta na kun byang du 'gyur ba mi 'thad pa'i rtsod spang gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:4270: dang po ji ltar shes rab sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:4271: 'phags pa brgyad stong par sher phyin gyi mtshan nyid zhus pa'i lan du /
NK045(bi)001:4272: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni stong
NK045(bi)001:4273: pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid do zhes tha snyad kyi
NK045(bi)001:4274: mtshan nyid ma bstan par don dam pa'i mtshan nyid
NK045(bi)001:4275: bstan te gzugs su rung ba gzugs kyi mtshan nyid
NK045(bi)001:4276: la sogs pa tha snyad kyi gnas tshul ni don
NK045(bi)001:4277: dam du ma grub par blos btags pa tsam ste
NK045(bi)001:4279: chos kun gyi gnas tshul rnal ma ni stong pa nyid de /
NK045(bi)001:4280: yin lugs skyon med pa yin pas na de ltar gsungs so 'dir yang de bzhin du /
NK045(bi)001:4281: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ni stong pa nyid yin la /
NK045(bi)001:4282: de kho na'i mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yin par
NK045(bi)001:4283: ma zad kyi gzugs la sogs pa chos 'di thams
NK045(bi)001:4284: cad kyi mtshan nyid kyang sher phyin de dang 'dra
NK045(bi)001:4285: bar stong pa nyid du shes shing /
NK045(bi)001:4286: chos su gdags pa ji snyed pa rnams thams cad
NK045(bi)001:4287: ngo bo stong zhing dmigs pa'i mtshan ma med par
NK045(bi)001:4289: de ltar spyod pa de ni bde bar gshegas pa'i
NK045(bi)001:4290: shes rab kyi phar phyin la spyod pa yin no
NK045(bi)001:4291: // gnyis pa la don dngos dang /
NK045(bi)001:4293: de ltar bstan pa'i mjug bsdu ba gsum /
NK045(bi)001:4295: sems can yongs su sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:4296: mdo las gal te chos thams cad dben pa dang
NK045(bi)001:4297: stong pa lags na sems can rnams kun nas nyon
NK045(bi)001:4298: mongs pa dang rnam par byang bar ci ltar 'gyur
NK045(bi)001:4299: zhes dris pa'i lan gyi don dang mthun par kun
NK045(bi)001:4301: sems can rnams ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yongs
NK045(bi)001:4302: su rtog pa can du gyur pa'i dbang gis rtog
NK045(bi)001:4303: pa de 'phel bar byed pa 'dod pa'i yon tan
NK045(bi)001:4304: gyi zas la 'dod pa skye bar byed cing /
NK045(bi)001:4305: 'dod pa de'i dbang gis 'khor bar chagsa pa'i yid
NK045(bi)001:4306: dang ldan pa rnams ni phag mi gtsang ba'i 'dam
NK045(bi)001:4307: la rgyu ba ltar rtag tu srid par 'khor bar
NK045(bi)001:4308: gyur pa yin pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa'i
NK045(bi)001:4309: phyogs snang tshul la yod par 'gyur ro //
NK045(bi)001:4310: snang tshul la 'khrul pa'i dbang gis yod kyang gnas tshul la de ltar yod ma myong ste /
NK045(bi)001:4311: kun tu rtog pa des bzung ba ltar gyi bdag
NK045(bi)001:4312: dang bdag gi ba'i chos gnyis ni yang dag par
NK045(bi)001:4313: grub pa min zhing stong pa yin pa ste gdod
NK045(bi)001:4314: nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)001:4315: yul med kyang mi mkhas pa'i byis pa bdag nyid kyiis ni med pa la yod par bzung ba /
NK045(bi)001:4316: dper na nam mkha' la mdud pa bor bar sems
NK045(bi)001:4317: pa ltar gyur pa yin pas chos kun gyi mtshan
NK045(bi)001:4318: nyid stong pa la kun nyon med kyang mtshan nyid
NK045(bi)001:4319: ltar mi 'dzin pa'i 'khrul pa can la kun nyon
NK045(bi)001:4322: dper na dogs pa'i sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:4323: dngos po'i don la med na der 'dzin pa'i rtog
NK045(bi)001:4324: pa ji ltar 'byung snyam na dper na rang nyid
NK045(bi)001:4325: dogsa pa'i 'du shes kyis ni dug bslang ba ste
NK045(bi)001:4326: dug khong du song ngo snyam du dug gi rtog
NK045(bi)001:4327: pa mngon gyur du skyes pa na /
NK045(bi)001:4328: dngos po'i don la dug de de'i khong du song
NK045(bi)001:4329: ba med kyang rtog pa de'i dbang gis dug gis
NK045(bi)001:4330: na ba ltar sems pa dang skrag nas brgyal bar
NK045(bi)001:4331: yang 'gyur te / mi sdar ma dag la 'byung
NK045(bi)001:4332: po'i tshul gyis bsdig pa dang dgras khyod gsod do
NK045(bi)001:4333: zhes sogs smras pa tsam gyis 'dar bar byed pa
NK045(bi)001:4334: yang 'gyur te / bzhin no // dug khong du
NK045(bi)001:4335: ma song yang rang gi rnam par rtog pas der
NK045(bi)001:4336: bzung ba las brgyal ba la sogs pa 'byung ba
NK045(bi)001:4337: de bzhin du mi mkhas pa'i byis pa so so'i
NK045(bi)001:4338: skye bo rnams kyis med bzhin du bdag yod par
NK045(bi)001:4339: 'dzin pa dang rang gi rgyud du gtogs pa'i chos
NK045(bi)001:4340: la bdag gir khas len pa goms pa las /
NK045(bi)001:4341: bdag ces bya ba'i yul der 'du shes pa yang
NK045(bi)001:4342: dag pa min pa'i rtog pa 'byung zhing de'i dbang
NK045(bi)001:4343: gis srid par skye zhing 'chi ba brgyud mar myong
NK045(bi)001:4346: ji ltara 'dzin pa sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:4347: ji ltar gnas tshul la med kyang bdag dang bdag
NK045(bi)001:4348: gi ba yod par 'dzin pa de ltar rang gi
NK045(bi)001:4349: rtog pa'i dbang gis kun nas nyon mongs pa nyid
NK045(bi)001:4351: dngos po'i gnas tshul ltar bdag dang bdag gir mi dmigs na rnam par byang bar gsungs te /
NK045(bi)001:4352: de ltar kun rdzob tu kun nas nyon mongs pa
NK045(bi)001:4353: dang rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba yin na yang
NK045(bi)001:4354: / yang dag pa'i gnas lugs 'di la ni gang
NK045(bi)001:4355: zag gang yang nyon mongs par gyur pa dang kun
NK045(bi)001:4356: nyon de rnam par dag pa nyid du 'gyur ba
NK045(bi)001:4357: yang med par byang chub sems dpas gdod nas mnyam
NK045(bi)001:4358: pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
NK045(bi)001:4359: rjes su rtogs par gyur pa yin no //
NK045(bi)001:4360: gnyis pa sher phyin de bsten dgos par gdams pa la /
NK045(bi)001:4361: dgos pa'i sgo nas chos de la brtson par gdams pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:4362: dpe'i sgo nas ji ltar brtson par bya ba dang /
NK045(bi)001:4363: de ltar brtson par byas pa'i phan yon bstan pa gsum las /
NK045(bi)001:4364: dang po la bsod nams chen po bya ba cung zad kyis 'grub pa /
NK045(bi)001:4365: 'gro ba kun gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ba /
NK045(bi)001:4366: gdul bya la lam ston pa por 'gyur ba gsum /
NK045(bi)001:4368: 'dzam bu'i gling na sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:4369: brtags pa mthar bzung gi dper bya na /
NK045(bi)001:4370: 'dzam bu'i gling na yod pa'i sems can ji snyed
NK045(bi)001:4371: ma lus pa de dag gis mi yi lus thob
NK045(bi)001:4372: ste / de thamsa cad kyis bla na med pa'i
NK045(bi)001:4373: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas lo stong phrag
NK045(bi)001:4374: bye ba mang por sangs rgyas dang sems can thams
NK045(bi)001:4375: cad la sbyin pa rgya chen po byin par byas
NK045(bi)001:4376: la dge ba'i rtsa ba de kun kyang 'gro ba'i
NK045(bi)001:4377: don du byang chub mchog gi rgyur yongs su bsngo
NK045(bi)001:4378: ba byas na de la phan yon tshad med pa
NK045(bi)001:4380: gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
NK045(bi)001:4381: mchog la mngon par brtson pa na dus ring po
NK045(bi)001:4382: phar zhog / tha na nyi ma gcig tsam zhig
NK045(bi)001:4383: la sher phyin de'i rjes su mthun pa ste rang
NK045(bi)001:4384: gis bsam zhing gzhan la ston pa sogs byed na
NK045(bi)001:4385: de'i bsod nams de la ni gong du bshad pa
NK045(bi)001:4386: sbyin pa'i phung po des ni bsod nams kyi char
NK045(bi)001:4387: yang 'gran par mi phod pa yin pa de yi
NK045(bi)001:4388: phyir na g.yel ba med par dus rtag tu shes
NK045(bi)001:4389: rab kyi phar phyin 'di la 'jug par bya dgos
NK045(bi)001:4391: shes rab pha rol sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:4392: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog la
NK045(bi)001:4393: spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa de dag 'gro ba'i khams
NK045(bi)001:4394: kun la snying rje chen po bskyed kyang sems can
NK045(bi)001:4395: gyi 'du shes su 'gyur ba ni med la /
NK045(bi)001:4396: de ltar dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje dang ldan
NK045(bi)001:4397: pa de yi tshe na mkhas pa de dag 'gro
NK045(bi)001:4398: ba kun gyi sbyin gnas dam par 'gyur zhing dus
NK045(bi)001:4399: rtag tu yul 'khor rnams su bsod snyoms sogs mdzad
NK045(bi)001:4400: pa don yod par yongs su spyod pa yin te
NK045(bi)001:4401: de la phul ba don rgya chen po yod pa'i
NK045(bi)001:4402: phyir ro // gsum pa byang chub sems gang sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:4403: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig 'khor ba'i gnas 'dira
NK045(bi)001:4404: sngon chad yun ring por pha ma bu tsha sogs
NK045(bi)001:4406: lha dang mi dang ngan song gsum gyi ste rgyud
NK045(bi)001:4407: lnga'i sems can rnams 'ching ba dang sdug bsngal las
NK045(bi)001:4409: lam yangsa pa ste gang las byang chub gsum 'byung
NK045(bi)001:4410: zhing sems can tshad med pa la go skabs 'byed
NK045(bi)001:4411: pa de la brten nas 'khor ba'i pha rol gyi
NK045(bi)001:4412: 'gram mya ngan las 'das pa nyid sems can gyi
NK045(bi)001:4413: khams la ston par 'dod pas nyin dang mtshan du
NK045(bi)001:4414: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson
NK045(bi)001:4415: para bya ste / de la brtson na sangs rgyas
NK045(bi)001:4416: kyi chos tshad med pa smra ba'i ston pa por
NK045(bi)001:4417: para bya ste / 'gyur ro // gnyis pa ji ltar brtson pa /
NK045(bi)001:4418: mi zhig sngon chad sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:4419: dper na mi zhig gis sngon chad ma rnyed pa
NK045(bi)001:4420: ste rnyed ma myong ba'i rin chen mchog gcig dus
NK045(bi)001:4421: gzhan zhig na rnyed par gyur te yid rab tu
NK045(bi)001:4422: dga' ba las / rnyed ma thag tu bag med
NK045(bi)001:4423: par gyur te rin chen de stor bar gyur na
NK045(bi)001:4424: dga' ba las / ni / rnyed dka' ba de
NK045(bi)001:4425: stor bar gyur pas na rin chen de lta bu
NK045(bi)001:4426: yid la mngon par 'dod bzhin du rtag tu sdug
NK045(bi)001:4428: dpe de ltar byang chub mchog gi lam la zhugs
NK045(bi)001:4429: pas ni rnyed dka' ba rin chen gyi dam pa
NK045(bi)001:4430: lta bu yi / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
NK045(bi)001:4431: phyin pa 'di la rnal 'byor du bya ba dor
NK045(bi)001:4433: dper na stor ba las phyis su rin chen de
NK045(bi)001:4434: slar yang rnyed nas dga' bas blangsa te rab tu
NK045(bi)001:4435: brtson pas gos la sogs pa'i khud du dkris shing
NK045(bi)001:4436: chud mi za bar sbas nas stor ba dang gzhan
NK045(bi)001:4437: gyis phrog par dogs pas myur du bdag gi khyim
NK045(bi)001:4438: du 'gro bar byed pa ni rin chen dang bral
NK045(bi)001:4439: ba'i mya ngan dang dbul ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad
NK045(bi)001:4441: gsum pa de ltar brtson pa'i phan yon la /
NK045(bi)001:4442: bsgrub pa gzhan zil gyis gnon pa /
NK045(bi)001:4443: lha mi'i re gnas su gyur pa /
NK045(bi)001:4446: de'i dge ba la gzhan gyis yi rang ba'i phan yon dang lnga /
NK045(bi)001:4448: nyi ma sprin dang sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:4449: dper na nyi ma sprin dang bral ba'i 'od zer
NK045(bi)001:4450: gyis d+r+wa ba can mun nag thibs po dang gzhan
NK045(bi)001:4451: yang mun pa thams cad 'joms pa de 'char ba
NK045(bi)001:4452: na / rang gi lus kyi phyogs gcig tsam na
NK045(bi)001:4453: 'od phra mo yod pa srin bu me khyer dang
NK045(bi)001:4454: na / / rang gi lus kyi 'od dang sgron
NK045(bi)001:4455: me sogs thogs pa'i mthus nye skor tsam snang bar
NK045(bi)001:4456: byed pa srog chagsa 'byung po thams cad dang /
NK045(bi)001:4457: cung zad snang ba skar ma'i tshogs dang /
NK045(bi)001:4458: phal cher snang ba zla ba'i 'od de de ltar 'od bzhi po kun zil gyis gnon pa /
NK045(bi)001:4459: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi
NK045(bi)001:4460: pha rol tu phyin pa mchog la spyod pa sgrib
NK045(bi)001:4461: pa'i sprin dang bral ba'i nyi ma lta bu de
NK045(bi)001:4462: ni / stong pa nyid dang ni mtshan ma med
NK045(bi)001:4463: par spyod pa la mkhas pas chos kyi 'od zer
NK045(bi)001:4464: mchog gi d+r+wa ba rab tu 'gyed pas bdag dang
NK045(bi)001:4465: chos su lta ba'i mun nag thibs po ma lus
NK045(bi)001:4466: pa bcom nas me khyer lta bu'i 'gro ba kun
NK045(bi)001:4467: ni / dang / srog chags gzhan lta bu'i dgra bcom pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:4468: skar ma lta bu'i rang rgyal dang /
NK045(bi)001:4469: zla ba lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan shes
NK045(bi)001:4470: rab phar phyin 'di yi thabs mkhas dang bral ba
NK045(bi)001:4471: mang po zil gyis gnon te /
NK045(bi)001:4472: shes rab kyi sgo nas 'di dang mi ldan pa'i
NK045(bi)001:4473: bsgrub pa gzhan thams cad las khyad par du 'phags
NK045(bi)001:4475: dper na rgyal po'i sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:4476: dper na rgyal po'i bu zhig 'bangs bskyab pa'i phyir nor gtong ba dang /
NK045(bi)001:4477: lugs kyi bstan bcos la mkhas pas yul 'khor yongs
NK045(bi)001:4478: su skyong ba'i don 'dod pa ste don shes shing
NK045(bi)001:4479: don dang ldan pa'i ngang tshul can yin gyi don
NK045(bi)001:4480: med pa min pa de ni rgyal ba'i sras kun
NK045(bi)001:4482: 'bangs thams cad kyis de la rjed par byed cing
NK045(bi)001:4483: rtsis che bar gyur nas don gyi phyir re bas
NK045(bi)001:4484: de yi drung du mngon par 'gro bar bya ba'i
NK045(bi)001:4486: rgyal bu 'di ni da ltar rgyal por ma gyur
NK045(bi)001:4487: pa'i dus na yang sems can mang po dga' bar
NK045(bi)001:4488: byed na / rgyal sar dbang bskur nas cod pan
NK045(bi)001:4489: bcing ba sogs rgyal sa la dbang ba'i thabs thob
NK045(bi)001:4490: par gyur te rgyal srid la gnas pa'i rgyal por
NK045(bi)001:4491: gyur nas 'bangs rnams kyi don byed cing de dag
NK045(bi)001:4492: dga' bar byed pa smos ci dgos so //
NK045(bi)001:4493: dpe de ltara du shes rab kyi pha rol tu
NK045(bi)001:4494: phyin pa la spyod pa'i mkhas pa don dang ldan
NK045(bi)001:4495: pa byang chub sems dpa' yang /
NK045(bi)001:4496: sems can rnams la chos kyi bdud rtsi sbyin par
NK045(bi)001:4497: byed cing lha dang mi rnams dga' bar byed pas
NK045(bi)001:4498: lha sogs de yi drung du 'ong zhing re gnas
NK045(bi)001:4499: su byas nas bkur bar byed la /
NK045(bi)001:4500: byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni lam la slob pa'i
NK045(bi)001:4501: gnas skabs da lta na yang sems can mang po
NK045(bi)001:4502: la phan par brtson pa yin na /
NK045(bi)001:4503: chos kyi rgyal por gyur te sangs rgyas kyi ye
NK045(bi)001:4504: shes la gnas par gyur nas sems can la phan
NK045(bi)001:4505: par mdzad pa smos ci dgos pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)001:4506: gsum pa la bdud rnams skrag par byed pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:4507: bdud kyis de la mi tshugs pa'i tshul gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:4509: de yi tshe na sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:4510: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi phar phyin la
NK045(bi)001:4511: gnad dang ldan pa de ltar spyod pa de yi
NK045(bi)001:4512: tshe na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
NK045(bi)001:4513: gyi khams kyi bdud sdig can rnams ni 'di snyam
NK045(bi)001:4514: du / byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni nges par
NK045(bi)001:4515: bdag gi yul las 'phags te sangs rgyas nas bdag
NK045(bi)001:4516: gi yul stong par 'gyur ro snyam du rgyu des
NK045(bi)001:4517: sems zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur la /
NK045(bi)001:4518: bdag gis mthus kyang 'di zil gyis gnon par dka'
NK045(bi)001:4519: 'o snyam du mya ngan gyis nyam thag par gyur
NK045(bi)001:4520: pa dang / de'i dbang gis lus sdug bsngal ba
NK045(bi)001:4521: dang yid mi bde ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i
NK045(bi)001:4522: yon tan gyis zil gyis mnan nas rang gi mthus
NK045(bi)001:4523: snyems pa med par nyams chung bar 'gyur la /
NK045(bi)001:4524: de ltar gyur pas bdud de dag gis ma bzod
NK045(bi)001:4525: nas ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'di yi
NK045(bi)001:4526: yid thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam las phyir nur zhing
NK045(bi)001:4527: ldog par 'gyur zhes sems pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:4528: tha na thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems gcig tsam yang dkrugs pa'i glags rnyed dam snyam du /
NK045(bi)001:4529: byang sems de la 'jigs pa chen po bstan pa'i
NK045(bi)001:4530: phyir phyogs rnams me yis sreg par byed cing skar
NK045(bi)001:4531: mda' 'khrugs pa gtong ba lta bu sogs bdud kyi
NK045(bi)001:4532: cho 'phrul sna tshogs ston par byed do //
NK045(bi)001:4533: gnyis pa la glags mi rnyed pa'i tshul dang /
NK045(bi)001:4534: zhar la ldog phyogs glags rnyed pa'i rgyu bstan pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:4536: gang tshe mkhas pa sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:4537: bdud kyi cho 'phrul ston pa de ltar gyur pa
NK045(bi)001:4538: gang gi tshe na mkhas pa byang chub sems dpa'
NK045(bi)001:4539: de dag theg pa chen po'i lam de la mi
NK045(bi)001:4540: phyed pa'i bsam pa rab tu drag po dang ldan
NK045(bi)001:4541: zhing / sbyor ba'i sgo nas nyin mtshan rtag tu
NK045(bi)001:4542: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog gi
NK045(bi)001:4543: don la lta bar byed do //
NK045(bi)001:4544: de ltar byas pa de yi tshe byang sems de'i
NK045(bi)001:4545: lus dang sems daga ni mkha' la 'gro ba'i bya
NK045(bi)001:4546: ltar du srid zhi'i g.yangs sa'i 'jigs pa med par
NK045(bi)001:4547: rgyu ste mi gnas pa'i sher phyin la gnas pa'i
NK045(bi)001:4548: mthu las so // des na de la nag po'i
NK045(bi)001:4549: rtsa lag rnams kyis glags rnyed par ga la 'gyur
NK045(bi)001:4550: te nam mkhar 'gro ba'i bya la khyi sogs kyis
NK045(bi)001:4552: gnyis pa la glags rnyed pa'i rgyu gtso bo rtsod pa yin par bstan pa /
NK045(bi)001:4553: nyes pa de las sdang ba'i thabs bstan pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:4554: dang po la rtsod pa spyi dang /
NK045(bi)001:4555: bye brag tu lung bstan ma thob pas thob pa'i byang sems la rtsod pa'i nyes dmigs gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:4557: gang tshe byang chub sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:4558: gong du bshad pa ltar thabs mkhas pa dang shes
NK045(bi)001:4559: rab kyi go cha dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems
NK045(bi)001:4560: dpa' la bdud kyi glags mi rnyed kyang tshul de
NK045(bi)001:4561: dang mi ldan pa'i blo chung ba la glags rnyed
NK045(bi)001:4562: pa yin la / de yang brgyad stong pa las /
NK045(bi)001:4563: bdud kyi glags rnyed pa'i nyes pa bdun dang /
NK045(bi)001:4564: nyi khri las bcu gnyis gsungs pa'i tha ma de 'dir bstan pa ni /
NK045(bi)001:4565: dus gang gi tshe byang chub semsa dpa' gang phan
NK045(bi)001:4566: tshun du lus kyis 'thab pa dang ngag gis rtsod
NK045(bi)001:4567: par gyur cing / phan tshun du gcig la gcig
NK045(bi)001:4568: mi mthun pa khros pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur
NK045(bi)001:4569: pa de yi tshe na bdud sdig can de ni
NK045(bi)001:4570: dga' zhing rtsod pa ci tsam 'phel ba de tsam
NK045(bi)001:4571: du mchog tu nyams bde bar 'gyur te /
NK045(bi)001:4572: de'i rgyu mtshan byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis ka
NK045(bi)001:4573: thabs dang shes rab kyi lam dang 'gal ba rtsod
NK045(bi)001:4574: pa de'i nyes pas rgyal ba'i ye shes las ni
NK045(bi)001:4575: thag ring du 'gyur zhing bdag gis glags rnyed do
NK045(bi)001:4577: de ltar de gnyis ka sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
NK045(bi)001:4578: las ring du 'gyur zhing rgyud ma rang pa srin
NK045(bi)001:4579: po dang yi dwags la sogs pa sha za rnams
NK045(bi)001:4581: khro ba dang khro ba la slar lan byed pa
NK045(bi)001:4582: gnyis ka yang gzhan don du snying rjes rdzogs byang
NK045(bi)001:4583: thob 'dod dang de'i lam phar phyin nyams su len
NK045(bi)001:4584: par rang gi dam bcas pa de rtsod pas nyams
NK045(bi)001:4586: khro bas rtsod pa ni snying rje dang byang chub
NK045(bi)001:4587: kyi sems dang bdag med par mthong ba'i shes rab
NK045(bi)001:4588: sogs dang rnam pa kun tu 'gal ba'i phyir /
NK045(bi)001:4589: yid sdang zhing de'i gnyen po bzod pa dang bral
NK045(bi)001:4590: ba la byang chub thob pa ga la yod de
NK045(bi)001:4591: sa bon bsregs pa'i myu gu bzhin no //
NK045(bi)001:4592: de ltar rtsod par gyur pa de yi tshe bdud
NK045(bi)001:4593: rnams rang gi phyogs su gtogs pa rnams dang bcas
NK045(bi)001:4594: te dag'a bar 'gyur te de dag gi bsam pa
NK045(bi)001:4595: bzhin du grub pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)001:4596: des na byang chub sems dpa' la 'dod chags kyi
NK045(bi)001:4597: nyes pa bskal pa'i bar du byung ba las khro
NK045(bi)001:4598: ba skad cig tsam skyes pa de ni snying rje
NK045(bi)001:4599: dang rnam pa kun tu 'gal ba'i phyir nyes pa
NK045(bi)001:4600: che tshul mdo rnams las rgya cher 'byung la khyad
NK045(bi)001:4601: par du yul byang chub sems dpa' la khro ba
NK045(bi)001:4603: byams pa seng ge sgra chen po zhes bya ba dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs las /
NK045(bi)001:4604: zhe sdang gi rtsod pa dang bcas pa'i gnas las dpag tshad brgyar 'byol bar bya ste /
NK045(bi)001:4605: zhe sdang gi sems bskyed par mi bya'o //
NK045(bi)001:4606: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten khams kyi
NK045(bi)001:4607: sems can thams cad la spyos shing brdeg la mtshon
NK045(bi)001:4608: gyis btab pa bas byang chub sems dpa' gzhan la
NK045(bi)001:4609: tha ba dang zhe sdang gi sems bskyed pa de
NK045(bi)001:4610: ches nyes pa lci zhing des byang chub sems dpa'
NK045(bi)001:4611: smas pa dang nyams par 'gyur te /
NK045(bi)001:4612: dper na lcags ni lcags las gzhan bong ba sogs kyis mi chod pa ltar /
NK045(bi)001:4613: byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang byang
NK045(bi)001:4614: chub sems dpa' cig shos la zhe sdang bas zad
NK045(bi)001:4615: par byed kyi gzhan gyis zad mi nus pas na
NK045(bi)001:4616: / gcig gis gcig la zhe sa dang gus pa
NK045(bi)001:4617: dang bcas par bya ste sems dang po bskyed pa'i
NK045(bi)001:4618: byang chub sems dpa' la yang ston pa'i 'du shes
NK045(bi)001:4619: / bskyed par bya'o // zhes gsungs pa bzhin no //
NK045(bi)001:4620: gnyis pa lung bstan ma thob sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:4621: khyad par du phyir mi ldog pa'i lung bstan ma thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig gis /
NK045(bi)001:4622: lung bstan pa'i rtags thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
NK045(bi)001:4623: la sems khros nas lus dang ngag gi rtsod pa
NK045(bi)001:4625: ji srid du 'gyod pa'i tshul gyis sems de btang
NK045(bi)001:4626: nas bshags pa mi byed par rtsod pa ma btang
NK045(bi)001:4627: na / rgyud ma rung pa dge ba'i sa bon
NK045(bi)001:4628: mi 'phel ba'i tha ba lta bu skyon dang ldan
NK045(bi)001:4629: pa'i sems kyi skad cig ci tsam zhig skyes pa
NK045(bi)001:4630: ji snyed pa de snyeda kyi bskal par gzhi nas
NK045(bi)001:4631: gsar du lam la 'jug pa'i go cha bgo dgos
NK045(bi)001:4632: na / so zhes / rtsod pa'i sems skyon can
NK045(bi)001:4633: skyes pa de snyed kyi bskal par dmyal bar skye
NK045(bi)001:4634: zhing khro bas de snyed kyi bskal par bsags pa'i
NK045(bi)001:4635: dge rtsa zad par byas shing sdig pa de tsam
NK045(bi)001:4636: 'phel ba'i phyir bskal pa de snyed kyi grangs tsam
NK045(bi)001:4637: du gzhi nas te gsar du sbyin sogs lam thams
NK045(bi)001:4638: cad la go cha bgos nas ma bslab bar du
NK045(bi)001:4639: lam sor mi chud pas de tsam du bla na
NK045(bi)001:4640: med pa'i byang chub dang thag bsring bar byed do
NK045(bi)001:4641: na / so zhes / zhes so // gnyis pa
NK045(bi)001:4642: nyes pa de las sdang ba'i thabs bstan pa la
NK045(bi)001:4643: na / so zhes / zhes so // / kun
NK045(bi)001:4644: rdzob tu stobs bzhi tshang ba'i sgo nas bshags pa
NK045(bi)001:4645: na / so zhes / zhes so // / dang
NK045(bi)001:4646: / don dam par mi dmigs par lta bas bshags
NK045(bi)001:4647: na / so zhes / zhes so // / dang / pa gnyis / dang po /
NK045(bi)001:4648: sangs rgyas bzod pa'i sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:4649: sangs rgyas rnams ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas byang chub la reg pa yin na /
NK045(bi)001:4650: de las bzlog pa bdag gi khro ba'i sems 'di
NK045(bi)001:4651: ni bzang ba min te bskal pa mang po'i dge
NK045(bi)001:4652: rtsa sreg par byed pa'i ngang tshul can byang chub
NK045(bi)001:4653: kyi lam dang ches 'gal ba'o snyam du nyes pa
NK045(bi)001:4654: la nyes par shes pa'i dran pa skyed par byed
NK045(bi)001:4655: cing sdig pa byas pa de la mchog tu 'gyod
NK045(bi)001:4656: pa ni sun 'byin pa'i stobs so //
NK045(bi)001:4657: sdig pa'i dngos po de so sora 'chags par byed
NK045(bi)001:4658: pa'i phyira rten gyi stobs phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang
NK045(bi)001:4659: byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid kyis mngon sum byas
NK045(bi)001:4660: te de la bsten par byed cing /
NK045(bi)001:4661: gnyen po'i stobs mdo sde zab mo klog pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:4662: gzungs bzla ba dang zab mo'i don la mnyam par
NK045(bi)001:4663: bzhag pa sogs chos spyod kyi rim pa gang yang
NK045(bi)001:4665: sor chud pa'i stobs phyis kyang nyes pa de lta bu mi byed par sdom par byed la /
NK045(bi)001:4666: 'di lta bu ma rung ba ni bdag byang chub
NK045(bi)001:4667: sems dpas bya ba'i 'os ma yin no snyam du
NK045(bi)001:4668: yid log pa'i tshul gyis rtsod pa sogs kyi ngang
NK045(bi)001:4669: tshul la dga' bar mi byed pa de ni sangs
NK045(bi)001:4670: rgyas kyi chos 'dir slob pa yin gyi bdud kyi
NK045(bi)001:4671: chos la slob pa min no //
NK045(bi)001:4673: de ltar shes pa'i phan yon gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:4675: gang zhig slob tshe sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:4676: gang zhig lam la slob pa'i tshe bslab pa zhes
NK045(bi)001:4677: bya ba'i bya ba gang yang mngon par zhen pa'i
NK045(bi)001:4678: tshul gyis khas mi len la /
NK045(bi)001:4680: des bslaba par bya ba'i chos phar phyin rnams kyang mi dmigs shing /
NK045(bi)001:4681: gnyen po bslab pa dang de'i mi mthun phyogs bslab
NK045(bi)001:4682: pa ma yin pa 'di gnyis su yang mi rtog
NK045(bi)001:4683: par chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i rang bzhin
NK045(bi)001:4684: du shes pa de ltar gang gis slob pa de
NK045(bi)001:4685: ni sangs rgyas kyi chos shes rab kyi pha rol
NK045(bi)001:4686: tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu 'dir phyin
NK045(bi)001:4687: ci ma log par slob pa yin no //
NK045(bi)001:4689: byang chub sems dpa' sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:4690: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig de lta'i mi slob
NK045(bi)001:4691: pa'i bslab pa 'di shesa pa de ni gzhar yang
NK045(bi)001:4692: ste / nam du yang shes rab dang ting nge
NK045(bi)001:4693: 'dzin gyi bslab pa las nyams pa dang tshul khrims
NK045(bi)001:4694: 'chal bar mi 'gyur te nyes pa'i rgyu dmigs pa
NK045(bi)001:4695: can gyi lta ba spang ba'i phyir dug gi sa
NK045(bi)001:4696: bon med pa la de'i lo 'bras mi skye ba
NK045(bi)001:4697: ste / bzhin no // de lta bu'i byang chub
NK045(bi)001:4698: sems dpa' de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos stobs la
NK045(bi)001:4699: sogs pa brnyes pa'am grub par bya ba'i phyir lam
NK045(bi)001:4700: shes rab zab mo 'di lta bu la slob pa
NK045(bi)001:4701: ste / bzhin no // yin no // yang sangs
NK045(bi)001:4702: rgyas mnyes pa'am dgyes par byed pa'i chos la gnas
NK045(bi)001:4703: pa'i don du'ang 'grel par snang ngo //
NK045(bi)001:4704: byang sems de ni sems dang tshul khrims kyi bslab
NK045(bi)001:4705: pa lhag par 'phel zhing shes rab kyi bslab pa
NK045(bi)001:4706: la mkhas te de'i rgyu mtshan ni dmigs pa med
NK045(bi)001:4707: pa'i lam la gnas pa'i phyir te dmigs pa dang
NK045(bi)001:4708: bcas na bdag tu lta ba la sogs pa des
NK045(bi)001:4709: rmongs pa'i phyir lhag pa'i bslab par yang mi 'gyur
NK045(bi)001:4711: de ltar bden pa gnyis la mkhas pa'i byang chub
NK045(bi)001:4712: sems dpa' chos snang ba'i 'od byeda pa rnams kyi
NK045(bi)001:4713: shes rab la de ltar bslab par bya'o //
NK045(bi)001:4714: de ltar slob pa na thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam
NK045(bi)001:4715: dang 'gal ba nyon mongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa
NK045(bi)001:4716: can / dge ba ma yin pa'i sems gcig tsam yang skyed par mi byed do //
NK045(bi)001:4717: rang gi rgyud shes rab zab mo'i snang bas khyab
NK045(bi)001:4718: pa'i phyir ngan rtog gi mun pa gnas pa'i go
NK045(bi)001:4719: skabs med de / nyi ma mkha' la 'gro ba'i
NK045(bi)001:4720: zer gyis zil gyis gnon par gyur pa'i mdun gyi
NK045(bi)001:4721: bar snang la ni mun pa gtan mi gansa pa
NK045(bi)001:4722: skabs med de / bzhin no // bzhi pa la phar phyin kun la bslab par 'gyur ba dang /
NK045(bi)001:4723: theg pa kun la bslab par 'gyur tshul gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:4724: dang po la rtsa bar gyur pa'i dpe dang /
NK045(bi)001:4725: snying por gyur pa'i dpe gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:4727: shes rab pha rol sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:4728: 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par byas pa rnams kyi ni /
NK045(bi)001:4729: sbyin sogs pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad rang
NK045(bi)001:4730: gi bslab pa'i gnas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
NK045(bi)001:4731: phyin pa 'dira ni 'dus par 'gyur te 'di'i khongs
NK045(bi)001:4732: su ma gtogs pa cung zad kyang med do //
NK045(bi)001:4733: de ci'i phyir zhe na lam shes rab kyi pha
NK045(bi)001:4734: rol tu phyin pa ni bden pa gnyis kyi tshul
NK045(bi)001:4735: la yang dag par mkhas pa yin la /
NK045(bi)001:4736: shes rab de'i sgo nas phar phyin gyi mi mthun
NK045(bi)001:4737: phyogs ser sna la sogs pa tshar gcod cing thabs
NK045(bi)001:4738: la mkhas pa'i sgo nas 'bras bu byang chub chen
NK045(bi)001:4740: der yang 'khor gsum du mi rtog pas lam thams
NK045(bi)001:4741: cad rnam kun mchog ldan gyi phar phyin gcig gi
NK045(bi)001:4743: de thams cad 'bras bu rnam kun mchog ldan gyi
NK045(bi)001:4744: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes rnam pa thams cad
NK045(bi)001:4745: mkhyen pa nyid du ro gcig par byed pa'i phyir
NK045(bi)001:4746: ro // des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
NK045(bi)001:4747: phyin pa 'di yod na pha rol tu phyin pa
NK045(bi)001:4748: thams cad kyi bslab pa ma tshang ba med pa
NK045(bi)001:4749: yod par 'gyur te rtsa ba 'di la brten nas
NK045(bi)001:4751: dper na rtag smra bzhi la sogs pa sngon gyi
NK045(bi)001:4752: mtha' la brten pa'i lta ba bco brgyad dang 'du
NK045(bi)001:4753: shes yod med du smra ba dang chad smra sogs
NK045(bi)001:4754: phyi ma'i mtha' la brten pa'i lta ba bzhi bcu
NK045(bi)001:4755: rtsa bzhi ste / lta ba drug cu rtsa gnyis su tshangs pa d+r+wa ba'i mdo las gsungs pa /
NK045(bi)001:4756: de thams cad kyang khyad gzhi bdag yod par bzung
NK045(bi)001:4757: nas de'i khyad par gyi chos sna tshogs su dpyod
NK045(bi)001:4759: bdag tu 'dzin pa'am 'jig tshogs kyi lta bar ni
NK045(bi)001:4760: lta ba drug cu rtsa gnyis po de dag 'dus
NK045(bi)001:4761: pa yin te gzhi de la brten nas byung zhing
NK045(bi)001:4762: de'i khyad par 'byed pa tsam du gyur la de
NK045(bi)001:4763: med na gzhan thams cad kyang med pa'i phyir ro
NK045(bi)001:4764: // de ltar shes nas dpe de bzhin du pha
NK045(bi)001:4765: rol tu phyin pa 'di dag thams cad kyang shes
NK045(bi)001:4766: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la 'dus
NK045(bi)001:4768: dper na srog gi sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:4769: dper na mig la sogs pa dbang po du ma
NK045(bi)001:4770: yod du zin kyang 'jig rten 'dir gnas pa'i srog
NK045(bi)001:4771: gi dbang po 'gagsa para gyur na tshe 'dir gtogs
NK045(bi)001:4772: pa'i dbang po gzhan gang dag ji snyed yod pa
NK045(bi)001:4773: thamsa cad 'gags par 'gyur ba de ltar du /
NK045(bi)001:4774: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa
NK045(bi)001:4775: gang zhig mkhas pa mchog byang chub sems dpa' rnams
NK045(bi)001:4776: kyi bslab pa pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan thams
NK045(bi)001:4777: cad sher phyin 'dir ni 'dus par gsungs te 'di
NK045(bi)001:4778: med na de thams cad kyang mi 'byung la 'di
NK045(bi)001:4779: yod pa las de kun 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
NK045(bi)001:4780: phar phyin du 'gyur ba dang de las sangs rgyas
NK045(bi)001:4781: thob kyi bdag med rtogs pa dang ma 'brel ba'i
NK045(bi)001:4782: sbyin sogs ji tsam spyad kyang 'khor ba las kyang
NK045(bi)001:4783: thar mi nus na byang chub chen po'i lam phar
NK045(bi)001:4784: phyin du 'gyur ba lta ga la ste gnas med
NK045(bi)001:4785: do // gnyis pa theg pa kun la bslab par 'gyur ba ni /
NK045(bi)001:4786: byang chub sems mkhas sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:4787: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu
NK045(bi)001:4788: phyin pa la mkhas pa ni theg pa gsum la
NK045(bi)001:4789: mkhas par 'gyur te khal gcig la bre gang 'dus
NK045(bi)001:4790: pa'i dpe ltar thabs dang shes rab kyi rnam pa
NK045(bi)001:4791: yongs su rdzogs pa'i lam mchog tu gyur pa shes
NK045(bi)001:4792: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di shes na
NK045(bi)001:4793: / thabs dang shes rab nyi tse ba nyan rang
NK045(bi)001:4794: gi lam ni de'i zhar la shes pa yin no
NK045(bi)001:4795: / // de'i phyir na shes rab kyi pha rol
NK045(bi)001:4796: tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum gyi lam
NK045(bi)001:4797: rgya cher bstan to zhes dang /
NK045(bi)001:4798: nyan thos kyi sa la bslab par 'dod pas kyang 'di la bslab par gsungs te /
NK045(bi)001:4799: rgyal po chen po'i mdzod na nor sna tshogs yod
NK045(bi)001:4800: pa'i phyir dman pa dag la mkho ba'i rdzas dag
NK045(bi)001:4801: kyang de na blang du yod pa bzhin du rang
NK045(bi)001:4802: don nyi tse ba'i lam la zhugs pa rnams kyi
NK045(bi)001:4803: lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa yang 'di yi zhar
NK045(bi)001:4804: la gting phyin pas shes rgyu yod pa'o //
NK045(bi)001:4805: de ltar yin mod kyi byang chub sems dpa' de
NK045(bi)001:4806: dag ni nyan thos kyi bslab par bya ba'i yon
NK045(bi)001:4808: de bzhin du rang rgyal rnams kyi bslab pa'i yon
NK045(bi)001:4809: tan kun la'ang ma rmongs pa slob par byed cing
NK045(bi)001:4810: de de'i rigs can rnams tshul de'i sgo nas rjes
NK045(bi)001:4812: byang sems de dag rang nyid dman lam de la
NK045(bi)001:4813: mi gansa shing de la 'dod pa yang mi skyod
NK045(bi)001:4814: mod de / tshul 'di ni bdag gis bslab par bya ba yin te /
NK045(bi)001:4815: gang gi phyir na gang zag gi bdag med par
NK045(bi)001:4816: rtogs pa sogs ni 'dir yang de bzhin du 'dod
NK045(bi)001:4817: la / thabs shes nyi tse bas lam dman par
NK045(bi)001:4818: gyur pa'i cha ni rang gis shes nas 'da' bar
NK045(bi)001:4819: la / bya ba dang / gzhan de'i rigs can
NK045(bi)001:4820: rjes su bzung ba'i phyir ston par 'os pa yin
NK045(bi)001:4821: no snyam du de'i phyir theg pa thams cad la
NK045(bi)001:4823: lnga pa la dngos dang de'i rgyu mtshan gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:4824: dang po mi ldog byang chub sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:4825: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
NK045(bi)001:4826: la brtson pa ni yon tan tshad med pa yin
NK045(bi)001:4827: te brtson pa po'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya
NK045(bi)001:4829: brtson pa de la gzhan rjes su yi rang ba la yang bsod nams chen po thob ste /
NK045(bi)001:4831: phyir mi ldoga par byang chub mchog la bsam pa
NK045(bi)001:4832: drag po dang sbyor ba shes rab kyi phar phyin
NK045(bi)001:4833: nyams su len pa'i sgo nas rab tu zhugs pa
NK045(bi)001:4834: yi gang zag byang chub sems dpa' de'i de ltar
NK045(bi)001:4835: sems bskyed pa la gzhan zhig gis bsam pa thag
NK045(bi)001:4836: pas de'i rjes su yi rang ba byas na /
NK045(bi)001:4837: stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'di na yod pa'i
NK045(bi)001:4838: ri rab rnams srang la gzhal bas tshad gzung du
NK045(bi)001:4839: rung gi rjesa su yi rang ba'i dge ba de
NK045(bi)001:4840: ni de lta bur tshad gzung du yod pa min
NK045(bi)001:4842: dge ba don gnyer sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:4843: de ltar phan yon che ba ci'i phyir zhe na /
NK045(bi)001:4844: dngos su byang chub sems dpa' de gcig pu'i dge
NK045(bi)001:4845: ba la yi rang ba des 'jig rten na rang
NK045(bi)001:4846: gi dge ba don du gnyer ba rnams dang gzhan
NK045(bi)001:4847: la phan par 'dod pa'i sems can ji snyed yod
NK045(bi)001:4848: pa de kun gyi bsod namsa phung po la yang
NK045(bi)001:4849: brgyud nas rjes su yi rang bar gyur pa yin
NK045(bi)001:4850: te / de ci yi phyir na byang chub sems
NK045(bi)001:4851: dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni sems can thams cad
NK045(bi)001:4852: kyi don du gyur pa yin pas na mi ldog
NK045(bi)001:4853: pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag lam des rnam
NK045(bi)001:4854: 'dren rgyal ba'i yon tan thob par gyur nas sdug
NK045(bi)001:4855: bsngal rnam pa mang po gtan du zad para bya
NK045(bi)001:4856: ba'i phyir 'jig rten thams cad du chos kyi sbyin
NK045(bi)001:4857: pa sbyin par byed cing des dge ba don du
NK045(bi)001:4858: gnyer ba dang gzhan phan 'dod pa rnams kyi bsam
NK045(bi)001:4859: pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pas na /
NK045(bi)001:4860: dper na sman gyi ljon shing chen po gces par
NK045(bi)001:4861: bskyang na dngos su ljon pa bskyed pa yin kyang
NK045(bi)001:4862: brgyud nas 'gro ba mang po bskyang ba'i don du
NK045(bi)001:4863: gyur pa dang tshul 'dra ba yin no //
NK045(bi)001:4864: rnam grangs bzhi pa gang zag gi che ba la /
NK045(bi)001:4865: mi rtog pa'i spyod pa thob pa /
NK045(bi)001:4866: mi rtog kyang bya ba byed pa mi 'gal ba'i dpe /
NK045(bi)001:4867: de ltar rtogs pa thob pa'i yon tan dang gsum /
NK045(bi)001:4868: dang po la don dang dpe gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:4870: byang chub sems dpa' sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:4871: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig rnam par mi rtog
NK045(bi)001:4872: pa la gnas nas kun byang gis bsdus pa'i chos
NK045(bi)001:4873: rnams kun kyang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
NK045(bi)001:4874: med pa dang spros pa med pa'am smon pa med
NK045(bi)001:4875: par yongs su shes pa de ni /
NK045(bi)001:4878: nye ba dang ring ba la sogs pa'i tshul du
NK045(bi)001:4879: rtog pa'i shes rab mtha' gnyis su 'dzin pa nyid
NK045(bi)001:4880: kyis byang chub tshol bar mi byed de /
NK045(bi)001:4881: gnyis su 'dzin pa'i rtog pa dang bral ba'i rnal
NK045(bi)001:4882: 'byor pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
NK045(bi)001:4883: phyin pa mchog la brtson pa yin no //
NK045(bi)001:4885: nam mkha'i khams de sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:4886: de ltar byang chub la nye ring du 'dzin pa
NK045(bi)001:4887: sogs rtog pa thams cad bral ba de'i tshul ni
NK045(bi)001:4888: dper na nam mkha'i khams de yi rang gi ngo
NK045(bi)001:4889: bo dang ni nam mkha' der 'agla ba nam mkha'
NK045(bi)001:4890: dang lhan cig gnas su mi rung ba gnyis ka
NK045(bi)001:4892: nam mkha' la rang gi ngo bo ye nas med
NK045(bi)001:4893: pas chos gang gis kyang ni de ma thob pa'i
NK045(bi)001:4894: phyir ro // gang gi bdag nyid thob pa med
NK045(bi)001:4895: pa de ni chos gang dang yang mi nye la
NK045(bi)001:4896: gang dang yang 'gal te ring ba med do //
NK045(bi)001:4897: dpe de bzhin du chos thams cad byang chub kyi
NK045(bi)001:4898: rang bzhin la byang chub ni nam mkha'i tshul du
NK045(bi)001:4899: don dam par sus kyang gsar du thob par mi
NK045(bi)001:4900: 'gyur la / su dang yang ring ba med par
NK045(bi)001:4901: ye nas mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa'i shes rab
NK045(bi)001:4902: zab mo la spyod par mkhas pa'i byang chub sems
NK045(bi)001:4903: 'gyur la / dpa' yang / nam mkha' lta bu
NK045(bi)001:4904: yin te rnam par rtog pa thams cad nye bar
NK045(bi)001:4905: zhi ba la spyod pa'i che ba dang ldan no
NK045(bi)001:4906: 'gyur la / dpa' yang / // gnyis pa la
NK045(bi)001:4907: sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i dpes yul sems can du mi
NK045(bi)001:4908: 'gyur la / dpa' yang / // rtog pa / sprul pa'i dpes byed pa por mi rtog pa /
NK045(bi)001:4909: shing mkhan gyi bzo'i dpes 'bras bu la mi rtog pa gsum /
NK045(bi)001:4910: dang po skye bo'i dbus na sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:4911: de ltar mi rtog pa'i spyod yul thob pa des
NK045(bi)001:4912: sems can gyi don mdzad pa sogs ci lta bu
NK045(bi)001:4913: yin zhe na dpe'i sgo nas bshad pa /
NK045(bi)001:4914: dper na ltad mor 'dus pa'i skye bo mang po'i
NK045(bi)001:4915: dbus na sgyu ma'i skyes bu ste sgyu ma'i sngags
NK045(bi)001:4916: sogs kyi mthus snang ba'i skyes bu de 'di snyam
NK045(bi)001:4917: du / bdag gi lha la sogs pa'i gzugs su
NK045(bi)001:4918: snang ba 'dis skye bo mang po'i tshogs 'di mgu
NK045(bi)001:4919: bar bya'o snyam du mi sems mod kyi /
NK045(bi)001:4920: ltad mo ba rnams mig mgu ba'i bya ba de
NK045(bi)001:4921: yang byed de 'di ltar g.yo 'gul la sogs pa'i
NK045(bi)001:4922: rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs pa rab tu ston par byed
NK045(bi)001:4923: pa skye bo'i tshogs des mthong na yang /
NK045(bi)001:4924: sgyu ma'i skyes bu de la lus su grub pa med la sems kyang med de /
NK045(bi)001:4925: de ltar gdags gzhis stong pa la ming yang grub pa yod pa ma yin no //
NK045(bi)001:4926: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
NK045(bi)001:4927: pa dmigs pa med pa'i don la spyod pa byang
NK045(bi)001:4928: chub sems dpa' rtog pa med pa dag ni /
NK045(bi)001:4929: nam yang 'di snyam du bdag gis byang chub chen
NK045(bi)001:4930: po rtogsa par byas nas 'gro ba rnams yongs su
NK045(bi)001:4931: dgrol lo zhes mi sems mod kyi /
NK045(bi)001:4932: 'jig rten gyi khams su skye ba sna tshogs par
NK045(bi)001:4933: ston pa dang ni gdul bya 'dul ba'i bya ba
NK045(bi)001:4934: mang po dang ldan pa dag /
NK045(bi)001:4935: dper na med bzhin snang ba sgyu ma lta bur
NK045(bi)001:4936: ston kyang de dang der rnam para mi rtog pa'i
NK045(bi)001:4937: tshul gyis spyod pa yin no //
NK045(bi)001:4939: dper na sangs rgyas sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:4940: dper na de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i blo gros
NK045(bi)001:4941: kyi mdzad pa bzhin du sangs rgyas rnams kyis sangs
NK045(bi)001:4942: rgyas su sprul pa mdzad pa de dag gis chos
NK045(bi)001:4943: ston pa sogs sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad
NK045(bi)001:4944: byed mod kyi / sprul pa des rang gi sangs
NK045(bi)001:4945: rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa de la bdag ni
NK045(bi)001:4946: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa'o snyam dregs pa
NK045(bi)001:4947: cung zad kyang skye bar mi 'gyur te sprul pa'i
NK045(bi)001:4948: snang ba tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)001:4949: de bzhin du chos thams cad rang bzhin dben la
NK045(bi)001:4950: snang ba sgyu ma ltar rtogs pa'i shes rab la
NK045(bi)001:4951: spyod pa goms shing gding du gyur pa'i mkhas pa
NK045(bi)001:4952: mi rtogs pa'i spyod yul thob pa'i byang chub sems
NK045(bi)001:4953: dpa' yang sprul pa dang sgyu ma bzhin du chos
NK045(bi)001:4954: ston pa la sogs pa'i bya ba thams cada ston
NK045(bi)001:4955: kyang kun tu rtog pa mi 'byung ngo //
NK045(bi)001:4956: gsum pa shing mkhan bzo bo sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:4957: shing mkhan bzo bo yi bya ba la mkhas pas
NK045(bi)001:4958: skyes pa'am bud med dang 'dra ba'i bzo byas pa
NK045(bi)001:4959: na bzo byas pa'i skyes pa dang bud med de
NK045(bi)001:4960: yang 'gro ba la sogs pa'i bya ba thams cad
NK045(bi)001:4961: byed la bdag gis 'di byas so zhes byas pa'i
NK045(bi)001:4962: 'bras bu la mi rtog ste de la sems med
NK045(bi)001:4963: pa'i phyir ro // dpe de bzhin du rnam par
NK045(bi)001:4964: mi rtog pa'i shes rab la spyod par mkhas pa'i
NK045(bi)001:4965: byang chub sems dpa' de yang ci la'ang mi rtog
NK045(bi)001:4966: pa'i phyir ro // kyang / rnam par mi rtog
NK045(bi)001:4967: pa'i ye shes la gnas bzhin rdzogs smin sbyang ba'i
NK045(bi)001:4968: bya ba thams cad byed de /
NK045(bi)001:4969: 'di ltar chos thams cad ye nas rang gi ngo
NK045(bi)001:4970: bos dben bzhin snang ba sgyu ma lta bu yin
NK045(bi)001:4971: la / de ltar goms pa'i blo gsal ba rab
NK045(bi)001:4972: kyi mthar thug pa na chos thams cad de'i ngang
NK045(bi)001:4973: tshul can du snang ba kho nar 'gyur ba'i phyir
NK045(bi)001:4974: sgyu ma'i skyes bu ltar rnam par mi rtog pa
NK045(bi)001:4975: la / 'byung la / mi rtog ye shes de'i
NK045(bi)001:4976: mthus lhun gyis grub pa'i mdzad pa sna tshogs ston
NK045(bi)001:4977: pa ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bur rig
NK045(bi)001:4978: la / 'byung la / par bya ste / mi
NK045(bi)001:4979: rtog ye shes de yang slob lam gyi gnas skabs
NK045(bi)001:4980: su rjes mthun pa dang sangs rgyas kyi sa na
NK045(bi)001:4981: yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar du shes par bya'o //
NK045(bi)001:4982: gsum pa la lha rnams kyis 'dud pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:4983: bdud pham par byed pa'i yon tan gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:4985: de ltar spyod mkhas sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:4986: de ltar mi rtog pa'i spyad pa spyod par mkhas
NK045(bi)001:4987: pa rnams la tshangs dang dbang po sogs 'jig rten
NK045(bi)001:4988: pa'i lha yi tshogs mang po dag gi thal mo
NK045(bi)001:4989: sbyar ba dang bcas te lus kyis btud nas gus
NK045(bi)001:4990: pa chen pos phyag kyang 'tshal bar byed cing /
NK045(bi)001:4991: lha yi yang lhar gyur pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
NK045(bi)001:4992: khams kyi sangs rgyas ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag
NK045(bi)001:4993: gi'ang / byang chub sems dpa' mi rtog pa'i spyod
NK045(bi)001:4994: yul thob pa de'i yon tan basngagasa pa'i phung po
NK045(bi)001:4995: brgyud ma'i phreng ba yongs su brjod para mdzad de
NK045(bi)001:4996: gi'ang / / dper na da ltar 'jam dpal dang
NK045(bi)001:4997: kun tu bzang po'i basngagasa pa sangs rgyas rnams kyis
NK045(bi)001:4998: brjod par mdzad pa bzhin no //
NK045(bi)001:5002: gang g+aa'i klung mnyam sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5003: gang g+aa'i klung chen po'i rdul gyi grangs dang ma
NK045(bi)001:5004: nyam pa'i zhing na sems can ji snyed cig yod
NK045(bi)001:5005: pa de thams cad kun yongs su brtag pa bzung
NK045(bi)001:5006: ste dper na / gal te bdud du gyur la /
NK045(bi)001:5007: bdud de re re'i ba spu nyag ma re re
NK045(bi)001:5008: las kyang bdud de snyed sprul bar byas nas rnam
NK045(bi)001:5009: par mi rtog pa'i ye shes thob pa'i byang chub
NK045(bi)001:5010: sems dpa' de la glags bcol bar byas kyang /
NK045(bi)001:5011: de dag kun gyis mkhas pa de la ba spu'i
NK045(bi)001:5012: khung bu bskyod pa tsam gyi bar chad kyang bya
NK045(bi)001:5013: mi nus so // gnyis pa rgyu rnam bzhi yis sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5014: de ltar bar chad bya mi nus pa ci yi phyir zhe na /
NK045(bi)001:5015: rgyu rnam pa bzhi yis byang chub sems dpa' thabs
NK045(bi)001:5016: la mkhas shing chos nyid rtogs pa'i stobs dang ldan
NK045(bi)001:5017: pa de ni lha'i bu'i bdud la sogs pa bdud
NK045(bi)001:5018: bzhis thub par dka' zhing lam las bskyod par mi
NK045(bi)001:5019: nus pa ste / rgyu bzhi po gang zhe na /
NK045(bi)001:5020: stonga pa nyid kyi don la blo gnas pa'i shes rab dang /
NK045(bi)001:5021: sems can yongs su mi gtong ba'i snying rje dang /
NK045(bi)001:5022: bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi don du bla
NK045(bi)001:5023: na med pa'i byang chub bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa
NK045(bi)001:5024: lta bu sngon rang gis yi dam du bcas nas
NK045(bi)001:5025: khas blangs pa'i tshig gyi skad smras pa de bzhin
NK045(bi)001:5026: du phyir mi ldog par sgrub par byed pa'i dam
NK045(bi)001:5028: tshogs gnyis yongs su bsags pas sangs rgyas rnams mnyes
NK045(bi)001:5029: shing chos nyid kyis de dag gi rgyud la bde
NK045(bi)001:5030: bar gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs zhugs pa
NK045(bi)001:5031: can te de ltar rgyu bzhi'i sgo nas 'dis bdud
NK045(bi)001:5032: thams cad pham par byed nus so //
NK045(bi)001:5033: rtsa ba'i sa bcad lnga pa spyad bya chos kyi che ba la /
NK045(bi)001:5034: 'bras bu bgrod gcig lam du tshud pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:5035: lam gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:5036: shes bya bslab pa thams cad kyi mchog yin pa'i che ba bstan pa gsum /
NK045(bi)001:5038: de bzhin gshegs yum sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5039: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum shes rab
NK045(bi)001:5040: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad par byed
NK045(bi)001:5041: pa'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig tshul
NK045(bi)001:5042: 'di la snying nas mos pa byed cing /
NK045(bi)001:5043: bsam pa thag pas 'di nyid nyams su len pa'am bsgrub pa la mngon par brtson par byed na /
NK045(bi)001:5044: sgo gsum zhi zhing dul ba'i des pa ste byang
NK045(bi)001:5045: chub sems dpa' de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
NK045(bi)001:5046: kyi tshul la zhugs pa nyid du rig par bya
NK045(bi)001:5047: ste / 'di ni 'bras bu thams cad mkhyen pa'i
NK045(bi)001:5048: ye shes la bgrod pa'i lam gcig pu ste gnyis
NK045(bi)001:5049: su med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)001:5051: byang sems kyi gnas pa sher phyin ngos bzung ba /
NK045(bi)001:5052: de nyid gnas pa gzhan kun gyi mchog tu bstan pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:5054: chos dbyings de bzhin sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:5055: byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa gang zhe na shes
NK045(bi)001:5056: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'o
NK045(bi)001:5057: // de ci lta bu zhe na /
NK045(bi)001:5058: 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings las ma gtogs pa'i chos
NK045(bi)001:5059: cung zad kyang dmigs su med pas chos thams cad
NK045(bi)001:5060: ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin tsam du gyur
NK045(bi)001:5061: pa'o // de ltar shes nas chos kyi dbyings la
NK045(bi)001:5062: blo gnas pa zhes pa'i tha snyad de yang ci
NK045(bi)001:5063: la'ang mi gnas pa'i don te /
NK045(bi)001:5064: dmigs pa thams cad bral ba'i de kho na nyid
NK045(bi)001:5065: la chos kyi dbyings zhes gdags pa las de la
NK045(bi)001:5066: dmigs par bya ba'i gzhi med pas na chos dbyings
NK045(bi)001:5067: dngos po'i de kho na nyid dam de bzhin nyid
NK045(bi)001:5068: la yang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi 'gyur
NK045(bi)001:5069: zhing de ni ci la'ang mi gnas pas na mi
NK045(bi)001:5070: gnas pa'i gnas pa zhes tha snyad byas pa'o //
NK045(bi)001:5071: de ltar dmigs pa'i spyod yul thams cad kyis dben
NK045(bi)001:5072: pa mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i ye shes de
NK045(bi)001:5073: ni dper na bar snang gi sprin ci la'ang mi
NK045(bi)001:5074: rten pa bzhin du chos gang la yang gnas pa
NK045(bi)001:5076: ci la'ang mi gnas kyang mi gnas pa'i gnas pa
NK045(bi)001:5077: zab mo de'i mthus rdzogs smin sbyangs pa rgya mtsho'i
NK045(bi)001:5078: rnam thar la mnga' dbang 'byor pa ni /
NK045(bi)001:5079: ji ltar rig sngags 'chang ba gang zhig rang nyid
NK045(bi)001:5080: gnas par bya ba'i ched du byas pa'i khyim la
NK045(bi)001:5081: sogs pa med par nam mkha' la rgyu ba de
NK045(bi)001:5082: dag / gnas 'dod pa na rig sngags kyi mthus
NK045(bi)001:5083: skad cig nyid la nam mkha'i khams der dus su
NK045(bi)001:5084: bab nas sa las skye ba la sogs pa min
NK045(bi)001:5085: na yang me tog yid du 'ong ba dang 'bras
NK045(bi)001:5086: bu'i shing la sogs pa dang ldan zhing bkod pas
NK045(bi)001:5087: mdzes pa'i skyed mos tshal la sogs pa ji ltar
NK045(bi)001:5088: 'dod par byin gyis rlob cing snang bar byed do
NK045(bi)001:5089: dag / // de ltar mi gnas par gnas pa'i
NK045(bi)001:5090: sher phyin zab mo bla na med pa'i rig sngags
NK045(bi)001:5091: su gyur pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis rdzogs smin sbyang
NK045(bi)001:5092: ba'i tshul ji ltar 'dod pa la spyod pa can
NK045(bi)001:5093: gyi byang chub sems dpa' mkhas shing gzhan gyi rgyud
NK045(bi)001:5094: gsal ba de ni rdzogs smin sbyang ba bsam gyis
NK045(bi)001:5096: rang don du rtogs par byed pa lam gyi chos
NK045(bi)001:5097: dang thob par bya ba sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
NK045(bi)001:5099: gzhan don du 'chad par byed pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:5100: chos 'dod mkhan te chos bshad pa'i yul nyid du
NK045(bi)001:5101: lta bar byed pa mi dmigs te thams cad dmigs
NK045(bi)001:5102: su med pa'i rang bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)001:5103: tshul 'di lta bu ni tha snyad tsam du gzhan
NK045(bi)001:5104: sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar 'dod cing
NK045(bi)001:5105: / rang nyid theg pa chen po'i lam dang 'bras
NK045(bi)001:5106: bu'i yon tan la dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
NK045(bi)001:5107: rnams kyi gnas pa yin no //
NK045(bi)001:5109: dgra bcom rnam thar sogs tshigs bcad gsum ste /
NK045(bi)001:5110: sgrib pa gnyis kyi dgra bcom pa'i rnam par thar
NK045(bi)001:5111: pa'i ting nge 'dzin phul du byung ba la gnas
NK045(bi)001:5112: pa de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi gnas pa ma
NK045(bi)001:5113: gtogs par / byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa 'di
NK045(bi)001:5114: ni gzhan nyan thos dang rang rgyal bcas pa yi
NK045(bi)001:5115: gnas pa nyon mongs pa mtha' dag zhi ba'i ting
NK045(bi)001:5116: nge 'dzin rab tu zhi ba zag med kyi bde
NK045(bi)001:5117: ba dang ldan pa ji snyed cig yod pa kun
NK045(bi)001:5118: gyi mchog tu gyur pa yin pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:5119: gzhan de dag 'di'i gong na med pa yin pas bla na med pa'i gnas pa 'di yin no //
NK045(bi)001:5120: de ltar spros pa ma lus pa zhi ba'i ting
NK045(bi)001:5121: nge 'dzin gyi gnas pa la gnas kyang zhi ba
NK045(bi)001:5123: dper na 'dab chagsa rnams rten med pa'i nam mkha'
NK045(bi)001:5124: la gnas kyang sa la ltung bar 'gyur ba ma
NK045(bi)001:5125: yin la / nya ni chu la gnas kyang rna
NK045(bi)001:5126: ba dang sna sogs 'tshubs te 'chi ba med pa
NK045(bi)001:5127: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas par gnas
NK045(bi)001:5128: pa'i bsam gtan gyi stobs dag gis 'khor ba'i pha
NK045(bi)001:5129: rol zhi ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la
NK045(bi)001:5130: son pa ste rtogs par gyur pa la yang stong
NK045(bi)001:5131: pa la gnas kyang rten med pas na gzhan srid
NK045(bi)001:5132: zhi'i mthar mi lhung ba bya dang 'dra zhing /
NK045(bi)001:5133: stong pa nyid la'ang ma zhen pa'i phyir nya rang
NK045(bi)001:5134: nyid kyi gnas chus mi 'tshubs pa bzhin du zhi
NK045(bi)001:5135: ba phyogs gcig pa'i mya ngan las 'da' bar mi
NK045(bi)001:5136: 'gyur ro // des na sems can gyi khams kun
NK045(bi)001:5137: gyi yon tan ji yod pa thams cad kyi mchog
NK045(bi)001:5138: tu 'gro ba nyid du 'dod pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:5139: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mchog tu ngo mtshar rmad
NK045(bi)001:5140: du byung ba chos thams cad kyi nang na mchog
NK045(bi)001:5141: tu gyur pa la reg par 'dod pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:5142: sems can rnams la chos kyi sbyin pa rab dang
NK045(bi)001:5143: mchog dang dam par gyur pa sbyin par 'dod pa
NK045(bi)001:5145: sems can rnams la phan pa mdzad pa rgyal ba
NK045(bi)001:5146: sras dang bcas pa rnams kyi gnas pa mchog 'di
NK045(bi)001:5147: la bsten par gyis shig ces so //
NK045(bi)001:5148: 'di la sems can kun gyi yon tan gyi mchog
NK045(bi)001:5149: tu gyur pa 'jig rten thams cad las 'das pa'i
NK045(bi)001:5150: chos sku'i gnas su 'gro ba dang /
NK045(bi)001:5151: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rmad du byung ba dang ldan pa longs sku dang /
NK045(bi)001:5152: chos kyi sbyin pa 'jig rten la sbyin pa sprul pa'i sku zhes sbyar ba dang /
NK045(bi)001:5153: chos kyi sbyin pa rab ste bsod nams cha mthun gyi lam dang /
NK045(bi)001:5154: mchog thar pa cha mthun gyi lam dang /
NK045(bi)001:5155: dam pa theg pa mchog gi chos sogs la sbyar bar mdzad pa'ang snang mod /
NK045(bi)001:5156: so sor ma sbyar bar yon tan gyi che ba'i rnam grangs su byas kyang rung ngo //
NK045(bi)001:5157: gsum pa bslab pa thams cad kyi mchog tu bstan pa la /
NK045(bi)001:5158: ngo bo'i sgo nas mchog tu bstan pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:5159: 'bras bu mi zad par 'byin pa'i sgo nas mchog tu bstan pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:5161: bslab pa 'di ni sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5162: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bslab pa
NK045(bi)001:5163: 'di ni 'dren pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos
NK045(bi)001:5164: kyi sgo mo sna tshogs pa'i sgo nas bslab pa
NK045(bi)001:5165: tshad med pa yongs su brjod pa'i bslab pa gang
NK045(bi)001:5166: ji snyed cig gsungs pa de dag kun gyi mchog
NK045(bi)001:5168: 'di las lhag par gyur pa'i bslab pa gang cung
NK045(bi)001:5169: zad kyang med pa'i phyir gong na med pa yin
NK045(bi)001:5170: te / mkhas pa gang zhig bslab pa kun gyi
NK045(bi)001:5171: pha rol te mthar phyin par 'gro bar 'dod pas
NK045(bi)001:5172: sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa shes rab kyi pha rol
NK045(bi)001:5173: tu phyin pa 'dir slob par bya'o //
NK045(bi)001:5179: 'di ni chos gter sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5180: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
NK045(bi)001:5181: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad bya'i chos
NK045(bi)001:5182: mi zad pa thams cad kun gyi 'byung gnas yin
NK045(bi)001:5183: pas chos kyi gter chen po mchog tu gyur pa
NK045(bi)001:5184: yin pa dang 'bras bu stobs sogs kyi yon tan
NK045(bi)001:5185: rin po che 'byung zhing lam phar phyin dang gzungs
NK045(bi)001:5186: dang byang phyogs sogs kyi yon tan gyi nor sna
NK045(bi)001:5187: tshogs pa kun kyang 'byung bas rgya che ba'i chos
NK045(bi)001:5188: kyi mdzod kyi dam pa rmad du byung ba yina
NK045(bi)001:5189: la sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ba'i rigs su gyur
NK045(bi)001:5190: pa yin te 'di las 'khrungs pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)001:5191: 'gro ba'i lus dang sems bde ba dang skyid pa thams cad gnas pa'i mdzod yin te /
NK045(bi)001:5192: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
NK045(bi)001:5193: 'di nyid rtogs pa las zab pa dang rgya che
NK045(bi)001:5195: 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba'i bar gyi
NK045(bi)001:5196: legs la ma ji snyed pa 'byung ba yin te
NK045(bi)001:5197: gzhi sher phyin la dmigs pa'i sgo nas dang /
NK045(bi)001:5198: lam sher phyin nyams su blang ba'i sgo nas dang
NK045(bi)001:5199: 'bras bu sher phyin thob pa las 'jig rten dang
NK045(bi)001:5200: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i legs pa ji snyed pa
NK045(bi)001:5201: 'byung ba yin par rig par bya ste de med
NK045(bi)001:5202: na de kun ldog la yod na yod pa'i rjes
NK045(bi)001:5204: 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar bzhugs
NK045(bi)001:5205: pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi mgon po sangs rgyas
NK045(bi)001:5206: rnams ji snyed pa de dag thams cad shes rab
NK045(bi)001:5207: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyams su blang
NK045(bi)001:5209: 'di'i ngo bor gyur pa chos kyi dbyings ni nam
NK045(bi)001:5210: yang zad mi shes te bri gang dang bral bar
NK045(bi)001:5211: gnas so // de yang gzhi sher phyin med na
NK045(bi)001:5212: de tshul bzhin rtogs nas nyams su len pa med
NK045(bi)001:5213: gnas so // la / lam med na 'bras bu
NK045(bi)001:5214: yang med mod kyi gzhi chos kyi dbyings gnyis su
NK045(bi)001:5215: med pa'i don rigs sam chos nyid du gnas pa
NK045(bi)001:5216: de de bzhin du rtogs shing ston pa'i shes rab
NK045(bi)001:5217: kyang rgyu yin pa'i tshul shes par bya'o //
NK045(bi)001:5218: gnyis pa phyi yi rten 'brel gyi sgo nas bshad pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:5219: nang gi rten 'brel gyi sgo nas bshad pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:5220: dang po la dpe phyi yi rten 'brel dang /
NK045(bi)001:5221: don sher phyin bshad pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:5223: shing dang 'bras bu sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5224: 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo las 'gyur
NK045(bi)001:5225: ba med kyang chos can rten 'brel gyi rol pa
NK045(bi)001:5226: mi 'gag pa ni phyi yi chos rnams kyang rten
NK045(bi)001:5228: shing dang 'bras bu dang me tog dang nags tshal
NK045(bi)001:5229: ji snyed pa de dag thams cad sa las yang
NK045(bi)001:5230: dag par 'byung zhing sa yi steng du 'thon pa
NK045(bi)001:5231: yin la / 'on kyang shing la sogs pa de
NK045(bi)001:5232: snyed yang nas yang du skyed par byas kyang sa
NK045(bi)001:5233: la ni sngar bas yongs su rgyun 'gags te zad
NK045(bi)001:5234: pa med cing 'phel ba med la 'bras bu rnams
NK045(bi)001:5235: 'byin pas dang po'i gnas skabs las 'gyur te yongs
NK045(bi)001:5236: su mi nyams la bdag gis 'bras bu 'di dag
NK045(bi)001:5237: skyed do snyam du rnam par mi rtog cing 'bras
NK045(bi)001:5238: bu rnams yang nas yang du bskyed kyang skyo ba
NK045(bi)001:5239: med de sems can rnams kyi las kyi rgyu las
NK045(bi)001:5240: de ltar sa chen po las ji srid 'jig rten
NK045(bi)001:5241: gnas kyi bar du rtsa shing la sogs pa skye
NK045(bi)001:5242: ba na byed po gzhan gyis dben pa rten cing
NK045(bi)001:5243: 'brel ba'i tshul te des mtshon nas phyi'i chos thams
NK045(bi)001:5244: cad kyang rang rang gi rgyu las skye zhing rnam
NK045(bi)001:5245: par rtog pa med par 'du byed pa shes par
NK045(bi)001:5246: yin la / bya'o // gnyis pa sangs rgyas sras dang sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5247: sangs rgyas kyi sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang
NK045(bi)001:5248: nyan thos rnams dang rang rgyal dang lha rnams dang
NK045(bi)001:5249: / de las gzhan pa'i 'gro ba mi la sogs
NK045(bi)001:5250: pa kun gyi bde ba dang skyid pa'i chos rnams
NK045(bi)001:5251: ji snyed pa de kun shes rab kyi pha rol
NK045(bi)001:5252: tu phyin pa mchog las byung ste sher phyin las
NK045(bi)001:5253: sangs rgyas 'byung la des chos bstan pa las mngon
NK045(bi)001:5254: mtho nges legs kyi yon tan kun 'byung gi gzhan
NK045(bi)001:5255: gyis bstan pa med par dge sdig gi rgyu 'bras
NK045(bi)001:5256: khong du chud pa'i 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i
NK045(bi)001:5257: lta ba'ang mi 'byung bar nges te rang stobs kho
NK045(bi)001:5258: nas shes mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)001:5259: 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba med na
NK045(bi)001:5260: 'jig rten pa'i bde ba kun kyang sgrub par mi
NK045(bi)001:5262: yang dag pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam dang 'bras bu ni lta ci smos pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)001:5263: rnam pa gcig tu na shes rab kyi pha rol
NK045(bi)001:5264: tu phyin pa ni shes rab bla na med pa'i
NK045(bi)001:5265: don te / de ni bden pa gnyis kyi rang
NK045(bi)001:5266: bzhin la phyin ci ma log par ji lta ba
NK045(bi)001:5268: des na bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la phyin ci
NK045(bi)001:5269: ma log pa'i blo thams cad kyang de'i khongs su
NK045(bi)001:5270: 'dus shing de'i cha shas su gtogs pa'i phyir mngon
NK045(bi)001:5271: mtho dang nges legs sgrub pa'i shes rab thams cad
NK045(bi)001:5272: kyang dngos sam brgyud nas de la brten pa'o //
NK045(bi)001:5273: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
NK045(bi)001:5274: las 'khor 'das kyi bde ba thams cad 'byung yang
NK045(bi)001:5275: shes rab de la ni nam yang zad pa dang
NK045(bi)001:5276: 'phel ba med de de bzhin du gnas so //
NK045(bi)001:5277: gnyis pa la dpe lugs 'byung 'khor ba'i rten 'brel dang /
NK045(bi)001:5278: don lugs ldog rnam byang gi rten 'brel gyi tshul gyis bstan pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:5280: sems can tha ma sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5281: 'jig rten 'di na lus dang longs spyod la ltos
NK045(bi)001:5282: nas sems can tha ma ngan song gsum dang 'bring
NK045(bi)001:5283: mi dang mchog tu gyur pa lha ste sems can
NK045(bi)001:5284: gyi ris ji snyed yod pa de kun rtsa ba
NK045(bi)001:5285: ma rig pa las byung bar bde bar gshegs pas
NK045(bi)001:5286: gsungsa ste / chos rnams thams cad rgyu las byung /
NK045(bi)001:5287: de rgyu de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs /
NK045(bi)001:5288: zhes pa bzhin du nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa'i
NK045(bi)001:5289: rnam par rtog pa gang zhig yang dag pa'i don
NK045(bi)001:5290: ma mthong zhing phyin ci log tu 'dzin pa'i sems
NK045(bi)001:5291: byung de lam rig pa zhes brjod la /
NK045(bi)001:5292: ma rig pa de las 'du byed la sogs pa rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis 'byung bas na /
NK045(bi)001:5293: zag bcas kyi las dang srid pa sogs nyon mongs
NK045(bi)001:5294: pa'i rkyen rnams tshogs nas sdug bsngal gyi 'khrula 'khor
NK045(bi)001:5295: te du mar 'gyur zhing yang nas yang du 'khor
NK045(bi)001:5296: ba'i rang bzhin can 'di rab tu 'byung la /
NK045(bi)001:5297: sems can gyi khams kyi ma rig pa'i 'khrul 'khor
NK045(bi)001:5298: de ni 'bras bu byung bas zad pa med la
NK045(bi)001:5299: 'phel ba'ang med de de bzhin du gnas so //
NK045(bi)001:5300: des na rang bzhin ma grub bzhin du snang ba
NK045(bi)001:5301: yin pas sgyu ma'i snang ba lta bu'i srid pa
NK045(bi)001:5302: la 'phel 'grib mi mngon pa ni chos kyi dbyings
NK045(bi)001:5303: kyis klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams spyi yi dbang
NK045(bi)001:5304: du byas te tha snyad kyi ngos nas gsungs pa'o
NK045(bi)001:5305: // gnyis pa ye shes tshul sgo sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5306: mi slob pa sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang de'i
NK045(bi)001:5307: tshul dang mthun pa bsgom pa'i lam dang de'i sgo
NK045(bi)001:5308: nyid du gyur pa mthong lam dang /
NK045(bi)001:5309: de skye ba'i thabs sbyor lam dang de'i rtsa ba
NK045(bi)001:5310: tshogs kyi lam ji snyed pa de kun shes rab
NK045(bi)001:5311: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog las byung ste
NK045(bi)001:5312: bdag med rtogs pa las de kun 'byung bas so
NK045(bi)001:5313: // shes rab rnam pa gsum dge ba'i bshes gnyen
NK045(bi)001:5314: des tshogs bsags pa la sogs pa'i rkyen rnams tshogs
NK045(bi)001:5315: nas rang lam gyi spang bya spong ba dang rtogs
NK045(bi)001:5316: pa'i yon tan skyed pa 'jig rten las 'das par
NK045(bi)001:5317: byed pa'i las kyi 'khrul 'khor ram ye shes kyi
NK045(bi)001:5318: 'khrul 'khor rab tu 'byung la de'i rtsa ba shes
NK045(bi)001:5319: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nam yang
NK045(bi)001:5320: rgyun chad pa'i zad pa med la /
NK045(bi)001:5321: snga ma'i gnas skabs las lhag par 'phel ba'ang med de de bzhin du gnas so //
NK045(bi)001:5322: de ltar yang nam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus pa'i mdo las rgyu la brten te byung ba yi //
NK045(bi)001:5323: chos rnams thams cad rab shes na //
NK045(bi)001:5324: de yi mdzod ni mi zad de //
NK045(bi)001:5325: chos kyi mdzod ni bsam mi khyab //
NK045(bi)001:5326: chos bzhi 'di dag mi zad par //
NK045(bi)001:5327: 'jig rten mgon pos rab gsungs te //
NK045(bi)001:5328: sems can nam mkha' byang chub sems //
NK045(bi)001:5329: de bzhin sangs rgyas chos rnams so //
NK045(bi)001:5330: ci ste de dag rdzas yin na //
NK045(bi)001:5331: de dag yongs su zad 'gyur gyi //
NK045(bi)001:5332: de dag med pas mi zad ces //
NK045(bi)001:5333: de bas de ni mi zad gsungs //
NK045(bi)001:5336: byang chub sems dpa' sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5337: de ltar 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad rten cing
NK045(bi)001:5338: 'brel bar 'byung ba tsam gyi snang ba yin par
NK045(bi)001:5339: shes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi gces pa
NK045(bi)001:5340: zab mo khong du chud pa ste de ltar rtogs
NK045(bi)001:5341: pa des chos kyi snang ba thob pa dang sangs
NK045(bi)001:5342: rgyas chos kyi sku mthong ba yin par gsungs pas
NK045(bi)001:5343: bden pa gnyis su phye ba'i kun rdzob kyi bden
NK045(bi)001:5344: pa ni rten 'brel bslu med kyi tshul du khong
NK045(bi)001:5346: byang chub semsa dpa' gang zhig rten cing 'brel bar
NK045(bi)001:5347: 'byung ba'i chos 'di la rigs pas legs par dpyad
NK045(bi)001:5348: na rten nas 'byung ba dpyad mi bzod pa tsam
NK045(bi)001:5349: las / don dam par rang gi ngo bos skye
NK045(bi)001:5350: ba med pa dang zad pa ste 'gags pa med
NK045(bi)001:5351: par ye nas chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid
NK045(bi)001:5352: du mnyam pa yi bden gnyis dbyer med pa'i shes
NK045(bi)001:5353: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don zab mo
NK045(bi)001:5354: 'di lta bu shes par byas te gomas na /
NK045(bi)001:5355: de'i byed las nyi ma sprin med cing 'od zer
NK045(bi)001:5356: 'phro bas mun pa ma lus pa bsal ba ltar
NK045(bi)001:5357: / glo bur ba'i sgrib pa ma rig pa'i thib
NK045(bi)001:5358: po ma lus pa bcom nas chos kyi dbyings dang
NK045(bi)001:5359: gnyis su med pa rang byung gi ye shes nyid
NK045(bi)001:5360: thob ste sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro //
NK045(bi)001:5362: gnyis pa phar phyin gzhan lnga bshad pa la /
NK045(bi)001:5363: bsam gtan brtson 'grus bzod pa tshul khrims sbyin pa lnga las /
NK045(bi)001:5364: dang po bsam gtan gyi phar phyin bshad pa la /
NK045(bi)001:5365: 'bras bu dam pa'i rten du gyur pa'i bsam gtan la bslab pa /
NK045(bi)001:5366: bslab kyang rang don du chags pa med pa /
NK045(bi)001:5367: chags pa med pa'i sgo nas gzhan don du 'jug pa /
NK045(bi)001:5368: bsam pa'i dbye bas mchog dman du gyur pa'i tshul gyis mjug bsdu ba bzhi /
NK045(bi)001:5369: dang po la bsam gtan bzhi la bslab pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:5370: gzugs med kyi snyoms 'jug bzhi la bslab pa'o //
NK045(bi)001:5372: mthu chen ldan pa sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5373: yon tan bsgrub pa'i mthu chen po dang ldan pa
NK045(bi)001:5374: byang chub sems dpa' de bsam gtan bzhis kyang gnas
NK045(bi)001:5376: de'i tshe de la mtshan 'dzin gyis rten para byed
NK045(bi)001:5377: pa ma yin zhing ro myong nas gnas par byed
NK045(bi)001:5378: pa'ang med mod / 'on kyang bsam gtan gyi dngos
NK045(bi)001:5379: gzhi so so'i yan lag rtog dpyod la sogs pa
NK045(bi)001:5380: dang bcas pa bzhi po 'di byang chub dam pa
NK045(bi)001:5381: mchog gi spang rtog thob pa yi rten du 'gyur
NK045(bi)001:5382: te mthong ba'i lam la sogs pa ni bsam gtan
NK045(bi)001:5383: gyi sems la brten pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)001:5384: gnyis pa shes rab mchog thob sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5385: shes rab mchog thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bsam
NK045(bi)001:5386: gtan dag la gnas pa ni gzugs med pa'i ting
NK045(bi)001:5387: nge 'dzin dam pa bzhi yang nyams su myong yang
NK045(bi)001:5388: de la zhen par mi byed kyi /
NK045(bi)001:5389: gzugs med kyi bsam gtan 'di dag sdig sdug med
NK045(bi)001:5390: pa dang mngon shes sogs kyi mthun rkyen du gyur
NK045(bi)001:5391: pa yin pas byanga chub dam pa mchog thob pa
NK045(bi)001:5392: la phan pa'i rkyen du gyur pa'i phyir slob pa
NK045(bi)001:5393: yin gyi / byang chub sems dpa' de nyan thos
NK045(bi)001:5394: ltar rang gi rgyud kyi zag pa zad nas zhi
NK045(bi)001:5395: ba phyogs gcig pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byed pa'i
NK045(bi)001:5396: phyir ni de la slob pa mina no //
NK045(bi)001:5397: gnyis pa la mdor bstan rgyas bshad gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:5399: 'di ni yon tan sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5400: tshul 'di ni yon tan mtha' dag sog par byed
NK045(bi)001:5401: pa'i byang sems rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung
NK045(bi)001:5402: ba ste / gang zhe na bsam gtan gyi ting
NK045(bi)001:5403: nge 'dzin la gnas nas shes rab kyis de la
NK045(bi)001:5404: mtshan ma med par rtogs so //
NK045(bi)001:5405: bsam gtan de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
NK045(bi)001:5406: rnams gal te las ni zhig par gyur te tshe
NK045(bi)001:5407: barjesa na / sems can smin pa sogs kyi don
NK045(bi)001:5408: du rang gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du
NK045(bi)001:5409: 'dod pa'i khams su yongs su skye ba len pa'o
NK045(bi)001:5410: barjesa na / // gnyis pa la dpe don gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:5412: dper na 'dzam gling sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5413: de ltar rgyu snyoms 'jug gi bsam gtan thob bzhin
NK045(bi)001:5414: du 'bras bu bsam gtan gyi lhar mi skye bar
NK045(bi)001:5415: mar 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba de ci zhig
NK045(bi)001:5416: gis yin zhe na bsam gtan la ma chags shing
NK045(bi)001:5417: rang gi yon tan gyi chos rdzogs pa'i don du
NK045(bi)001:5418: yin te / dper na 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi
NK045(bi)001:5419: zhig sngon chad lha yi yul gyi char gnas pa
NK045(bi)001:5420: lha yi grong khyer lta na sdug pa la sogs
NK045(bi)001:5421: pa mchog tu gyur pa der ma phyin la /
NK045(bi)001:5422: phyis zhig na der song ste de na lha rnams
NK045(bi)001:5423: kyis yongs su bzung ba'i khang bzang dang skyed mos
NK045(bi)001:5424: tshal la sogs pa'i yul yid du 'ong ba de
NK045(bi)001:5425: rnams mthong nas de la ma chags par phyir 'dzam
NK045(bi)001:5426: gling 'dir 'ong bar gyur na mi de lha yi
NK045(bi)001:5427: yul gyi bkod pa mthong yang ma chags pas der
NK045(bi)001:5428: mi sdod pa de 'dzam gling 'di'i yul la sogs
NK045(bi)001:5429: pa la chags par mi byed pa ltar du yin
NK045(bi)001:5431: de bzhin byang chub sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5432: dpe de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan
NK045(bi)001:5433: mchog shes rab snying rje la sogs pa 'chang ba
NK045(bi)001:5434: / ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor la brtson te
NK045(bi)001:5435: bsam gtan bzhi sogs kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas
NK045(bi)001:5436: nas de la zhen par mi byed par phyir yang
NK045(bi)001:5437: 'dod pa'i khams su gnas te sngar gyi bsam gtan
NK045(bi)001:5438: dang 'dod khams kyi chos la'ang chags pa med do
NK045(bi)001:5439: / // 'dod par skyes kyang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags sogs kyis mi gos te /
NK045(bi)001:5440: dper na chu yis pad+ma la mi gos pa bzhin
