NK045(bi)001:5441: du byis pa'i chos la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro
NK045(bi)001:5446: bdag nyid chen po sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5447: byang sems de bsam gzugs thob kyang der skye bar
NK045(bi)001:5448: mi byed par slar 'dod khams su skye ba'i dgos
NK045(bi)001:5449: pa ni / bdag nyid chen po des chos bstan
NK045(bi)001:5450: pa sogs kyi sgo nas sems can yongsa su smin
NK045(bi)001:5452: sangs rgyas kyi zhing sbyong ba dang pha rol tu
NK045(bi)001:5453: phyin pa rnams rdzogs pa'i don byed pa kho nar
NK045(bi)001:5454: zada de rgyu gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //
NK045(bi)001:5455: 'o na de gsum gzugs med pa'i khams sogs su 'di bsgrub pas chog mod snyam na /
NK045(bi)001:5456: gzugs med na chos bstan pa dang sbyin pa'i yul
NK045(bi)001:5457: sogs med pas der byang chub kyi yon tan bskyed
NK045(bi)001:5458: pa'i rgyu sbyin sogs pha rol tu phyin pa rlabs
NK045(bi)001:5459: po che 'grub pa las nyams par 'gyur tu 'ong
NK045(bi)001:5460: ngo zhes gzugs med kyi khams su byang sems des
NK045(bi)001:5461: skye ba don du gnyer bar mi byed do //
NK045(bi)001:5462: gnyis pa la dpe dang don gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:5464: dper na mi zhig sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste dper
NK045(bi)001:5465: na mi zhig gis rin chen gyi gter rnams rnyed
NK045(bi)001:5467: de nas gter de la rang nyid chags pa'am 'dod
NK045(bi)001:5468: pa'i blo ni bskyed par ma byas te ma blangs
NK045(bi)001:5469: par song la / mi des kyang dus gzhan zhig
NK045(bi)001:5470: na gzhan gyi don du gter chen po de dag
NK045(bi)001:5472: blangs nas rang gi khyim du song ste de la
NK045(bi)001:5473: chags par mi byed par gnyen bshes rnams la ster
NK045(bi)001:5474: ba ltar du dpe bkod nas shes par bya'o //
NK045(bi)001:5476: de bzhin byang chub sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5477: dpe de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' makhasa pa
NK045(bi)001:5478: sems can rnams la 'phral du dga' ba dang nam
NK045(bi)001:5479: phug gi bde ba sbyin par byed pa de dag
NK045(bi)001:5480: bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin mi mthun phyogs kyi
NK045(bi)001:5481: skyon zhi ba bzhi po thob nas /
NK045(bi)001:5482: bsam gtan gyi bde ba dang ldan pa la ma
NK045(bi)001:5483: chags par 'bras bu skye ba'i bsam gtan gyi ting
NK045(bi)001:5485: 'gro ba la snying brtser ldan pa rnams ni phyir
NK045(bi)001:5486: yang 'dod pa'i khams su 'jug ste 'dod pa'i khams
NK045(bi)001:5487: 'dir sdug bsngal ba mang bas zhing sbyang ba'i dmigs
NK045(bi)001:5489: phar phyin sgrub pa'i yul yod pas tshogs myur du rdzogs pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:5490: chos bstan pas sems can rnams skyo zhing smin par
NK045(bi)001:5491: nus pas byang chub sems dpa' myur du 'tshang rgya
NK045(bi)001:5492: bar 'dod pas 'dod pa'i khams 'dir skyes na tshogs
NK045(bi)001:5493: myur du rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)001:5494: bzhi pa la spang bya dman pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:5495: blang bya mchog gi tshul gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:5497: gal ste byang chub sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5498: gal te byang chub semsa dapa'a rnam par thar pa'i
NK045(bi)001:5499: ting 'dzina dang bsam gtan bzhi la ga nas kyang
NK045(bi)001:5500: / nyan thos dgra bcoma pa dang ranga rgyal gyi theg par 'doda pa'i blo bskyed na /
NK045(bi)001:5501: theg chen gyi lam la ltos na de lta bu ni manyam para ma bazhaga pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:5502: rgoda cing semsa g.yengas par gyur pa yin te /
NK045(bi)001:5503: rgyu mtshan ci'i phyir na dman lam yid byed des
NK045(bi)001:5504: sems phrogs par gyur nas theg pa chen po'i don
NK045(bi)001:5505: las g.yengs pas na don chen po 'bras bu sangsa
NK045(bi)001:5506: rgyas kyi yona tan las yongsa su nyamsa pa mnyan
NK045(bi)001:5507: pa gru zhig pa rin po che'i gling du mi
NK045(bi)001:5510: gzhan yang gzugs dang sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5511: tshul de las gazhana du gyur pa yanga 'di lta ste /
NK045(bi)001:5512: gzugas dang sgra dang de bzhina du dri dang ro
NK045(bi)001:5513: dang rega bya dang bcas pa ste 'doda pa'i yon
NK045(bi)001:5514: tan lnga la dga' zhing chags pas de sgrub pa
NK045(bi)001:5515: la mngona par brtson par gyur kyang /
NK045(bi)001:5516: dgra bcom dang rang rgyal gyi theg pa 'dod pa
NK045(bi)001:5517: dang bral la bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi
NK045(bi)001:5518: sems bskyed pa'am byang chub sems dpa'i lam la dga'
NK045(bi)001:5519: na dpa' bo de ni rtag tu mnyam par bzhag
NK045(bi)001:5520: pa yin para shes par bya ste 'dod pa'i yon
NK045(bi)001:5521: tan lngas g.yengs par 'gyur kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i
NK045(bi)001:5522: bar chad kyi sems ma bskyed pas don chen po
NK045(bi)001:5523: la sems rtse gcig par gyur pas mnyam bzhag yin
NK045(bi)001:5524: zhes so // de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i
NK045(bi)001:5525: bsam gtan thams cad ni 'bras bu rdzogs byang thob
NK045(bi)001:5526: pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:5527: gzhan don snying rjes zin pa'i thabs su gyur pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:5528: rang bzhin med par rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis zin
NK045(bi)001:5529: pas ma chags pa'i tshul gyis 'jug pa'i khyad par
NK045(bi)001:5530: 'di gsum gyis theg pa chen po'i bsam gtan bshad
NK045(bi)001:5531: pa'i tshul 'di phar phyin 'og ma kun la'ang de
NK045(bi)001:5532: ltar yin no // gnyis pa brtson 'grus la /
NK045(bi)001:5533: gzhan don du brtson par gdams pa /
NK045(bi)001:5535: 'khor gsum dag pa'i tshul gyis brtson pa gsum /
NK045(bi)001:5539: sems can gang zag sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5540: sems can du gyur pa gang zag zhes pa'i ming
NK045(bi)001:5541: can ji snyed pa gzhan rnams kyi phyir du phan
NK045(bi)001:5542: bde sgrub pa'i go cha bgos pa'i sems dpa' zhing
NK045(bi)001:5543: de yang rang 'dod kyi dri mas rnam par dag
NK045(bi)001:5544: pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
NK045(bi)001:5545: pa la gus pas mngon par brtson zhing rtag tu
NK045(bi)001:5546: sbyor ba'i sgo nas rnam par spyod pa yin te
NK045(bi)001:5547: / dper na bran mo chu chun te chu len
NK045(bi)001:5548: mo rnams ni rang dbang med par rje bo'i dbang
NK045(bi)001:5549: du gyur pa de bzhin du /
NK045(bi)001:5550: dpa' bo byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can
NK045(bi)001:5551: kun gyi gzhan dbang gis 'gro ba'am gzhan dbang du
NK045(bi)001:5553: gnyis pa la gnod pa byas kyang de'i don du brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang /
NK045(bi)001:5554: rtag tu gzhan don la brtson pa'i tshul gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:5555: dang po la dpe dang don gnyis las /
NK045(bi)001:5557: spyo ba byas sam sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5558: 'di ltar ngag gis ngan du smra ba'i sgo nas
NK045(bi)001:5559: spyo ba byas sam 'on te rtag tu lus kyis
NK045(bi)001:5560: brdeg par byed kyang rung ste /
NK045(bi)001:5561: bran mo des rje bo la ni bgo ba phyir
NK045(bi)001:5562: zlog pa'i tshig mi smra yi ji ltar khro ba
NK045(bi)001:5563: bstan kyang de la sems slar mi khro bar ma
NK045(bi)001:5564: zad / nyes na 'di yisa bdag ni bsad par
NK045(bi)001:5565: 'gyur du'ang 'ong ste bdag ni 'di la dbang ba'i
NK045(bi)001:5566: phyir ro snyam du bsam nas /
NK045(bi)001:5567: shin tu skrag pa'i yid kyis 'jigsa pa dang bcas
NK045(bi)001:5568: te bka' nyan la de nyid rje bo de'i zil
NK045(bi)001:5569: gyis gnon par gyur pa yin no //
NK045(bi)001:5571: de bzhin byang chub sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5572: bshad ma thag pa'i dpe de bzhin du bla na
NK045(bi)001:5573: med pa'i byang chub kyi ched du byang chub mchog
NK045(bi)001:5574: gi lam la zhugs pa byang sems rnams ni 'gro
NK045(bi)001:5575: ba kun la brana du gyur pa bzhin du gnas
NK045(bi)001:5576: par bya te / de'i rgyu mtshan ni 'gro ba
NK045(bi)001:5577: 'di rnams snying rjes yongs su bzung ba las bdag
NK045(bi)001:5578: byang chub thob cing yon tana rnams rdzogs par 'gyur
NK045(bi)001:5579: bas des de la ngor lta zhing bsam pa dang
NK045(bi)001:5580: mthun par 'jug pa bran mo bzhin du byed pa
NK045(bi)001:5581: par bya te / yin te / de ltar ma
NK045(bi)001:5582: byas par sems can la khros na rtsa dang shing
NK045(bi)001:5583: las me byung bas ni rtsa shing de nyid sreg
NK045(bi)001:5584: par byed pa ltar rang gi khro ba'i mes rang
NK045(bi)001:5585: brlag nas bsad pa ltar byang chub lam gyi srog
NK045(bi)001:5588: bdag gi bde ba sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5589: 'di ltar bdag gces 'dzin byas pas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad 'dren la /
NK045(bi)001:5590: gzhan gces par bzung bas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan kun thob pa'i phyir de ltar shes nas /
NK045(bi)001:5591: bdag gi bde ba 'dod pa'i sems btang nas lan
NK045(bi)001:5592: dang rnam smin la re ba med pa'i sems kyis
NK045(bi)001:5593: sems can gzhan gyi dgos pa sgrub pa la nyin
NK045(bi)001:5594: dang mtshan du mngon par brtson par bya ste bu
NK045(bi)001:5595: gcig pa la ma ni rnam pa kun tu skyo
NK045(bi)001:5596: ba med pa'i yid kyis rim gro byed pa ltar
NK045(bi)001:5597: bsam pa thag pa nas sems can gyi don la
NK045(bi)001:5598: rnam par skyo ba med par gnas par gyis shig
NK045(bi)001:5599: / gnyis pa ma zhum pa la mdor bstan rgyas bshad gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:5601: byang chub sems dpa' sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5602: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig snying rje chen po'i
NK045(bi)001:5603: dbang gis yun ring po tshad med par 'khor ba
NK045(bi)001:5604: 'dir gnas shing mi gtong bar 'dod cing /
NK045(bi)001:5605: der gnas nas sems can gyi don byed pa dang
NK045(bi)001:5606: zhing sbyong ba la brtson pa'i rnal 'byor pa gang
NK045(bi)001:5607: zhig / de lta bu'i tshul la skyo ba'i blo
NK045(bi)001:5608: ni rdul tsam skye bar mi 'gyur na de ni
NK045(bi)001:5609: brtsona 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan
NK045(bi)001:5610: te 'gro ba'i don sgrub pa la g.yel ba med
NK045(bi)001:5612: gnyis pa la spang bya dang gnyen po gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:5614: byang chub sems dpa' sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5615: byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mi mkhas pa gang
NK045(bi)001:5616: zhig bskal pa bye ba sogs su tshad bgrangs shing
NK045(bi)001:5617: 'di tsam zhig gi bar du brtson na bla na
NK045(bi)001:5618: med pa'i byang chub thob bo zhes bsam nas /
NK045(bi)001:5619: gal te de 'dra ba'i yun la ring bar 'du shes pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:5620: mgo dang yan lag gtong ba sogs dka' ba'i spyod
NK045(bi)001:5621: pa la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes kyi sgo nas
NK045(bi)001:5622: byang chub sgrub par byed na /
NK045(bi)001:5623: yang dag pa'i chos bla med byang chub sgrub par
NK045(bi)001:5624: byed pa de yi tshe na 'du shes de nyid
NK045(bi)001:5625: kyi dbang gis yun ring por sdug bsngal bar 'gyur
NK045(bi)001:5626: zhing / tshul des ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rola
NK045(bi)001:5627: tu phyin pa las nyams shing le lo can du
NK045(bi)001:5629: ngo bo ni dge ba la spro ba yin zhing
NK045(bi)001:5630: spro ba de dang ldan na las de la mi
NK045(bi)001:5631: zhum par 'jug nus kyi ring ba'i 'du shes sogs
NK045(bi)001:5632: kyis spro ba nyams nas sgyid lug par 'gyur ba'i
NK045(bi)001:5633: phyir te 'jig rten na yang don gang gi phyir
NK045(bi)001:5634: spro ba drag po yod pa'i tshe na dpag tshad
NK045(bi)001:5635: brgya'i lam la'ang dga' bzhin du 'gro la /
NK045(bi)001:5636: spro ba med par gyur ba'i tshe rgyang grags gcig
NK045(bi)001:5637: tu 'gro ba la yang 'tsher bar lta ba bzhin
NK045(bi)001:5638: no // des na rang bzhin med par rtogs pa'i
NK045(bi)001:5639: shes rab dang snying rje chen po zung du zhugs
NK045(bi)001:5640: pa'i thabs mkhas de'i sgo nas sems can gyi khams
NK045(bi)001:5641: tshad med pa'i mthar thug pa'i mu dang mnyam par
NK045(bi)001:5642: rdzogs smin sbyang ba tshad dang mtha' med par bya'o
NK045(bi)001:5643: snyam pa'i mu dang mthar gtug pa med pa'i blo
NK045(bi)001:5644: skyed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'i
NK045(bi)001:5645: brtson 'grus yin pas go cha de lta bu'i sgo
NK045(bi)001:5646: nas zhugs pas lam ji ltar goms pa bzhin brtson
NK045(bi)001:5647: 'grus de ltar 'phel te mtha' yi tshad gzung du
NK045(bi)001:5648: med par gyur pa ni 'jam dpal la sogs pa'i
NK045(bi)001:5649: rnam par thar pa bzhin du shes par byas nas
NK045(bi)001:5652: dus kyi dbang du byas pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:5653: dngos po'i dbang du byas pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:5655: byang chub mchog tu sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5656: de ltar dus la ring ba dang dngos po la
NK045(bi)001:5657: bya dka' ba'i 'du shes de spang ba'i brtson 'grus
NK045(bi)001:5659: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa dang po gang yin pa de nas bzung ste /
NK045(bi)001:5660: mthar byang chub bla na med pa thob par 'gyur
NK045(bi)001:5661: gyi bar de dag dper na nyin mtshan gcig gi
NK045(bi)001:5662: tshad tsam du ni 'da' bar sla ba yin pa'i
NK045(bi)001:5663: tshul du yid la sems par byed cing spro bar
NK045(bi)001:5664: gyur na / mkhas pa shes rab kyi 'od gsal
NK045(bi)001:5665: bas brtson 'grus brtsam pa'i tshul de lta bu yin
NK045(bi)001:5667: bskal pa sngon gyi mtha' thug pa med par 'khor
NK045(bi)001:5668: ba 'dir sdug bsngal mi bzod pa brgyud mar myong
NK045(bi)001:5669: yang des phan pa ci yang ma 'grub pa la'ang
NK045(bi)001:5670: skyo ba med na bdag da lta don chen po
NK045(bi)001:5671: 'bras bu mthar thug pa bsgrub pa'i lam 'di bsgrub
NK045(bi)001:5672: na 'grub tu rung ba yin zhing je bas je
NK045(bi)001:5673: bzang du 'phel bas na 'di la skyo ba ci
NK045(bi)001:5674: ste skyed snyam du spro bar byas na de'i dbang
NK045(bi)001:5675: gis ring ba dang dka' ba'i 'du shes zil gyis
NK045(bi)001:5676: mnan pas dus ring ba la'ang thung ba'i 'du shes
NK045(bi)001:5677: kyi tshul gyis sdug bsngal med par bde ba'i sgo
NK045(bi)001:5679: rin po che'i khe mthong nas lam ring ba dang
NK045(bi)001:5680: dka' ba la dka' bar mi sems par bde ba'i
NK045(bi)001:5681: 'du shes byed pa la sogs pa bzhin du 'gyur
NK045(bi)001:5682: ro // des na bya rgyu'i dngos po la mi
NK045(bi)001:5683: ltos par sems kyi dbang gis bya dka' ba dang
NK045(bi)001:5684: mi dka' bar gyur pa yin par shes par bya
NK045(bi)001:5685: ro // ste / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
NK045(bi)001:5686: lus gtong ba dang gzhan don du mnar med du
NK045(bi)001:5687: 'jug pa la'ang dga' zhing bde ba'i 'du shes su
NK045(bi)001:5689: gnyis pa gal te 'ga' zhig sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:5690: gal te 'ga' zhig 'di skad du ri'i rgyal po
NK045(bi)001:5691: ri rab kyi ri 'di bshig par gyis dang 'di
NK045(bi)001:5692: bshig pa'i rjes la khyod byang chub mchog thob par
NK045(bi)001:5693: 'gyur ro zhes smra ba na de las ci ste
NK045(bi)001:5694: des ri rab ni 'di ltar che zhing brtan pa
NK045(bi)001:5695: 'di bshig daka'o snyam du skyo ba'i blo skyed cing
NK045(bi)001:5696: 'di lo'am bskal pa ji tsam gyis bshig par nus
NK045(bi)001:5697: snyam du tshad kyang sems par byed na /
NK045(bi)001:5698: de 'dra'i sems zhum pa dang bcas pa de ni
NK045(bi)001:5699: tshe byang chub sems dpa' de ni le lor gyur
NK045(bi)001:5700: pa yin te spro ba nyams pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)001:5701: ji ste byang sems de ni 'di snyam du bla
NK045(bi)001:5702: na med pa'i byang chub de brtson 'grus 'di tsam
NK045(bi)001:5703: gyis tshod kyis thob na lta 'di mthar gyis shig
NK045(bi)001:5704: par nus pa yin pa'i phyir 'di ni ci zhig
NK045(bi)001:5705: dka' ste mi daka'o zhes su bsam nas /
NK045(bi)001:5706: yun gyi tshad mi gzhal bar dus skad cig tsam
NK045(bi)001:5707: la ri rab de thal bar brlag nus pa lta
NK045(bi)001:5708: bu'i spro ba drag po'i sems bskyeda par byed na
NK045(bi)001:5709: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' don dang don ma
NK045(bi)001:5710: yin pa'i gnas la mkhas pa de ni brtson 'grus
NK045(bi)001:5711: brtsam pa nyid du gyur pa ste /
NK045(bi)001:5712: tshul de lta bur rnam mkhyen la spro ba'i sgo
NK045(bi)001:5713: nas bya dka' ba la mi zhum pa'i brtson 'grus
NK045(bi)001:5714: dang ldan pa de ni ring pora mi thogsa par
NK045(bi)001:5715: 'dren pa'i byang chub mchog thob par 'gyur te /
NK045(bi)001:5716: de thob byed kyi rgyu brtson 'grus de lta bu yod pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)001:5721: 'gro ba yongs su sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5722: 'di ltar brtson 'grus rtsom pa na yang dmigs pa
NK045(bi)001:5723: can ni de'i dbang gis yongs su mi dag pa'i
NK045(bi)001:5725: gang zhe na bdag gis 'gro ba rnams yongs su
NK045(bi)001:5726: smin par byas nas gzhan gyi don bya'o zhes mtshan
NK045(bi)001:5727: mar 'dzin pa'i 'du shes kyi ngang nas /
NK045(bi)001:5728: gal te lus dang ngag dang yid kyis brtson par byeda na /
NK045(bi)001:5729: bdag tu 'du shes pa la gnas pas dmigs med
NK045(bi)001:5730: kyi brtson 'grus la ltos na le lor gyur pa
NK045(bi)001:5731: ste / de'i rgyu mtshan dmigs pa can gyi lta
NK045(bi)001:5732: ba des brtson pa yang dag par mi 'gyur la
NK045(bi)001:5733: de'i ldog phyogs su lhung bas thams cad mkhyen pa
NK045(bi)001:5734: nyid las ring bar 'gyur te dper na gnam dang
NK045(bi)001:5735: sa rgyang thag ring ba bzhin du 'gyur ro //
NK045(bi)001:5737: gang tshe lus dang sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5738: brtson 'grus rtsom pa gang gi tshe na rtsom pa
NK045(bi)001:5739: po rang gi lus dang sems dang gzhan sems can
NK045(bi)001:5741: brtson pa'i 'khor gsum gyi 'du shes rnam par log
NK045(bi)001:5742: nasa mtha' 'am bdag gzhan gnyis su med pa'i chos
NK045(bi)001:5743: kyi tshul la spyod pa 'di ni byang chub chen
NK045(bi)001:5744: po dri ma zhi ba nam yang mi nyams pa
NK045(bi)001:5745: mchog gi go 'phang 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
NK045(bi)001:5746: rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
NK045(bi)001:5747: nyid yin no zhes phan pa mdzad pa rgyal ba
NK045(bi)001:5750: chos la nges sems kyi bzod pa /
NK045(bi)001:5751: gnod pas mi mjed pa'i bzod pa /
NK045(bi)001:5752: sdug bsngal dang len gyi bzod pa gsum /
NK045(bi)001:5757: gal te gzhan las sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5758: gal te gzhan lasa bdag la smod pa la sogs
NK045(bi)001:5759: pa ngan du brjod pa'i tshig rtsub mo thos par
NK045(bi)001:5760: gyur pa na / 'di ltar bzod pa'i yul rnyed
NK045(bi)001:5761: pa nyid kyis bzod pa 'byung bas na 'di ni
NK045(bi)001:5762: bdag gi bde ba'i rgyu yin no zhes su snyam
NK045(bi)001:5763: nas byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa de
NK045(bi)001:5765: de la yang don dam par na tshig rtsub mo
NK045(bi)001:5766: 'di su zhig gis smra ba po dang de sus
NK045(bi)001:5767: thos pa dang / zhe sdang ba sogs rgyu gang
NK045(bi)001:5768: gis brjod bya ngan du smra ba gang zhig gzhan
NK045(bi)001:5769: yid bcad pa sogs dgos pa gang gi phyir smra'o
NK045(bi)001:5770: snyam du brtag na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i
NK045(bi)001:5771: snang ba ngo bo ma grub pa'i sgyu ma ltar
NK045(bi)001:5772: rtogs nas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mchog
NK045(bi)001:5773: dang ldan pa ni mdzangs pa yin te /
NK045(bi)001:5774: rkyen las byung ba'i chos tsam la khro bar byar med pa'i don khong du chud pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)001:5775: de ltar ma shes pa'i blun po dag ni lan du khro zhing bdag gzhan nyams par byed do //
NK045(bi)001:5777: byang chub sems dpa' sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:5778: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig bzod pa'i legs byas kyi chos dang ldan na /
NK045(bi)001:5779: gang zhig stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
NK045(bi)001:5780: gyi khams 'di rin chen sna tshogs kyis bkang ste
NK045(bi)001:5781: 'jig rten mkhyen pa sangs rgyas rnams dang /
NK045(bi)001:5782: dgra bcom pa rnams dang rang rgyal rnams la phul
NK045(bi)001:5783: bar byas pa'i sbyin pa'i phung po la ni bzod
NK045(bi)001:5784: pa'i ngang tshul dang ldan pa de la bsod nams
NK045(bi)001:5785: kyi char yang 'gran par mi phoda do //
NK045(bi)001:5786: bzod pa la gnas pa'i rnam smin gyi 'bras bu
NK045(bi)001:5787: ni lus ni gser ltar yongs su dag par 'gyur
NK045(bi)001:5788: te sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi grangs dang ldan pa'i
NK045(bi)001:5789: mtshan bzang po dang ldan zhing mthu stobs pha mtha'
NK045(bi)001:5790: yas par 'gyur la chos la nges sems kyi bzod
NK045(bi)001:5791: pa'i skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu sems can rnams
NK045(bi)001:5792: la chos rab tu gyur pa stong pa nyid sgrogs
NK045(bi)001:5793: par byed par nyid du 'gyur zhing bdag po'i 'bras
NK045(bi)001:5794: bu ni 'jig rten 'dir ni bzod pa dang ldan
NK045(bi)001:5795: pa de la 'gro ba rnams dga' bar 'gyur zhing
NK045(bi)001:5796: rten par byed la bral ba'i 'bras bu ni rmongs
NK045(bi)001:5797: pa dang bral ba'i mkhas par 'gyur ro //
NK045(bi)001:5798: gnyis pa gnod pa la ci mi snyam pa'i bzod pa la /
NK045(bi)001:5799: ji ltar bzod par bya ba dang //
NK045(bi)001:5800: de ltar bzod pa'i 'bras bu gnyis //
NK045(bi)001:5802: gal te sems can sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5803: gal te sems can la las tsan dan gyi phur
NK045(bi)001:5804: ma ste thum po blangs nas rab tu gus pa'i
NK045(bi)001:5805: yid kyis byang chub sems dpa' yi lus la ni
NK045(bi)001:5806: nyug cing byug par byed la /
NK045(bi)001:5807: gzhan zhig gis gnod pa'i sems kyis me mdag de'i
NK045(bi)001:5808: mgo la 'thor bar byed pa de gnyis ka la
NK045(bi)001:5809: / byang chub sems dpa' de yis chags pa dang
NK045(bi)001:5810: sdang ba med par mnyam zhing snyoms pa'i yid ni
NK045(bi)001:5812: byang chub sems dpa' sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5813: byang chub sems dpa' don gyi tshul la mkhas pas de ltar bzod par byas nas /
NK045(bi)001:5814: bzod pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa de ni /
NK045(bi)001:5815: byang chub mchog tu yongs su bsngosa par byas na /
NK045(bi)001:5816: dpa' bo byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'jig rten
NK045(bi)001:5817: kun la phan pa'i phyir bzod pas na nyan thos
NK045(bi)001:5818: dgra bcom pa dang rang rgyal dang gzhan sems can
NK045(bi)001:5819: gyi khams mang po ji snyed pa zil gyis gnon
NK045(bi)001:5820: par 'gyur te / mdo gzhan las sh+aa ri'i bu
NK045(bi)001:5821: nyan thos kyi bzod pa ni rang gi nyon mongs
NK045(bi)001:5822: tsam spong bas nyi tse ba yin la /
NK045(bi)001:5823: byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa ni sems can thams
NK045(bi)001:5824: cad kyi phyir yin pas dpag tu med de zhes
NK045(bi)001:5825: pa nas 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser dang ra gan
NK045(bi)001:5826: dang / ri rab dang yungs 'bru dang rgya mtsho
NK045(bi)001:5827: dang sgra rtse'i chu thigs kyi khyad par gyi dpes
NK045(bi)001:5829: gsum pa sdug bsngal dang len gyi bzod pa bstan pa /
NK045(bi)001:5830: bzod byed 'di snyam sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:5831: bzod par byed pa po de 'di snyam du yang sems ni bskyeda par bya ste /
NK045(bi)001:5832: sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang gshin rje'i
NK045(bi)001:5833: 'jig rten te yi dwags kyi khams na tsha grang
NK045(bi)001:5834: bkres skom la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal bzod dka' ba
NK045(bi)001:5835: mang po yod la 'dod pa'i yon tan la chags
NK045(bi)001:5836: pa'i rgyu yis rang dbang med par gnod pa de
NK045(bi)001:5837: dag myong zhing des rang gzhan gyi don gang yang
NK045(bi)001:5838: ma byas par don med par sdug bsngal myong ba
NK045(bi)001:5839: yin na / rang gzhan gyi don sgrub pa bla
NK045(bi)001:5840: na med pa'i byang chub kyi ched du ci yi
NK045(bi)001:5841: phyir na da lta bdag gis bzod par mi bya
NK045(bi)001:5842: yin na / snyam du / lcag gis gzhur ba
NK045(bi)001:5843: dang dbyig pas bsnun pa dang mtshon gyis btab pa
NK045(bi)001:5844: dang srog 'gag par byas te bsad pa dang lcags
NK045(bi)001:5845: sgrog la sogs pas bcing ba dang /
NK045(bi)001:5846: rdo dang tho ba la sogs pas brdeg pa dang
NK045(bi)001:5847: mgo gcod pa dang rna ba dang rkang lag dang
NK045(bi)001:5849: de la sogs pa'i 'jig rten na gang yod pa'i
NK045(bi)001:5850: sdug bsngal ji snyed pa bdag gis dang du blangs
NK045(bi)001:5851: nas bzod par bya'o snyam pa yi byang chub sems
NK045(bi)001:5852: dpa' de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
NK045(bi)001:5854: bzhi pa tshul khrims la mchog gi tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i phan yon dang /
NK045(bi)001:5855: tshul khrims de'i mchog dman gyi dbye ba bshad pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:5856: dang po tshul khrims kyis ni sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5857: tshul khrims kyis ni zhi ba mya ngan las 'das
NK045(bi)001:5858: pa 'dod pa rnams khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur
NK045(bi)001:5859: te tshul khrims de thar par 'gro ba'i rkang pa
NK045(bi)001:5860: lta bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)001:5861: ngo bo'i khyad par ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims ni stobs bcu'i spyod yula gnas shing zhes /
NK045(bi)001:5862: stobs bcu pa ni sangs rgyas yin la de'i rjes
NK045(bi)001:5863: su slob pa'i tshul khrims yin te dman lam yid
NK045(bi)001:5864: byed sogs dang ma 'brel zhing theg pa chen po'i
NK045(bi)001:5865: lam gyi spang bya mtha' dag gi dri mas ma
NK045(bi)001:5866: gos pas tshul khrims nyams pa med pa ste des
NK045(bi)001:5867: nyes spyod sdom pa'i tshul khrims bstan to //
NK045(bi)001:5868: sdom pa'i bya ba ste tshul khrims ni dge ba'i
NK045(bi)001:5869: chos ji snyed pa kun gyi rjes su 'jug pa
NK045(bi)001:5870: yin te mi mthun phyogs las srung zhing gnyen po
NK045(bi)001:5871: la 'jug pa de nyid tshul khrims kyi ngo bor
NK045(bi)001:5872: gyur pas na 'di ni dge ba chos sdud kyi
NK045(bi)001:5874: sems can kun la phan phyir tshul khrims de lta
NK045(bi)001:5875: bur srung la de yang byang chub chen por bsngo
NK045(bi)001:5876: ba ni sems can don byed kyi tshul khrims so
NK045(bi)001:5877: // des tshul khrims kyi ngo bor mdor bstan nas /
NK045(bi)001:5878: gnyis pa de'i mchog dman gyi dbye ba bshad pa la /
NK045(bi)001:5880: kun slong gi sgo nas dang /
NK045(bi)001:5881: rlom pa yod med kyi sgo nas dbye ba gsum /
NK045(bi)001:5883: gal te dgra bcom sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5884: gal te nyan thos dgra bcom pa dang rang rgyal
NK045(bi)001:5885: gyi byang chub la reg par 'dod pa'i sems kyis
NK045(bi)001:5886: tshul khrims srung bar byed na theg pa chen po
NK045(bi)001:5887: 'di la ltos nas ni gang zag de tshul khrims
NK045(bi)001:5888: 'chal zhing bsam pa mi mkhas shing de bzhin du
NK045(bi)001:5889: sbyor ba spyod pa yang nyams pa yin te don
NK045(bi)001:5890: chen po las ltung ba'i phyir na bsam sbyor nyams
NK045(bi)001:5891: pa'o // ci ste tshul khrims de gang gi ched
NK045(bi)001:5892: du srung ba bla na med pa'i byang chub sgrib
NK045(bi)001:5893: gnyis zhi ba mchog tu yongs su bsngo na /
NK045(bi)001:5894: gang zag de 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la brtson
NK045(bi)001:5895: pa'i tshul gyis gnas na yang tshul khrimsa kyi pha
NK045(bi)001:5896: rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa zhes bya ste
NK045(bi)001:5897: lam dang 'bras bu mchog gi phyir zhugs pa las
NK045(bi)001:5899: gnyis pa la mdor bstan rgyas bshad gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:5901: chos gang nges pa'i sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5902: bslab bya'i chos ganga zhig kun slong gi sgo nas
NK045(bi)001:5903: nges pa ste byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thob
NK045(bi)001:5904: bya byang chub mchog gi yon tan 'byung bar 'gyur
NK045(bi)001:5905: ba 'di ni yon tan gyi chos dang ldan pa
NK045(bi)001:5906: byang sems rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi don du gsungs
NK045(bi)001:5907: la / kun slong dman pas zin pa'i chos gang
NK045(bi)001:5908: zhig phan byed byang sems rnams kyi thob bya'i 'bras
NK045(bi)001:5909: bu byang chub chen po las yongs su nyams pa
NK045(bi)001:5910: 'di ni theg pa chen po'i tshul khrims 'chal ba
NK045(bi)001:5911: yin no zhes rnam par 'dren pas gsungs so //
NK045(bi)001:5916: gal te byang chub sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5917: gal te byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa
NK045(bi)001:5918: gang zhig 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la zhen pa'i
NK045(bi)001:5919: tshul gyis spyod par gyur kyang /
NK045(bi)001:5920: sangs rgyas chos dang 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la snying nas skyabs su song ste /
NK045(bi)001:5921: bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang 'grub par bya'o
NK045(bi)001:5922: snyam du kun mkhyen yid byed dang ma bral na
NK045(bi)001:5923: / don la mkhas pa de ni tshul khrims kyi
NK045(bi)001:5924: pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par rigs par
NK045(bi)001:5926: gal te bskal pa sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5927: gal te bskal pa bye bar dge ba'i las lam bcu la spyad kyang /
NK045(bi)001:5928: nyan thos dgra bcom dang rang rgyal nyid kyi sa la 'dod pa skyeda na /
NK045(bi)001:5929: de tshe theg pa chen po'i tshul khrims la skyon
NK045(bi)001:5930: byung zhing tshul khrims yang dag pa nyams pa yin
NK045(bi)001:5931: te / theg pa chen po pas nyan rang gi sa la sems bskyed pa de ni /
NK045(bi)001:5932: byang sems de la dge slong gi phas pham pa
NK045(bi)001:5933: bzhi byung ba bas kyang nyes pa shin tu lci
NK045(bi)001:5934: ste phas pham pa byung yang byang chub mchog tu
NK045(bi)001:5935: sems bskyed pa ma btang na de tsam gyis byang
NK045(bi)001:5936: chub chen po'i lam las skal ba med par mi
NK045(bi)001:5937: 'gyur la / dman par sems bskyed pa des ni
NK045(bi)001:5938: de ma btang gi bar du theg pa chen po'i
NK045(bi)001:5939: lam dang 'bras bu la 'gro ba'i skal ba med
NK045(bi)001:5941: gsum pa la blang bya dang spang bya gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:5943: tshul khrims srung zhing sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5944: tshul khrims srung zhing de nyid byang chub mchog tu yongs su bsngo la /
NK045(bi)001:5945: tshul khrims de la mtshan mar bzung ba yis rlom
NK045(bi)001:5946: sems su gyur pa med cinga tshul khrims la sogs
NK045(bi)001:5947: pa de yi sgo nas bdag la bstod par mi
NK045(bi)001:5948: byed la / nga yi 'du shes dang sems can gyi 'du shes yongs su spangs na /
NK045(bi)001:5949: byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu ni tshul khrims
NK045(bi)001:5950: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'o zhes
NK045(bi)001:5952: gnyis pa la spang bya dngos dang /
NK045(bi)001:5953: de'i gnyen po bstan pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:5955: gal te byang chub sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5956: gal te byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i lam theg
NK045(bi)001:5957: chen la spyod pa de dag 'di snyam du sems
NK045(bi)001:5958: can 'di dag ni khrims dang ldana la 'di dag
NK045(bi)001:5959: ni tshul khrims 'chal ba'o zhes sna tshogs pa'i 'du
NK045(bi)001:5960: shes zhugs nas mngon par zhen pa dang ldan pa
NK045(bi)001:5961: ni 'du shes de nyid kho nas shin tu tshul
NK045(bi)001:5963: mngon par zhen pa dang ldan la de'i sgo nas
NK045(bi)001:5964: gzhan la brnyas pa sogs byed pa'i dri ma des
NK045(bi)001:5965: theg pa chen po'i tshul khrims nyams shing gang zag
NK045(bi)001:5966: de la yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims med de
NK045(bi)001:5967: / de dag dmigs pa'i 'du shes des nyams par byas pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)001:5969: gang la bdag gi sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:5970: gang zag gang la bdag gi 'du shes dang sems
NK045(bi)001:5971: can gyi 'du shes med pa'i gang zag gi bdag
NK045(bi)001:5972: med rtogs pa kho na la /
NK045(bi)001:5973: de ltar bdag tu mngon par zhen pa'i 'du shes
NK045(bi)001:5974: dang de'i dbang gis byung ba 'dod chags dang bral
NK045(bi)001:5975: ba la ni sdom pa min pa ste tshul khrims
NK045(bi)001:5976: 'chal ba ni ga la yod de /
NK045(bi)001:5977: mi dge ba gang ji snyed pa ni bdag tu
NK045(bi)001:5978: chags pa'i 'du shes kyi rtsa ba can yin na
NK045(bi)001:5979: de med pa la sdig pa'i dngos po 'byung ba
NK045(bi)001:5980: ni gnas med de rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)001:5981: gang zag gang la chos thams cad rang bzhin med
NK045(bi)001:5982: par shes pa 'i sgo nas sdom pa dang sdom
NK045(bi)001:5983: pa ma yin pa tshul 'chal gnyis su 'dzin pa'i
NK045(bi)001:5984: rlom sems med pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i
NK045(bi)001:5985: tshul khrims kyi sdom par rnam par 'dren pas gsungs
NK045(bi)001:5986: te tshul 'di dang ldan na nyes spyod mtha' dag
NK045(bi)001:5987: gis dben pa 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims dang
NK045(bi)001:5988: ldan la de yang dmigs pa med pas yongs su
NK045(bi)001:5989: dag pa nyid du gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro
NK045(bi)001:5991: sbyin pa btang ba dang ma btang ba'i skyon yon
NK045(bi)001:5992: shes nas sbyin pa la dga' bar bya ba dang
NK045(bi)001:5993: / tshul ji ltar sbyin pa btang bar bya ba gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:5995: byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshul /
NK045(bi)001:5996: phal pas de ltar ma btang ba'i skyon /
NK045(bi)001:5997: de ltar shes nas sbyin pa la mos par bya ba'i tshul gsum /
NK045(bi)001:5999: sems can dag pa sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:6000: sems can rgyud dag pa gang zhig bshad ma thag
NK045(bi)001:6001: pa de ltar 'du shes dang 'dod chags pa bral
NK045(bi)001:6002: ba'i dbang gis tshul khrims dag pa dang ldan pa
NK045(bi)001:6003: de ni yid du sdug pa dang mi sdug pa
NK045(bi)001:6004: kun la de dang der mtshan mar lta ba med
NK045(bi)001:6005: pa yin la / mgo dang rkang lag kyang gzhan
NK045(bi)001:6006: la gtong zhing de yi tshe na mi nus pa
NK045(bi)001:6007: zhum pa'i sems kyang med de /
NK045(bi)001:6008: tshul de ltar rang la ci bdogs pa thams cad
NK045(bi)001:6009: btang zhing dus rtag tu bdogs pa thams cad la
NK045(bi)001:6011: 'di ltar chos rnams ni rang bzhin med pa dang
NK045(bi)001:6012: bdag med pa rkyen las byung ba tsam gyi ya
NK045(bi)001:6013: ma barlara shes nas bdag gi sha yang gtong zhing
NK045(bi)001:6014: de la zhum pa'i sems skye ba med na /
NK045(bi)001:6015: de tshe phyi rol gyi dngos po gtong ba ni smos ci dgos te /
NK045(bi)001:6016: gal te de yis ser sna byed pa de ni
NK045(bi)001:6017: rnam pa kun tu gnas med pa yin te chags
NK045(bi)001:6020: bdag tu 'du shes sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:6021: dngos po'i don la med bzhin du bdag tu 'du
NK045(bi)001:6022: shes pa dang mig sogs dngos po rnams la bdag
NK045(bi)001:6023: gir 'dzin pas chags pa can gyi blun po rnams
NK045(bi)001:6024: la de ltar gtong ba'i blo lta zhig ga la
NK045(bi)001:6026: ser sna can ni yi dwags kyi gnas su skye
NK045(bi)001:6027: bar 'gyur zhing ci ste brgya lam zhig na mir
NK045(bi)001:6028: skye na yang de yi tshe dbul por 'gyur ro
NK045(bi)001:6029: // gsum pa de tshe byang chub sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:6030: 'di ltar srid par skye ba de yi tshe byang
NK045(bi)001:6031: chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sems can rnams ni ser
NK045(bi)001:6032: sna'i dbang gis dbul por gyur pa shes nas /
NK045(bi)001:6033: rang nyid kyis ser sna'i sems tshar bcad de bsam
NK045(bi)001:6034: pa gtong ba la mos par 'gyur zhing sbyor bas
NK045(bi)001:6035: bdog pa thams cad rtag tu lhug par de dgag
NK045(bi)001:6036: pa med par gtong ba yin te /
NK045(bi)001:6037: gling bzhi po bkod pas legs par brgyan pa 'di
NK045(bi)001:6038: yang ma byin par bzhag na 'dus byas mi rtag
NK045(bi)001:6039: pa'i rang bzhin du gyur cing yid brtan par bya
NK045(bi)001:6040: ba'i snying po med pa dper na mchil ma'i thal
NK045(bi)001:6041: ba ste / mchil ma phyir dor ba'i zeg ma
NK045(bi)001:6042: dang 'dra bar shes nas snying po med pa las
NK045(bi)001:6043: snying po len pa'i phyir du gling de dag gzhan
NK045(bi)001:6044: la phar byin nas byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar
NK045(bi)001:6045: 'gyur gyi gling de dag tshur thob na ni de
NK045(bi)001:6046: lta bur dga' ba min te rgyu mtshan bshad ma
NK045(bi)001:6047: thag pa de nyid kyi phyir na'o //
NK045(bi)001:6048: gnyis pa ji ltar gtong tshul la /
NK045(bi)001:6052: snying rjes gzhan don du gtong ba /
NK045(bi)001:6053: thabs mkhas pas yongs su bsngo ba dang ldan pa /
NK045(bi)001:6054: rnam smin dang dngos po la ma chags par gtong ba gsum /
NK045(bi)001:6056: byang chub sems dpa' sogs rkang pa gsum ste /
NK045(bi)001:6057: byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa blo gsal ba des
NK045(bi)001:6058: ni sbyin pa tha na zas kham gcig tsam sbyin
NK045(bi)001:6059: pa na yang snying rje'i bsam pa sngon du 'gro
NK045(bi)001:6060: ba'i sgo nas 'di ltar srid pa gsum gyi ris
NK045(bi)001:6061: su gtogs pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag
NK045(bi)001:6062: kun la kha na ma tho ba med pa'i 'byor
NK045(bi)001:6063: ba dang theg pa gsum la zhugs pa thams cad
NK045(bi)001:6065: kun kyang bla na med pa sangs rgyas kyi 'bras
NK045(bi)001:6066: bu thob par byed pa de lta bur sbyin pa
NK045(bi)001:6067: 'di byin par gyur cig snyam du bsam nas sbyin
NK045(bi)001:6068: pa byin par byed pa yin la /
NK045(bi)001:6071: de yang 'gro ba'i sogs rkang pa gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:6072: sbyin pa byin pa'i bsod nams de yang 'gro ba'i
NK045(bi)001:6073: khams thams cad kyi don gyi phyir du bdag dang
NK045(bi)001:6074: sems can thams cad byang chub mchog tu mngon par
NK045(bi)001:6075: sangs rgyas pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo ba yin no
NK045(bi)001:6077: sbyin pa byin nas sogs rkang pa gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:6078: de ltar byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin nas
NK045(bi)001:6079: sbyin rgyu'i rdzas dang de'i lan gyi dngos po la
NK045(bi)001:6080: re zhing chags pa'am mtshan mar zhen pa'i tshul gyis
NK045(bi)001:6081: blo gnas par byed pa med la /
NK045(bi)001:6082: der ma zad byang sems de ni nam du'ang sbyin
NK045(bi)001:6083: pa de'i rnam par smin pa la bdag gir 'gyur
NK045(bi)001:6084: ro snyam du re ba med de dngos po rnam
NK045(bi)001:6085: par smin pa dang bcas pa la ma chags par
NK045(bi)001:6086: sems can rnams kyi don du gtong ba'i phyir ro
NK045(bi)001:6087: // gnyis pa phan yon la spyi dang bye brag gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:6089: de ltar gtong la sogs rkang pa gnyis te /
NK045(bi)001:6090: bshad ma thag pa de ltar gtong ba'i byang sems
NK045(bi)001:6091: de ni thabs mkhas pa'i yid byed dang ldan pa'i
NK045(bi)001:6092: sgo nas gtong ba la mkhas pa dang bdog pa
NK045(bi)001:6093: dang de'i rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa thams
NK045(bi)001:6094: cad la ma chags par gtong bar byed pa ste
NK045(bi)001:6095: / de lta bu'i sgo nas dngos po chung du
NK045(bi)001:6096: zhig btang ba la yang sbyin pa mang po dpag
NK045(bi)001:6097: tu med pa byin par 'gyur zhing de'i rnam par
NK045(bi)001:6098: smin pa'ang de snyed du tshad med par 'gyur ro
NK045(bi)001:6099: / // gnyis pa bye brag la snying rje sogs
NK045(bi)001:6100: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa'i phan yon
NK045(bi)001:6101: / // dang / ma chags par btang ba'i phan yon gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:6103: srid pa gsum na sogs tshigs bcad gsum ste /
NK045(bi)001:6104: srid pa gsuma na yod pa'i sems can gcig kyang
NK045(bi)001:6105: ma lus pa ji snyed pa yongs su brtag pa
NK045(bi)001:6106: mtha' bzung gi dper byas te sems can de dag
NK045(bi)001:6107: thams cad kyis 'jig rten mkhyen pa sangs rgyas bcom
NK045(bi)001:6108: ldan 'das dang nyan thos dgra bcom pa dang rang
NK045(bi)001:6109: rgyal rnams la bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i bar du
NK045(bi)001:6110: sbyin pa rgya chen po byin te de'i 'bras bu
NK045(bi)001:6111: nyan thos kyi byang chub legs par tshol ba yin
NK045(bi)001:6112: na / byang chub sems dpa' theg chen la mkhas
NK045(bi)001:6113: pa thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa gang zhig gis
NK045(bi)001:6114: na / / sems kyi bya ba rdzogs pa'i skad
NK045(bi)001:6115: cig ma gcig la bshad ma thag pa de dag
NK045(bi)001:6116: gi bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de la yi
NK045(bi)001:6118: sems can thams cad kyi don du byang chub mchog rab sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngo na /
NK045(bi)001:6119: de ltar yongs su bsngosa pa'i sems gcig tsam bskyed
NK045(bi)001:6120: pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
NK045(bi)001:6122: dper na nor bu mching bu'i tshogs mang du spungs
NK045(bi)001:6123: pa'i phung po rgya chen por gyur pa yang rin
NK045(bi)001:6124: chen beed+aur ya nor bu dbang gi rgyal po gcig
NK045(bi)001:6125: gis de kun zil gyis gnon nus pa de bzhin
NK045(bi)001:6126: 'gro ba gzhan kun gyi sbyin pa'i phung po shin
NK045(bi)001:6127: tu rgya chen po kun kyang /
NK045(bi)001:6128: bsam pa rmad du byung ba rjes su yi rang
NK045(bi)001:6129: ba gcig gi sgo nas byang chub sems dpas zil
NK045(bi)001:6132: gal te byang chub sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:6133: gal te byang chub sems dpas 'gro ba rnams la sbyin pa byin nas /
NK045(bi)001:6134: sbyin pa'i bsod nams de la bdag gir mi byed
NK045(bi)001:6135: cing sbyin par bya ba'i dngos po de la'ang phangs
NK045(bi)001:6136: pa med par de ltar shin tu ma chags pa'i
NK045(bi)001:6138: sbyin pa de lta bu gtong ba la dge ba'i
NK045(bi)001:6139: rtsa ba gang zhig tshogs rdzogs shing sgrib pa spong
NK045(bi)001:6140: ba'i mthu chen po dang ldan pa gong nas gong
NK045(bi)001:6142: sbyin pa'i mi mthun phyogs ni chags pa'i dbang gis
NK045(bi)001:6143: ser sna byed pa yin la 'dir ni chags pa
NK045(bi)001:6144: de gtan du skabs mi thob par byas te btang
NK045(bi)001:6145: bas na dper na sprin med pa'i 'od zer gsal
NK045(bi)001:6146: ba dang ldan pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yar gyi
NK045(bi)001:6147: ngo ji lta ba bzhin no //
NK045(bi)001:6148: gnyis pa lam gyi 'bras bu bshad pa la /
NK045(bi)001:6149: lam bye brag pa'i 'bras bu dang /
NK045(bi)001:6150: lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:6152: byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pas sogs rkang pa bcu drug gam tshigs su bcad pa bzhis bstan te /
NK045(bi)001:6153: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lam thams cad pha
NK045(bi)001:6154: rol tu phyin pa drug tu ma 'dus pa med
NK045(bi)001:6155: cing de'i phyir na theg pa chen po dang shes
NK045(bi)001:6156: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzhung rgyas pa'ang
NK045(bi)001:6157: de nyid du don gyis 'dus par gsungs shing de
NK045(bi)001:6158: lta bu'i phar phyin drug gi nyams len rnams gong
NK045(bi)001:6159: du legs par bstan zin nas /
NK045(bi)001:6160: da ni de dag gi 'bras bu bshad pa /
NK045(bi)001:6161: byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pas yi dwagsa kyi 'gro
NK045(bi)001:6162: ba dag tu skye ba rgyun gcod pa dang longs
NK045(bi)001:6163: spyod kyis dbul ba dang ni de bzhin du nyon
NK045(bi)001:6164: mongs pa thams cad kyang gcod de /
NK045(bi)001:6165: rang gis dmigs pa med pa'i sbyin pa btang bas
NK045(bi)001:6166: ser sna dang ma rig pa sogs nyon mongs thams
NK045(bi)001:6168: gzhan la chos kyi sbyin pa byin pas kyang de
NK045(bi)001:6169: dag gi nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod par byed
NK045(bi)001:6170: do // byang chub sems dpas spyad pa spyod pa'i
NK045(bi)001:6171: tshe na'ang tshe rabs thams cad du ji ltar 'dod
NK045(bi)001:6172: pa'i longs spyod mang bas mtha' yas pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:6173: mi zad cing 'phel ba'i rgyas pa thob par 'gyur la /
NK045(bi)001:6174: zang zing dang chos kyi sbyin pas bsdus nas sdug
NK045(bi)001:6175: bsngal gyi rgyu dang 'bras bu la gnas par gyur
NK045(bi)001:6176: pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa
NK045(bi)001:6177: yin no // tshul khrims kyis dud 'gro'i 'gro ba
NK045(bi)001:6178: rigs dang gzugs la sogs pa tha dad pa sna
NK045(bi)001:6179: tshogs su gyur pa du ma'i ngo bo dang /
NK045(bi)001:6180: der ma zad mi khoms pa'i gnas brgyad char yang
NK045(bi)001:6181: spong bar byed cing khrims de yis dal ba yi
NK045(bi)001:6182: rten bzang po rtag tu rnyed par byed do //
NK045(bi)001:6183: bzod pas ni gzugs bzang ba'i dam pa rgya chen
NK045(bi)001:6184: po mtshan dpes legs par brgyan pa sangs rgyas kyi
NK045(bi)001:6185: sku yi bar du thob par 'gyur te /
NK045(bi)001:6186: gser gyi mdog lta bur sdug cing 'gro bas lta bar bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro //
NK045(bi)001:6187: brtson 'grus kyis ni dkar po'i chos rnams kyi yon
NK045(bi)001:6188: tan 'grib par mi 'gyur bar gong nas gong du
NK045(bi)001:6189: 'phel ba'i mthus / ye shes mtha' yas pa rgyal
NK045(bi)001:6190: ba'i yon tan gyi bang mdzod rnyed par 'gyur ro
NK045(bi)001:6191: 'phel ba'i mthus / // bsam gtan gyis ni 'dod
NK045(bi)001:6192: pa'i khams kyi 'dod pa'i yon tan nyes dmigs che
NK045(bi)001:6193: zhing bde ba chung bas smad pa dag gi 'os
NK045(bi)001:6194: su gyur pa 'dor bar byed cing /
NK045(bi)001:6195: sngon gnas dang zag zad dang sems shes te rig pa gsum dang /
NK045(bi)001:6196: lha'i rna ba dang mig dang rdzu 'phrul te mngon
NK045(bi)001:6197: par shes pa gsum ste snga ma dang bsdom pas
NK045(bi)001:6198: drug po de dang seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa
NK045(bi)001:6199: la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par sgrub par
NK045(bi)001:6200: byed do // shes rab kyis ni chos thams cad
NK045(bi)001:6201: kyi rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su shes nas
NK045(bi)001:6202: dngos por 'dzin pa spangs te khams gsum ma lus
NK045(bi)001:6203: pa las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur la /
NK045(bi)001:6204: sku gnyis dang ldan pa mi yi khyu mchog chos
NK045(bi)001:6205: kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas su gyur te 'jig rten
NK045(bi)001:6206: gyi khams kun tu mnga' dbang bsgyur ba'i phrin las
NK045(bi)001:6207: kyi 'khor lo rin po che rgyun mi 'chad par
NK045(bi)001:6208: bskor bar byas nas sdug bsngal mtha' dag gtan du
NK045(bi)001:6209: zad par bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba rnams la dam
NK045(bi)001:6210: pa'i chos kyi snang ba mchog kyang ston par 'gyur
NK045(bi)001:6212: chos 'di yongs rdzogs byas nas sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:6213: theg pa chen po'i rigs la gnas pa gang gis
NK045(bi)001:6214: byang chub tu sems thog mar bskyed pa nas bzung
NK045(bi)001:6215: ste ji skad bshad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
NK045(bi)001:6216: drug theg pa chen po'i lam gyi chos 'di ma
NK045(bi)001:6217: lus pa bskal pa grangs med pa gsum la sogs
NK045(bi)001:6218: par thabs mkhas pa'i tshul gyis nyams su len pa
NK045(bi)001:6219: ste / de la thabs mkhas pa gang zhe na
NK045(bi)001:6220: phar phyin de de thams cad kyang ya ma bral
NK045(bi)001:6221: bar don gcig tu dril ba ste 'di ltar phan
NK045(bi)001:6222: tshun gcig gi grogs su gcig dang gcig la'ang thams
NK045(bi)001:6223: cad tshangs par nyams su len pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:6224: kun kyang rnam kun mchog ldan shes rab kyi pha
NK045(bi)001:6225: rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bor gyur pa'i tshul gyis
NK045(bi)001:6226: nyams su len pa yin no //
NK045(bi)001:6227: de ltar nyams su blang bas pha rol tu phyin
NK045(bi)001:6228: pa mtha' dag gi nyams len rab kyi mthar thug
NK045(bi)001:6229: par yongs su rdzogs par byas nas byang chub sems
NK045(bi)001:6230: dpa' des skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i ye shes
NK045(bi)001:6231: kyis zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad ma tshangs
NK045(bi)001:6232: pa med pa'i rnam kun mchog ldan gyi chos dbyings
NK045(bi)001:6233: mngon du mdzad nus pas bcu'i rgyun gyi tha ma'i
NK045(bi)001:6234: ye shes chen po thob par gyur nas de la
NK045(bi)001:6235: brten te slob pa de mi slob pa byang chub
NK045(bi)001:6236: chen po'i sar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par
NK045(bi)001:6237: gyur nas gnas gyur mthar thug pa brnyes pa'i stobs
NK045(bi)001:6238: kyis 'di ltar nam mkha'i mthar thug par phyogs dang
NK045(bi)001:6239: ris su ma chad par yongs su dag pa'i zhing
NK045(bi)001:6240: khams rang snang 'og min gyi gnas dang /
NK045(bi)001:6241: bcud kyi sems can rnam par daga pa sa bcu'i
NK045(bi)001:6242: sems dpa' chen po rnams 'khor du yongs su 'dzin
NK045(bi)001:6243: pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa
NK045(bi)001:6244: nyid du gyur pa'i ye shes kyi sku thob pas
NK045(bi)001:6245: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten nam mkha'i mtha' klas pa srid
NK045(bi)001:6246: du ston pa sku gsum gyi rang bzhin sangs rgyas
NK045(bi)001:6247: kyi rgyud de phyogs kyi mu dang dus kyi mtha'
NK045(bi)001:6248: med pa'i ngang tshul can yongs su 'dzin pa dang
NK045(bi)001:6249: pa dang / / lung dang rtogs pa'i chos kyi
NK045(bi)001:6250: tshul mu mtha' med pa'i rgyud kyang yongs su 'dzin
NK045(bi)001:6251: pa dang / / pa dang / de bzhin du
NK045(bi)001:6252: sangs rgyas kyi chos de la spyod pa phyogs bcu'i
NK045(bi)001:6253: 'jig rten gyi khams su 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi
NK045(bi)001:6254: rgyud mu dang mtha' med pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:6255: phrin las chen pos srid pa dang zhi bar gtogs
NK045(bi)001:6256: pa'i phan pa dang bde ba'i chos kun kyang yongs
NK045(bi)001:6258: chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa'i ye shes kyi sku
NK045(bi)001:6259: spang ba dang rtogs pa'i mthar phyin pa rtag brtan
NK045(bi)001:6260: 'pho 'gyur med pa nam mkha' lta bu yid bzhin
NK045(bi)001:6261: nor bu bzhin du lhun gyis grub pa'i phrin las
NK045(bi)001:6262: chen pos 'khor ba'i mu dang mtha' ji srid du
NK045(bi)001:6263: phan bde mdzad pa 'bras bu'i mthar thug thob pa
NK045(bi)001:6264: yin no // gsum pa de ltar bstan pa'i dgos pas mjug bsdu ba ni /
NK045(bi)001:6265: 'gro ba'i nad gso sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste /
NK045(bi)001:6266: 'gro ba'i lus dang sems kyi nad ma lus pa
NK045(bi)001:6267: rtsad nas zhi ba'i tshul gyis gso bar mdzad pa
NK045(bi)001:6268: sman pa'i mchog tu gyur pa ni sangs rgyas yin
NK045(bi)001:6269: te / nad du gyur pa sdug bsngal thams cad
NK045(bi)001:6270: kyi rtsa ba ni dngos por 'dzin pa yin la
NK045(bi)001:6271: de las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dang
NK045(bi)001:6272: te / / nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib
NK045(bi)001:6273: pa las byung ba'i srid zhi'i rgud pa thams cad
NK045(bi)001:6274: ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis shes rab kyi
NK045(bi)001:6275: pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsis gso
NK045(bi)001:6277: de lta bu sman pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya seng ge nyid kyi zhal nas /
NK045(bi)001:6278: brjod bya shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
NK045(bi)001:6279: bstan pa gang zhig de'i khyad par ci lta bu
NK045(bi)001:6280: zhe na byang chub mchog gi lam theg pa chen
NK045(bi)001:6281: po'i zab pa dang rgya che ba'i chos mtha' dag
NK045(bi)001:6283: mdo 'di'i ming ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las
NK045(bi)001:6284: 'das pa'i lam dang 'bras bu'i yon tan gyi rin
NK045(bi)001:6285: po che ma lus pa 'dir chud cing sdud pas
NK045(bi)001:6286: na yon tan rin chen sdud pa byang chub mchog
NK045(bi)001:6288: de ltar gsungs pa'i dgos pa ni lam 'di lta
NK045(bi)001:6289: bu mtha' yas pa'i sems can kun gyisa thob par
NK045(bi)001:6290: bya ba'i phyir bshad de sngon bskal pa grangs med
NK045(bi)001:6291: pa nas sems can rnams yongs su bskyab pa'i don
NK045(bi)001:6292: du bdag nyid mngon par sangs rgyas par bya'o zhes
NK045(bi)001:6293: pa'i dam bca' yongs su rdzogs pa'i lag rjes la
NK045(bi)001:6294: / dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen pos rang
NK045(bi)001:6295: gi thugs su chud pa'i chos zab mo'i mthar thug
NK045(bi)001:6296: pa 'di gdul bya la bstan pas de dus kyi
NK045(bi)001:6297: nye ba'i gdul byar gyur pa dag gis zhal nas
NK045(bi)001:6299: ring ba'i gdul bya rnams kyis kyang brgyud nas thos la /
NK045(bi)001:6300: de ltar thos pas dmigs phyed cing bsam pas don
NK045(bi)001:6301: go la bsgom pas nyams su lon te rim gyis
NK045(bi)001:6302: sangs rgyas par 'gyur zhing de'i tshul gyis phyogs mu
NK045(bi)001:6303: med pa dang dus mtha' yas par yang ye shes
NK045(bi)001:6304: kyi sku mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i sangs rgyas
NK045(bi)001:6305: rnams kyis tshig 'di dang don 'di'i sgo nas sems
NK045(bi)001:6306: can rnams bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam
NK045(bi)001:6307: la 'jog par mdzad pa yin no //
NK045(bi)001:6308: bzhi pa mjug gi don la gzhung lhag ma ma
NK045(bi)001:6309: lus par ston pa'i tshig gis skabs bsdu ba dang
NK045(bi)001:6310: / khungs btsun par ston pa'i ched du lo ts+aa ba'i 'gyur byang smos pa gnyis /
NK045(bi)001:6311: dang po 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
NK045(bi)001:6312: phyin pa sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so
NK045(bi)001:6314: gnyis pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+y+aa ka ra sim ha dang /
NK045(bi)001:6315: zhu chen gyi lo ts+aa ba ban de dpal brtsegs
NK045(bi)001:6316: kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa zhes
NK045(bi)001:6317: so // de dag gis 'phags pa shes rab kyi
NK045(bi)001:6318: pha rol tu phyin pa yon tan rin po che
NK045(bi)001:6319: sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa'i dngos bstan gyi don
NK045(bi)001:6321: rtsa ba'i sa bcad gnyis pa lam mngon par rtogs
NK045(bi)001:6322: pa'i rim pa dang sbyar ba ni zur du yod
NK045(bi)001:6325: legs gsung bka' yi rgya mtsho chen po yi //
NK045(bi)001:6326: snying por gyur pa shes rab phar phyin gyi //
NK045(bi)001:6327: rin chen rin thang bral ba'i yang snying ni //
NK045(bi)001:6328: yon tan rin chen sdud pa'i nor bu yin //
NK045(bi)001:6329: mtshan mchog zla ba rgyas pa'i gzugs kyi sku'i //
NK045(bi)001:6330: zab zhi thugs kyi dbyings na gnas pa gang //
NK045(bi)001:6331: dpal gyi mgul nas legs par drangs pa yi //
NK045(bi)001:6332: chos tshul 'di 'dra 'jig rten kun tu dkon //
NK045(bi)001:6333: mtha' dag chos kyi gzhung lugs nyams pa las //
NK045(bi)001:6334: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshig zur tsam //
NK045(bi)001:6335: nyams pa phangs zhes bden par smra mchog gis //
NK045(bi)001:6336: zhi ba'i zhal chem bzhag pa nye bar dran //
NK045(bi)001:6337: sa bcu'i sems dpa' gang+g+aa'i rdul snyed kyis //
NK045(bi)001:6338: gang gi ye shes cha tsam mi mtshon pa //
NK045(bi)001:6339: bde bar gshegs pas dngos su gsungs pa'i gzhung //
NK045(bi)001:6340: 'chad nyan rtsom la spro ba ches cher 'phel //
NK045(bi)001:6341: ltos shig rigs kyi bu dag chos 'di ni //
NK045(bi)001:6342: zab mo'i mthar thug rgya che'i chos mdzod de //
NK045(bi)001:6343: tshogs gnyis yongs rdzogs rgyal ba'i ye shes kyi //
NK045(bi)001:6344: rgyu mthun dam pa 'di yin dga' bar gyis //
NK045(bi)001:6345: nyams len mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa yang //
NK045(bi)001:6346: don gyis ches cher gsal zhing dngos bstan gyi //
NK045(bi)001:6347: dgongs pa 'grel ba'i lugs bzang dri ma med //
NK045(bi)001:6348: lung dang man ngag rigs pa'i tshul gyis brtsams //
NK045(bi)001:6349: 'di yi dge bas skye ba thams cad du //
NK045(bi)001:6350: zab mo stong dang rten 'byung zung 'jug don //
NK045(bi)001:6351: legs rtogs rgyal ba dgyes pa'i lam bzang las //
NK045(bi)001:6352: nam yang gzhan du ldog par ma gyur cig /
NK045(bi)001:6353: 'di nas sangs rgyas thob pa'i bar du bdag /
NK045(bi)001:6354: skye dang skye bar shes rab gong 'phel zhing //
NK045(bi)001:6355: rang don yid byed spang ba'i snying rje dang //
NK045(bi)001:6356: thabs mkhas mchog gis 'gro don spyod par shog /
NK045(bi)001:6357: rgyal ba mchog la bka' drin gzo sems kyis //
NK045(bi)001:6358: rgyal ba'i chos mdzod ma lus kun 'dzin zhing //
NK045(bi)001:6359: rgyal sras kun tu bzang dang 'jam dbyangs bzhin //
NK045(bi)001:6360: rgyal ba'i phrin las srid mthar spel gyur cig /
NK045(bi)001:6361: gzhung 'di mthong thos sems sogs byed pa dang //
NK045(bi)001:6362: bdag la bzang ngan las kyis 'brel thogs kun //
NK045(bi)001:6363: myur du lta ba'i thib po rab bsal nas //
NK045(bi)001:6364: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas gyur cig /
NK045(bi)001:6365: chos 'di chos nyid bzhin du legs bshad pa //
NK045(bi)001:6366: bden pa de yis sras bcas rgyal kun gyis //
NK045(bi)001:6367: 'di 'dzin rnams kyi blo gros spobs pa'i dpal //
NK045(bi)001:6368: bskyed nas phyogs las rnam par rgyal gyur cig /
NK045(bi)001:6369: bstan la gnod pa dam sri kla klo sogs //
NK045(bi)001:6370: mi dang mi min nag po'i rtsar lag rnams //
NK045(bi)001:6371: gzhung 'di'i glegs bam bzhugs pa'i phyogs su yang //
NK045(bi)001:6372: gnod pa'i bsam sbyor gtan nas zhi gyur cig /
NK045(bi)001:6373: chos ltar bcos pa'i mun sprul ji snyed pa //
NK045(bi)001:6374: 'di yi byin gyis rming med bcom gyur nas //
NK045(bi)001:6375: yang dag chos kyi snang ba 'bar ba'i mthus //
NK045(bi)001:6376: 'gro ba'i phan bde gong nas gong 'phel shog /
NK045(bi)001:6377: dus kyi snyigs ma bdo ba'i smag 'di la'ang //
NK045(bi)001:6378: lhag bsam zla ba'i cha shas gong 'phel zhing //
NK045(bi)001:6379: gzhan phan bsil zer bye ba'i 'od 'phro ba //
NK045(bi)001:6380: du ma mdzes pa ngoms bzhin 'char gyur cig /
NK045(bi)001:6381: bstan 'dzin mchog rnams yun ring 'tsho gzhes shing //
NK045(bi)001:6382: bstan pa'i sbyin bdag rnams kyang 'byor pa 'phel //
NK045(bi)001:6383: bstan pa'i snying por 'gro kun dad gyur nas //
NK045(bi)001:6384: bstan pa rin chen mchog tu rgyas par shog /
NK045(bi)001:6385: mkha' mthas khyab pa'i yid can rgya mtsho rnams //
NK045(bi)001:6386: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i lam bzang la //
NK045(bi)001:6387: bdag nyid gcig pus legs par bkod gyur nas //
NK045(bi)001:6388: kun kyang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid gyur cig /
NK045(bi)001:6389: gzhung 'di gang du dar ba'i sa phyogs su //
NK045(bi)001:6390: nad dang dbul phongs 'thab rtsod zhi ba dang //
NK045(bi)001:6391: bsam don chos bzhin 'grub cing bkra shis pa'i //
NK045(bi)001:6392: dga' ston gong nas gong du 'phel gyur cig /
NK045(bi)001:6393: de ltar rgyal ba'i yum gyi dgongs don la ma
NK045(bi)001:6394: nor bar 'jug pa'i 'grel bshad 'di ni rang nyid
NK045(bi)001:6395: chung ngu'i dus nas chos 'di la lhag par mos
NK045(bi)001:6396: pa'i dbang gis / rang rgyud la chos zab mo'i
NK045(bi)001:6397: bag chags bzang po 'jog pa sogs kyi don du
NK045(bi)001:6398: brtsam par 'dod pa'i blo yod pa'i nyer len gyi
NK045(bi)001:6399: pa'i dbang gis / rgyu la / lhan cig byed
NK045(bi)001:6400: pa'i rkyen du gyur pa snga 'gyur rdzogs pa chen
NK045(bi)001:6401: po'i rnal 'byor pa rig 'dzin sna tshogs rang grol
NK045(bi)001:6402: gyis don gnyer chen pos gsung gis bskul ma yang
NK045(bi)001:6403: nas yang du mdzad pa dang /
NK045(bi)001:6404: snga 'gyur gyi ring lugs pa chen po bla ma
NK045(bi)001:6405: dam pa lung rtogs nas kyang nan tan du bskul
NK045(bi)001:6406: zhing / mang du thos pa mdo sngags kyi ming
NK045(bi)001:6407: can sogs chos smra ba du mas bskul ba la
NK045(bi)001:6408: brten nas chos tshul 'di la yid ches brtan par
NK045(bi)001:6409: gyur pa mi pham 'jam dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rjes
NK045(bi)001:6410: rgya bod kyi 'grel pa rnams kyi legs par bshad
NK045(bi)001:6411: pa la brten nas rang lo zhe bdun pa dga'
NK045(bi)001:6412: ba chu 'brug gi lor rgyal dbang pad+mas byin gyis
NK045(bi)001:6413: brlabs pa'i gnas dkar mo stag tshang du grags pa'i
NK045(bi)001:6414: dpal gyi ke'u tshang gong ma bkra shis dpal 'bar
NK045(bi)001:6415: pad+ma bde ldan gling zhes bya bar hor zla drug
NK045(bi)001:6416: pa'i tshes bcu bzhi la dbu btsugs nas nyi ma
NK045(bi)001:6417: zhing / brgyud mar / dal khoms dang bstun par
NK045(bi)001:6418: ci rigs re bris shing zla ba de'i tshes nyer
NK045(bi)001:6419: brgyad pa rgyu skar rgyal dang ldan pa'i dus bzang
NK045(bi)001:6420: po sogs rten 'brel phun sum tshogs pa la yongs
NK045(bi)001:6421: su rdzogs par grub par bgyis pa 'dis phyogs dang
NK045(bi)001:6422: dus thams cad du khyab cing bstan pa dang sems
NK045(bi)001:6423: can ris su ma chad pa la phan pa rmad
NK045(bi)001:6424: du byung ba rgyun mi 'chad par byed par shog
